item.text: @#/ /rgyud ja pa bzhugs so//
@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ sarba ra ha s+yo nA ma ta n+t+ra rA dzA/ bod skad du/ thams cad gsang ba zhes
bya ba rgyud kyi rgyal po/ bcom ldan 'das ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'byung lnga nyid
kyis lnga yi bdag nyid can/ /mi rnams lus la nges par mthong ba dag /rang sems rab tu bsgom par
gyur na ni/ /dngos der bsgoms pas nges par sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /rang shes gsang ba dam pa ni/ /sangs
@##/ /rgyas ye shes bla med de/ /gnyis med gnyis kyi tshul can te/ /sangs rgyas rtag par rab tu 'dud/ /
yang dag bdag med las byung zhing / /gnyis med ye shes las byung ba/ /sdug dang mi sdug rnam spangs pa/ /
ci la'ang phyag ni mi 'tshal to/ /ma skyes pa ni yang dag bskyed/ /skyes pa'i 'og tu rtag par ni/ /sangs rgyas skur
ni sgom pa dang / /rang gi ye shes mchog phyag 'tshal/ /rnal 'byor pa dang sems can kun/ /ma skyes pa ni yang dag
skye/ /skyes pa'i 'og tu rtag par ni/ /nyon mongs bag chags kyis sun 'byin/ /lus can rnams ni 'khor gyur pa/ /
sdug dang mi sdug rnam 'byed yin/ /sems gang de nyid sdug bsngal te/ /sems can rnams kyi lus 'byung ngo / /sems de yi ni
rgyun nyid kyis/ /'gro ba sdug bsngal gnon par 'gyur/ /rnam par snang mdzad rgyal ba mgon/ /sangs rgyas thams cad bsdus
gcig pu/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rtogs gyur pa/ /sangs rgyas 'khor ba sgrol ba po/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /thugs
rje'i nyams dang yang dag ldan/ /rgyu yi de nyid mnyam sbyor bas/ /'bras bu'i de nyid rnams kyang ston/ /'bras bu'i de nyid yang
dag zhugs/ /rgyu yi de nyid mi 'dod do/ /gang du 'dod pa skyes gyur pa/ /de nyid 'khor ba'i bag chags yin/ /mkhas pa yi ni
cho ga yis/ /bsgom pa ru ni yongs su btags/ /gang zhig slar yang gcig gyur pa/ /rnal 'byor pa yi rnal 'byor byung / /
@#/ /sangs rgyas rjes dran la dmigs shing / /chos ni rjes su dmigs pa yi/ /tshogs gnyis kyi ni sbyor ba
yis/ /rkang gnyis dam pa nyid du 'gyur/ /b+ha gar ling ga rab bzhag ste/ /sangs rgyas skur ni rnam par bsgom/ /sangs rgyas rjes
dran rnal 'byor pa/ /sangs rgyas sprin ni bsgom par bya/ /b+ha gar ling ga rab bzhag ste/ /rdo rje chos ni rnam par bsgom/ /chos ni
rjes dran rnal 'byor pa/ /chos kyi sprin las char rab 'bebs/ /mtshan ma ling ga zhes bshad de/ /phyag rgyas mtshan ma rnam
pa bzhi/ /'joms pas b+ha ga zhes bshad de/ /nyon mongs 'joms pa'i dam pa yin/ /sems can kun gyi dngos kun gyi/ /
rang sems chos ni bsdus pa yin/ /chos bdag med pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /bsad na rang nyid 'chi bar 'gyur/ /rang gi sems
nyid rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /rtogs par bya ba sems nyid yin/ /rang gi sems nyid gsang bya ba/ /sems nyid kho na gsad par bya/ /sbyor ba nyid dang yang dag 'brel/ /gang
yang srid pa 'byung ma yin/ /gang tshe sangs rgyas de tshe ni/ /sbyor lnga sangs rgyas bdag ces bsgom/ /ting 'dzin ye shes las byung ba/ /sangs rgyas nyid phyir mdor bsdus
pas/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor med pa ni/ /rnal 'byor pa ni 'tshang mi rgya/ /phra mo'i dngos po ji bzhin mthong / /sdug pa'i dngos por de bzhin te/ /dngos dang dngos med khyad par
ni/ /bsgom pa kun tu brtags pa yin/ /dngos po bsgom pa'i dngos ma yin/ /bsgom par bya ba bsgom pa yin/ /dngos po bsgoms par gyur pa yis/ /rang gi sems ni
yongs su sbyangs/ /sangs rgyas sangs rgyas yul ma yin/ /sems can yul du'ang mi 'gyur gyi/ /rang sems rtogs pas sangs rgyas te/ /sangs rgyas sangs rgyas rtogs
pas min/ /gnyis med sbyor ba 'di la yang / /ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes brtags/ rgyu yi de nyid ji ltar mthong / /'bras bu'i de nyid de nyid yin/ /rgyu yi de nyid cung zad
med/ /'bras bu'i de nyid de bzhin no/ /de nyid de ni de bzhin shes/ /de nyid rnal 'byor pa kun spyod/ /rgyu yis rgyu ni dngos por min/ /'bras bu'i dngos por 'bras bus
@#/ /min/ /rgyu de 'bras bu'i dngos por rung / /rang gi sems ni so sor rnang / /ye shes de ni rgyu dngos te/ /gsang de 'bras bu'i dngos po yin/ /gsang
ba gnyis med spyod pa yis/ /de yis dngos pos mchog yin no/ /de nyid de nyid rtogs gyur pa/ /gsang de gsang ba'i rnal 'byor ba/ /gsang ba de rig shes pa ste/ /
mchog ni mchog gi rnal 'byor pa/ /sdug pa'i ngo bor gang bshad pa/ /mi sdug pa yang de yi dngos/ /sdug dang mi sdug gzugs gang yin/ /mi mthong de ni de bzhin
gshegs/ /rnam shes tsam ni med pa ru/ /rnal 'byor rnal 'byor 'byung mi 'gyur/ /ji ltar ye shes mchog dag pa/ /de ltar dag pa de bzhin gshegs/ /rnam
par shes pa rnam pa bzhi/ /phyag rgya bzhi yi cho ga yis/ /gsang ba gnyis med sbyor ba yis/ /sku gsung thugs ni yang dag byung / /thugs ni phyag rgya chen po ste/ /dam
tshig phyag rgya kun tu 'gro/ /chos kyi phyag rgya gsung gi ste/ /las kyi phyag rgya sku yi yin/ /rgya yis rgyas btab dngos po ni/ /gsang bdag gsang ba'i rnal 'byor pa'o/ /
rang rig pa yi ngo bo yis/ /ting 'dzin ye shes brtags pa yin/ /lus ngag sems su rnam brtags pa'i/ /bya ba rgyud du rnam btags pa/ /gsang ba rnam pa gsum
du bshad/ /rdo rje las can sna tshogs bzhin/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi bdag nyid ni/ /gsang ba'i ye shes bla med yin/ /phyag rgya bzhi po gsang ba de/ /rnal 'byor pa yis las
grub byed/ /'byung ba chen po bzhi po yang / /phyag rgya bzhi zhes bshad pa yin/ /phyag rgya bzhi yis mnyam sbyor ba/ /lha mo bzhi dang yang dag sbyor/ /sa ni spyan zhes bshad
pa yin/ /chu ni mA ma kI zhes bshad/ /me dang rlung zhes grags pa ni/ /gos dkar mo dang sgrol ma yin/ /dbang chen sa yi khams yin te/ /chu yi khams ni chu dkyil 'khor/
/me ni me yi khams yin te/ /rlung ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor ro/ /dbang chen kha dog ser po ste/ /gru bzhi pa ste rgyas pa yin/ /chu yi dkyil 'khor zlum po ste/ /dkar po'i mdog
can zhi ba'i yin/ /me yi dkyil 'khor kha dog dmar/ /gru gsum dbang gi las rnams la'o/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor gzhu yi dbyings/ /nag po'i gdug pa'i las rnams
la/ /'byung ba che bdag las grub pa/ /las kyi dngos grub yon tan bzhi/ /las kyi dngos grub dngos grub mchog /'khor los bsgyur ba rnam pa bzhi/ /zhi ba la ni spyan gyi
tshul/ /rgyas pa pad+ma'i rdo rje can/ /dbang la rnam par snang mdzad gnas/ /rdo rje khro bo mngon spyod la'o/ /zhi ba dgongs ka bya ba yin/ /de bzhin rgyas pa snga dro la/ /gdug pa'i
@#/ /las rnams nyi ma'i gung / /dbang gi las ni mtshan phyed bya/ /zhi la dkar po sbyar bar bya/ /ser por snang ba rgyas pa la/ /dbang gi las la dmar po
ste/ /gdug pa nag po rab tu sbyar/ /ting 'dzin ye shes las byung ba/ /las kyi bsgrub pa dam pa yin/ /bcom ldan dag pa bsgom bya ste/ /sangs rgyas kun las mi g.yo
gyur/ /b+ha ga'i dbus su gsang ba'i bdag /rdo rje'i dbyings ni de bzhin gshegs/ /lnga yi bdag gyur bdag nyid ni/ /bsgoms na g.yo ba med par 'gyur/ /snying la
gnas pa'i lha mo che/ /rnal 'byor pa yi rnal 'byor bskyed/ /sangs rgyas thams cad bskyed mdzad yum/ /rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang mor bshad/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti
mug ste/ /'di dag 'jig rten dug gsum yin/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dug mi mnga'/ /rdo rje dbyings ni de bzhin gshegs/ /chags dang sdang dang rmongs pa rnams/ /
bsgoms nas khams gsum pa yi bdag /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gyur te/ /sangs rgyas bden pas gdug bcom mo/ /rang sems so sor rtogs pa yis/ /gti
mug sems ni de bzhin gshegs/ /rmongs pa nyid ni 'jig rten gyur/ /sems can kun la blta bar bya/ /zhe sdang sems ni de bzhin gshegs/ /phra mo'i ye shes
yang dag bskyed/ /sdang gyur rdo rje nyid du gyur/ /sems can thams cad gzhig par bya/ /'dod chags sems ni de bzhin gshegs/ /byang chub sems ni yang dag bskyed/ /
chags gyur bzang po nyid gyur pa/ /sangs rgyas thams cad chags par bya/ /byams pa'i sems ni de bzhin gshegs/ /nga rgyal yang dag bskyed nas ni/ /mdza' bor gyur
cing kun nyid gyur/ /sangs rgyas kun la 'khyud par bya/ /chags pa'i lta bas byams pa ste/ /thugs rje'i chos ni smra ba dang / /kun la mi 'jigs sbyin pa dang / /sangs rgyas
thams cad mnyes bya'o/ /rnal 'byor sbyin las rab dga' ste/ /tshul khrims ldan las dri med 'gyur/ /bzod pa las ni 'od byed pa/ /brtson las 'od 'phro can dang
ldan/ /bsam gtan las ni sbyang dka' ba/ /shes rab kyis ni mngon gyur mthong / /thabs chen las ni ring du song / /stobs dang ldan las mi g.yo 'gyur/ /smon lam
gyis ni legs blo ldan/ /ye shes ldan las chos kyi sprin/ /rgyal ba de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ /rang rig bdag nyid bcu gcig 'gyur/ /pha rol phyin pa bcu rnams dang / /
stobs dang dbang ni rdzogs gyur cing / /sa bcu las ni 'das gyur ba/ /mtshan ma brtan gyur de las ni/ /rdo rje chu ni rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /chos kyi bdud rtsi bcud len
@#/ /yin/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi mtha' yas pa/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa spangs pa yin/ /chos kyi bdud rtsi bcud kyis len/ /rdo rje'i chu ni dag 'thungs
pas/ /rdo rje slob dpon rnal 'byor ba/ /'dod nas dag par de tshe 'gyur/ /'dod nas dag par gnas gyur pa/ /de nas byang chub sems su 'gyur/ /byang chub sems kyi
bdag can 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /rnam par grol ba'i ras kyis g.yogs/ /byang chub sems ni bla na med/ /yang dag bskyed gyur rnal
'byor pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' snying la 'dug /sems can khams ni mtha' yas pa'i/ /mar gyur dam tshig 'dzin byed pa/ /rdo rje dam tshig gis spyod na/ /rtag tu dam
tshig gnas par gyur/ /khams gsum lam ni nyams dga' bar/ /bud med ces bshad ji snyed pa/ /cho ga bzhin du kun spyod cing / /thugs kyi rdo rje smad mi bya/ /rdo rje gsum
gyi sku la gnas/ /dam tshig phyag rgya ji snyed pa/ /rdo rje dam tshig gsum gyis bya/ /gsung gi rdo rje smad mi bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' las byung ba'i/ /phyag rgya kun ni bud
med bzang / /de rnams sten pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /phyag rgya thams cad dbang du 'gyur/ /'jig rten khams ni thams cad na/ /bud med ces bya ji snyed pa/ /phyag rgya chen
po'i sbyor ba yis/ /de dag kun la nye bar spyad/ /gsang ba mchog gi rnal 'byor pa/ /ting 'dzin ye shes dam pa yin/ /gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na/ /nga rgyal ma yin hUM ma
yin/ /rig pa ma yin sngags rig min/ /lag pa'i phyag rgya'ang mi bca' 'o/ /mchod rten gyi ni las mi bya/ /glegs bam dag kyang bklag mi bya/ /dkyil 'khor dag ni mi bya
zhing / /rdo rje mchog gsum phyag mi btsal/ /slob dpon smad par mi bya ste/ /bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/ /khyod kyi srog chags gsad par bya/ /brdzun gyi tshig kyang smra
bar bya/ /khyod kyis ma byin blang bya zhing / /gzhan gyi bud med bsten par bya/ /sbyin sreg yang na bsam gtan min/ /lus ngag yid ni mi phyed pa/ /gzhan min sems kyis bya
ba ste/ /'di ni gsang ba'i mchog yin no/ /sngags rnams thams cad rab tu 'grub/ /rnal 'byor kun kyang rnam kun tu/ /de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis/ /sangs rgyas
chos nyid bsgom par bya/ /ma 'dres chos ni bco brgyad po/ /sangs rgyas chos zhes bshad pa yin/ /de rnams rtag tu bsgom pa ni/ /sangs rgyas chos ni sgrub byed yin/ /
bsam gtan bzhi dang gzugs med bzhi/ /rtag tu thob par byas pa dang / /'gog pa'i snyoms 'jug de yis ni/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu bsgrub/ /byang chub phyogs
@#/ /ni sum cu bdun/ /chos su yang dag bshad pa gang / /de rnams bsgoms pas dag pa dang / /byang chub sems dpa' 'gro phan yin/ /'gro ba rnams
la spro ba'i sems/ /brtan zhing snying po rab bsgoms pa/ /stong pa'i de nyid las byung ba/ /rdo rje ye shes zhes bya ba bshad/ /chos bdag med las yang dag byung / /gnyis
med ye shes dam pa ste/ /chos nyid mchog gi ye shes ni/ /chos kyi dbyings zhes yang dag bshad/ /'di ni chos dbyings ye shes te/ /rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin skyes/ /
rdo rje ye shes rang bzhin sems/ /rdo rje dbyings zhes bya bar bshad/ /sems kyi spro ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /phra mo'i ye shes sogs sbyor ba/ /de bzhin gshegs kun ye
shes ni/ /rnam par snang mdzad ces byar bshad/ /byams pa spro ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /sbyor ba spyod par byed pa'i mchog /zag med brtan par gyur ba yi/ /thugs ni
mi bskyod pa zhes bshad/ /thugs rje spro ba'i tshul gyis ni/ /sems can phan 'dogs mdzad pa po/ /thugs ni 'gro don yang dag ldan/ /rin chen 'byung ldan zhes
bshad do/ /dga' bas spro ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /theg chen mchog ni dri ma med/ /thugs ni 'od gsal dag pa ni/ /'od dpag med ces de bshad do/ /btang snyoms
spro bar mdzad pa'i shugs/ /sems can thams cad rtogs mdzad pa/ /don yod bla med bya ba ni/ /don yod grub par de bshad do/ /byang chub rang bzhin ye shes mchog /de
'dir rdo rje zhes bshad do/ /rdo rje ye shes las byung ba/ /rdo rje sems dpar de bshad do/ /sangs rgyas thams cad spyan 'dren pa/ /rdo rje lcags kyu zhes bshad de/ /rdo rje'i rigs
rnams kun gyi rgyal/ /rdo rje rgyal por de bshad do/ /sangs rgyas thams cad chags byed pas/ /mnyes par byed pa zhes bshad do/ /bdud kyi sbyor ba chags pa che/ /rdo rje
chags par de bshad do/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes byed cing / /legs so zhes pa rab sogs pa/ /byang chub sems dpa' dga' byed pas/ /rdo rje legs par de bshad
do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa gang / /mkha' mnyam rdo rje las byung ba/ /don yod rin chen chen po de/ /rdo rje rin chen de bshad do/ /ma rig bral ba'i ye shes ni/ /tshogs
dag las ni nges par byung / /thar pa'i snang ba gzi brjid che/ /rdo rje nyi mar de bshad do/ /rnam pa kun gyi dngos ye shes/ /thar pa'i lam 'jug thob mdzad gang / /chos kyi
rgyal mtshan tog chen po/ /rdo rje dpal du de bshad do/ /rdo rje bshad pa rnal 'byor che/ /sangs rgyas kun 'byung rmad byung ba/ /'di ni byang chub sems dpa' che/ /rdo rje bzhad
@#/ /par de bshad do/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rnal 'byor che/ /sangs rgyas chos ni rtogs mdzad pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos dag pa/ /rdo rje chos
su de bshad do/ /shes rab rnon po theg pa che/ /nyon mongs thams cad nges gcod mdzad/ /shes bya'i sgrib pa gcod pa po/ /rdo rje rnon por de bshad do/ /sangs rgyas rol
mo'i 'khor lo ni/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor bas/ /sems dpa' chen po theg pa che/ /rdo rje rgyu zhes de bshad do/ /shes rab ye shes rang bzhin dag /gsung gi
sgra ni rnam par spang / /'jam pa'i gsung gi bdag nyid gyur/ /rdo rje smra bar de bshad do/ /pha rol phyin pa kun gyi zhabs/ /chos rnams thams cad rtogs mdzad pa/ /sems
can kun don sprul pa po/ /rdo rje las zhes bya bar bshad/ /sangs rgyas rjes dran yang dag grub/ /theg pa dman pa rnam spangs shing / /byang chub sems la rab zhugs
pa/ /rdo rje bsrung bar de bshad do/ /sdig pa thams cad zad byed cing / /de bzhin nyon mongs rnams sreg la/ /nyon mongs zad pa nyer len pas/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin de
bshad do/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje rnams/ /bcing ba ru ni yang dag gyur/ /de nyid de nyid ye shes te/ /rdo rje khu tshur zhes bshad do/ /dam tshig phyag rgya thams cad ni/ /
rdo rje bsdams las yang dag byung / /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis gyur pa/ /las kyi phyag rgya zhes bshad do/ /nga rgyal med cing snang ba med/ /mtshan ma med cing zhen pa med/ /bdag med
mnyam nyid ye shes ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' zhes byar bshad/ /gsang ba'i mnyam par 'byor ba 'dir/ /ye shes pha rol phyin dge ba/ /rnam pa bcu gnyis yang dag byung / /rdo rje
pha rol phyin pa'i 'od/ /byang chub sems ni rab bsgoms pas/ /pha rol sangs rgyas nyid son pa'i/ /pha rol phyin thob ye shes ni/ /rdo rje sems mar bshad pa yin/ /bsdu ba'i
dngos po bzhi rnams ni/ /shes rab pha rol phyin rdo rje/ /chos bzhi gcig tu gyur pa ni/ /rdo rje rin chen mar bshad do/ /gsang ba'i ye shes ye shes che/ /de nyid pha rol phyin
dge ba/ /pha rol phyin pa che las byung / /rdo rje chos mar shes par bya/ /pha rol phyin pa'i dge ba ni/ /sbyor ba'i thabs su rab bstan pa/ /rdo rje las mar shes par bya/ /gang phyir de ni
rol pa dge/ /sgeg mo sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin/ /tshul khrims pha rol phyin dge bas/ /brgyan pa'i yan lag yid 'ong yin/ /glu ma bzod pa'i pha rol phyin/ /ched du brjod pa'i
chos brjod pa'o/ /gar ma brtson 'grus pha rol phyin/ /myur du sangs rgyas nyid ster ba'o/ /bdug pa shes rab pha rol phyin/ /kun tu khyab par spros phyir ro/ /me tog bsam
@#/ /gtan pha rol phyin/ /'dod pa'i 'dam gyis ma gos pa'o/ /mar me smon lam pha rol phyin/ /phyogs kun snang bar byed pa yin/ /dri ni thabs kyi pha
rol phyin/ /dri ngan thur sel dge ba yin/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi thabs chen po/ /dbye ba rnam pa bzhi yis gnas/ /thams cad 'dod pa'i thabs chen po/ /rdo rje lcags kyu zhes
bshad do/ /byang chub spyad pa spyod byed pa/ /rdo rje zhags pa zhes bshad do/ /theg pa 'di la brten 'gyur gang / /rdo rje lcags sgrog ces bshad do /chos rnams thams
cad ma skyes shing / /gdod nas zhi ba mkha' dang mnyam/ /de lta'i tshig ni rab 'jug pas/ /rdo rje dril bu zhes bshad do/ /tshogs gnyis kyi ni sbyor ba yis/ /sems can
kun gyi don ston pa'i/ /sems ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yin par bshad/ /yang dag rdo rje rtogs pa ste/ /'dzin pa'i sbyor nyid lcags kyu
yin/ /phra rab 'bigs pa mda' zhes bya/ /dgyes pas legs so zhes bya ba/ /spras pas rin po che ru bshad/ /gzi brjid ces bya nyi ma yin/ /sgreng bas tog tu
bshad pa ste/ /rnam par 'byed pas bzhad par bshad/ /'dod chags dag pa pad+ma yin/ /nyon mongs dgra bcom ral gri ste/ /dkyil 'khor sbyor bas 'khor lo
yin/ /gang gi brjod pas smra bar bshad/ /kun nyid sna tshogs rdo rje yin/ /gzhig dka'i sbyor ba go cha yin/ /'jigs pa'i spyod pas mche ba ste/ /phyag rgya'i sbyor nyid
bcing ba yin/ /dkyil 'khor du ni gang bshad pa/ /yid kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa yin/ /gzhal yas khang ni ye shes te/ /sems kyi brtsegs pa sgreng ba yin/ /phyi yi gru bzhi
pa gang yin/ /tshad kyis mnyam pa nyid gyur pa/ /byams pa la sogs sems gang yin/ /thig bzhi zhes ni bshad pa yin/ /chos kyi sbyor ba rjes dran nyid/ /gang de rdo rje thig
du bshad/ /lta ba kun las rnam grol ba/ /ye shes thig tu bshad pa yin/ /tshul khrims tshogs kyi dam pa ni/ gang zhig rgyan du bshad pa yin/ /dad dbang la sogs
sems gang yin/ /ra ba lngar ni yang dag byung / /rnam par thar pa bzhi po ni/ /sgo rnams su ni yang dag bshad/ /yang dag spong ba bzhi po ni/ /rta babs rnams dang ka bar
byung / /dran pa nyer gzhag bzhi po ni/ /khyams rnams bzhi por shes par bya/ /rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhi po ni/ /de ni sgo khyud rnam bzhi yin/ /byang chub yan lag bdun po
ni/ /phreng ba me tog chun brgyan pa/ /'phags lam yan lag brgyad po ni/ /ka pa brgyad ces bya bar bshad/ /sgrib pa gnyis las rnam grol zhing / /ting 'dzin ye shes
@#/ /kyis brtags pa/ /lam gyi ye shes khyad par rnams/ /rnga yab ces ni yang dag bshad/ /nyon mongs thams cad nges gcod cing / /nyon mongs
'phrog pas dra ba ste/ /yang dag gcod cing spong ba nyid/ /sel ba'i spong ba la gnas pa/ /tshogs gnyis kyi ni sbyor pa nyid/ /nyon mongs pa yi phyed 'phrog pa/ /dra ba phyed ces
bya bar bshad/ /rang bzhin 'od gsal gang yin de/ /byang chub sems ni bla med yin/ /sems ni don kun skyed byed pa/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yin par bshad/ /shes rab
ye shes rang bzhin dag /rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin skyes/ /thar pa'i snang ba gzi brjid che/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor yin par bshad/ /tshon rtsi lngar ni yang dag ces/ /lta
ba lnga yi me tog yin/ /ye shes lnga yi nges sbyor nyid/ /sangs rgyas lnga zhes yang dag bshad/ /nam mkha' bzhin du bdag med pa'i/ /rnam shes ye shes dam pa yin/ /
ye shes de yi rgyan bshad pa/ /chags pa'i sems zhes bya bar bshad/ /chags bral las ni byang chub 'byung / /chags pa'i sems las gzhan yin no/ /de bas
chags dang chags bral ba/ /byang chub sems zhes yang dag bshad/ /'jig rten chags dang bral bas 'dul/ /phyag rgya'i dngos grub chags las byung / /der ni
thabs kyi sgom pa dag /dngos grub thams cad ster ba yin/ /ji ltar 'jig rten 'dul 'gyur ba/ /de ltar rnal 'byor ba yis spyad/ /ji ltar gdul bya dag gyur pa/ /zhen pa
kun tu mchod par 'gyur/ /mtshan nyid gang zhig yang dag bshad/ /mtshan nyid des ni mtshon par 'gyur/ /sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgya yis/ /rgyas btab ye shes yin
par bshad/ /phyag rgya bsgoms pas rnal 'byor ba/ /rtag tu phyag rgya'i bdag can 'gyur/ /rgyas btab dngos po shes nas ni/ /bsgoms na phyag rgyas btab par 'gyur/ /
mtshan dang mtshan nyid 'brel ba ni/ /shes nas rnal 'byor yang dag spyod/ /ji ltar mtshan nyid yang dag grub/ /de bzhin dag pa myur du 'grub/ /g.yas pa'i cha yi mtshan
mas ni/ /shes rab can ni rab tu bstan/ /g.yon gyi mtshan ma ji ltar mthong / /de yis thugs rje mtshon pa yin/ /phyag ni gnyis ka'i mnyam sbyor las/ /ting 'dzin gnyis
su bshad pa yin/ /zhabs gnyis kyi ni mtshan ma yis/ /tshogs gnyis dag ni bstan pa yin/ /sor mo lnga yi mnyam sbyor las/ /dkyil 'khor lnga yis brgyan pa yin/ /
sangs rgyas lnga yes mngon byang chub/ /rim pa bzhin du bstan bya ste/ /gang zhig gung mo ston pa ni/ /nam mkha' las ni byung ba mtshon/ /gang zhig mdzub mo ston pa ni/ /des
@#/ /ni dbang chen dkyil 'khor yin/ /sran lag tu ni yang dag bshad/ /chu yi dkyil 'khor zhes bshad do/ /gang zhig mthe bo ston pa ni/ /de yis me
ni mtshon pa yin/ /gang zhig mthe'u chung ston pa ni/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor nyid du 'gyur/ /gang zhig lte ba ston pa ni/ /rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug bshad/ /gang zhig
snying ga ston pa ni/ /rdo rje sems mar rjes su dpag /gang zhig smin mtshams ston pa ni/ /rdo rje rin chen ma zhes bya/ /gang zhig lkog ma ston pa ni/ /rdo rje chos mar shes
par bya/ /gang zhig spyi bo ston pa ni/ /rdo rje las mar shes par bya/ /byang chub lngar mngon byang chub pa'am/ /yang na ye shes lnga rnams sam/ /sangs rgyas lnga dang yang
dag ldan/ /dkyil 'khor byang chub yin par bstan/ /sngon gyi sgrar ni ji skad bshad/ /mdun du de ni rab tu bstan/ /rgyab kyi sgrar ni ji ltar bshad/ /phyi mar de ni yang dag
bstan/ /gang du thog ma'i sgrar gyur pa/ /de ni rgyu yi sgra ru bstan/ /gang zhig tha ma'i sgrar gyur ba/ /'di ni 'bras bur yang dag bstan/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan gnyis mi
mnga'/ /rgyu dang 'bras bur ldan 'gyur min/ /gang phyir thog ma tha ma mod/ /de phyir rtag pa zhes bshad do/ /rang sems rtogs pas sangs rgyas te/ /rtogs par bya
zhing sems nyid yin/ /sangs rgyas zhing zhes bshad pa dang / /byang chub sems su shes par bya/ /rang bzhin dag pa'i sems can ni/ /kun tu rig par yang dag bshad/ /
sems can rang bzhin dag pa ni/ /byang chub sems su shes par bya/ /dang por gyur pa snying gar rdebs/ /brtan pa nyid du'ang rang nyid 'gyur/ /sgra 'dzin pa ni ral pa'i dbus/ /
'od dpag med du mnyam gzhag yin/ /tsum pa na ni rjes bshad pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje gsung / /dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor ba/ /rnam par snang mdzad ces
bshad do/ /bu mo lo grangs bcu gnyis par/ /skyes mchog thub pas gang gsungs pa/ /pha rol phyin pa bcu gnyis su/ /gsungs kyi gzhan du mi brtag go /bu mo lo grangs
bcu drug par/ /de bzhin gshegs pas gang gsungs pa/ /rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa' yi/ /bsgom pa'i don gyi sgra yin no/ /lha mo lo grangs nyi shu par/ /'khor
los bsgyur bas ji skad gsungs/ /mchod pa nyi shu'i bdag nyid can/ /nyi shu po dang rim bzhin no/ /rang gi chung ma rang rig las/ /byung ba'i rang rig yin par bshad/ /
gzhan gyi chung mar gang bstan pa/ /gzhan sdug gzhan gyi rig pa yin/ /gci dang rdo rje zhes bshad pa/ /rdo rje ye shes bla med yin/ /bshang dang pad+ma zhes bshad pa/ /chos
@#/ /kyi ye shes rnyog med yin/ /yongs su gsal bar rnam shes pa/ /dkyil 'khor thugs kyi dam pa yin/ /sku gsung thugs kyi spyod pa yis/ /'bad pa
yis ni mchod byed pa/ /rang gi rdo rje pad+mar ldan/ /dbang po gnyis las byung ba yi/ /rang gi khu ba thig le yis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' mchod par bya/ /tshogs gnyis kyi ni sbyor
ba yis/ /sangs rgyas thams cad gcig bsdus pa/ /gnyis med gnyis nyid la brten pa/ /thugs rje nyams dang yang dag ldan/ /dbang po gnyis kyis mnyam sbyor bas/ /
rang gi khu ba mkhas pa yis/ /rnal 'byor chen po byung nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor yang dag byin gyis brlab/ /dgod dam rab tu smra ba'am/ /sangs rgyas rol mo'i gar byed pa/ /
lha mo bzhi yis mnyam sbyor bas/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu rnams kyis rol/ /gsang zhing legs par bsgril ba dang / /tshad dang ldan zhing mdzes pa yis/ /shes rab can gyis thig
gdab pa/ /sku gsung thugs ni bsgoms pas so/ /zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhis ni mdzes byas la/ /thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan/ /dar dang me tog phreng
bas brgyan/ /grwa yi mtshams ni thams cad dang / /sgo khyud kyi ni nad rnams su/ /rdo rje rin chen spras pas ni/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor thig gdab po/ /rdo rje'i thig gis yongs
bskor zhing / /ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes/ /ka ba brgyad kyi nang gnas pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor brgyad par bstan pa dang / /grwa yi dkyil 'khor dor bar ni/ /rdo rje lha mo'i tshogs kyis
mchod/ /'khor lo lnga dang yang dag ldan/ /dkyil 'khor lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /dra ba dra phyed kyis brgyan cing / /rnga yab kyis ni nyer spras pa/ /khru ni bcu gnyis bya ba'am/ /khru
bcu drug tu rab tu brtag /yang na khru ni nyi shu tsam/ /nyi shu lnga dang ldan pa yis/ /khru ni nyi shu lnga pa yis/ /dkyil 'khor yang dag byin gyis brlab/ /sgo rnams kyi ni dbus ma'i
cha/ /cha dgu ru ni rnam dbye ba/ /dkyil 'khor sgo ru bsams nas ni/ /sgo khyud der ni bya ba yin/ /sgo khyud dkyil 'khor rnam pa ni/ /snying po'i dkyil 'khor dang mnyam par/ /dgu
cha ru ni rnam bgos te/ /grwa yi dkyil 'khor dor bar bya/ /tha mar khyams dang ldan pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor lngas ni brgyan pa dang / /kha dog lnga dang yang dag ldan/ /gru bzhi par
ni brtag par bya/ /lta ba lnga po bgrod dka' che/ /kha dog lnga yi de bzhin gshegs/ /sangs rgyas lnga dang mnyam sbyor bas/ /sa ni tshon gyis rab tu bsgyur/ /dkyil 'khor
lnga yi dbus su ni/ /sangs rgyas lnga ni dgod par bya/ /kha dog lnga dang ting 'dzin gyis/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yis khyab/ /shel dang zla ba'i 'od 'dra zhing / /sangs rgyas
@#/ /thams cad gcig bsdus pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnam snang mdzad/ /dpa' bo'i lta ba de bzhin gshegs/ /in+d+ra nI la'i 'od 'dra zhing / /rdo rje thams
cad gcig bsdus pa/ /mi bskyod ye shes las byung ba/ /rdo rje'i lta ba de bzhin gshegs/ /'dzam bu'i gser gyi 'od 'dra zhing / /sangs rgyas thams cad gcig bsdus pa/ /
sems can kun gyi don du byung / /'bar ba'i lta ba de bzhin gshegs/ /dpa' bo chen po pad+ma 'dra/ /pad+ma rA ga'i nor bu'i 'od/ /chos kyi ye shes las byung ba/ /chags
pa'i lta ba de bzhin gshegs/ /ma rgad kyi ni 'od 'dra zhing / /sangs rgyas thams cad gcig bsdus pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gcig las byung ba/ /byams pa'i lta ba de bzhin
gshegs/ /dbus ma'i sa yi gzhi dag pa/ /nor bu chu shel mdog 'dra ba/ /shar phyogs nyid du sngon po che/ /lho ru ser po yang dag ldan/ /nub phyogs der ni dmar po
ste/ /byang du ljang dang yang dag ldan/ /kun tu khyams dang ldan pa la/ /sgor ni khyams dang bral ba'o/ /gang zhig dbus mar yang dag bshad/ /sangs rgyas ye shes bla
med yin/ /gzhan dag don kun yang dag ldan/ /ting 'dzin ye shes dam pa yin/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam/ /
sangs rgyas sku ni rnam bsgoms la/ /spyan ni dbus su bsam par bya/ /bzhin bzang spyan ni yangs pa dang / /nor bu chu shel mdog 'dra la/ /mtshan rnams thams cad yongs su
rdzogs/ /bud med sgyu ma'i mchog 'dzin pa/ /phyag tu 'khor lo bsgom bya ste/ /khams gsum pa ni dbang byed pa/ /dngos kun grub byed ye shes ni/ /'khor lo yid bzhin nor
bu'i mdog /nam mkha'i rdo rje dbus chud par/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam/ /sangs rgyas sku ni rnam bsgoms la/ /nam mkha'i rdo rje mchog bsgom mo/ /zhal mdzes
spyan ni yangs pa dang / /ut+pal sngon po'i 'dab ma'i mdog /mtshan rnams thams cad yang dag rdzogs/ /nam mkha'i sgyu ma'i mchog bsam mo/ /phyag tu ut+pal sngo
dmar ste/ /khams gsum pas ni phyag byas pa/ /sangs rgyas byang chub byed pa'i mchog /gsang ba'i dngos grub rdo rje can/ /nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus chud par/ /zla ba'i
dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam/ /sangs rgyas sku ni rnams bsgoms la/ /rdo rje chos mar rnam par bsam/ /mdzes pa'i zhal la spyan yangs pa/ /pad+ma rA ga lta bu'i mdog /
sku mdog dmar po yang dag byung / /chags pa'i pad+ma 'dzin sdug pa/ /mtshan rnams thams cad yang dag rdzogs/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /phyag tu
@#/ /ut+pal dmar po ni/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rab bsgoms pa'o/ /chos kyi ye shes byed pa mchog /gsang ba dam tshig rdo rje can/ /mkha' dbyings
rdo rje'i dbus chud par/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam/ /sangs rgyas gzugs na rnam bsgoms la/ /sgrol ma mchog ni bsam par bya/ /zhal mdzes spyan ni yangs
pa dang / /sna tshogs rgyan gyis rab tu brgyan/ /kha dog ser po nyid bsam zhing / /bud med sgyu ma'i dregs por ba/ /phyag tu ut+pal dam pa ni/ /ser po snang ba bsgom par

bya/ /rdo rje nyid 'dzin las byung ba/ /sems can kun gyis phyag byas pa'o/ /oM ru ru s+phu ru dz+wa la ti Sh+Tha sid+d+ha lo tsa ne/ sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni swAhA/ /oM shaM ka re shAn+ti ka re g+huT+Ta g+hu T+Ti ni/
g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya g+hu T+Ti ni swahA/ oM ka Te bi ka Te ni ka Te ka TaM ka re swahA/ toM tA re tu t+ta re tu re swAhA/ /rig pa'i lha mo bzhi'o/ /sku ni lus kyi ngo bo yis/ /thugs ni sems kyi rnam
pa nyid/ /gsung ni ngag gi rnam pa yis/ /mchod nam chod pa'i bdag nyid 'gyur/ /sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba ni/ /mkhas pa yis ni bsrung bya ste/ /bsrungs na mchog
tu gsang ba ni/ /rtag par kun tu 'byung bar 'gyur/ /dngos po yongs su dag pa ni/ /med pas kun tu brtag mi 'byung / /rnal 'byor ba yis rnal 'byor thob/ /tshogs med
yang dag mi mthong ngo / /de bas gsang ba'i ye shes 'byung / /rnal 'byor kun tu 'byung bar 'gyur/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i thabs/ /ting 'dzin ye shes brtags pa yin/ /chos
rnams thams cad rnam dag pa/ /dag pa nyid du gyur pa ni/ /ji ltar lha yi nor bu ni/ /rang gi 'od kyis rtag tu snang / /srid pa yongs su dag pa yang / /rnal 'byor rnal 'byor thob byed
yin/ /rdo rje dbyings ni gsang chen du/ /gang zhig dbang bskur mkhas pa la/ /thugs kyi gsang ba'i rnal 'byor mchog /mkhas pas de la bshad par bya/ /thams cad gsang ba
zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so// /rgya gar gyi mkhan po pad+ma kA ra barma dang / zhus chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te
gtan la phab pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ trai lo kya bi dza ya mahA ka wa rA dzA/ bod skad du/ 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa'i rgyal po chen
po/ /dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ri rab ri'i rtse mo na rdo rje dang / nor bu rin po che'i rtse mo'i
khang pa brtsegs pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag du ma dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / mi'am ci dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / brjed
@#/ /byed dang / ma mo rnams dang / bltar rung ba dang / bltar mi rung ba du ma sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mngon par dad pa rnams dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs
te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i dkyil nas babs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag btsal nas/
bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /yang bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis lha chen po la sogs pa sems can ma rungs pa de
dag la dam tshig 'dzin du stsal bar 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de'i slad du bdag la bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i
tshig /bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pas gsan nas phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad cas gsungs so/ /gnod sbyin khyod/ shin tu khengs pa/ shin tu
khro ba/ shin tu 'thur ba de/ ji ltar khyod kyis sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir 'di lta bu'i sngags kyi tshig smra/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /de'i phyir na bcom ldan 'das/ /bdag sems can ma lus pa 'dul bar bgyid do/ /gang gi phyir zhe na/
bdag gis 'dod pa'i bde ba can rnams dbang du bgyi ba la sogs pas btul nas bla na med pa'i bde ba la bgod par 'tshal lo/ /sems can ma rungs pa rnams bsad pa la sogs
pas sbyangs te/ zhi ba la dgod par 'tshal lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ phyag na rdo rje/ legs so/ /legs
so/ /'jig rten thams cad kyi don gyi phyir dang / phan pa'i phyir dang / bde ba'i phyir snying po 'di smros shig /de nas phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpas lha thams cad nas/ mi
rnams thams cad kyi bar du sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mngon par dad pa de rnams la bka' stsal ba/ grogs po dag /sangs rgyas la skyabs su dongs shig /nga'i bka' yang
rjes su skyongs shig /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag na rdo rjes phyag btsal nas 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i snying po 'di gsungs so/ /oM

suM b+ha ni suM b+ha hUM/ gr-ih+NA gr-ih+nA hUM/ gr-ih+nA pa ya gr-i h+nA pa ya hUM/ A na ya ho b+ha ga bA na badzra hUM phaT/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gsum thams cad g.yos/ /rab tu g.yos/
kun tu rab tu g.yos so/ /'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul to/ /'phar/ rab tu 'phar/ kun tu rab tu 'phar ro/ /de nas lha thams cad la sogs pa sems can thams
@#/ /cad 'dar yed yed nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags te/ khor khor yug dang / khor khor yug chen po'i ri la sogs pa tshun chad kyi gling
bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can thams cad kyis gang ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su tshogs
pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po la gzigs nas 'di skad gsungs so/ /grogs po rnams/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa la skyabs su 'gro bar khas long zhig /nga'i bka' yang rjes
su skyongs shig /de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor chen po thams cad bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes skrag ste/ 'dar yed yed nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
la skyabs su dong ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha chen po'i lha dang / mthu bo che dang / tshangs pa rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta bu'i
sems can 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/ 'di ltar byin che zhing bdag cag 'chos pa 'di su lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su
bcad pa 'di glengs te gsungs so/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs/ /kun tu bzang po kun gyi bdag /sangs rgyas thams
cad nyid skyes 'di/ /phyag na rdo rje gnod sbyin che/ /ma rungs 'chos la dbang ba ste/ /gang ming brjod pa des yis ni/ /sangs rgyas pa yang thob par 'gyur/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje byang
chub sems dpa' chen pos yang gsungs pa/ kye kye lha dag /sangs rgyas la skyabs su dong la nga'i bka' bzhin du yang gyis shig /rdo rje 'bar ba gcig tu 'bar bar gyur
ba 'dis khyed thams cad gtan sreg par gyur ta re/ de nas lha chen po la sogs pa thams cad kyis 'di skad ces smras so/ /khyod ni gnod sbyin nged ni lha bas na nged kyis
gnod sbyin gyi bka' rjes su skyong bar mi nus so/ /de nas phyag na rdo rjes de thos nas khros te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bcom ldan 'das
rnams kyis bdag ma rungs pa thams cad 'dul bar dbang bskur te bskos so/ /de bas na gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la bka' stsal na lha chen po 'di 'dul
bar 'tshal lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha chen po la 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /sems can chen po/ khas longs shig /'dis khyod gsang ta re/ de nas bcom
ldan 'das la lha chen po la sogs pa 'jig rten gsum thams cad kyi dbang po rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gnod sbyin ma rungs pa 'di'i
@#/ /bka' bzhin du byed pa bdag cag ma lags so/ /de nas lha chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag btsal te/ bcom ldan
'das phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye gnod sbyin/ nga ni thams cad kyi dbang po chen po/ byed pa po/ 'joms pa po/ skye dgu'i bdag po tshangs pa'o/ /gtogs
'dod do/ /dbang phyug chen po'o/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' chen po khros nas 'di skad gsungs so/ /khyod ni lus srul po mi sha za ba/ /ma rungs pa/ drag
shul gyi las byed pas na gtum po ste/ sha za'i lus srel ba na ji ltar tshangs pa dang / gtogs 'dod dang / dbang phyug chen po yin/ tshangs pa zhes bya ba ni mi 'gyur
ba'o/ /gtogs 'dod ces bya ba ni thar pa'o/ /dbang phyug chen po zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang po ste/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po de ni nga yin pas
'dul nus so/ /de nas dbang phyug chen po lha chen po khros nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag btsal te/ 'jigs su rung ba chen po'i gzugs khros pa chen
po'i gad mos bgad nas 'jigs pa chen por byed pa/ 'bar ba chen po gtong ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mtha' med par gzugs sna tshogs su byas/
'bar ba chen po'i grub pa/ mi mtshungs pa/ rdo rje dang / mdung rtse gsum pa dang / 'khor lo dang / sh+ka ti dang / be con dang / mi mtshungs pa'i mtshon cha 'debs shing gtong
ba ma mo rnams kyi tshogs dang / 'byung po'i tshogs dang bcas par kun bstan to/ /bdud dang / bgegs byed pa dang / mtha' dang / mu med pa'i gzugs sna tshogs su sprul/ khro
bo rab tu mi bzad pa ma rungs pa'i tshogs chen po dang lhan cig tu rab tu 'thab cing shin tu 'gyed pa/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtshan mo'i mun nag tu byas/ 'bar
ba chen po'i phung pos klongs te rab tu snang bar byas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang ba chen po cung zad du mche ba'i thog ma gtsigs pa/ smin ma'i mtshams kyi khro
gnyer gyi rlabs bskyod pa/ mig g.yon pa cher bgrad de/ rdo rje'i lta ba khro ba dang bcas pas zab mo'i tshig gis snying po mchog 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i
dpal zhes bya ba 'di gsungs so/ /hUM/ de nas hUM zhes bya ba des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun sgra des gang nas/ g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu
rab tu g.yos so/ /'khrol/ rab tu 'khrol/ kun tu rab tu 'khrol lo/ /de nas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa lha'i tshogs thams cad bcom ldan 'das/ bskyab tu gsol/ bde
@#/ /bar gshegs pa/ bskyab tu gsol zhes nas bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su dong ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad
gsungs so/ /gang 'di lta bu'i sngags kyi tshig smra ba ni khyod rab tu mi bgrungs so/ /de nas phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag btsal nas/ yang
'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba 'di gsungs so/ /oM sum+b+ha ni su m+b+ha hUM/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM/ gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ye hUM/ A na ya ho b+ha ga bAn badzra hUM phaT/ de nas 'di
gsungs pa tsam gyis lha chen po la sogs pa lha'i bdag po thams cad 'khor dang bcas par bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gang na ba der mgo rkang bzlos ste/ ri rab
ri'i rtse mo'i dkyil 'khor chen por btsud nas brlams par byas te/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs g.yon pas mnan to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ phyag na rdo rje khyod kyis 'di 'dra bar sems can 'dul bar byed pa legs
so legs so/ /de bas na thul la dbugs phyungs shig /de nas phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de dag gi don gyi phyir rdo rjes bcings pa
'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra D-i D+ho me b+ha ba rak+Sha sarba nA swAhA/ de nas phyag na rdo rjes 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis lha chen po la sogs pa de dag dran pa rnyed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
kyis de dag la 'di skad gsungs so/ /grogs po dag /sems can chen po 'di'i bka' bzhin du byed par khas long zhig /de nas bcom ldan 'das la de dag thams cad mgrin
gcig tu bdag cag mchid kyis 'tshal lo zhes gsol to/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yang rang gi snying po 'di gsungs so/ /hUM Tak+ki ho/ /
de nas 'di brjod pa tsam gyis lha la sogs pa thams cad dbang du byas te/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la phyag byas nas mchi ma blags te ngo ro bton nas skyabs su dong
ste| bcom ldan 'das bskyab tu gsol/ nga bdag cag khyod kyi bka' nyan na ci ltar bgyi ba bka' stsal du gsol zhes so/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen pos de rnams la gsungs pa/ grogs po dag /byang chub kyi sems dang / sdom pa gzung bar khas longs shig /de dag gis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag
cag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur bgyid cing byang chub tu 'ang sems bskyed par 'tshal lo/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sems
@#/ /dpa' chen pos yang de rnams ji lta ba bzhin du dkyil 'khor du btsud nas sdom pa 'dzin du bcug ste/ byang chub sems ni brtan byas pa/ /sems
can thams cad bde ba stsal/ /phyag na rdo rje bdag chen dang / /'dod pa smad par mi bya'o/ /'di ni gsang ba pa yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag sdom pa 'dzin
du bcug nas dam tshig byin pa ni/ oM badzra sa ma ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa mA bi rA ga ye sarba kA mAn hUM phaT/ de nas de dag gis smras pa/ 'di ni bdud kyis smras pas na bdag
cag mi nyan to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas de dag la khyed cag gis 'di la ma brnyas shig ces gsungs pa dang / de dag gis gsol ba
ji ltar 'dod chags dang bral ba ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bo zhes bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis bka' stsal to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kye grogs po
dag /nga ni ji ltar 'dul bzhin du byed pa ste/ 'di nyid kyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'di sun 'byin te/ ji ltar bde ba la mi chags pa dang / sdug bsngal la 'dod
chags pa can ji lta bus 'jig rten 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i chos sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'chad par mdzad de/ de dag sbyang ba'i phyir 'di ni de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kun tu bzang po byang chub sems dpas ci nas kyang 'dod chags dang bral bar ma byed cig ces bka' stsal to/ /de nas phyag na rdo rjes yang gsungs pa/
oM badzra sa ma ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi bi rA ga ya sarba kA mAM hUM phaT/ de nas de dag gis ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba bzhin no zhes gsol to/ /de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes

lag tu rdo rje byin te/ rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba 'di byin no/ /oM badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa sarba ta thA ga ta badzra d+ha ro t+t+we badzra pA Ni hI/ ha ha ha ha/ de nas rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur ba byin pa ni 'di

lta ste/ dbang phyug chen po ni rdo rje rig sngags mchog go /mthu bo che ni rdo rje sgyu ma'o/ /tshangs pa ni rdo rje mi smra ba'o/ /sgra gzhon nu ni rdo rje dril bu'o/ /dbang po ni rdo rje 'thab cha ste/
de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gsum gyi dbang po thams cad rig pa'i blon po chen por dbang bskur ro/ /de nas bar snang la rgyu ba rnams rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur ba byin pa

ni/ 'di lta ste/ bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ni/ rdo rje 'khyil pa'o/ /zla ba ni rdo rje 'od do/ /be con rtse mo ni rdo rje be con no/ /skya sleng ni rdo rje skya sleng ste/ de rnams ni rdo rje khro bor dbang bskur ro/ /
de nas nam mkha' la rgyu ba'i lha rnams rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur ba byin pa ni 'di lta ste/ chang gis myos pa ni rdo rjes zin pa'o/ /chang byed ni rdo rje phreng ba'o/ /rgyal ba ni rdo rje
@#/ /dbang ngo / /rgyal ba skyes pa ni rdo rje rnam par rgyal ba ste/ de dag la sogs pa ni tshogs kyi bdag por dbang bskur ro/ /de nas sa pa rnams rdo rje ming

gis dbang bskur ba byin pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ mdzod skyong ni rdo rje gru shing ngo / /rlung ni rdo rje rlung ngo / /me ni rdo rje me'o/ /ku be ra ni rdo rje 'jigs pa ste/ de dag la sogs pa ni rdo rje pho nyar
dbang bskur ro/ /de nas sa 'og na gnas pa'i dbang po thams cad rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur ba byin pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ phag ni rdo rje kyo ba'o/ /gshin rje ni rdo rje nag po'o/ /sa'i
spyi bo ni rdo rje rnam 'dren no/ /bA ru Na ni rdo rje klu ste/ de dag la sogs pa ni rdo rje bran du dbang bskur ro/ /de nas 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag po rnams kyis lha mo thams cad kyi
lag tu rdo rje byin te/ rdo rje'i dbang bskur nas/ rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur ba byin pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ nyon mongs pa ni rdo rje khro ba ma'o/ /nor can ni rdo rje gser ma'o/ /tshangs ma
ni rdo rje zhi ma'o/ /dug mo ni rdo rje gzhon nu ma'o/ /dbang mo ni rdo rje khu tshur te/ de dag la sogs pa ni rigs sngags kyi blon mo chen mor dbang bskur ro/ /de nas bar snang la
rgyu ba'i ma rnams dbang bskur ba byin pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ bdud rtsi ma ni rdo rje bdud rtsi ma'o/ /'khrung ma ni rdo rje sdug gu ma'o/ /be con 'chang ma ni rdo rje be con rtse ma'o/ /skye
'phrog ma ni rdo rje rked chings ma ste/ de dag la sogs pa ni rdo rje khro mor dbang bskur ro/ /de nas nam mkha' la rgyu ba'i ma rnams dbang bskur ba byin pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ gsod ma ni rdo rje
gsod ma ma'o/ /za ba mo ni rdo rje zab mo'o/ /gos ni rdo rje bgo ba mo'o/ /dga' mo ni rdo rje dbang mo ste/ de dag la sogs pa ni rdo rje tshogs ma mor dbang bskur ro/ /de nas sa la rgyu
ba'i ma rnams dbang bskur ba byin pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ zhi ba mo ni rdo rje pho nya mo'o/ /rlung ma ni rdo rje mgyogs ma'o/ /me ni rdo rje 'bar ma'o/ /ku be ra ma ni rdo rje thag gu ma ste/ de dag la

sogs pa ni rdo rje pho nya mor dbang bskur ba byin pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ phag mo ni rdo rje gdong ngo / /mgo lpags ma ni rdo rje nag mo'o/ /sna chad ma ni rdo rje phyags ma'o/ /klu mo ni rdo rje chu srin
ma ste/ de dag la sogs pa ni rdo rje bran mor dbang bskur ro/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' chen pos btsud pa de dag thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi ye shes bskyed
nas rdo rje'i dam tshig byin pa'o/ /oM pa li tod pa li tod badzra A ka R+Sha ya hUM dza/ lha rnams dgug pa'o/ /oM badzra a gri pi TA ya sa ma ya hUM/ bar snang la rgyu ba rnams kyi'o/ /oM

badzra mA lA gra laM/ phreng ba 'chang ba rnams kyi'o/ /oM badzra ban+d+ha haM/ sa la rgyu ba rnams kyi'o/ /oM badzra pA tA la b+hany+dza b+hany+dza hUM phaT/ 'og na gnas pa rnams kyi'o/ /oM he ru ka badzra sa ma
@#/ /ya sarba du Sh+TaM sa ma ya mu bra b+ha n+d+ha tsakra hUM phaT/ ma mo rnams thams cad kyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag na rdo rjes phyag
btsal nas 'di skad gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni sems can thams cad 'dul ba lags na/ bcom ldan 'das/ ma rungs ba'i sems can gyis dkyil 'khor de
dag la ji ltar bgyi pa bka' stsol cig /bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ gang gis sems can de rnams sems can thams cad la phan pa byas nas bla na med pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i dam tshig 'di nyid la tshud cig /de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i gdon 'di dag la ji ltar nan tan bgyi/ rims la sogs pa ji ltar bgyi/ dmyal ba la sogs pa ngan song gi rnams ji ltar bgyi/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ dam tshig de nyid la nan tan byed du tshud cig /de nas phyag na rdo rjes yang gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mi 'di rnams ji ltar nan
tan bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen por btsud nas rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du tshud cig /rdo rje'i
dkyil 'khor du btsud nas dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor du tshud cig /dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor du btsud nas las kyi dkyil 'khor du btsud cig /de nas phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems
dpa' chen po/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rangs te/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so/ /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs te/
grub pa thams cad byed pa'i mchog /dkyil 'khor chen por bshad par bya'o/ /de nas yang dag rab bshad pa/ /dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste/ /chos kyi dkyil 'khor tshul
'dra bar/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad thig gdab po/ /de la srad bu bre ba'i cho ga ni/ 'di lta ste/ /gsar zhing legs par byas pa dang / /tshad ma bzang po'i srad pu yis/ /shes
rab can gyis srad bre ba/ /'jig rten gsum rgyal dran zhing ngo / /de ya dbus su gdab pa ni/ /seng ldeng phur pa brtan par ro/ /de las srad bu bre gsungs pa/ /srad bu nyis lnga pa
kyis byas te/ /bcu drug cha ru bgo bar bya/ /thams cad du ni rim gsum mchog /khor khor yug rigs dag kyang / /phur bu yis ni de bzhin no/ /de yi nang du bya ba ni/ /srad
bu rim bdun ldan par te/ /tshon ser dri zhim ldan pa yis/ /thig rnams kyang ni gdab par bya/ /de yi dbus su gzhag pa ni/ /shin tu bkrabs pa'i nas phul bzhi'o/ /de yi
@#/ /steng du mgon po ste/ /sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan gzhag par bya/ /sangs rgyas thad 'khor thams cad du/ /byang chub brgyad ni rim bzhin par/ /bri 'am yang
na gzhag par bya/ /tshon sna lnga mchog rnams kyis so/ /sangs rgyas spyan snga de ru ni/ /phyag na rdo rje de bzhin no/ /bri'am gzhag par bya ba ni/ /rdo rje hUM zhes par 'dus so/ /de yi
zhabs ni g.yon pa yis/ /dbang phyug chen po mnan par bya'o/ /g.yas pa'i zhabs kyis btsir ba ni/ /nyon mongs ma yin lha mo 'o/ /'dod grub spyod pa'i lha rnams kyang / /
srad bu rim bdun par dag tu/ /bri 'am yang na gzhag par bya/ /rdo rje shugs kyis dgongs nas su/ /phyi rol byung nas de ru yang / /gling rnams bzhi yang bri bar bya/ /dbyibs
dang cho ga ji bzhin du/ /grwa yi ri mo legs par dgod/ /gling rnams dbus ni thams cad du/ /'jig rten ji bzhin bsogs par bya'o/ /tshangs pa la sogs bzhi yi rnams/ /
de ru 'jig rten dbang po bri/ /khor khor yug ri dang ni/ /gling rnams kyi yang bar dag tu/ /phyi yi rdo rje'i rigs rnams kyi/ /dkyil 'khor yang dag bri bar bya/ /sgo srung bri bar
bya ba yang / /rdo rje sgo bzhi de dag tu/ /rdo rje kyo ba zhags pa dang / /sgrog dang dril bu de bzhin no/ /kho ra khor yug ri yi ni/ /phyi rol dmyal ba brgyad rnams so/ /gnam dal
dang ni nad dag dang / /mkha' 'gro ma dang gdon drag rnams/ /bzhag gam yang na bri bar bya/ /chos min can ni gzhig phyir ro/ /de yi phyi rol du dgod pa/ /gtor ma sna tshogs
mchog rnams so/ /de nas dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga 'byung ste/ de la thog ma nyid du slob dpon gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal te 'jug pa ni/ gtsang
mas gos gtsang ma bgos la/ ser la thag gu dmar po thogs nas rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya bcings la/ de'i steng du dri zhim po'i me tog bzhag nas snying po 'di brjod la zhugs
shig /oM badzra pra tI tsa ma ha ha ha ha hi/ de nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas du ru ka'i bdug pa'am/ ci bdog pas gsol to/ /rdo rje 'dzin ma mdzub mo gnyis
kyo btang du byas la snying po 'di brjod do/ /oM u ru gra gra bi ri Ni bi ri Ni/ badzra ma ya hi/ b+hi da ye swahA/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas na de las mtshan ma 'byung ba ni ba spu g.yo ba
la sogs pa dang / sa g.yo ba'am/ dri zhim po'am/ 'od zer mthong ba'o/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje'i spyi bor me tog gtor cig /de nas slob ma gzhug ste/ de la thog ma nyid
du bkrus nas slob ma gos gtsang ma bskon te/ gsum la skyabs su btang ba dang / bslab pa'i sdom pa 'dzin pa la so sor gnas par byas nas byang chub kyi sems bskyed cig /de
@#/ /nas gdong ras kyis g.yog nas mgo gtsug tor du byas te/ rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya bcings la chug cig /bcug nas me tog gtor te/
de nas gang la 'bab pa de ni de'i lha'o/ /de nas gdong bcings pa bkrol nas rang gi rig pa'i lha ston la/ de la mchod cing slob dpon la yang ci 'dod pa'i yon phul nas
de rang gi rig pa 'am/ sngags bzlas te phyag rgya yang bcing ngo / /'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal pa rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo
zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'o/ /de nas rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ /rdo rje'i phreng ba mnyam ldan pas/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor brtag par bya/ /'jug par bya ba
de bzhin te/ /las kyang de dang 'dra bar bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor de ru zhugs nas ni/ /de bzhin rdo rje gsor bar bya/ /'jig rten gsum rgyal rab bslabs nas/ /rdo rje mchog
ni bsgrub par bya/ /de la rdo rje sgrub pa'i cho ga ni lag pa gnyis kyi rdo rje'i phyag rgya 'dzin pas rdo rje bzung la ji srid du 'gul pa de srid bzlas so/ /de phyin cad rdo rje des
las thams cad byed do/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nas dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ /dkyil 'khor chen po kun bris nas/ /mtshan ma thams cad bstan par
bya/ /'jug pa rdo rje dril bu dang / /rdo rje 'dzin mchog phyag rgyas so/ /de la rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya ni 'di yin no/ /rdo rje 'dzin ma kun byas nas/ /rdo rje kun tu brtag bya ba/ /g.yas
par gzhag nas g.yon pa yis/ /dril bu gsil nas 'jug par bya/ /btsud nas su ni dril bu de/ /mnyam par gzhag pas gsil bar bya/ /slob dpon gyur cig dam tshig kyang / /
rtag tu bsrungs zhes brjod par bya/ /ji ltar dril bu'i sgra 'di ni/ /de yi mi rtag pa ru gsungs/ /de ltar khyod la byin pa ni/ /rdo rje chen po zhes bya 'dis/ /nges par sreg par 'gyur
ba ni/ /de ste rdo rje 'dzin dad dang / /skyabs gsum brtul zhugs de bzhin te/ /ji ltar byang chub sems 'dod rnams/ /khyod kyis de tshe spangs gyur na'o/ /de la 'di ni dam tshig gi
sngags so/ /oM ha na sa ma ya hUM phaT/ de nas de bzhin du 'dug la de nas rdo rje'i chu 'di blud do/ /de nas gdong bcings pa bkrol nas cho ga bzhin du bya'o/ /dam tshig gi dkyil
'khor ro/ /de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ /de bzhin dkyil 'khor bris nas su/ /cha lugs mang po gzhag par bya/ /btsud nas las rnams thams cad kyang / /slob
dpon gyis ni de bzhin bslab/ /de nas las kyi rab tu sbyor ba 'di'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thab ga bzhir byas la mngar po'i yam shing la me bus la mngar po'i
@#/ /me tog dang / 'bras bu rnams sbrang rtsi dang mar las sbags te/ bla gos g.yas su gzar la ku sha'i bam po la 'dug ste/ rdo rje'i tshig tu bzlas shing /
zhi ba dang / rgyas pa dang / dbang du bya ba la sogs pa zhi ba'i las rnams la lag pa g.yon pas bdag gis phyag rgya bcings te/ g.yas pas bsregs na de dag 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /
bcom ldan 'das kyi rgyab tu thab zur gsum du kha ba'i tsher ma rnon po'i yam shing dang / 'dab ma dang / me tog dang / yal ga'i rtse mo dang / sdong bu dang / 'bras bu'ang de dang
'dra bar rang gi khrag gis bskus nas stan mkhrang po la 'dug ste/ bla gos g.yon du gzar la/ khros pa'i tshig gis bzlas shing g.yon pas bsregs na dgug pa dang /
gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / rgyas gdab pa dang / gzhom pa dang / btsir ba dang / bsnyal ba dang / myos par bya ba dang / stan 'pho ba la sogs pa las drag po rnams rab tu
'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgug pa dang / dam tshig gi bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba la sogs pa grub pa thams
cad kyi las ni bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas su rtswa 'jam po bting ba la 'dug nas/ stod g.yogs sbyar ma ltar bgos te/ ting nge 'dzin gyis bzlas shing 'khor lo lta bu'i
thab tu du ba med pa'i mdag ma la til dang 'bras la sogs pa nas 'bras g.yas g.yon gyis sreg go /bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon du rdo rje lta bu'i thab byas la stod g.yogs kyis
yan lag thams cad bcings te rlod stan 'jam po la 'dug nas/ yam shing thams cad 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'dzings pa'i me la lag pa g.yas pa rdo rje dang bcas pa rdo rje khu tshur gyi
phyag rgya bcings nas lag pa g.yon pa rdo rje khu tshur 'dzin pas gzar bu gzung nas 'dzum zhing dga' bar byas te/ rdo rje tshig gis zlos shing ro thams cad bsregs na/ rdo rje 'dzin
pa dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du byas pa la sogs pa dam pa 'grub pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga'o/ /'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgya la ba rtog pa chen po'i
rgyal po las/ dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi cho ga'o// //de nas yo byad bshad par bya'o zhes nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin gyis gsungs pa/ dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga
thams cad mthong bar 'gyur nas sgrub bo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dkyil 'khor du ni ma zhugs sam/ /dam tshig spangs par gyur pa ni/ /phyag na rdo rje mi 'grub pa/ /gsang ba
yang dag mi shes pas/ /bcom ldan sems dpa' 'dod pa'o/ /chags dang rdo rje de nyid de/ /de la chags par ma gyur na/ /phyag na rdo rje mi 'grub bo/ /de bas yang dag ma
@#/ /mthong bas/ /dkyil 'khor du ni grub ma gsungs/ /yang dag ma mthong grub pa ni/ /the tshom can gyis mi 'grub bo/ /rab tu 'jigs pa rnyed nas su/ /
nad kyis kyang ni 'jigs par byed/ /gdon yang de la brtson par 'gyur/ /shi nas ngu 'bod du ltung ngo / /de ltar dkyil 'khor thams cad du chug la nad dang / gdon la sogs
pa ston cig /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi kha dog ras la bri bar bya ste/ de'i thad 'khor kun tu byang chub sems dpa' brgyad bri ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ g.yas
phyogs su ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang po dang / 'jam dpal dang / sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'o/ /g.yon phyogs su ni rdo rje khu tshur dang /
byams pa dang / nam mkha'i mdzod do/ /steng du nam mkha'i snying po'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi 'og tu ni phyag na rdo rje ste/ rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i phyag na rdo rje dang bcas pa lag pa
gnyis kyis bcing ngo / /lag pa gnyis po gzhan la g.yas pa ni rdo rje gsor/ g.yon pas ni me tog gi gzhu dang / mda' lnga bsnams pa/ /sku mdog ni ut+pal sngon po lta bu/
yid tsam 'dzum la mche ba cung zad gtsigs la/ khro ba dang bcas pas bzhad pa'i zhal/ phyir brkyang bsku ma du gnas pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ zhabs g.yon
bas lha chen po'i 'dan pa g.yon par mnan/ zhabs g.yas pa bskum pas u ma'i nu mar btsir te/ stod g.yog khra bos yan lag g.yogs pa/ ko rlon gyi smad g.yogs can/
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbu rgyan du thogs pa'o/ /de nas tshes zhag gcig nas mgo brtsams te/ tshes bco lnga'am/ zla ba'am/ lo'i par du nyin re zhing brgya stong bzlas
te gos dkar po gtsang ma bgos te bdag gi khyim du gnas shing zas gtsang ma yid bzhin du zos te bzlas na de nas zla ba gcig lon pa dang / zla ba dang pos ni hUM zhes bya bas
phyi rol gyi las rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /gnyis kyis ni las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /gsum gyis ni bcom ldan 'das rmi lam du ston cing 'das pa dang / ma
'ongs pa thams cad ston to/ /bzhis ni sems can thams cad dgug pa dang / dbang du bya par nus so/ /zla ba lngas ni yid bzhin snang ba dang / mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /zla ba
drug gis ni ci 'dod pa thams cad kyi gzugs su 'gyur ro/ /zla ba bdun gyis ni bdag gi lus sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / phyag na rdo rjer ston cing cho
'phrul thams cad kyang ston to/ /zla ba brgyad kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi lha la sogs pa dgug pa dang / dgug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du
@#/ /byed cing las su bsgo'o/ /zla ba dgus ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams thams cad dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du byed
do/ /zla ba bcus ni sa bcu thob par 'gyur ro/ /zla ba bcu gcig gis ni bcu gcig pa sangs rgyas kyi sa thob bo/ /zla ba bcu gnyis pas ni rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /de nas
sgrub pa bstan te/ ras la rdo rje hUM zhes pa de bzhin du bris la/ de'i thad 'khor thams cad du mthu chen po la sogs pa nas/ klu bA ru na'i mtha'i bar du bcom ldan 'das la sgong
zhing pus mo gtsugs pa bris la/ de nas de bzhin du bzlas pa ni rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya grangs med par bzlas te/ zla ba'i mtha'i bar du/ /tshes nyi shu dgu'i mtshan
thal byung bzlas na/ nang par thams cad 'ong ngo / /'ongs nas kyang dbang du 'gyur te thams cad bsgo ba bzhin du byed do/ /de nas sgrub pa gzhan 'byung ste/ bcom ldan
'das de bzhin du bris nas gser gyi mdangs kyi lha mo la sogs pa thams cad rang rang gi phyag rgya bsgreng nas gar byed cing mi sdug pa 'jigs pa'i gzugs su
bri'o/ /de nas de bzhin du zla ba gcig gi mtha'i mtshan thal byung du zlos shig /de nas nang par kun lhags te/ de bzhin du gar dag gis sgrub pa po la mchod do//
'di la rtog pa 'dir bris pa de bzhin no snyam du bsams nas des mi 'jigs par bya'o/ /de nas dbang du 'gyur ste/ rtag tu las thams cad byed pa'i g.yog mor 'gyur ro/ /de
nas cho ga gzhan te ras la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bris la/ de nas de bzhin du brgyad stong du bzlas na nub tha ma la rdo rje 'dzin pa 'thob ste/ ci 'dod pa grub pa'i mchog
kyang 'thob bo/ /gzhan yang sgrub pa phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar 'bum zlos shig /de nas dgos pa kun bcom ldan 'das kyis mdzad do/ /phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar ci 'dod par
yam shing thams cad kyis sbyin sreg gis lo gcig gi bar du bsregs na thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rdo rje hUM zhes pa bris pa de'i spyan sngar lo gcig gi mtha'i
bar du grangs med par zlos shig /de nas tha mar bcom ldan 'das rang gi ci 'dod pa'i mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan
sngar rdo rje hUM zhes pa'i phyag rgya bcings la/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'gul gyi bar du zlos shig /de nas phyag rgya 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /grub pa des na dgug pa dang / dbang
du bya ba dang / gzhug pa dang / drang pa dang / ltung ba dang / dbab pa dang / stan 'pho ba la sogs pa las phran tshegs kyi bcings pas hUM zhes pas mdzad do/ /de nas cho ga
@#/ /gzhan te rig pas dbang bskur bar bya bar 'dod na/ bri'am/ 'jim pa las phyag na rdo rje'i cha lugs byas la phyag gnyis brkyang ste rdo rje 'dzin to/ de zla
ba yar gyi tshes gcig nas brtsams te/ tshes bco lnga'i bar du mar bzhi bre brgyad kyis khrus shig /de nas tha mar mtshan thal byung bzlas so/ /de nas nad par gzugs de
bzhad de/ de nas rig pa thams cad kyi bdag por 'gyur ro/ /de nas sgrub pa gzhan 'byung ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi cha lugs bri'am/ 'jig pa la de bzhin
du phyag brkyang ba rdo rje 'dzin par byas la de'i zhabs kyi bar du spos chus bkrus na de phyin chad yid bzhin du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas sgrub pa gzhan 'byung ste ras la
bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje phyag bzhi par byas la/ de'i phyag g.yas par pad+mo/ g.yon par rdo rje/ g.yas par rdo rje hUM zhes pa/ g.yon par mda' dang / gzhu'o/ de nas
de'i spyan sngar stong phrag brgya bzlas pa'i mjug tu zhag gsum smyung ba byas te/ mtshan thal byung bzlas na/ de'i nang bar de dang 'dra ba'i gzugs su 'gyur te/ bskal
par gnas shing mi dga' ba dang / sems can thams cad dbang du bya ba dang / thams cad du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas dkyil 'khor sgrub pa 'byung ste/ dkyil 'khor
mthong bas lci ba gsum gyis khrus byas/ dus gsum du gos brjes la/ rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya bcings nas brgyad stong dus gsum du nyin bdun bzlas na/ de nas phyag na rdo rjes
slob dpon gyi gzugs su byas nas rmi lam du thams cad smra'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i cho ga gzhan 'byung ste/ dkyil 'khor chen po mthong bas zla ba gcig gi bar du de
bzhin du dus gsum du khrus byas nas dus gsum du gos brjes/ dus gsum du ba lang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor bas te/ rno lcags kyi mtshon chas der rdo rje bris la/ de la lta zhing
rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya bcings te/ brgyad brgya bzlas na zla ba gcig gi mthar bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo / /de nas rdo rje sgrub pa 'byung ste/ rdo rje ras sam/ rtsig pa'am/ shing
leb la bris nas de la mchod pa byas te rdo rje khu tshur gyis bzung la/ lo gcig tshun chad rdo rje nam 'bar gyi bar du zlos shig /'bar ba des na nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / lo
bcu drug lon pa'i lus phyag na rdo rje dang mtshungs pa'i gzugs dang / stobs dang / mdog tu gyur te/ 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad dang ldan pa/ bde ba dang / yid ba de ba
thams cad thob par 'gyur ro/ /tshe yang lo stong phrag brgyar 'gyur ro/ /de nas ral gri sgrub pa 'phyung ste/ rdo rje khu tshur gyis ral gri bzung la lo gcig gi bar du bzlas na rig
@#/ /'dzin thams cad kyi bdag po rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'khor lo sgrub pa 'byung ste/ 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor bris la lcags kyi 'khor lo
thogs nas/ nam rdo rjer gyur cing slar yang 'khor lor gyur gyi bar du bzlas so/ /de nas de thogs pas na rig 'dzin thams cad kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas
kyo ba tang bsgrub par 'dod pas phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar gser gyi kyo ba tang bya ste/ lag pa g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis bzung la/ grub pa rnam gsum du gyur gyi bar du bzlas
la dros pa tsam gyis thams cad kun dgug nus par 'gyur ro/ /dud pa byung ba tsam gyis thams cad dbang du byed nus par 'gyur ro/ /'bar bas ni thams cad dgug nus pa
dang / dbang du bya nus shing rig 'dzin gyi rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /de nas lha la sogs pa thams cad dgu pa 'byung ste/ lha chen po la sogs pa lha rnams gang yang rung ba'i cha
lugs rkang pa g.yon pas mnan la/ rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya bcings te/ bsdigs shing zla ba gcig gi mtha'i bar du bzlas na lha thams cad lhags te/ las thams
cad byed pa'i g.yog tu 'gyur ro/ /klu dbang du bya bar 'dod na klu'i mtshor lte ba man chad chu'i nang du bcug la lo gcig tshun chad klu thams cad rang gi gzugs su ston
cing las thams cad byed pa'i g.yog tu gyur gyi bar du bzlas so/ /gnod sbyin dbang du bya bar 'dod pas gnod sbyin gang la gnas pa'i gnas der rdo rje hUM zhes pa'i phyag rgya bcings la
gnod sbyin de dag lhags te bka' ci stsal zhes smra ba'i bar du bzlas so/ /de phyin cad bka' thams cad byed pa'i g.yog tu 'gyur ro/ /de nas ma rnams thams cad dbang du bya bar 'dod
pas ma'i gnas su song nas/ khro mo'i snying gar rdog pas mnan la zla ba gcig lon gyi bar du bzlas na tshes nyi shu dgu la 'jigs su rung ba'i sgra chen po 'byin par byed de/ de nas
dbang du gyur nas bka' bzhin byed pa'i g.yog mor 'gyur te/ phrag pa la khyer nas mtho ris su khrid de slar yang khrid cing 'ongs nas tshogs kyi bdag por bcu gcing de dag gis
mchod de/ sngon ma byung ba'i don thams cad dang / 'dod pa thams cad dang / na chung thams cad 'gug go/ 'di lta bu'i rnal 'byor yang ster te/ rnal 'byor gang gi khro bo'i 'jig
rten du yang 'gro zhing phyir yang 'ong ngo / /de la sus kyang cung zad kyang byed mi nus so/ /de nas dpal chen mo bsgrub par 'dod pa des phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar bzlas pa ni phyag na rdo
rje'i sku las lha mo'i lus mthong gi bar du ste/ de las ma 'gul cig ces bsgo'o/ /de phyin cad don thams cad ster bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas pa yang ster ba'i bar du'o/ /de nas
@#/ /mtsho dbyangs ma dbang du bya bar 'dod na/ des phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar yi ge'i phreng bar byas la phreng ba'i yi ge bkod cing mthar phyin pa'i bar du bklags
te/ nyin re zhing dus gsum du las de byas la/ de nas brgyad stong bzlas na zla ba gcig lon pa dang mtsho dbyangs ma mthong ngo / /de phyin chad thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang
ldan par 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gtsug lag thams cad dang / shes nyen can du bya ba thams cad dang / bzo thams cad kyang ma bslabs
par des rab tu shes so/ /de nas lig bu mig dang / gur gum dang / ldong ros dang / ba bla rnams la bsgrub pa 'byung ste/ lig bu mig blangs la/ 'jom pa'i steng du bzhag
nas lag pas mnan ste grub pa rnam gsum byung gi bar du bzlas so/ /gcig gis ni mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /gnyis pas ni gzugs mang por 'gyur ro/ /gsum pas ni nam
gnas gong mar 'dzeg pa na nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /gur gum la sogs pa bzung ste/ 'jom pa'i bu gar bcug la rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgyas mnan nas nam
'bar gyi bar du bzlas so/ /de nas thig le byas nas 'dod pa thams cad kyi bdag po dang / rig 'dzin dang / thams cad du 'gro ba dang / tshe lo stong du thub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas
sA la b+hany+tsi ka sgrub pa 'byung ste/ gnas gang na sA la b+hany+tsi ka ri mo bris pa 'am/ gzugs su byas pa de'i 'jom pa la sor mo bzhag ste/ zla ba gcig gi bar du zlos shig /de nas zla ba gcig
gi mthar mtshan thog thag zlos shig /de nas nang bar rang gi gzugs su bstan nas 'dod pa thams cad sbyin pa'i chung mar 'gyur ro/ /gnod sbyin mo bsgrub par 'dod pas gnod sbyin
mo gang na 'dug pa'i gnas der 'dug la rang gi gzugs su 'ongs kyi bar du bzlas na de la 'dod pa thams cad ster ba'i bran mor 'gyur ro/ /de nas sha za mo bsgrub par 'dod pas phyag
dar phung po mes btang ste/ lag pa g.yon pas rang gi mtshan ma de bzung la g.yas pas zegs ma bsregs pa ni phyag dar gyi phung po de las ci tsam du sha za mo gdong mdangs gzugs mi sdug
pa 'ongs te rang gi gzugs su gnas so/ /de yang de bzhin du bran mor 'gyur ro/ /de nas ci bgyi bsgrub par 'dod pas nyin zhag gcig smyung ba byas la/ tshes nyi shu dgu la brgyad stong bzlas
te/ de nas zla ba gcig slong mo la za zhing grangs med par bzlas te/ zla ba gcig lon pa dang nub gsum smyung ba byas nas mtshan thog thag zlas so/ /de nas nang par ci bgyi 'ongs
na des mi 'jigs par bya ste/ de nas de rang nas 'grub bo/ /de phyin cad 'dod pa thams cad 'bul ba'i g.yog tu 'gyur te/ mtho ris kyi lha mo'ang 'gugs shing 'bul lo/ /de yang
@#/ /skyel cing slar yang 'gugs so/ /'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi thams cad kyang smra'o/ /gzhan gyi nor thams cad kyang phrog nas 'bul lo/ /
de nas rig pa'i brtul zhugs bya bar 'dod pa dngos grub med pa gang yin pa des zla ba drug gi bar du nyin zhag bcu bcu zhing spyad pa snga ma brjes la slong mo'i kha zas la sogs pa nas
rlung bza' ba'i bar du'o/ /de nas mjug tu mtshan thal byung bzlas na nang par sangs rgyas pa yang sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /de nas nyin re zhing bco brgyad kyi bar du sngon gyi spyad pa rnams
byas la de'i mjug tu mtshan thal byung bzlas na nang par las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ba ni hUM zhes thang cig brjod pas kyang ngo / /de nas rol langs bsgrub pa 'byung ste/ ma smras ma
nyams pa'i mi ro blangs la legs par bkrus nas byug pas legs par byugs te/ me tog gi phreng ba btags nas rkang pa g.yon pas mnan la dbugs byung gi bar du bzlas
na de ldang ste langs pa dang / de zhon na thams cad du 'gro zhing tshe yang lo stong phrag brgyar 'gyur ro/ /de nas ro langs kyi grub pa mchog sgrub pa 'byung ste/ ma smas ma nyams pa'i
mi ro blangs nas de bzhin du rab tu brgyan la zhon te langs shing yang 'gyel ba'i bar du bzlas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur 'gyur ro/ /de phrag pa la khyer na de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad srel ba'i rig 'dzin 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad du rdzu 'phrul gyi 'gro ba dang / tshe yang bskal bar 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs
so/ /de nas ma bsgrubs kyang dkyil 'khor mthong ba nyid kyis las su 'gyur pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ thang cig brjod pas ni bdag dang / gzhan dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / rgyal po la
sogs pa bsrung bar 'gyur ro/ /mtshams bcad pa la sogs pa ni brtan par lta bas mtshams bcad na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang mi 'da' na gzhan lta ci smos/ sa'i
dkyil 'khor dang / nam mkha' dang / phyogs bcing ba yang lta ba des so/ /dbab pa ni reg pa dang / ma reg pas ral gri dang / me long dang / snod dang / mthe bo dang / shing ljon pa
dang / bris pa dang / cha lugs dang / gzhu dang / mda' dang / rdo rje la sogs pa rdo rje dbab pa'i phyag rgya gos kyis g.yogs la bcings te/ gu gul gyi bdag pas dbab bo/ /
gdon zhi bar bya ba ni hUM zhes pas so/ /rdo rje hUM zhes pa'i phyag rgyas ni sems can thams cad 'phungs par byed do/ /rdo rje lcags sgrog gi phyag rgyas ni byad ma'i gdon las thar par byed
do/ /he ru ka rdo rje'i phyag rgya bstan pas ni byad mas bsad pa las slar gso bar bya'o/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgya gzung bas skra las bzung ste/ bslang bas ni dug gnon pa dang / dug bslang
@#/ /ba dang / dug zhi bar bya ba dang / dug spo ba dang / dug gzhig par bya ba dang / dug gis shi ba las gso bar bya ste/ rdo rje hUM zhes pa gcig gis so/ /gter
dbyung ba ni zangs kyi ril ba chus bkang la/ rdo rje hUM zhes pa'i mdzub mo dang / gu gul gyis bdug pa byas te bzlas na gal te gter yod na ni chu de lud do/ /de ste med na ni 'khyil
lo/ /de nas 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i hUM zhes pa bzlas te blang ngo / /snang ba dgug pa ni dong ka'i ljon pa'i yam shing gis ma bus te/ zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang /
mar gyis rA dza ko shA ta ka'i me tog la bskus nas stong phrag brgyad bsregs na snang ba thob bo/ /'og gi gnas su ni rdo rje 'og gi phyag rgyas 'khrul 'khor thams cad bcom
nas rdo rje hUM zhes pa bzlas te zhugs na de la sus kyang gtse bar mi 'gyur ro/ /gtogs 'dod kyi 'khor los kyang ci yang byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar rdo rje
'am/ /nor bu marga ti'am/ pad+ma rA ga 'am/ mu tig gam/ gser ram/ dbyig gam/ gzhan ci yang rung ba'am/ skyes pa'am/ bud med dam/ sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs
la lo gcig gi bar du dus gsum du brgya brgyar bzlas nas/ de nas lo gcig lon na brgya 'gyur du 'gyur ro/ /de snyed du brgyar bzlas na de snyed kyi brgyar 'gyur ro/ /de nas

stong du bzlas na yang stong du 'gyur ro/ /longs spyod dgug pa ni stong phrag brgyar bzlas so/ /dgug pa ni rdo rje kyo btang gi phyag rgyas zla ba bzhis khugs so/ /dbang du bya ba ni rdo rje khu tshur gyi
dam tshig gi phyag rgyas so/ /sems can thams cad gtan 'pho ba ni rdo rje hUM zhes pa'i phyag rgya bcings te stong phrag brgyar bzlas na/ sems can thams cad yid kyis dmigs pa bzhin
gtan 'pho'o/ /chu gnon pa ni rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings la chu'i steng du 'gror rung ba'i bar du bzlas/ /me gnon pa ni thang cig bzlas pas so/ /lo tog bsrung ba ni rdo rje lta bas te/ de la srog
chags rnams gang gis kyang gnod par mi 'gyur zhing / byi ba la sogs pa yang 'da' bar mi byed do/ /rdeg pa spong ba ni khro bo'i lta bas te gang du bltas pa der 'pho'o/ /bza' ba dang /
btung ba thams cad spo ba ni 'bar ba'i lta bas ni rang gi snod du 'pho'o/ /sdig pa dang / sbrul thams cad med par bya ba ni thang cig brjod pas so/ /gcan srin thams cad la thang cig
bzlas pas med par 'gyur ro/ /rkun po thams cad pham pa ni rdo rje khu tshur bcings pas so/ /dmag las sgrol ba ni rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgyas so/ /gzhu dang / mda' dang / mdung
dang / rgyal mtshan mnan nas 'gul gyi bar du bzlas te/ de thogs na dmag thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /zhal che la ni thang gcig brjod pas rtsod pa'i lan thebs par
@#/ /'gyur ro/ /zhi ba thams cad ni til gyi sbyin sreg gis so/ /rgyas pa thams cad ni yungs kar gyi sbyin sreg gis so/ /gtan 'pho ba thams cad ni tsher ma'i
sbyin sreg gis so/ /gso ba thams cad ni dUr ba'i lo ma'i sbyin sreg gis so/ /'tshe ba dang / gnam dal dang / rmi lam ngan pa thams cad gzhil ba ni til dang / 'bras kyi sbyin sreg
gis so/ /gzhom pa thams cad ni hUM zhes pas so/ /dgod du gzhug ba dang / myos par bya ba thams cad la phaT ces bya bas so/ /thams cad gnyid log tu gzhug pa ni bskums
la mig btsums te/ brgya bzlas pas thams cad gnyid log par byas pa yin no/ /sems can thams cad rgyas gdab pa ni rdo rje khro bo'i lta bas bltas na rgyas btab par
'gyur te/ nyin bdun las lhag par mi gson no/ /ngag 'phrog ba ni rang gi lce sos bzung nas hUM zhes bya ba'i bar du sbyor ba bya'o/ /snying drang ba ni rdo rje sor mo'i phyag rgyas
dpung ba bsnol te/ rang gi mchan khung du glong zhing snying po bzlas na nub bdun tshun chad 'pho bar 'gyur ro/ /snying bcad pa ni rdo rje blangs te gcad par bya'o/ /snying dbye ba ni
rdo rje lcags phur gyis gdab ste/ ming nas smos shing gzugs so/ /snying spo ba ni lag pa gnyis kyis rdo rje blangs te mtshan bdun du rab tu sbyor ba byas pas 'pho bar 'gyur
ro/ /de nas phyag rgya 'di rnams las thar bar bya ba bshad de/ /des rgyas 'debs pa la ni khu tshur dam pos so/ /ngag 'phrog pa la ni rdo rje ngag gis bzlas pas so/ /snying 'dren pa la

ni rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgya snying gar dgrol lo/ /bcad pa la ni rdo rje hUM zhes pa bzlas nas 'o mas khrus shig /phye ba la ni phur bu phyung nas rdo rje dris skus shig /snying spo ba la ni rdo rje
snying pos thar bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du byad ma'i phyag rgya yang spo bar bya'o/ /snying bsgrub par 'dod na bud med kyi snying gar lta zhing lan gcig bzlas na de'i snying ga nas sgra thos par
'gyur ro/ /skyes pa'i snying gar yang de bzhin du byas te/ snying ga thams cad du yang de ltar ro/ /de nas pha rol gyi sems shes pa bsgrub par 'dod pas ni rdo rje hUM zhes pa brgyar bzlas
na pha rol gyi sems shes so/ /sngon gyi gnas shes phar bya ba ni rdo rje hUM zhes pa bzlas pas so/ /rmi lam mthong bar 'dod pas ni rdo rje hUM zhes pa lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas shing
bdug pas ka pi tsas bdugs te/ gnyid log na de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi shes pa ston to/ /tshig bsgrub par 'dod pas rdo rje
tshig gi stong phrag brgya bzlas na rdo rje tshig gis rang gi lces smras pa thams cad bden par 'gyur te ci bslangs pa de stsol to/ /cho 'phrul ston pa ni bzlas pa'i rdo rje'i tshig gis
@#/ /brgyad brgya bzlas na rang gi lus la cho 'phrul du 'gyur ba ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / rdo rje 'dzin dang / lha dang / klu dang /
gnod sbyin la sogs pa sems can thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan gyi tshul du ston to/ /rang gi gzugs ci dga' bar bsgyur bar byed 'dod pas rdo rje tshig gis rdo rje bzlas pa
stong phrag brgya bzlas na gzugs gang dang / gang 'dod pa de dang / bdag sangs rgyas kyi gzugs su'ang byed par 'gyur ro/ /mi snang bar 'dod pas rdo rje khu tshur gyis rdo rje bzung
la rdo rje bzung bas mi snang bar gyur pa de srid kyi bar du bzlas so/ /btang bas ni dgrol lo/ /khri'u la 'dug nas rdo rje lag tu blangs te/ nam 'phar gyi bar du bzlas so/ /gdon
gyis 'dzin du gzhug na rdo rje hUM zhes pas so/ /gdon gar byed du 'jug pa ni hi zhes pas so/ /gdon bskyod pa ni hag ces pas so/ /gdon gzhom pa ni phaT ces pas so/ /
gcer bar bya ba ni mi'i skra'i skud pas rang gi dpung pa bcings na gcer bar 'gyur te gos brje bar 'gyur ro/ /sdang bar bya ba ni rdo rje khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya dral
bas so/ /bskrad pa ni rdo rje khu tshur gyis 'phang ngo / /dgos pa bskyed pa ni mtshan thog thag sha chen po rang gi khrag gis bskus te sreg go/ gzhan gyi bud med dgug pa ni
rdo rje bzung nas snying po bzlas shing dgug gam/ yang na thams cad du khyab pa hUM zhes pas thams cad bya'o/ /bud med thams cad dang dga' bar spyod pa ni rang gi rtags rdo rje bcings pas
bzung la nyin bdun dus gsum du langs kyi bar du bzlas so/ /de nas mjug tu nam phyed kyi bar du bzlas na rtag tu ldang la mi snyoms shing bcud mang la rtags shugs drag por
'gyur ro/ /bu mo spyad pa ni rdo rje bzung nas thams cad du khyab par hUM zhes bya ba byas nas spyod do/ /bud med thams cad dbang du bya ba ni rdo rje hUM zhes pa'i phyag rgya bcings la stong phrag
brgya bzlas na bud med thams cad mgu bar 'gyur ro/ /phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar spyan ras gzigs dbang po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la stong phrag brgya bzlas na bud med
thams cad mgu bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad dbang du bya bar 'dod na rdo rje khu tshur gyi bcings pas rdo rje bzung la nam 'gul gyi bar du bzlas so/ snang ba la dbang
du bya bar 'dod na rdo rje blangs te rang gi spyi bor bzhag la spyi bor rdo rje brtan par gyur gyi bar du bzlas so/ /de nas snang ba'i mdun du 'dug na des snang bar rang gi dbang bskur
ba yang stsol to/ /nor dgug pa ni rin po che'i gtso bo'i phye mas sbyin sreg byas pas so/ /char dbab pa ni rdo rje hUM zhes pa stong bzlas pas so/ /char gcad pa ni rdo rje hUM zhes pas so/ /
@#/ /ser ba gcad pa ni rdo rje gsor ba'i phyag rgyas so/ /gdon dgag pa yang phyag rgya de nyid kyis so/ /sprin dgag pa ni rdo rje hUM zhes pa brgyar bzlas pas so/ /
bsal bal ni rdo rje hUM zhes pa lan brgyar bzlas so/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bzhag nas me tog dang / bdug pas mchod de/ rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgyas mnan la rdo
rje langs kyi bar du bzlas so/ /de thogs nas sa bskor na ci 'dod pa bzhin du sgyu ma'i las rnams ston te/ rdo rjes bskor bas dus ma yin par shing la 'bras bu dang / me
tog mthong ngo / /nam mkha' la me tog gi phreng ba chags par bya ba ni dbugs bsdams la rdo rje khu tshur bcings te gtor na chags so/ /cha lugs bzhad par bya ba ni rdo rje'i
phyag rgyas so/ /gar byed par bya ba ni rdo rje 'dzin mas so/ /smra bar bya ba na hUM zhes pas so/ /rgyug par bya na rdo rje dgug pa'i phyag rgyas so/ /smin ma 'gul bar bya na rdo rje'i
phyag rgya 'dzin pas rdo rje thogs la rang gi smin mtshams su bsgul bas so/ /sa g.yo bar bya na rkang pa g.yon pa brdabs pas so/ /khyim bskul ba ni rdo rje dbab pa'i
phyag rgyas so/ /khang pa dgug pa ni rdo rje khros pa'i kyo btang gi phyag rgya bcings pas so/ /sprin med par char pa dbab pa ni rdo rje hUM zhes bzlas pas so/ /skad cig tu sprin 'du
zhing ston pa ni rdo rje bskor bas so/ /zla ba dang / nyi ma dbab cing bstan pa ni rdo rje brdabs pas so/ /nyi ma dang / zla ba mang por bstan na/ rdo rje bzhi nam mkha' la gtor bas so/ /dmag
rnam bzhi bstan na rdo rje bskor bas so/ /mtshan mo nyin par du bya na rdo rje 'bar ba bskor bas so/ /nyin par mtshan mor bya na mig btsums la rdo rje bskor bas so/ /thams cad nas
rdo rje bstan na brgya bzlas te rdo rje bskor bas so/ /thams cad nas byang chub sems dpa' bstan na stong bzlas te rdo rjes bskor bas so/ /phyag na rdo rje thams cad ba la bstan na
stong phrag brgya bzlas te bskor bas so/ /thams cad nas sangs rgyas bstan na rdo rje la bye ba bzlas pas so/ /'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po
las/ rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i rtog pa chen po rdzogs so// //de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
rgyas kyis phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad gsungs so/ /ngas kyang sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir gang 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po 'dir
brtson par 'gyur ba la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di sbyin no/ /de nas phyag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas tsog tsog por 'dug
@#/ /ste mnos pa/ hUM badzra bid swAhA/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rab tu g.yos so/ /sems
can thams cad kyang rab tu g.yos nas phyag 'tshal zhing dbang du gyur to/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo
bos phyag 'tshal nas rdo rje rig pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di bshad do/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du dkyil 'khor thams cad brtags te/ de'i dbus su nas phul bzhi la
bcom ldan 'das bzhugs te/ de'i spyan sngar phyag na rdo rje yid kyis kyang tsog tsog por bzhag go/ de nas de bzhin du gzhug go/ zhugs nas 'di skad du/ khyod deng nas
de bzhin gshegs pa nyid do/ /de ste dad na de bshad do zhes bsgos shig /des smras pa/ gsungs shig ces pa dang / de nas khyod deng phan cad de bzhin gshegs
par gyur to zhes smros shig /des smras pa/ ci'i phyir/ dkyil 'khor mthong ba'i phyir ro zhes des smros shig /gang dkyil 'khor 'dir zhugs pa de de bzhin gshegs
pa nyid du blta ste/ des sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyang tshe 'di nyid dam/ pha rol la thob par 'gyur ro/ /zhes smras nas/ phyag rgya slongs shig /de bzhin gshegs pa'i
dkyil 'khor ro/ /de nas phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bshad do/ /dkyil 'khor de bzhin du bris nas bcug la/ rdo rje'i
sgrub pa bsgrub bo/ /lag pa gnyis kyi rdo rje bzung nas rang gi phyag rgya bsgom so/ /rdo rje zhes bya ba 'di ci yin/ snying bsgom pa ste/ rdo rje tshig gis bzlas na des de bzhin gshegs
pa yang tshe di'am gzhan la thob par 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /thams cad dam tshig chen po'i tshul du byas la 'di smros shig /dad brtan phyag na rdo rje la/ /de
bzhin gshegs rigs de bzhin no/ /sems can thams cad mgu ba ru/ /khyod kyi de ltar brtag par bya/ /deng nas khyod kyi de ltar ma byas na/ /sems can dmyal bar ltung bar
'gyur ro/ /dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ro/ /yang dkyil 'khor de bzhin du bris la slob ma bcug nas las rnam bzhi yang bslab bo/ /lus thams cad kyis gtugs te/ de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas langs te yan lag lngas phyag byas te sdig pa thams cad ni bshags so/ /de nas langs nas thal mo sbyar te/ pus
mo gnyis sa la gtugs nas/ bsod nams thams cad kyi rjes su yi rang ngo / /de nas langs te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsugs la/ rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya bcings
@#/ /nas phyag 'atsal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i tshig gi badzra bid brjod cig /des ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / phyag na rdo rje
la phyag bya ba dang / bkur sti dang / mchod par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /mchod pa'i cho ga'o/ /de nas phyag na rdo
