mtha' med pa thams cad ni/ /nam mkha' 'byung ba chen po'i gnas/ /nam mkha' skye ba skye med phyir/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rab tu
dga' ba'i bshad pa'i rgyud ni/ rab tu dga' phyir nyon mongs te/ /'gro ba thams cad bde 'dod pa/ /de la bde ba rnam dag phyir/ /srid gsum snga rol bcom ldan 'byung / /
de nas dang po'i snying po'i de kho na nyid bshad pa'i rgyud ni/ chags pa kun la chags pa che/ /'dod ldan thams cad sad par byed/ /'dod chags 'bar ba dri za yi/ /snying po'i
phyag rgya rdo rje'o/ /de nas yi ge hUM gi glu blang ba'i rgyud ni/ glu las chags pa dga' las 'dod/ /rab tu dga' las thams cad 'byung / /thams cad 'byung bar grub pa'i
@#/ /phyir| |bskal pa dang por bcom ldan gsungs/ /de nas yi ge hUM gi bzlas pa'i don gyi rgyud bshad pa'i rgyud ni/ myur du thams cad rjes chags
pas| |dngos grub thams cad rjes su chags/ /rjes su chags par byed mchog ni/ snying po'i bzlas pa'i don yin no/ /de nas rdo rje sems rgyud ni/ glu rnams ci ltar
khro bo ni/ bsdus nas kun tu 'jug pa na/ /rdo rje thog ni brtan gyur pa/ /de bzhin rdo rje bsdus pa 'o/ /de nas rdo rje sems dpa' 'byung ba shes pa'i rgyud ni/ thams cad
bdag nyid sems dpa' ni/ bdag gi bdag nyid la yang gnas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dngos su ni/ /myur du thams cad du yang zhugs/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs
pa 'byung ba shes pa'i rgyud ni/ 'dod las chags pa dga' las bde/ /bde las sdig pa sdig las sdug /sdug las ting 'dzin shin tu brtan/ /rdo rje nyid las
sangs rgyas 'byung / /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la sogs pa 'byung ba shes pa'i rgyud ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs nyid dang / /de nyid rdo rje rigs
chen po/ /de nyid pad+ma'i rigs dag ba/ /de nyid nor bu'i rigs mchog bshad/ /de nas mngon par byang chub pa shes pa'i rgyud ni/ rang sems so sor rtog pa ni/ /
byang chub sems ni yang dag 'byung / /rdo rje nyid phyir sangs rgyas nyid/ /bdag nyid sangs rgyas rab tu bsgom/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bdud nyid du shes pa'i rgyud ni/ /rang sems
nyid ni bdud nyid de/ /sems nyid de bzhin gshegs pa yin/ /rang gi sems ni gdul ba'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas bdud nyid du ni 'byung / /de nas rtog pa thams cad sgrub
pa shes pa'i rgyud ni/ /rtog pa kun la grub bya gang / /rgyu ba dang ni mi rgyu yin/ /rang gi lha yi rnal 'byor gyis/ /de dag thams cad bsgrub par bya/ /de nas dang po'i snying
po sgrub pa shes pa'i rgyud ni/ /bzlas pa'i don shes nus pa yis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rab bsgrub ste/ /ci srid 'dod pa'i bzlas pa mchog /dngos grub chen po'i bde ba
ster/ /de nas snying po dang / phyag rgya dang / sngags dang / rig pa sgrub pa shes pa'i rgyud ni/ /sems dpa' gang gi snying po dang / /phyag rgya sngags dang rig pa dang / /bzlas
pa'i don du sems dpa' che/ /bdag nyid dang ni bsgrub bya ba/ /de nas dngos grub shes pa'i rgyud ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos grub che/ /de bzhin de bzhin gshegs kun
gyi/ /byang chub rdo rje sems dpa' nyid/ /las kun mchog gi dngos grub phyir/ /de nas bsod nams med pa rnams kyi dngos grub grub pa shes pa'i rgyud ni/ /ci 'dod 'khor
@#/ /lo bris nas ni/ /ci yang rung ba'ang thal bas kyang / /sems dpa' chen po bzhag byas nas/ /nyin zhag bzhir ni bsgrub par bya/ /de nas slob
dpon nyid kyi grub pa shes pa'i rgyud ni/ bde ba chen po rdo rje yi/ /gsang mchog dam tshig grong khyer du/ /ci bzhin rang nyid rab zhugs te/ /bdud rtsi'i chu yis dbang bskur
bya/ /de nas me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa 'bul ba'i shes pa'i rgyud ni/ rdo rje can la mchod pa kun/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la dkar/ /rdo rje bdag nyid nag
po ste/ /dmar po pad+ma nor bu ser/ /de nas dbul ba shes pa'i rgyud ni/ rdzogs pa 'am ni mtshang ba/ /yang na ji ltar rnyed pa ni/ rdo rje gar sogs mchod pa yis/ /rtag tu
thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nas dus kyi mchod pa shes pa'i rgyud ni/ /drug ldan la sogs snyam pa'i glu/ /glu ni thams cad ci 'dod pas/ /rdo rje 'byed ma la sogs
'grol/ /mchod pa dag ni rab tu bya/ /de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa shes pa'i rgyud ni/ rdo rje gar bcas mchod pa ni/ go rims ci lta ba bzhin du/ /bzlas pa'i don
gyis ma brjod kyang / /mchog gi dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nas sdig pa chen po byed pa'ang grub pa shes pa'i rgyud ni/ dkyil 'khor la ni ma zhugs kyang / /
tshul khrims 'chal ba la sogs pa/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi stos kyis ni/ sdig pa kun las grol bar 'gyur/ /de nas dngos grub mi thob pa'i rgyu shes pa'i rgyud ni/ chags pa smad
par mi bya ste/ /rnam dag de bzhin bde ba ster/ /bcom ldan 'das kyang chags pa che/ /'di ma dag pas 'grub mi 'gyur/ /de nas mchog gi dngos grub sgrub pa shes pa'i rgyud
ni/ ji bzhin yul dang ldan gyur nas/ /mchog gi dngos grub bsgrub par bya/ /rtog pa kun nas rnal 'byor 'di/ /tshe 'di nyid la sgrub par byed/ /bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i
rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po'i rdo rje rin po che chen po las/ rtog pa thams cad kyi rgyud phyi ma'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das rtog pa de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi rdo rje gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i rdo rje rin po che/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi cho ga gzigs pa'i ye shes kyi
dbang phyug gi rdo rje'i pad+ma/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sna tshogs pa'i mdzad pas 'phrin las dam pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rdo rjes thams cad la khyab pa/ ma lus shing
lus pa med pa'i rdo rje'i khams bstan pa'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa nam mkha'i khams kyi mthar thug par chos kyi dbyings spro ba thams cad khyab pa'i de bzhin
@#/ /gshegs pa thams cad kyis 'khor lo mngon par mkhyen par mdzad nas dang po'i snying po'i gsang ba'i de kho na nyid kyi rdo rje'i sgrub pa'i rgyud 'di gsungs
so/ /ci srid 'khor ba'i gnas la zhugs/ /de srid sems can gdon par mdzad/ /mya ngan 'das bzhugs gzi brjid can/ /sems can don ni nus pa min/ /de phyir sems
dpa' dam pa rnams/ /'khor ba srid du 'khor bar bzhugs/ /sems can don ni mngon par bzhed/ /thams cad dag pa'i mchog chos can/ /de bzhin gshegs pas
mi 'dul bas/ /sems can don mi mdzad pa de/ /'dir ni rab grub dngos grub mchog /dus kun du ni thams cad du/ /rdo rje 'chang chen la sogs pa/ /'di ltar bsod nams
rnam smin gyis/ /kun la mthong ba la sogs kyis/ /rang gi las kyis mdzad mi spyod/ /dkyil 'khor la ni ma zhugs kyang / /srid pa 'di la myur 'grub 'gyur/ /shin tu
mthong ba la sogs kun/ /sems can thams cad rab stsol mdzad/ /kun nas dus kun thams cad la/ /dngos grub thams cad rab stsol 'gyur/ /rgyal po rdo rje
'chang chen po/ /srid pa'i dbang phyug kun gyi gtso/ /de phyir bsgrub bya 'di bshad bya/ /dngos grub shin tu rtag pa'o/ /gang gis srid pa 'di nyid du/ /shin tu rtag
pa'i dngos grub thob/ /lugs ma 'am ni brdungs ma 'am/ /ri mor bris pa 'am 'dus byas pa'i/ /phyag na rdo rje'i sku gzugs ni/ /ci bzhin bshad par rab gzhug bya'o/ /bde
ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig gi de kho na nyid sgrub pa'i dngos grub gyi cho ga rgyas pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
kyis phyag rgya'i ye shes kyi slar yang phyag rgya thams cad sgrub pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /nyin re snga rol dus ci bzhin/ /dang po'i rdo rje bde ba che/ /'dis ni rtag pa
thams cad la/ /phyag rgya thams cad mdor bsdus pas/ /dam tshig yang dag bcings nas grub/ /phyi nas ma bsgrubs kyang grub 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje
chos kyi de kho na nyid kyi gsang ba'i sngags sgrub pa 'di gsungs so/ /langs pa 'am ni 'dug pa 'am/ /gang dang der ni gnas pa 'am/ /thams cad rjes chags rnal
'byor gyis/ /dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis las kyi gsang ba'i de kho na nyid kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ /gsang ba'i gar
mchog mchod pa 'am/ /yang na mchod pa ci bde bar/ /byas te mgon po bsgrub byas na/ /mchog gi dngos grub myur du 'thob/ /de nas rang gi phyag rgyas bdag
@#/ /nyid bsgrub pa'i rgyud ni/ /phyag rgya chen po mnyam gzhag ste/ /rang gi snying pos lan gcig bsgrub/ /brtan zhing shin tu dgyes kun chags/ /shin
tu dgyes myur bdag po grub/ /de nas yi ge hUM gi glu blang ba'i grub pa'i rgyud ni/ ri b+hi da sogs rgyan dang ldan/ /ci nus pa dang ci 'dod pa/ /dri za dang po blangs nas ni/ /yi
ge hUM gis grub par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das chags pa chen po dang po'i rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so/ /de kho na nyid chen po'i gsang
ba'i dngos grub sgrub pa'i rgyud do// //de nas rtog pa thams cad kyi las kyi phyag rgya bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang / tha ma med
pa'i 'phrin las can rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /shin tu ring ba'i tshe 'phel ba ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje'i chos so/ /shin nu gzhon pa'i na tshod 'phel ba ni bde ba chen
po'i rdo rje'i bcud kyis len gyis so/ /gzugs chen po dang / gzi brjid chen po 'phel ba ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje'i gzugs kyi gzi brjid kyis so/ /'du byed chen po thams
cad 'phel ba ni bde ba chen po rdo rje 'du byed chen pos so/ /sems can thams cad kyi bdag nyid thams cad bsrung ba ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje bsrung bas so/ /phyogs thams
cad dang / mtshams dang / dkyil 'khor bcing ba ni/ bde ba chen po rdo rje bskor bas te/ thams cad rdo rje chen po'i ngo bo nyid khro bo'i rgyal po chen po rdo rjes kyang 'jug par mi nus
shing mi phyed par 'gyur ro/ /srid pa thams cad srung ba ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs pas so/ /bdag nyid kyi dngos grub thams cad dam/ /gzhan dag rdo rjer
byed pa ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje go chas so/ /'thab mo thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje rgyal mtshan mchog gi dpung rgyan gyis so/ /'thab mo srung ba ni
bde ba chen po'i gzhan gyis mi thub pas so/ /gzhan gyi dpung thams cad gzhig pa ni rdo rje bde ba chen po'i rdo rje 'dzin par byed pas so/ /gzhan gyi dpung nyams pa dang / ldang
ba dang / ltung ba dang / gsod pa ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje glog bskor bas so/ /rims thams cad la sogs pa'i nad thams cad dang / nad chen po zhi ba ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje
'phrog pas so/ /dug thams cad gzhig pa dang / dug med par bya ba ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje phyag rgya'i las kyis so/ /gdon thams cad las dgrol ba ni bde ba chen po rdo
rje'i 'byung po bskrad pas so/ /ma mo dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / gdon thams cad dgrol ba chen po dang / gzhom pa dang / snying gzhan dbyung ba dang / shi ba gso ba dang /
@#/ /tshe 'phel ba de shin tu srung ba rnams ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya'i lan gyis so/ /thams cad dbab pa dang / g.yo ba dang / 'ching ba
dang / gar byed du gzhug pa dang / glu len du gzhug pa dang / snga ma 'byung ba so sor bstan pa dang / rmad du byung ba dang / cho 'phrul bstan pa dang / bden pa thams cad
pa thams cad smrar gzhug pa dang / dgrol ba dang / bsrung ba dang / sos su bcug pa rnams ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje dbab pas so/ /rgyu ba dang / mi rgyu ba'i dngos po thams
cad la yid kyis 'dod pa'i pra dbab pa thams cad grub pa ni bde ba chen po rdo rje pra dbab pas so/ /rang gi lus dang / ngag dang / yid rdo rjes mthong ba dang / thos pa
dang / smra ba dang / ston pa'i shes pa grub pa ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje'i bdag nyid bsgoms pas so/ /thams cad las 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba
thams cad bka' mthong ba'i yi ge sna tshogs pa 'am/ dngos po sna tshogs pa thams cad kyis rna ba'i shes pa rab tu 'jug pa ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje thams cad
mkhyen pas so/ /glog dang / char pa dang / thog dbab pa thams cad bzlog pa dang / sprin gzhig pa ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje khro bo'i lta bas so/ /sa'i 'og thams
cad las sngar ma byung ba'i 'bru la sogs pa'i 'bras bu 'byung ba dang / nye bar len pa dang / chu med pa'i gnas las chu'i dngos po 'byung ba dang / nye bar len pa dang / mun pa chen
por snang ba chen po bskyed pa dang / nye bar len pa dang / rlung thams cad la bka' bsgo ba dang / nye bar len pa dang / nam mkha' thams cad las yid kyis 'dod pa'i dngos po
thams cad mthong ba dang / nye bar len pa ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug mas so/ /thams cad gzhom pa dang / rengs pa dang / dral ba dang / rmugs pa dang / gnyid
log par bya ba dang / rgyas gdab pa dang / ltung ba dang / rmongs pa dang / gsad pa dang / phyir ldog pa ni bde ba chen po'i gdug pa'i rdo rje'i phyag rgyas so/ /thams cad rjes su
chags pa dang / dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / dbab pa dang / bcing ba dang / bkrol ba dang / dral ba dang / ltung ba dang / ltung ba bslang ba dang / 'dren pa dang / bran du
byed pa dang / mngag gzhug bka' bsgo ba byed pa dang / thams cad tshur drang ba dang / phar btang ba dang / gsad pa dang / slar gso ba la sogs pa'i las thams cad byed pa
dang / dbang du byed pa'i sgrub pa ni bde ba chen po rdo rje'i thams cad sgrub pas so/ /rigs thams cad kyi mchog gi dngos grub la sogs pa'i mchog gi dngos grub thams cad
@#/ /dang / mchog gi dbang bskur ba la sogs pa thams cad dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang / thams cad rjes su chags pa la sogs
pa'i bde ba dang / yid bde ba thams cad rab tu gzhug pa dang / mchod pa chen po thams cad la sogs pa'i las thams cad myur du grub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ni bde ba chen
po'i rdo rje mchog gi dngos grub kyis so/ /de la bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig gi dang po'i mchog gi dam tshig gi las kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud ni 'di yin te/ bde ba
chen po'i rdo rje ni rdo rje sems dpa'i tshe ster ba'o/ /'di'i las kyi phyag rgya thams cad bcing ba'o/ /dbus ma'i rdo rje btung bar bya/ rtse mo'i 'od zer byas pas gdong
pa yongs su sbyangs te gdong par dgrol bar bya'o/ /bdag nyid la kun tu bskor nas snying gar dgrol bar bya'o/ /gtsug tor dang / phyogs thams cad dang / dkyil
'khor bskor ba'o/ /snying ga dang / yid kyis rgyab dang / phrag pa dang / spyi bo dang / dpral bar bzhag la rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis phreng ba bcings la go cha bya ste/ mdud
pa byas nas rdo rje'i gnas rnams su slar yang phreng ba byas pas rgyab tu mdud pa byas te dar dpyangs bya'o/ /snying ga dang / dpral ba dang / mgrin pa dang / spyi bor gzhag
par bya'o/ /dbus ma'i dar mchog go /byab pa'i gyen du kha bltas pa'i dbugs pa dang / 'jigs pa'i gdong gis blta ba'o/ /'bar ba bzhi'i tshul gyis 'dor zhing khros pa'i rang
gi snying gar bcings te zhi ba'i lta bas rtse mo 'phrog par bya'o/ /lta bas 'phrog par bya'o/ /dbab pas myur du dgrol bar bya'o/ /yongs su bskor nas dpral bar bzhag ste dbus
ma'i rdo rje sor mo'i rtse mo gnyis bskyod par byas na ci lta ba bzhin du las byed pa'i snying gar bzhag ste/ dbus ma rdo rje'i las ni 'di lta ste/ snying gar gtod pa dang / skyed pa
dang / 'ching ba dang / gar byed du bcug pa dang / mgrin pa gsal ba dang / rdo rje rtse mo btsir ba dang / kha dbub pa dang / mgrin pa gsal ba dang / bcings pa myur du dkrol ba
dang / bsrung ba dang / bya ba pa'i las so/ /snying ga kha sbyor bskyed pa'o/ /nyid re bzhin snga rol tu lan gcig lus yongs su sbyang ba dang / mgrin pa gsal ba'i ngag dang / snying
gar gzhag pa dang / phyag rgya la lta ba ste/ nyin re snga rol du lan gcig dbang po thams cad la kun tu bskor bar bya'o/ /dbus ma rdo rjes byed pa ni khro bo'i rdo rje'i lta bas
so/ /dbus ma'i rdo rje'i las ni 'og nas 'byung ste/ nye bar longs spyod pa dang / thams cad la dgug par byed pa dang / dbab pa sbyin pa dang / 'bar ba'i me stag byed
@#/ /pa dang / nye bar len pa dang / rlung gi tshul dang / nam mkhar sgom pa las du ma'o/ /dbus ma'i rdo rje'i lus ni phyag rgyas gzhom pa dang / rtse
mo gnyis snying gar btsir ba dang / sen mo brud pa dang / mig 'degs pa dang / btsum pa dang / sor mo mnyam pos snying gar bteg pa dang / ltung ba dang / slong bar
byed pa dang / phan tshun rdeg pa dang / rang gi snying gar rang bzhin du gzhag pa'i las so/ /dbus ma'i rdo rje las ni mda' gtod pa dang / lcags sgrog gnyis kyis
dgug pa dang / g.yon pa la g.yas pa bcug pa dang / rtse mo bskyod pa dang / gdu bur bcing ba dang / myur du dgrol ba dang / sor mo mnyam por myur du dral ba
dang / ltung bar byed pa dang / 'og nas bteg pa dang / g.yon pa g.yas pas drang ba dang / las thams cad la sbyar bar byed pa dang / 'og nas bskyod cing gyen du
drang ba dang / tshur 'dren pa dang / phar gtang ba dang / g.yon dang / g.yas kyis drag por 'degs pa dang / rang gi snying gar rtse mo 'dren pa dang / las thams cad
la nges par sbyor bar byed pa'i las dang / snying gar 'khor lo gzhug pa dang / dbang bskur ba'i phreng ba dang / dar dpyangs 'ching bar byed pa dang / snying gar
de las drangs te bde ba tshur 'dren pa thams cad yongs su sbyang ba dang / gar gyis blangs te spyi bor dgrol ba'i las so/ /bde ba chen po rab grub dang / /chags pa chen po rnam
dag phyir/ /don yod thogs med sna tshogs pa'i/ /phyag rgya'i rgyud ni rab tu bshad/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po yis/ /sangs rgyas sras bcas bdag nyid kun/ /sems can
thams cad myur grub dang / /don yod dngos grub kun stsol ba'o/ /dkyil 'khor dag tu ma zhugs pa/ /sdig pa'i las ni kun dang ldan/ /de dag kyang ni grub 'gyur te/ /
bcings pa tsam gyis sdig byang phyir/ /gang zhig le lo nyid kyis sam/ /brtson 'grus ldan yang ma tshad ba/ /dkyil 'khor med pa'i sems can gang / /slob dpon nyid
byin ma rlabs dang / /de dag grub mchog rdo rje chen/ /rdo rje slob dpon nyid du 'gyur/ /don yod mchog dang sna tshogs pa'i/ /bcings pa tsam gyis myur grub byed/ /bsam
pa thams cad yongs rdzogs pa'i/ /mchog gi dngos grub kun la 'jug /dang po 'byung ba'i rdo rje mchog /bde ba che las yang dag 'byung / /bag chag shin tu grub pa dang / /dgrol
ba thams cad la yang ngo / /de nas phyag rgya thams cad sgrub pa'i gsang ba'i rgyud ni/ /las 'dod thog mar phyag rgya ni/ /skal ba ci bzhin snying pos grub/ /rang gi bdag nyid
@#/ /nges sbyar bya/ /bde ba chen po'i rdo rje gsang ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las/ bde ba chen po thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig don yod pa'i
dngos grub kyi mchog ces bya ba'i rgyud phyi ma'i cho ga rgyas pa yongs su rdzogs pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
yongs su mthar thug pa med pa'i sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje thams cad kyi las kyis sbyor ba ni/ rdo rje 'chang ba dang bcas pa rnams kyis bde ba chen po'i rdo rje gsang
pa'i dam tshig rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po 'dis sems can gyi khams ma lus pa kun du khyab cing spro ba dang / dngos grub thams cad kyi cho ga rgyas pa/ srid pa thams cad
kyi rtse mo'i yongs su mthar thug pa'i gsung rab yongs su mthar thug pa'i don du thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' la gsol ba btab pa yin no/ /rdo
rje nam mkha' chen po yis/ /chos kyi dbyings ni spro ba mchog /rdo rje'i nam mkha' chen po yi/ /chos dbyings spro ba'i dngos grub ster/ /rtag tu sangs rgyas thams
cad ni/ /rdo rje 'chang chen bcas pa dang / /rdo rje 'chang gi theg pa ni/ /yongs su mthar thug nus pa min/ /e ma'o mngon zhes sems can dang / /le lo can dang
las kun dang / /thugs rje dam pa'i rdo rje khyod/ /byang chub sems ni bla na med/ /bde ba chen po rab sgrub dang / /chags pa chen po rnam dag phyir/ /rtog pa 'di ni mthar thug pa/ /
rab tu sgrub phyir mthar thug brjod/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig gsan nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi ting nge 'dzin rdo rje sems dpa' byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di gsungs so/ /bde ba chen po rab sgrub dang / /chags pa
chen po rnam dag phyir/ /thams cad dngos grub don du ni/ /yongs su mthar thug byin brlabs pa'o/ /gang gis tshul mchog 'di ni nyan 'gyur dang / /gang gis khyim na
gsang ba thams cad gnas/ /bde chen mchog gi rdo rje mchog gsang ba'i/ /dngos grub tshe 'dir de dag rnams la bstan/ /brtan pa nyid phyir 'dul bar nga mi byed/ /
sems can don du rgyal ba las dag phyir/ /rnam par sbyang bar mdzad pa 'di yin te/ /rtog pa 'di ni bgegs med bdud rnams med/ /dngos grub 'phel med min par
byin gyis brlabs/ /bdud dang brtan med nyid ni bdag mi byed/ /brtan pa nyid phyir 'dul bar nga mi byed/ /rtog pa chen po'i mchog 'di gang bsgrub pa/ /myur du dngos
@#/ /grub mchog phyir bdag brtan 'gyur/ /brtan zhing rab dgyes brtan pas rjes su cha chags/ /bde ba chen po kun byed shin tu rgyas/ /nga yi dang po'i
snying po gang sgrub pa/ /de la nga ni rtag tu dngos grub ste/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus nas legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs
pa la mngon par bstod do// //bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba zhes bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po mchog tu grub pa'i rgud phyi ma yongs su rdzogs so// //
de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje 'di nyid slar yang ston par mdzad cing zhal rab tu 'dzum pa dang / mchog dang po'i rdo rje
bde ba chen po rdo rje bsnyems pas gsor nas rang gi thugs gar gtod pa'i tshul du 'dzin cing mchog tu gsang zhing mchog tu grub pa don yod cing thogs pa med pa bde ba
chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig 'di rtog pa thams cad kyi sdig pa dang / sgrib pa dang / bdud thams cad 'dul bar byin gyis brlabs pa'i dbang gis ma grub pa
rnams kyang mchog dam par grub par byed pa dang / mchog tu gsang ba/ thog ma dang / tha ma med pa'i mtshon cha mchog dang po zhes bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po dbang phyug chen
po'i chen po rgyud phyi ma gsungs pa/ /de nas thog ma'i gnas nyams dga'/ /nam mkha' kun la rab tu gnas/ /rin chen 'od 'bar rab tu gsal/ /dri ma med pa'i ma dngas
kyis brgyan/ /zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /sgo khyud rnams kyis rab tu brgyan/ /kha khyer gyis ni yongs su bskor/ /rdo rje lha mo tshogs kyis mchod/ /zla ba phyed ni rab tu gnas/ /
rdo rje rin chen 'bar byed pa/ /rlung gis bskyod pa'i rtse mo mchog /dar 'phan dril bu sgra sgrogs pa/ /dra ba me long rtog me long / /me tog chun po'i rgyan gyis bskor/ /bde ba chen
po rdo rje che/ /rdo rje kun gyis legs sbyar ba/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i bzhugs gnas che/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis rjes bsten pa/ /byang chub sems dpa'i gnas kyi mchog /rdo rje
'dzin pa kun gyi gnas/ /bde ba chen po rdo rje che/ /rdo rje rin chen mchog ces bya/ /rdo rje 'chang chen bzhugs nas ni/ /bde ba chen po rnam par bzhugs/ /thog mtha' med
pa'i sems dpa' ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che/ /kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid/ /rdo rje bsnyems tshul bdag po'i bdag/ /sems can kun gyi sems gang ni/ /brtan
pa'i phyir ni dpa' zhes bya/ /brtan par bzhag pas ting 'dzin te/ /nges pa la ni rdo rjer gyur/ /sems dpar byin brlabs sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur//
@#/ /de nyid bcom ldan sna tshogs pa/ /byang chub spyod pa'i rjes mthun pa/ /bdud dang bdud las rgyal ba nyid/ /byang chub sems rgyas de nyid do/ /rdo rje drag
po mthar byed nyid/ /phyag na rdo rje nyid kyang de/ /de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs/ /de nyid rdo rje rigs chen po/ /de nyid pad+ma'i rigs dag pa/ /de nyid nor bu'i rigs
bzang bshad/ /de nyid 'dod chags bral ba nyid/ /'dod dang grol ba de nyid de/ /dus gsum srid gsum mchog gsum ste/ /'jig rten gsum mchog khams gsum
pa/ /mi g.yo thams cad mchog de nyid/ /brtan pa sra ba nor chen po/ /rgyu ba sems kyi 'dus byas pa/ /thams cad byed pa thams cad nyid/ /dang po'i sems dpa' sems
dpa' che/ /byang chub sems dpa' bde bar stsol/ /sems dpa'i skyil krung bcas nas ni/ /pad+ma'i steng du bzhugs pa dang / /btsun mo'i tshogs bcad sna tshogs pa/ rdo
rje lha mos yongs su bskor/ /bde ba chen po grub don du/ /'dod chags chen po rnam dag phyir/ /ma lus gdul bya'i don du ni/ /dngos grub thams cad rab grub phyir/ /
dam tshig mchog ni ma lus pa/ /rgyal bas kyang ni bsrung bar bya/ /bsnyems bcas rdo rje gsor ba dang / /rdo rje bsnyems pa'i tshul 'chang zhing / /phyag rgya kun myur grub
mngon du/ /rdo rje sems dpa' mchog grub phyir/ /dngos grub kun gyi thabs chen po/ /bsod nams kun gyis cher mthong ba/ /ye shes phyag rgya yang dag ldan/ /snying po chen po
dam yin ste/ /gang gis bsod nams mi ldan pa 'am/ /de bzhin dkyil 'khor ma zhugs pa 'ang / /don yod thogs pa med mchog 'gyur/ /dngos grub thams cad rnyed
dka' min/ /bde ba chen po rdo rje che/ /gsang ba mchog gi dam tshig brtan/ /dngos po thams cad sgrub pa ster/ /rtog pa thams cad myur grub byed/ /thog mtha' med phyir
dang por 'byung / /mchog dang dang po zhes byar bshad/ /tshig kun gyis ni ci 'dod dang / /chags pa kun gyis ci dga' bar/ /rjes su chags par bgyi'o zhes/ /ci bzhin
'bab pa'i ye shes 'jug /nye ba'i snying po bcas snying po/ /bskal ba dang por bcom ldan gsungs/ /hUM/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/ /sangs rgyas thams cad
sras bcas pa/ /rdo rje 'dzin bcas sna tshogs pa/ /skad cig gis ni 'dus par 'gyur/ /rdo rje 'dzin gyis thog mar/ /yud kyi 'jig rten gsum po 'byung / /ci ltar 'gro
bar rab grub ces/ /bde gshegs rnams kyis dngos grub dris/ /de rnams kyis ni bka' gsan nas/ /rdo rje 'dzin rang grol ba ni/ /'byin dang stsol dang ston pa po/ /byed
@#/ /pas tshig ni 'di skad gsol/ /chags bral gyis 'dul 'jig rten rnams/ /chags bral nyid kyis dag par 'gyur/ /'dod chags chen po
bde ba che/ /'di ni ji ltar 'grub par 'gyur/ /de yi tshig de gsan nas ni/ /rgyal ba rang nyid kyis gsungs pa/ /byang chub sems de thog ma'i lha/ /khyod ni thabs chen nyid
yin no/ /ji srid 'khor lo'i gnas su ni/ /mkhas mchog 'dug par gyur pa'i tshe/ /de srid mtshungs med sems can don/ /mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus/ /ci srid
sems can rnam rtog pa/ /de srid byang chub srid pa che/ /byang chub sems can la phan phyir/ /rdo rje can gyis ci bder gyis/ /de nas thog ma dang dkyil 'khor/ /dang po'i
dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlabs/ /rdo rje kun gyi dam tshig mchog /ci bzhin cho gas bsgrubs pa nyid/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de ni/ /bde ba chen po grub phyir
dang / /'dod chags chen po rnam dag phyir/ /gtso bo mgon la gsol ba btab/ /bcom ldan khyod la gsol ba ni/ /'dod chags chen po bde ba che/ /snying po 'di
ni rtog pa mchog /bde chen myur du grub pa 'o/ /de rnams kyi ni bka' gsan nas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde chen po/ /bde ba chen po rdo rje che/ /dkyil 'khor chen po
bka' stsal to/ /de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ /dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste/ /bde ba chen po rdo rje mchog /gsang ba dam pa zhes bshad do/ /thog mar dam tshig gsum thob
pa'i/ /rdo rje slob dpon rang phyag rgyas/ /'khor lo kun gyi cho ga la/ /rtag tu rdo rje dril 'chang bya/ /rtag pa thams cad yang dag 'bebs/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad sgrub byed
yin/ /dam tshig che gsum zhes bya ba'i/ /rgya 'di thams cad sgrub byed yin/ /dngos grub cho ga thams cad la/ /rdo rje dril bu rab bskul bas/ /cho ga lhag gam ma tshang yang / /
'grub 'gyur smad par mi bya 'o/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /mchog gi dang po mtha' yas mchog /bla na med cing mnyam med pa/ /nam mkha'
kun la rab tu gnas/ /mchog ste yi ge dam pa yin/ /dkyil 'khor gnas ni sbyang byas la/ /de yi dbus su cho ga bzhin/ /dngos grub byin rlabs cho ga yis/ /dkyil 'khor
de ni grub par bya/ /glu dang rol mo'i cho ga dang / /me tog spos sogs mchod pa yis/ /ji rnyed pa dang / ci 'dod par/ /mchog dang por ni brtag par bya/ /mchog gi dang
por mtha' yas mchog /bla na med cing dpe med pa/ /nam mkha' kun la rab tu gnas/ /grong khyer dag ni mi 'gyur mchog /thog ma med mchog rtag pa'i phyir/ /sangs
@#/ /rgyas 'byung ba'ang rab tu bzhugs/ /kun mchog mnyam pa nyid rten pas/ /lhag dang mtshang med kun gang / /mtha' dang dbus med nam mkha'
ni/ /'di ni dbu mar rnam brtags pas/ /phyag rgya'i sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /de yi dbu mar rnam brtag nyid/ /de yi dbus su pad+ma'i gzugs/ /yu bar bcas pa
rab tu gzhag /sna tshogs pad+mas yang dag khebs/ /thams cad dag pa'i gdan de yin/ /de nas srad bu nyis 'gyur du/ /byas pa'i thig ni gdab bya ste/ /nam mkha'
kun gyi tshad yin phyir/ /gdul bya'i blo ni mtha' yas pas/ /tshad ni tshad med pa yin no/ /mi mnyam med pas zur bzhi pa/ /dran dang dbang po sgo bzhi ste/ /bsam
gtan rnams kyi rta babs bzhi/ /ting 'dzin khyams su bshad pa yin/ /khyams la brten pa'i rdo rje'i bdag /gzugs rnams lha mos mchod pa 'o/ /rgyan rnams kun
gyis bkra ba ni/ /bsams pa thams cad rdzogs byed pa/ /gdul bas bskyod pa sna tshogs mchog /dam chos mchog ste kun tu 'gro /rlung gis bskyod pa sna tshogs
pa'i/ /ba dan rtser btags dril sgra sgrogs/ /me long ye shes rtag me tog /byang chub yan lag me tog phreng / /dra ba me long me tog che/ /me tog phreng ba'i rgyan gyis
bskor/ /kun grub mi 'gyur bde ba ni/ /bde ba chen po zhes bshad do/ /bde ba chen po'i gzhal yas khang / /dang po'i gnas su bri bar bya/ /thar pa chen po'i grong khyer mchog
kun mchog de ni legs bris nas/ /thog ma tha ma med pa'i dbyings/ /phyogs kun mnyam pa nyid du bsam/ /de ni phyi yi dkyil 'khor ro/ /de yi nang gi 'khor lo ni/ /dkyil
'khor brgyad pa lta bu yin/ /'di ni rnam thar brgyad po ste/ /dngos grub kun gyi bde ba ster/ /byang sems theg pa chen po yi/ /mdo sde'i 'khor lo rab bskor bas/ /rdo rje thig
gis yongs bskor ba/ /rdo rje 'khor lo yang dag bri/ /de ni sna tshogs pad+ma cher/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dgod par bya/ /lugs ma'am yang na brkos pa 'am/ /byas pa 'am
yang na bris ba ste/ /'dzum bcas zla ba'i mdog can la/ /dmar zhing sna tshogs 'od 'bar ba/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang la sogs/ /rgyan dang na bza' sna tshogs pa/ /sems
dpa'i skyil krung dag gis bzhugs/ /rdo rje bsnyems tshul 'chang ba'i mchog /su ra ta s+t+waM zhes brjod cing / /rang snying pos kyang gzhag par bya/ /de yi phyogs ni thams
cad du/ /tshon nam de bzhin phye ma yis/ /go rims dag ni ci bzhin du/ /rdo rje lha mo yang dag bri/ /rdo rje mchod bstod la brtson bya/ /rdo rje chags ma mdun du bri/ /lha mo
@#/ /rdo rje rol pa ni/ /rdo rje can la rab 'khyud pa/ /rgyab tu rdo rje dran ma ni/ /chu srin rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa 'o/ /rdo rje 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ma/ /rdo rje khu
tshur gnyis bsnyems bri/ /de nas 'di rnams dgod pa'i phyag rgya ni/ dzaHbadzra dri Sh+Ti sa ma ke ma Ta hUM/ oM badzra ki li ki la hUM/ baM badzri Ni sma ra ra Ta/ ho badzra kla me shwa ri
s+t+waM/ /mtshams su rdo rje sems ma sogs/ /dus kyi mchod pa yang dag bri/ /rdo rje sbrang rtsi ma dang sprin/ /ston dang dgun ni rdo rje ma/ /me tog bdun pa mar me che/ /dri
ste spyi bor thal sbyar ba/ /rdo rje rgyal po'i lha mo ste/ /de nas phyag rgya rab bshad bya/ /oM ma d+hu badzri g+huM g+huM/ oM badzra me g+he gu lu gu lu/ oM sha rad badzri/ oM oM/ oM badzra
shi shi ri hUM hUM/ sgeg mo bzhad ma glu chen ma/ /gar mdzad ma yi lha mo'i tshogs/ /rdo rje rol mo 'di dag ni/ /phyi rol gyi ni mtshams su bya/ /he ra ti badzra me g+ha bi
la si ni tra ha/ /he ra ti badzra nr-i t+ye be ba be ba/ sgo yi gnas ni thams cad du/ /gsol ga pa ni bzhi po ste/ /rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa dang / /lcags sgrog de bzhin dril
bu ma'i/ /badzra aM ku sha dzaH/ badzra pA she hUM/ badzra shriM kha le baM/ badzra g+ha N+De hoH/ /dam tshig mchog ni thams cad kyi/ /dgongs shing brtag pa nyid du 'gyur/ /rdo rje lha
mo la sogs pa/ /dngos grub kun la 'byung bar 'gyur/ /gsol ka ba dang g.yog mo yi/ /gtso mo pho nya bran mo'o/ /de nas kun mchog la sogs pa/ /mngon bris yang dag
bsgrub par bya/ /dam tshig mchog ni bcings nas su/ /dzaHhUM boM hoHzhes brjod bya/ /sems dpa'i skyil krung bcas nas ni/ /rdo rje can gyi spyan sngar 'dug /bde ba chen
po'i rdo rje mchog /bdag po lan cig yang dag dgug /hUM mahA su kha badzra satwa/ ya hi shI g+h+raM mahA su kha badzra a mo g+hA ya/ a nu pA la ya/ pra bud+d+ha su ra ta s+t+waM a nu ra k+to

me b+ha ba/ su to sh+yo me b+ha wa/ su to sh+yo me b+ha wa/ b+ha ga wA na nA di na sa satwa/ sarba sid+d+hi m+me pra yats+tsha/ a she ta ma tri sha A be sha ya sa ma ye ra bad d+ha/ pa shI ka ro me/ i me ra mu
drA pa daiH/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ 'di yis bcom ldan 'das rtag par/ /dkyil 'khor du ni rang nyid gshegs/ /bkug cing bcug la shin tu brtan/ /dbang du gyur nas rab tu
thub/ ces bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen po gsungs so/ /rdo rje slob dpon rang lha ni/ /'od zer kun tu ston la sogs/ /mtshan ma rnams pa mang po ni/ /ngo mtshar gyur pa mthong
bar 'gyur/ /de nas rdo rje mchod yon ni/ /rdo rje thal mo kha byed bul/ /bum pa kang dag ci snyed pa'i/ /me tog sogs kyis yang dag mchod/ /ba dan rtse mor dril btags
@#/ /pa/ /mtshams kyi char ni bzhag par bya/ /bum pa spos chus gang pa la/ /rdo rje bcas pas phyin brlangs pa/ /lcug ma la ni yongs su bzlas/ /de

la bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi tshur bsgrub pa ni 'di yin te/ hUM mahA su kha badzra ma mo g+ha sa ma yo da ka sad d+ha ma b+hi sha ny+tsa/ sarba su kha so ma na s+yA myA da da ku ru
ku ru/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ /'di lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas la bdag nyid la rdo rjes dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /bsang gtor bya ba dang / 'thungs pas kyang sdug bsngal
thams cad bsal pa dang / bde ba chen po thams cad 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de nas 'khor lor ma zhugs
kyang / /rang nyid thog mar byung zhugs shing / /rdo rje kun gyi slob dpon che/ /rdo rje can gyis rang byin rlob/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin slob dpon/ /rang nyid khrus byas dris legs
byugs/ /ci rnyed pa yi rgyan gyis brgyan/ /shin tu dmar ba'i gos bgo zhing / /me tog phreng btags kha dris bsgo/ /rnam sgeg dga' ba'i rdo rje dang / /rdo rje gar gyi sbyor
ba yis/ /spyi bor me tog thal sbyar nas/ /gnas de mgon la phyag bya'o/ /zhugs nas dkyil 'khor de la ni/ /bskor ba dag ni lan gsum bya/ /de nas mdun du
'dug nas ni/ /de kho na nyid lan gcig brjod/ /'dod chags chen po bde ba chen/ /rdo rje chen po nor che ba/ /ye shes chen po las chen po/ /de dag rdo rje sems grub brjod/ /de nas me
tog sil ma ni/ /mgon la gtor te cho ga bzhin/ /dang po Sha Da la sogs/ /bstod pa glu ru lan gcig blang / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstod pa'i rgyal po mtshan brgya rtsa
brgyad pa de kho na nyid chen po ni 'di yin te/ /dpal mchog dang / po sems dpa' che/ /dga' ba chen po'i dga' ba chen/ /kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid/ /rdo rje bsnyems tshul bdag
po'i bdag /sems dang sems dpa'i ting 'dzin mchog /rdo rje rdo rje mchog chen po/ /kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa mchog /bdud dang bdud rni rab 'joms pa/ /thams cad du ni
byang chub che/ /sangs rgyas sangs rgyas skyes mchog skyes/ /rdo rje hUM mdzad yi ge hUM/ /'jig rten dbang phyug nor rab gsal/ /'dod chags chen po bde ba nyid/ /'dod dang thar
pa nor che ba/ /dus gsum srid gsum mchog gsum dang / /'jig rten gsum mchog khams gsum pa/ /brtan par rang 'byung gsal ba ste/ /rab phra sbom dang legs bsags
pa/ /rgyu ba rab mchog thob mdzad pa/ /srid pa 'khor ba sbyong mdzad pa/ /thog mtha' med cing thog mtha' can/ /mdangs ldan dang por thams cad gnas/ /snying po phyag rgya
@#/ /sbyor dam tshig /de nyid bden pa mchog pa ste/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dngos grub che/ /chos dang las ni khams chen po/ /dam pa'i chos ste las/
mchog bdag /byang chub sems ni rab sbyod mdzad/ /rdo rje khro bo khro bo che/ /dus mtha' ltar 'bar 'dul ba po/ /'dul mdzad chen po gdug pa'i mchog /drag po drag
nyid zad mdzad pa/ /thams cad dag pa pad+ma che/ /shes rab thabs te tshul chen po/ /'dod chags dag pa'i ting 'dzin mchog /sna tshogs chags pa dbang phyug che/ /nam
mkha' mtha' yas rtag pa'i don/ /'byung po thams cad gnas chen po/ /'byor pa po ni thams cad gnas/ /'byor pa dpal dang gtso bo rgyal/ /bsam pa thams cad rdzogs
mdzad pa/ /phyag 'tshal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyag 'tshal 'dud cing phyag 'tshal lo/ /dad pas khyed la bdag brten bgyid/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod/ /
gang zhig bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di/ /nyid re nang par rjod byed dam/ /chos kyi tshig gis lan gcig brjod/ /dngos grub shin tu myur bar 'gyur/ /gal te 'dir grub mi 'dod
na/ /dang por nyin re dus gsum dang / /bstod na sdig pa las nges grol/ /zhing dag pa ni grub par byed/ /rtag tu sdug bsngal thams cad sel/ /lan gcig rab tu brjod
pa yis/ /dngos grub thams cad skal bzang byed/ /phun sum tshogs dpal 'phel bar byed/ /dngos grub don yod yon tan can/ /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa 'o/ /de nas
gsang ba'i mchod pas ni/ /rab tu dga' bas mgon la mchod/ /rang gi phyag rgyas lan gcig ni/ /rang gi phyag rgyas bcings te grub/ /de nas lha yi chu dang ni/ /de bzhin sku
mchog gis dbang bskur/ /rang nyid snying po rdo rje phyag /snying po 'di ni blang bar bya/ /de la rdo rje sems dpar dbang bskur ba'i snying po ni 'di yin te/ hUM mahA su kha badzra satwa a b+hi

She ke na hrIHa b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ sarba badzra a d+hi pa ti s+t+waM dr-i d+ho me b+ha ba mi d+ha nA ma ma ste ga blan/ mahA badzra d+ha ra su rata s+t+waM/ mahA badzra satwa/ oM b+hur b+hu ba swa/ /de nas rdo rje dbang
bskur ba/ /phyag na rdo rje ril 'dzin pa/ /rdo rje 'dzin chen slob dpon du/ /'di nyid du ni rab 'grub 'gyur/ /de nas kyang ni ci 'dod par/ /cho ga'i dam pa bsgrubs nas ni/ /rdo rje
gar gyi mchod pa yis/ /legs par mchod la phyir phyung bya/ /de nas brtsams te rdo rje'i bdag /rdo rje kun gyi gsung rab 'dzin/ /rdo rje thams cad 'dzin slob dpon/ /dngos
grub thams cad grub par 'gyur/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dngos grub / /phyag rgya kun bdag dbang phyug che/ /d+hIH/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i rdo rje che/ /las rnams thams cad
@#/ /nus la brtag /mi tshugs pa dang mi sod pa/ /kun byed dngos grub thams cad ster/ /sems can kun gyi rgyal po che/ /tshar gcod pa dang phan 'dogs
nus/ /thams cad rjes chags byed kun mchog /kun rig pa dang kun gyi bdag /'dod pa thams cad la rab sbyor/ /phun tshogs kun gyi dbang phyug che/ /lha la sogs pa'i
sems can kun/ /bsgo ba thams cad rtag tu byed/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rtag tu mthong / /tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nyid kyis ni 'dod par ldan/ /dga' zhing
rang nyid de bdag por/ /rdo rje slob dpon 'gyur ba yin/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /bde ba chen po rdo rje slob dpon byin gyis brlab cing
'jug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// //de nas rdo rje slob ma 'jug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud rjes su bshad par bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems
dpas gsungs so/ /rdo rje mchod yon snying gar bskor/ /bcings nas bsam g.yos bzhin gyis ni/ /mgo bos yang dag phyag rgya bya ba/ /dngos grub thams cad grub byed
yin/ /dkyil 'khor du ni rab zhugs la/ /bskor ba lan gsum byas nas ni/ /'dod chags chen po bde ba che/ /'gro ba kun la'ang grub mdzad brjod/ /de nas dus kyi
mchod pa yis/ /bde ba chen po yang dag mchod/ /de bzhin du ni dbang bskur bar/ /rdo rje gsang ba'i slob ma gzhug /de nas ci bzhin brgyan nas ni/ /rdo rje slob dpon gyis rab
gzhug /slob ma'i tshogs rnams bcug nas ni/ /ci 'dod pa yi dngos grub 'thob/ /de nas slob ma bcug nas ni/ /dga' chen po 'di brjod par bya/ /rab dgyes rab bde
bstan pa yi/ /rdo rje sems dpa' deng grub mdzod/ /de nas me tog phreng ba ni/ /spyi bo nas ni myur du 'dor/ /gang du me tog babs gyur te/ /lhag pa'i lhar ni rab 'grub 'gyur/ /de nas

lha yi chu yis ni/ /rdo rje 'dzin par dbang bskur/ rdo rje chen po rdo rje lnga/ /byon la rdo rje bo d+hi brjod/ /oM ma hA su kha badzra/ /badzra a b+hi She ke na s+t+waM/ /a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ /ma hA badzra d+hA ra/ he
badzra nA ma si d+d+ha nA ma/ gang la rdo rje ming gang zhig yin pa de la kye zhes bya ba'i sgra dang sbyar bar bya'o/ /de nas snying po byin la/ phyag rgya bcing ba bslabs nas ci ltar mngon par
'dod pa bsgrub par bya'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i cho ga 'am/ /gang 'dod rang gis grub pa la/ /de nyid kyis ni dam tshig nyid/ /'jug la sogs pa'i cho ga bshad/ /'jig rten
pa ni sna tshogs dang / /de bzhin 'jig rten 'das pa yang / /thams cad rang gi ngo bo ni/ /rgyas par bsgrubs na rab tu 'grub/ /'di la rab tu 'jug tsam gyis/ /mi tshugs pa
@#/ /dang mi ldog pa/ /nyid du rgyal ba'i sras 'gyur zhing / bde chen rab tu grub pa ster/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin slob dpon/ /mna' ni dam du bsngags nas kyang / de nyid
chos dang dam tshig ni/ /rang nyid dang ni gzhan gyis bslab/ /de la 'di ni mna' grub pa'i rdo rje chus dbang bskur nas brjod par bya'o/ /'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu/ /dam tshig
'das na sreg par byed/ /dam tshig bsrungs na 'grub par 'gyur/ /dngos grub rdo rje bdud rtsi chu/ /de nyid chos dang dam tshig ni/ /gal te dkyil 'khor ma mthong smra/ /skye bo
'dug nang gnas pa 'ga'/ /dad pa med pas bgad par 'gyur/ /de la 'di ni de kho na nyid dang / dam tshig gi gsang ba'i cho ga rab tu sbyin pa yin te/ thog mtha' med
pa'i sems dpa' ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che/ /kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid/ /rdo rje bsnyems tshul bdag po'i bdag/ /de kho na nyid mchog gi gsang ba lnga'i
de kho na nyid chen por bshad par brjod par bya'o/ /bcom ldan de nyid chos kyi mchog bka' stsal bar mdzad de/ srid pa ngo bo nyid kyis dag/ ngo bo nyid kyis srid bral
byas/ /rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' mchog /srid pa mchog ni byed pa yin/ /de la srid pa rnam par dag pa'i thabs rtog pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mchog dam
tshig chen po bsten par bya ba ni 'di yin te/ /srid pa'i bde ba shin tu chung / /sdug bsngal chen po dag bya'i phyir/ /shin tu bde ba dam pa'i thabs/ /dam tshig rtag tu bsten par bya/ /
'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad ni/ /ci 'dod par ni bsten bzhin du/ /rang gi lhag pa'i lha sbyor bas/ /bdag dang gzhan la mchod par bya/ /de la rtog pa thams cad kyi gsang
ba'i mchog gi dam tshig chen po 'di brjod par bya ste/ /ci srid 'khor ba'i gnas su ni/ /mkhas mchog 'dug par gyur ba'i tshe/ /de srid mtshungs med sems can don/ /mya
ngan mi 'da' byed par nus/ /gsang ba mchog gi dam tshig thabs/ /bsod nams byin rlabs sgrub byed pa/ /dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug mchog /rgyun tu sems can don
byed pa'o/ /de ltar sems ni rab dang rdo rje nyid du gyis/ /rang gi dam tshig mi zad bde skyed bsten par gyis/ /de na 'gro la myur du bde ba sangs rgyas thams cad dang / /rab tu
mtshungs shing rtag pa nyid du rtogs par 'gyur/ /de nas khyed kyis bcud dang / kha zas dang / gnas pa dang / glu dang / rol mo la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams legs par
bstabs pa bas bdag nyid gang la sred pas kyang rdo rje slob dpon chen po mchod par bya'o/ /rdo rje slob dpon me tog sogs/ /ci 'dod par ni legs mchod cing / /rdo rje gar gyi
@#/ /mchod pa yis/ /yang dag par ni mchod de byung / /de nas rdo rje 'dzin slob dpon/ /gar gyi mchod pas mchod nas ni/ /rdo rje thal mo'i sbyor ba yis/ /
slob ma kun gyis rab tu mchod/ /ro dang kha zas gnas pa dang / /glu dang rol mo ci 'dod pas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin bdag /yang dag mchod nas phyir byung bya/ /dpal
mchog dang po zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor mchog tu gsang ba'o// //de nas sgrub pa bshad bya ba/ /dngos grub shin tu rtag pa ste/ /gang gi srid pa 'di nyid la/ /
dngos grub rtag pa thob byed pa'o/ /'di yis byang chub sems dpa' ni/ /srid par gnas shing srid par sangs/ /dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug grub/ /rtag tu sems can
kun don byed/ /'di yi ci ltar mchog grub pa/ /de ltar byang chub spyod sogs pas/ /dge ba'i tshul ni gzhan gyis kyang / /sangs rgyas kun sogs thob mi 'gyur/ /gdul
bya min pa bsod nams med/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pa ni/ /rnam pa kun tu mthong sogs kyis/ /sems can don byed mi nus so/ /de bas rgyud chen las grub pa/ /sangs
rgyas sam ni rdo rje 'dzin/ /mthong la sogs pa sems can don/ /nam mkha' mnyam par byed pa yi/ /'dod chags chen po bde ba che/ /srid pa'i nges pa dri ma med/ /nam
mkha' mtha' yas sems can don/ /mya ngan mi 'da' byed pa yin/ /dkyil 'khor dag tu ma zhugs pa'am/ /bsod nams med pa'am le lo can/ /de yang kun mchog grub pa
yis/ /tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das don yod grub pa rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de nas don yod cing thogs pa med pa myur du sgrub pa'i mchog
rjes su bshad par bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /lugs ma 'am ni brkos pa 'am/ /byas pa 'am ni bris pa yi/ /dang ba'i sems dpa'i brtags
nas ni/ /mdun du de ni bsgrub par bya/ /nyin re zhing ni dang po ru/ /de bzhin yul dang ldan gyur pas/ /dang po'i gsang mchog gis bkug ste/ /phyag rgya chen por rab byin
brlab/ /rdo rje mig gis de bzhin bltas/ /rdo rje bsnyems tshul bdag po rang / /rdo rje hUM ni glur blangs pas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bsgrub par bya/ /rdo rje cha lugs ci bzhin
du/ /mchog gi dad por rab dgyes pas/ /gzugs brnyan la sogs dang por ni/ /ci 'dod par ni rab tu bsgrub/ /'di yis 'dod pa kun dbang phyug /'dod pa tsam gyis
'gro 'ong lding / /dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug grub/ /kun mchog dam pa'i dbang phyug yin/ /phun tshogs kun bdag thams cad pa/ /'dod chags chen po bde ba che/ /
@#/ /thams cad 'jug mdzad sna tshogs pa/ /rtag par kun tu 'dul ba po/ /dngos grub kun gyi bde ba mchog /phyag rgya kun bdag dbang phyug yin/ /rdo rje
kun gyi dngos grub che/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i 'byung gnas che/ /mi tshugs pa dang mi sod pa/ /thams cad byed cing kun gyi gnas/ /khams gsum las rgyal sna tshogs
pa| |tshar gcod pa dang phan 'dogs pa/ /kun la rjes chags kun gyi mchog /kun rig dngos grub thams cad ste/ /'jig rten khams ni thams cad du/ /rang gi rnam
'phrul rab ston byed/ /kun mchog dngos grub chen po ste/ /dbang phyug chen po'i dbang phyug che/ /gzugs dang tshe stobs rdo rje mchog /rdo rje sems dpa' gnyis pa bzhin/ /
'gro ba rnams kyis mchod cing rjed/ /rang gi gnyen rnams kyis brten pa/ /rgyal po rdo rje 'chang chen ltar/ /rga dang 'chi ba med par 'gyur/ /gal te rdo rje sems dpa'
'am/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems nyid 'dod/ /dngos grub ji ltar 'dod pa nyid/ /tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur/ /phyi ma 'am ni 'jig rten pa/ /rtog pa kun bshad
cho ga 'am/ /rang nyid kyis mdzad kyis rtag tu/ /dngos grub thams cad grub 'gyur zhes/ /bcom ldan rdo rje dngos grub kyis/ /dbang phyug bde ba chen po ni/ /rdo rje 'chang ba
che rgyal po/ /kun mchog sa yi dbang pos gsungs/ /de la ci ltar na rang gi phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud yin zhe na/ /phyag rgya chen po mnyam gzhag la/ /rang gi snying pos lan gcig
sgrub/ /dr-iD+ha su to Sh+ya saM rak+ta/ /su po sid+d+ha ta la gu/ /de la ci ltar yi ge hUM gi glu blangs pa'i rgyud yin zhe na/ /ri d+hi ta sogs kyis brgyan ldan/ /ci nus pa dang / dga' dang
gaN+De la sogs glu blangs pa'i/ /yi ge hUM gis 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nas phyogs rgya thams cad kyi/ /mchog de sgrub pa'i rgyud bshad de/ /gal te phyag rgya sgrub 'dod na/
de bzhin yul dang ldan gyur pas/ /rang nyid kyis ni rgya bcings la/ /yongs su mi skyo'i bar du bsgrub/ /de la ci ltar na dam tshig thams cad grub pa'i rgyud yin zhe na/
dam tshig phyag rgya bcing nas ni/ /sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes brjod la/ /rang gi snying gar rim bzhin du/ /phyag rgya'i mchog de bsgrub par bya/ /de nas las kyi phyag rgya'i mchog sgrub
pa'i rgyud ni/ /rdo rje gar gyi mchod pa yis/ /yongs su mi skyo'i bar bsgrubs na/ /mchod pa kun sogs las rnams ni/ /tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur/ /rdo rje 'chang
chen nyid dang ni/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems nyid dang / /gzhan yang dngos grub thams cad ni/ /dam par myur du 'grub par 'gyur/ /rtog pa thams cad kyi sgrub pa
@#/ /chen po don yod par grub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// //de nas rtog pa thams cad sgrub pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud ni/ /nyin re zhing dang
por lan gcig phyag rgya bsgrub par don yod pa dngos grub thogs pa med pa bshad par bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ /thams cad rjes su mnyes par bya
ba dang / dgug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba bsgrub pa la ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje lta bas so/ /bde ba dang / yid bde ba dang / phun sum tshogs pa dang / dngos
grub thams cad mngon par 'phel bar bya ba la ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje chos so/ /tshe dang / lang tsho dang / gzugs dang / gzi brjod chen po mngon par 'phel bar bya
ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje bcud kyis len gyis so/ /dpal chen po dang / skal ba bzang po dang / grags pa dang / snyan pa 'phel bar bya ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje grub pas so/
stobs chen po dang / ye shes dang / chos dang / las bsgrub par bya ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje snying stobs che bas so/ /rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul dang / rmad du byung ba dang /
rnam par 'phrul ba thams cad ston pa la ni dang po'i rdo rje'i rnam par 'phrul bas so/ /thams cad du yi ge dang / gzugs kyi bden pa thams cad mthong ba dang / thos pa
dang / smra ba dang / 'dri ba grub par bya ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje don yod pa'i bden pas so/ /dbang po thams cad kyis bden pa thams cad mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / smra ba dang /
zil gyis gnon par bya ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje don yod pa'i bden pas so/ /sgyu ma thams cad dang / bde ba'i mchog dang / lung bsgo ba dang / lan thob pa grub pa la dang po'i rdo rje
yid du byung bas so/ /gter thams cad dbyung ba dang / nor dbrog pa dang / rgyal srid thob pa dang / sa la nye bar longs spyod pa la ni dang po'i rdo rjes dbang bskur bas so/ /yul
thams cad dang / skye bo dang / grong khyer dang / nangs dang / chu bor nye bar longs spyod sprul ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje grub pas so/ /thams cad las sngon ma byung ba'i lha yul dang
rin po che dang / kha zas dang / btung ba dang / g.yog 'khor shin tu bzang po la sogs pa sprul te nye bar longs spyod pa la ni dang po'i rdo rje sprul pas so/ /skad cig gis sa
gzhi thams cad 'bru la sogs pa smin par bskyed pa dang / chu'i phung po chen po 'byung ba dang / snang ba chen po bskyed pa dang / rlung thams cad dbang du bya ba la ni dang po'i rdo
rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug gis so/ /rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba'i dngos po thams cad bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / rang rtser gzhug pa dang / las thams cad la sbyar ba la ni/ dang
@#/ /po'i rdo rje don yod pa'i thams cad dbang du byed pas so/ /dngos grub thams cad las de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / rdo
rje 'dzin pa dang / rdo rje la sogs mthong ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje'i bsnyems pas so/ /rang gi bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i gzugs thams cad sprul cing
ston pa mi snang ba dang / nam mkhar 'gro ba grub pa dang / shin tu phra ba dang / sbom pa dang / du mar ston pa la ni dang po'i rdo rje gzugs sna tshogs pas so/ /'jig
rten gsum gyi bdag por gyur pa thams cad dbab pa dang / dbang du bya ba dang / bcing ba dang / las thams cad la sbyar ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje hUM mdzad kyis so/ /lha thams
cad dbab pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / las thams cad la nges par sbyar ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje lha'i bdag pos so/ /klu thams cad gdon pa dang / 'dul ba
dang / dbang du bya ba dang / las thams cad la nges par sbyar bar bya ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje 'bar ba'i rdo rjes so/ /gnod sbyin la sogs pa thams cad dgug pa dang / dbang
du bya ba dang / las thams cad la nges par sbyar bar bya ba dang / skrag par bya ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje gdon 'dul bas so/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad brtag pa dang / 'jug pa
dang / mchod pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / las thams cad la nges par sbyar bar bya ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje 'khor los so/ /phyag rgya thams cad dgug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang
du bya ba dang / brtan par bya ba dang / bsgrub pa la ni dang po'i rdo rje phyag rgya grub pas so/ /dam tshig thams cad dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / bsgrub pa la ni dang
po'i rdo rje dam tshig mchog gis so/ /las thams cad rab tu bsgrub pa la rnam pa mi 'jigs par bya ba dang / brtan par bya ba dang / grags pa chen po rab tu bsgrags pa la ni
dang po'i rdo rje las kyis so/ /rdo rje thams cad dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba bsgrub pa la ni dang po'i rdo rjes so/ /sems dpa' chen po thams cad
dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba bsgrub pa la ni dang po'i rdo rje sems dpas so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang /
bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba bsgrub pa la ni dang po'i de bzhin gshegs pas so/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba la ni dang
po'i rdo rje 'dzin pas so zhes kyang gsungs so/ /dkyil 'khor dag tu ma zhugs pa'am/ /sdig pa thams cad byas pa 'am/ /rang gi snying po ma bsgrubs pa dang / /dngos grub
@#/ /thams cad grub par 'gyur/ ma bsgrubs par thams cad 'grub pa don yod par grub pa phyag rgya chen po mchog tu grub pa'o/ /de nas dang po'i snying
po ma bsgrubs pa'i thams cad don yod pa thogs pa med pa las thams cad kyi rgyu skad cig la bsgrub pa rjes su bshad par bya'o/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje thams cad
kyi sna tshogs pa'i 'phrin las rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so/ /don yod pa dang thogs med pa/ /bdag kyang bde gshegs lhan cig tu/ /las kyi rab 'byams 'di dag ni/ /
dngos grub skad cig gis sgrub byed/ /'di lta ste/ thams cad shin tu bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi pa dang / bde legs su bya ba dang / tshe mngon par
'phel bar bya ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi sems dpa'i tshul gtsug tor gyi phyag rgyas so/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad mtshams dang / phyogs dang / dam tshig dang / dngos grub
bcing zhing bsrung ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi so sor 'brang ba chen pos so/ /nyin gsum pa dang / nyin bzhi pa dang / slar zlog pa dang / rtag pa can dang / khyab 'jug gi rims
thams cad gsal ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi rims nad med pas so/ /gdung ba thams cad dang / gnod byed dang / nad dang / mya ngan dang / sdug bsngal thams cad gzhig
pa la ni rdo rje gar gyis sdug bsngal nye bar zhi bas so/ /dug dang sbyar ba'i dug las nye bar thar pa dang / dbab pa dang / bcing ba dang / bza' ba dang / bdud rtsir bya ba la ni rdo rje
gar gyi nye ba'i dug gis so/ /gdon thams cad dbab pa dang / bcing ba dang / dam tshig 'dzin du gzhug pa dang / rab tu gdul ba dang / bsrung ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi gdon
las thar pa'o/ /thams cad la bcing ba dang / thar pa dang / dral ba dang / ltung ba dang / ldang ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi rdo rje chen po'i khro bos so/ /mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi
phyag rgya gzhig pa dang / gdon las thar bar bya ba dang / shi ba bslang bar bya ba dang / tshe mngon par 'phel ba dang / shin tu bsrung ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi phyag rgya'i lan gyis
so/ /sgrib pa thams cad dang / sdig pa thams cad dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa dang / byur gzhig pa la ni rdo rje gar gyi zhi bas so/ /thams cad dbab pa dang /
bskyod pa dang / gar byed du gzhug pa dang / thams cad bden par smrar gzhug pa dang / pra se na thams cad bsgrub pa la ni rdo rje gar gyi thams cad 'bebs pa'i phyag rgyas
so/ /thams cad rgyas gdab pa dang / gsad pa dang / ltung bar bya ba dang / bslang ba dang / slar gso ba la ni don yod pa'i rdo rje gar gyi mkha' 'gro ma chen mos so/ /
@#/ /thams cad rengs par bya ba dang / rmongs par bya ba dang / gnyid log par bya ba dang / gsad pa dang / bza' bar bya ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi gdug
pa'i srin pos so/ /gzhan gyi dpung thams cad skrag par bya ba dang / gzhig par bya ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / ltung bar bya ba dang / gsad par bya ba la ni rdo rje
gar gyi gshed byed kyis so/ /khro bo thams cad bsal ba dang / bzhin ras dang bar bya ba dang / rtsod pa las rgyal ba dang / 'jigs pa las thar pa dang / g.yul 'gyed pa la sogs
pa'i rgyal ba bsgrub pa la ni rdo rje gar gyi rgyal mtshan mchog gi dpung rgyan gyis so/ /sprin thams cad yang dag par bzung zhing mi g.yo bar bya ba dang / char chen po dbab
pa dang / rlung dang / char pa dang / glog dang / ser ba bzlog pa dang / dro ba dang / grang ba bsal ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi dbang po'i rdo rjes so/ /gzugs dang / sgra dang /
dri dang / ro dang / reg bya thams cad shin tu grub pa la ni rdo rje gar gyi 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gis so/ /rgyu ba dang / mi rgyu ba thams cad rjes su chags pa dang / dgug
pa dang / dbang du bya ba dang / rtse ba dang / las thams cad la nges par sbyar ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi dngos grub thams cad kyis so/ /lha thams cad dbab pa dang / klu
thams cad dbang du bya ba dang / gnod sbyin dang / 'byung po dang / ma mo thams cad las la nges par sbyar ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi rdo rje glu'i mchog gis so/ /rnam thos sras
mnan nas dpal drang ba dang / lha'i bu mo thams cad rab tu dbrog pa dang / lha dang / lha ma yin gyi bud med thams cad dang rtse ba dang / 'jig rten gsum ma lus pa las
rgyal ba dang / 'dod pa'i dbang phyug thams cad las rgyal ba dang / dbang phyug chen po thams cad dbrog pa la ni rdo rje gar gyi skyes bu byed pa chen pos so/ /mchod pa thams
cad sgrub pa dang / thams cad rdo rjer bya ba dang / bdud la sogs pa thams cad rab tu gzhom pa dang / phyag rgya thams cad bcing ba dang / dngos grub kyi mchog la sogs
pa ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi myur du grub par bya ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi don yod cing thogs pa med pa myur ba'i las sna tshogs kyi dngos
grub dam pas so// //de nas phyag rgya thams cad bsgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud ni/ nyin re dang po lan gcig ni/ /phyag rgya thams cad rab sgrub byed/ /snying mchog
lan gcig bzlas nas ni/ /phyag rgya chen po rab grub bya/ /de yis rjes la nye snying po/ /las rnams kun la nges sbyar bas/ /don yod grub pas las rnams ni/ /kun la
@#/ /shin tu 'grub par 'gyur/ /phyag rgya thams cad rab byin rlob/ /phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya ni/ /dkyil 'khor dag kyang mthong ba la/ /ma bshad pa la'ang
rab 'grub 'gyur/ /rtog 'dir 'jig pa yod min te/ /'khor lo med la brgya byin la/ /gang phyir bdag la byin rlob pas/ /rang sras rgyu ni 'gyur ba yin/ /sdig pa chen po
byed pa yang / /bsam pa shes nas sbyin par bya/ /'di dag bcings tsam nyid dag byed/ /dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /dpal mchog dang po'i rtog pa chen po'i
rgyal po bde ba chen po'i rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi cho ga rgyas pa'i rtog pa'o// //de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin/ /'byin pa byed pa bde ba che/ /bde chen can du
brtan phyir dang / /sems can thams cad rnam dag phyir/ /khams kun dang mnyam zad pa med/ /kun gyi bdag nyid la zhugs te/ /mnyam pa'i dngos grub mchog spros nas/ /
de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs phyung ngo / /mtha' yas pa yi zhing thams cad/ /'jig rten kun gyi khams bcas pas/ /de tshe sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /til gyi gang
bu bzhin myur gang / /'jig rten khams ni thams cad du/ /sems can kun mdun yang dag bzhugs/ /sems can thams cad ma dag pas/ /rang rig las kyi
dag ma gyur/ /de tshe sems can khams rnams ni/ /rang bzhin gyis ni gso dka' phyir/ /rang gi las ni sbyang don du/ /btang snyoms chen po mdzad pa yin/ /de nas bcom ldan
rdo rje can/ /sems dpa' chen po bde ba che/ /byang chub chen por thugs brtan pas/ /skad cig gis ni yang dag bskul/ /sems can la phan bsod nams can/ /byang chub
sems ni brtan pa dag /sems can khams ni rgud 'gyur bas/ /shin tu btang snyoms ma mdzad cig /de nas sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can/ /thugs
rje'i bdag nyid can gyi thabs/ /byang chub sems mchog khyod smros shig /de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin/ /de tshe kun nas byin gyis brlabs/ /bde ba chen po rdo rje che/ /dkyil
'khor chen po dam pa yin/ /khams gsum 'khor ba'i rgya khyon gyi/ /'khor lo chen po gdod nas byung / /de yis khams gsum gnas pa yis/ /sems can thams cad
yang dag bsgrubs/ /sangs rgyas kun sogs dngos grub la/ /de tshe dag pa 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nas sangs rgyas thams cad ni/ /'dus nas gsol ba 'debs mdzad pa/ /de
bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs chen po/ /sangs rgyas kun mchog bshad du gsol/ /de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /sku gsung thugs la yang dag gnas/ /sku gsung
@#/ /thugs ni rdo rje la/ /yang dag spros te 'di gsungs so/ /oM b+hUM khaM/ /de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/ /sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus nas ni/ /bdud bcom
la sogs mdzad nas ni/ /byang chub snying por byin gyis brlabs/ /de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni mchog gsungs pa/ /sems can la ni bde don phyir/ /rtog pa
kun gyi bde ba che/ /de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyi rol mchog /rdo rje 'khor lo yang dag bri/ /'khor lo lta
bar sangs rgyas nyid/ /'dzum pa'i tshems ni mi snang ba/ /su ra te sa ma ya s+t+waM/ /oM sid+d+ha mAM zhes brjod dgod/ /mdun du bdud las rnam par rgyal/ /mdzad pa'i sangs rgyas
yang dag bri/ /g.yas su byang chub sems dpa' yi/ /nor chen pos ni dbang bskur ba/ /rgyab tu byang chub sems dpa' dang / /mnyam du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/ /g.yon
du log par rnam dregs pa/ /sdig pa bsdus pa kun 'byin pa'o/ /de nas 'di rnams kyi snying po ni/ badzra satwa/ badzra rat+na/ badzra d+harma/ badzra karma/ de nas phyag rgya rnams te/ satwa
badzrI/ rat+na badzrI/ pad+ma badzrI/ bi shwa badzrI/ /mtshams kyi char ni rdo rje dang / /rin chen sdong bu nor bu bri'o/ /mtshams rnams su ni lha mo ste/ /lcags kyu la sogs sgo rnams
su/ /de bzhan snga ma ci lta bar/ /'khor lo de ni brtag par bya/ /mchod pa'i thal mo snying gar bcing / /g.yon du de bzhin bskor bar bya/ /me tog dang bcas phyag rgya 'di/ /sangs
rgyas kun gyi dam tshig rim/ /me tog bcas te snying gar bcing / /bsam pa g.yos pas gdung par bya/ /mgon la mgo bos phyag byas la/ /bskor ba lan gsum byas nas
ni/ /zhugs nas me tog 'dor bar bya/ /shin tu gsang ba yang dag dgug /de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par bya ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / dgug pa
dang / bsgrub par bya ba'i snying po ni 'di yin te/ oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harma NAM/ Ad+ya nut+pan na twa da/ /de nas cho ga ji bzhin du/ /ston la me tog sil ma dor/ /sangs rgyas
byang chub rab bsgrub phyir/ /'gro ba'i mgon la de nyid brjod/ /de yis kun nas sangs rgyas ni/ /thams cad 'dus pa nyid du 'gyur/ /thams cad mi dmigs sbyor ba yis/ /
dngos grub thams cad stsol bar mdzad/ /dkyil 'khor der zhugs pa la ni/ /dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /dga' ba la sogs mtshan ma mchog /sna tshogs
pa ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de nas de bzhin cho ga ni/ /rgyas pas slob ma mchog tu gzhug /mchod pa'i thal mos 'khor lo che/ /mchod nas slar ni dbyung bar bya/ /sgrub pa
@#/ /byas nas dngos grub kyang / /cho ga ci bzhin rab bshad bya/ /ras la bcom ldan bdud la sogs/ /rnam par rgyal ba mnyes par bri/ /sgrub 'di lan
gcig tsam gyis ni/ /de 'dra'i sgrub pas 'grub par 'gyur/ /sku gzugs sogs mdun yang dag par/ /ye shes khu tshur yongs bzung la/ /rdo rje'i tshig gi cho ga bzhin/ /
bzlas brjod stong phrag brgya bya'o/ /mdor na 'bum ni rdzogs pa na/ /ci 'dod dngos grub thams cad dang / /tshe mchog 'di la sangs rgyas nyid/ /thob 'gyur 'di la the tshom
med/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i sgrub pa chen po'i rgyud ni/ phyag rgya gang rung gcig bcings nas/ /bdag ni sangs rgyas yin bsgoms na/ /phyag
rgya chen po'i dngos grub che/ /bstan par myur du thob par 'gyur/ /de nas dam tshig sgrub pa'i rgyud ni/ /snying gar rdo rje gzugs bzhag ste/ /sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes brjod la/ /
bzlas brjod 'bum gyis bsgrubs nas ni/ /dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur/ /de nas las kyi phyag rgya thams cad sgrub pa'i rgyud ni/ /bdud las rgyal ba'i mchog
bcings te/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /mtshungs med sems can don byas nas/ /las kyi phyag rgya rtag tu 'grub/ ces bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ /de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi mchog sgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// //de nas ma bsgrubs dngos grub mchog /las rnams rab 'byams dam pa
ste/ /sdig pa kun sel sna tshogs pa/ /go rims bzhin du rab bshad bya/ /'di lta ste/ nad thams cad dang / mya ngan dang / gnod pa dang / gnod byed dang / dug thams cad
dang / sbyar ba'i dug dang / gshed byed dang / g.yengs byed dang / ro langs dang / sngags dang / sman dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / sdig pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa
dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang / rims dang / gdon dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / nye bar 'tshe ba dang / 'go ba'i nad dang / nyes pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang / lus dang /
ngag dang / sems kyi sdug bsngal thams cad rnam par bshig pa la ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis sdug bsngal 'phrog par byed pas so/ /tshe dang / lang tsho dang /
gzugs dang / kha dog dang / gzi byin chen po dang / mdangs dang / stobs dang / spro ba dang / brtson 'grus dang / dpal dang / skal ba bzang po dang / bsod nams dang /
ming dang / snyan pa dang / grags pa dang / dran pa dang / blo gros dang / brtan pa dang / rtog pa dang / stobs dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / phung po dang / 'du byed dang / sku dang / gsung
@#/ /dang / thugs 'phel ba la ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba chen pos so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims
dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / ye shes dang / stobs dang / thabs dang / rdo rje dang / bsgrub pa dang / gzungs dang / sa
dang spyod pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang / chos dang / las dang / sna tshogs pa'i bya ba dang / sems can gyi don dang /
sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa'i don dang / sku dang / gsung dang / thugs dang / rdo rje chen po grub pa la ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub thams cad kyis
so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa'i sems bskyed pa dang / kun tu bzang po'i cho ga spyod pa rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can thams
cad kyi don dang / 'pho ba dang / skye ba'i sa dang / gzhon nu'i rol pa ston pa dang / mngon par byung ba dang / dka' ba spyod pa ston pa dang / byang chub kyi snying por gshegs
pa dang / bdud thams cad 'dul ba dang / byang chub chen por mngon par byang chub pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / mu stegs thams cad tshar gcod pa
dang / 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba dang / lha las babs pa dang / 'dus pa chen po'i byin gyis brlab pa dang / gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba dang / 'dul ba la rab tu
bzhag pa dang / ngan 'gro thams cad las 'don pa dang / mdo sde thams cad ston par mdzad pa dang / rtog pa thams cad byin gyis brlab pa dang / dngos grub thams cad sbyin
pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs la dmigs pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul bsgrub pa la ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
kyi sna tshogs kyi rdo rjes so/ /ci ltar phyag rgya 'di dag gis/ /byang chub sems la mngon brten pa/ /de ltar byang chub spyod tshogs kyis/ /byang chub dam pa thob mi 'gyur/ /
don yod bsod nams dam pa yis/ /las kyi rab 'byams sgrub byed pa/ /cho ga ma grub pa rnams grub/ /sangs rgyas chos ni rab ster byed/ /rnam pa kun tu dad ldan pa'i/ /
sems can kun la sbyin par bya/ /dkyil 'khor dag tu ma zhugs pa/ /skad cig gis ni sbyor bar byed/ /dpal mchog dang po rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las/ de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub rdo rje byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje'i rtog pa rgyas pa'o// //de nas sna tshogs las chen po/ /khyab bdag rdo rje 'dzin chen
@#/ /po/ /gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba'i mchog /sems can kun la rjes ston mdzad/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs bskyed cing / /gang phyir nyes
byas kyis gdug pa'i/ /rang gi rang sems spyod pa yis/ /zhi bas sems can kun gyi don/ /gdul bar rab tu bsgrub mi nus/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis bsgrub bya ba/ /'gro ba
'di dag thams cad yin/ /gang tshe bde gshegs sems can don/ /dam ba mdzad par mi spyod pa/ /de tshe nyid kyis dngos po kun/ /gtso bos rdo rje gsol ba btab
sems can thams cad 'dul mdzad pa/ /bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab/ /u ti Sh+Tha sa ma ya kro b+ha ni sum+b+ha dz+wA la badzra hUM/ de nas sngags 'di gsungs tsam gyis/ /
phyag na rdo rje rang nyid gtso/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las/ /slar byung nas ni mdun na gnas/ /khro chen rgyal po'i sku yis ni/ /sems dpa'i skyil krung gis legs
bzhugs/ /'bar ba'i phreng 'od kyis gsal ba/ /sreg pa'i bskal pa gzhan 'dra ba/ /g.yon pa'i rdo rje bsnyems pa che/ /drag tu gsor bas bskyod mdzad cing / /'bar
ba'i rdo rje cher 'bar ba/ /rnam par 'phros pas sreg pa 'dra/ /'bar ba chen pos gsod pa ni/ /bskal pa'i me yi phung po 'dra/ /dang po'i rdo rje khro gnyer bcas/ /rdo rje
mchog 'dzin pas gsungs pa/ /de la rdo rje chen po me dang nyi ma ltar 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di yin te/ hUM/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/ /sdig pa kun gyi bud shing
zad/ /'jig rten khams kyi 'jig rten gsum/ /thams cad g.yos zhing 'gul par 'gyur/ /lha chen la sogs lha rnams ni/ /g.yo ba med cing rmongs par 'gyur/ /rdo rje
'bar ba 'khrugs pa kun/ /de bzhin 'jig pa lta bur 'gyur/ /nyan thos dang ni rang rgyal rnams/ /mya ngan 'das par nye bar 'gro/ lha la sogs pa'i srid gsum kun/ /de tshe
kun tu rmongs par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa yis/ /sangs rgyas byang chub yang bstan mdzad/ /sems dpa' kun gyi thabs chen po/ /dam pa yang ni thugs
su chud/ /de nas rdo rje 'bar ba'i mchog /'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrugs pa'i 'od/ /rdo rje mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal/ /zhal ras khro dang bcas pa yin/ /g.yon brkyang bas ni
legs par bzhugs/ /spyan 'bar 'jigs su rung ba ste/ /dbu skra gyen du brdzes shing g.yo/ /kun nas 'khyil cing 'bar ba che/ /rdo rje gsang ba'i rnal 'byor che/ /mkha'
'gro'i tshogs kyi lus can rnams/ /phyung nas kun tu 'gro ba rnams/ /thams cad du ni 'bar bar 'khrug /rlung bskyod bskal ba'i me lta bur/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba kun tu
@#/ /'khrugs/ /'jig rten khams ni ma lus na/ /sangs rgyas thams cad sras bcas pa/ /yang dag bzhugs pa legs bskul te/ /'jig rten thams
cad yongs su bskor/ /bkug nas sems can kun don dang / /brtan pa thams cad 'grub pa'i phyir/ /'jig rten gsum bdag de rnams dang / /rgyu dang mi rgyu'i sems med
byas/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal pos/ /kun mchog sa yi dbang phyug ni/ /de rnams la ni thugs rje yis/ /'chi ba slar gso brtan por gsungs/ /oM u t+tiSh+Tha ma hA a d+hi pa ti
badzri Ni/ shI g+h+raM ud thA pa ya hUM/ rgyu ba dang / mi rgyu ba thams cad bslang ba'o/ /de nas sa gsum bslang ba ni/ /thams cad du ni shi ba gso/ /sangs rgyas dpa' bos btul gyur
cing / /rdo rje can gyis kyang rjes btul/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin khro bas/ /'bar ba'i rdo rje gsor byed cing / /nga yi dam tshig la gnas zhes/ /sna tshogs pa la bka' rab bsgo/ /
de rnams kyis gsol ba/ 'di su zhig lags/ /bcom ldan sku ni zhi ba la/ /gnod sbyin gzugs can gang lags gsungs/ /khyed kyi dam tshig ci 'dra ba/ /zhus pa bde
ba'i tshig tu gsungs/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ /'di ni sangs rgyas rnam grol ba/ /gdod skyes rdo rje gnod sbyin che/ /dkon mchog gsum dang de bzhin
du/ /nga la skyabs su 'gro bar gyis/ /'jig rten gsum gyis 'di thos nas/ /tshogs bdag tshogs kyi dbang phyug bcas/ /bskal pa'i me dpung lta bu yi/ /'bar ba'i mtshon gyis
'thab par brtsams/ /de rnams kyis smras pa/ bdag cag gis ni sangs rgyas rigs/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin shes ma yin/ /bdag cag 'jig rten gsum po gcig /gnod sbyin
bsgo bas ci zhig bya/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin khros nas/ /khro gnyer dpral bar bsdus te gnas/ /de nas khro gnyer thams cad ni/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rjes su spyod/ /g.yon pa bsnyems
pa rgya bcas pas/ /smin ma spyan bsdus pas dgod cing / /nam mkha' khyab pa'i dbyangs kyis ni/ /drag tu khros bcas pas smras so/ /de la khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i
nye ba'i snying po sems can ma lus rgyal ba la ni 'di yin te/ /hi/ de nas snying po 'di phyung bas/ /des rgyal bcu gcig bcings pa dang / /dam tshig brtan pa 'dzin du bcug /
rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur nas/ /lag na rdo rje 'dzin mchog byas/ /rdo rje ming ni byin nas su/ /'jig rten gsum po'i ting 'dzin bzhag /de nas rdo rje chen po mchog /mgon
po yis ni gsol btab pa/ /sems can kun la rjes ston pas/ /rtog p+ba 'di ni bshad du gsol/ /rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs pa yi /dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyi rol tu/ /'bar
@#/ /pa'i 'khor lo yang dag bri/ /de yi dbus su bzhag bya ba/ /sngon po 'bar ba'i gzugs bzang ba/ /zhal gyi mche bcung zad gtsigs/ /zhal ni khro
dang bcas pas bzhad/ /sems dpa'i skyil krung gis legs bzhugs/ /bsnyems bcas shas cher 'bar ba la/ /'od zer 'bar ba'i 'od 'khrugs pa'i/ /rdo rje gsor
ba mdzad la brtson/ /de yi dngos ni thams cad du/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor ma yi gzugs/ /rdo rje mtshon cha mdung chen dang / /ral gri zhags pa mtshon 'dzin pa/ /mtshams
su mda' dang kha T+waM ga /'khor lo ba dan sna tshogs 'dzin/ /rdo rje'i rigs ni sna tshogs pa/ /'bar ba'i 'khor los yongs su bskor/ /dkyil 'khor dgod par bya ba
ni/ /thig bdun gyis ni yang dag tu/ /dang po rdo rje phyag rgya bdag /gnyis pa sngags kyi lha mo ste/ /gsum par rdo rje rgyal po ni/ /rdo rje lha mos yang dag bskor/ /rdo rje
chen mo sgeg mo che/ /bzhi pa glu mkhan ma la sogs/ /rgyal rigs gsol ka bran rnams kyis/ /khro bo rnams ni lnga ba la/ /drug par rdo rje pho nya mchog /gnod sbyin
srin po king kar/ /dbang phyug dam pa drag po sogs/ /gtum po chen po 'dul bar mdzad/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor dbyibs rnams su/ /mdor na ming po gsum la
sogs/ /lha la sogs pa'i tshogs thams cad/ /legs par bri ba 'am gzhag par bya/ /mtshams su lha mo rab bshad pa/ /de rnams kyi ni sgo bus su'ang / /lcags kyu la
sogs de bzhin du/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis ni/ /go rims dag ni ji bzhin du/ /cho ga rgyas pa ji bzhin bya/ /khros pas rdo rje gsor ba dang / /khro gnyer 'dzum
dang bcas pas mdud/ /de nas khro zhing slob dpon che/ /rdo rje can mchog rab zhugs la/ /rdo rje hUM mdzad kyis sdigs mdzub/ /hUM mdzad rab tu sbyar bar bya/ /bsnyems dang
bcas pas rgyas gdab nyid/ /de bzhin khro bas gdul ba la/ /rdo rje 'chang chen rgyas pa yis/ /gdug pa nyid la rab tu dgyes/ /de nas me tog blangs nas ni/ /khros pas
bdag po che la gtor/ /rdo rje 'bar ba'i lcags kyu ches/ /yang dag par ni dgug par bya/ /oM ma hA badzra dz+wA la yA na la rka ya hi dzaH/ sarba badzra ku la pra be sha ya hUM/ sarba mu
draM ga nA ban+d+ha na trA Ta/ sarba sa ma yaM sA b+ha ya phaT/ sarba du Sh+TA na da ha ba tsaM b+ha smiM ku ru ma hA kro d+ha a ka ni badzra Ni hUM phaT/ a a a a/ de nas bcom ldan khro bo yi/ rgyal
po brtan pa che byon 'gyur/ /rdo rje rigs la sogs pa kun/ /dngos grub thams cad gsol bar mdzad/ /de nas hUM mdzad la sogs sgras/ /mtshan ma rnams kyang 'byung
@#/ /bar 'gyur/ /gal te slob ma la sogs la/ /snying gar dbab pa bra ba skye/ /de nas rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi/ /phyag rgyas slob ma gzhug par bya/ /bcug nas

dang po'i sems dpa' yi/ /rang gi snying po brjod par bya/ /hUM hUM badzra pra ha ra Ni phaT/ hUM badzra shU la yA gr-i Ni tri ti/ ma tas hUM badzra ko She ts+tshin+da haM/ oM badzra a ma la pA she maT/
rdo rje 'gugs pa dang / rdo rje mdung dang / rdo rje ral gri dang / rdo rje zhags pa ste/ rdo rje khro bo'i srung ba'o/ /de nas 'di rnams kyi phyag rgya rdo rje don yod pa'i thogs pa med pa/
shin tu grub pa/ stobs dang / pha rol gnon pa rnams sems can mngon par rgyas gdab pa nus pa rnams bskul bar bya'o/ /oM badzra gu h+ya sid+d+ha pa ra ma yo gI shwa ri hi/ hUM

badzra tsaN+Da ho kha T+rAM ga ma hA badzra ka pA la ya ma ku te ru lu ru lu N+Di hUM badzra nA rA ya Ni dzi/ hUM badzra ba Ta ka dzi/ rdo rje khro bo'i mkha' 'gro ma lan gcig bzlas te dgod pa 'am bri bar
bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de kho na nyid kyi snying pos bzhugs su gsol na dngos grub thams cad la don yod pa'i dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas dam tshig brjod
par bya ste/ /sems can rnams la bde phyir dang / /bstan pa thams cad 'grub pa'i phyir/ /gdug pa 'dul las bsod nams ni/ /'gyur zhes rdo rje 'dzin gyis gsungs/ /
de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi phyag rgya dang bcas pa'i mdzub mo sbyar bar bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das gdug pa thams cad dang / bdud thams cad dang / 'jig
rten gsum po thams cad yang dag par 'dul ba nyid du byin gyis rlob par mdzad do/ /de nas dbang bskur ba rgyas pa la sogs pa de bzhin du byas la rdo rje khro bo'i las bzhi
pa la bslab par bya ste/ phyag rgya rnams kyis sems can rnams rgyas gdab pa dang / phyag rgya gzhag pa dang / gsad pa dang / slar 'tsho bar bya'o/ /gang la phyag rgya sbyar ba ni
'chi bar 'gyur na de ni gdug pa yin par shes par bya'o/ /de nas 'tsho bar byed pa'i phyag rgyas 'tsho bar byas la shin tu bsrung ba rab tu sbyar ba byas na shin tu bsrung ba yin
pa'i phyir/ gdug pa rnams slar yang gnod par mi byed do/ /de nas brtsams te slob ma bzang / /dkyil 'khor tshogs ni kun gyis kyang / /mi tshugs pa dang mi sod par/ /tshe
'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nas 'di sgrub bshad bya ste/ /ci bzhin sku ni dge 'dun du/ /rdo rje gsor zhing dang por ni/ /bzlas brjod stong phrag brgya bya'o/ /'bum tshang
nas ni sems dpa' che/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dang mnyam mchog /rdo rje khro bo rgyal po mchog /rgyas dang 'chi ba med par 'gyur/ /gdug pa rnams ni rjes 'dul zhing / /
@#/ /sangs rgyas kun la rab mchod par/ /'jig rten gsum du legs snang zhing / /cis kyang 'jigs pa med par 'gyur/ /de nas de kho na nyid kyi snying po
sgrub pa ni/ /'greng ngam yang na 'dug pa 'am/ /'gro ba'am nyal bar byed pa na/ /ci ltar de ltar 'bum bzlas na/ /tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur/ /'di yis 'dod
pa'i dbang phyug kun/ /'dod pa tsam gyis 'gro 'ong lding / /dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug grub/ /rgas dang 'chi ba med par 'gyur/ /'gro ba rnams kyis mchod pa dang / /rang
gi nye du rnams kyis bsten/ /gdug pa thams cad rjes 'dul zhing / /gang la 'jigs pa med par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das khro bo'i rgyal po chen pos gsungs so/ /de
nas phyag rgya'i dam pa sgrub pa ni/ /ci bzhin dus su phyag rgya bcing / /bdag nyid nges par bsregs nas ni/ /ci srid nyid du khro chen po'i/ /dngos grub thams cad 'grub par
'gyur/ /de nas dam tshig sgrub pa ni/ /bdag ni thams cad gsad bya zhes/ /brjod cing phyag na rdo rje yis/ /dam tshig phyag rgya bcings nas ni/ /bzlas na rdo rje 'dzin
'grub 'gyur/ /de nas las rnams sgrub pa ni/ /las rnams dam bsgrub pa ni/ /rnam pa bzhir ni rab phyed cing / /thams cad bde ba'i phyir zos na/ /rdo rje las nyid thob
par 'gyur/ /sgrub pa chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// //de nas dngos grub sgrub pa ni/ /rdo rje khro mchog rgyal po yi/ /las kyi rgyun ni dam pa rnams/ /go rims bzhin
du bshad par bya/ /'di lta ste/ thams cad bsreg pa dang / bskrad pa dang / gzhig pa dang / rengs par bya ba dang / gnyid log par bya ba dang / rgyas gdab pa dang / rmongs pa
dang / gzhig pa dang / bcing ba dang / gzir ba dang / dral ba dang / brdeg pa dang / 'bar ba dang / bsgyel ba dang / btso ba dang / gcad pa dang / dbug pa dang / phye mar
bya ba dang / gtor ba dang / rnam par gzhom pa dang / rims dang / dug dang / gdon gyis zin du gzhug pa dang / smyo bar bya ba dang / gsad par bya ba la ni rdo rje hUM mdzad kyis
so/ /thams cad dgug par bya ba dang / des par bkod pa dang / bskyod pa dang / gar byed du gzhug pa dang / glu len du gzhug pa dang / brgyal du gzhug pa dang / rtser gzhug
ba dang / ha ha zhes dgod du gzhug pa dang / 'khor ba dang / drang ba dang / 'od du gzhug pa dang / bsgom pa dang / nub par bya ba dang / dbyung ba dang / 'phang ba dang / nye bar
'degs pa bya ba dang / bskur ba dang / nga ro 'don par bya ba dang / dur gzhug par bya ba dang / rang nyid brdeg par bya ba dang / 'ching bar bya ba dang / skra 'bal bar bya ba
@#/ /dang / zhe 'gras par bya ba dang / gos bshu ba dang / khro ba 'bar bar bya ba la ni khro bo'i gdon gyi phyag rgyas so/ /thams cad dgug pa dang /
gzhug pa dang / dbab pa dang / pra se na bsgrub pa dang / bden pa smra bar bya ba dang / sgyu ma ston cing lan ston pa ston pa dang / dus tshigs kyi 'khor lo yongs su bzlog
pa dang / /dus ma yin par shing las me tog dang / 'bras bu smin par byed par ston pa dang / 'bru thams cad yang dag par ston par bya ba dang / rims dang / sbyar
ba'i dug dang / gdon dang / dug dang / mkha' 'gro ma las thar bar bya ba dang / g.yul 'gyed pa thams cad las thar bar bya ba dang / gzhan gyi dpung gzhom pa
dang / phyogs dang / mtshams dang / dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang / shin tu bsrung ba dang / yongs su skyob par bya ba dang / thar par bya ba dang / bslang ba dang / dbang
du bya ba la ni khro bo chen po sna tshogs grub pas so/ /lha la sogs thams cad ltung bar bya ba dang / klu gdon par bya ba dang / gnod sbyin rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang /
srin po skrag pa dang / mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i gdon thams cad btul ba dang / bdud kyi dpung thams cad gzhom pa dang / ma mo rnams gdul ba dang / gdug
pa'i tshogs rnam par gtor ba dang / gdug pa rnams tshar gcod pa dang / 'dum pa dang / 'jigs pa med par yang dag par bskyed pa dang / nor bu bzang po dbang du bya ba
dang / nor sbyin las nor bu thams cad dbrog pa dang / rnam thos sras mnan nas dpal drang ba dang / lha'i bu mo gzhon nu ma thams cad dang rtse 'jo bya ba dang / brgya byin
mnan nas bde sogs ma dbrog pa dang / skem byed tshar gcad pa dang / tshangs pa ltung bar bya ba dang / khyab 'jug gdul ba dang / dbang phyug chen po las rnam par rgyal
ba dang / 'dod pa'i dbang phyug mnan nas dga' ba mo dbrog pa dang / rdo rje bsgrub pa dang / byang chub chen po bsgrub pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par
bya ba dang / dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / dam tshig gis bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / bsgrub pa la ni rdo rje khro bo chen po rgyal po dam pa'i dngos grub kyis so/ /
zhes kyang gsungs so/ /lan gcig bzlas pas mchog grub pa/ /thog ma'i rtsa snying bzang lan gcig /de yi 'og tu khro gnyer gyis/ /bsgrub bya thams cad grub pa yin/ /
dpal mchog dang po'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ rdo rje me dang nyi ma ltar rab tu 'bar ba'i rtog pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// //de nas ting 'dzin thams cad ni/ /
@#/ /rnam dag mchog gi chos nyid las/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang chen po ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i gtso chen yin/ /gdug pa thams cad 'dul
don du/ /rang rig rin po che bskyed na/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi khre bo che/ /thabs med pas na thabs yin no/ /'dod chags la sogs kun bsags pas/ /ma dag sems
can khams dag ni/ /de rnams la ni rab spyod par/ /skyes bu mchog ni rnam par mkhyen/ /mchog tu mi 'dul ba nyid kyis/ /sangs rgyas kyang ni mnga' mi mdzad/ /
'jig rten kun na 'jig rten mchog /rang nyid bzang po la snyoms zhugs/ /de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po chos thams cad rang
bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i chos nyid kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te/ gang la gzigs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad khams
gsum pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug thams cad nyid thugs su chud par gyur pa'o/ /bsnyems pas pad+ma g.yon pa ni/ /bzung ste 'dab ma 'byed mdzad pas/ /ci nus
pa yi ting 'dzin gyis/ /rang bzhin gyis ni gzigs par mdzad/ /ci ltar pad+ma dmar po 'di/ /tshon gyi nyes pas mi gos pa/ /gnas kyi nyes pa sna tshogs pa'i/ /
khams gsum pa ni de bzhin dag /'di la gzigs pa la sogs pas/ /rgyal ba rnams ni dbang por 'gyur/ /de yis rdo rje sems dpa' ni/ /spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug gyur/ /
de nas sgom pa'i snying po 'di/ /dag par bsgoms pas sgom pa ni/ /rdo rje 'chang ba chen po ni/ /pad+ma chen po 'chang bar 'gyur/ /gser sbyangs ri yi dbang po ste/ /rgyal po chen po dang
mnyam pa/ /bsnyems pa g.yon pa'i pad mchog gi /g.yas pa mchog la rnam par gzigs/ /de nas pad+ma'i 'dab ma la/ /pad+ma chen po mchog 'dzin pa/ /sangs rgyas la
sogs 'byung ba yi/ /'khor lo rnams ni 'dul ba'i mchog /'gro ba sna tshogs 'dul mdzad pa/ /bzhugs pa rab tu bri bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis ni/ /de la
pad+ma dge ba der/ /'gro ba thams cad rnam sbyong ba'i/ /tshul gyis 'dul ba mdzad pa na/ /pad+ma'i rigs mchog ston pa'i phyir/ /rgyal po rnams kyis gsol ba btab/ /de nas
