thams cad 'dul mdzad cing / /shin tu dkar ba'i chos 'dzin pa/ /rdo rje chos te rang rgyal po/ /'jig rten dbang pos bka' stsal pa/ /phyi ni dkyil 'khor chen po la/ /pad+ma
'dab ma brgyad pa bri/ /de yi dbus su spyan 'dzum pa/ /'jig rten dbang phyug dgod par bya/ /gser sbyangs lta bu'i pad+ma ni/ /g.yon bsnyems tshul gyis gzigs
@#/ /mdzad pa/ /rgyal mtshan kun gyis rnam par spras/ /sangs rgyas sku mchog spyi bor bzhugs/ /de yi ngos ni thams cad du/ /sangs rgyas sku ni brgyad po
bri/ /rang gi ting 'dzin pad+ma che'i/ /ting nge 'dzin la rnam par gzigs/ /'jig rten dbang po'i gzugs logs su/ /sangs rgyas la sogs rigs kyi lha/ /zhi ba sred med
bu tshangs pa/ /'dod pa'i gzugs ni pad+ma can/ /spyi bor 'tsher zhing mgrin 'degs pa/ /rta mgrin lcags kyu bcings nas ni/ /chos kyi tshig gis spyan drang bya/ /de nas
pad+ma'i snying po ni/ /sarba ta thA ga ta pad+ma dzaHhUM badzra pad+ma/ he pad+ma/ pad+ma ba/ ho pad+ma ni rA dza/ de nas mtshams rnams su ni/ hUM pad+me tsaN+De shwa ra hUM/ he ma hA bi shwa pad+ma
tsU r+Ni sid+d+ha hUM/ maT hrIHpad+ma pad+mo hUM a ho pad+ma a shwa/ kra ma kra ma hUM dzaH/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis ni/ /cho ga rgyas par byas nas ni/ /pad+ma chen po me tog
bcas/ /ma yengs yid kyis phyag bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor zhugs nas ting nge 'dzin/ /las byung gzungs 'di brjod par bya/ /oM bi sho d+ha ya/ ma nu sa ni shud+d+ha ma hA satwa/

d+hA tu sa ma ya satwa/ rA ga dI pany+tsa ye/ tsit+ta me sarba d+ha meSh+ya badzri Ni tsit+ta me sarba d+ha me sh+ya dzi ni/ /gzugs kyi phyag rgya gsan nas ni/ /dgyes pas pad+ma 'dzin pa 'grub/ /de nas
mdzub mo lcags kyu bcing / /chos kyi tshig gis legs spyan drangs/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a wa lo ke shwa ra pad+ma ha sta/ ya hi shrI g+h+rAM ma me badzra mu drA a gri sh+ya sa be sa ma yer
ba d+ha bi shi ko mi/ dzaHhUM baM hoHsho d+ha ya sarba sA d+ha ya pa ma me/ ma hA badzra d+ha ra s+t+waM/ /de nas 'jig rten mgon po mchog /'jig rten 'dzin pa rang nyid byon/ /'jig rten
kun mchog 'grub 'gyur ba'i/ /ting 'dzin cho ga nges par mdzad/ /de nas de bzhin slob ma rnams/ /gzhug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ni/ /dngos grub thams cad sbyin pa yi/ /
ye shes dag ni bslab par bya/ /ting 'dzin snying po 'di yi ni/ /sgrub pa chen po gdong nas byung / /'jig rten kun gyi dbang phyug nyid/ /go rims bzhin du bshad par bya/ /
bud med rnams kyi nang zhugs pa'am/ /gdug pa rnams kyi nang chud pa'am/ /gang yang rung bar 'dug nas ni/ /pad+ma chen po yongs su bzung / /dus dang stobs ni ji
bzhin du/ /nyin re ci nus bsgrub par bya/ /cho ga 'di yis tshe 'di la/ /myur du mchog ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /'dod chags kun gyi bde myur bar/ /'dod pa tsam gyis 'gro
'ong lding / /'jig rten kun gyi dbang phyug rgyal/ /rga dang 'chi ba med par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' nyid/ /phyag na rdo rje nyid dang ni/ /dngos grub kun
@#/ /gyi mtha' yas mchog /tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur/ /de nas phyag rgya bsgrub pa ni/ /phyag rgya bcings te ting 'dzin gnas/ /dngos grub chen po
nyid thob bo/ /dam tshig dam tshig mchog gis te/ /las kyi las mchog phyag rgyas so/ /las kyi las mchog phyag rgyas so/ /sgrub pa chen po'i cho ga'i rgyud do// //de nas dngos grub ma grub
pa'i/ /ting 'dzin las ni 'dres ma dag /dang po'i ting 'dzin grub pa ni/ /go rims bzhin du rab bshad bya/ /'di lta ste/ sgrib pa thams cad dang / sdig pa thams
cad dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa dang / yams dang / 'tshe ba dang / nad 'go ba dang / nyon mongs pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang / 'jigs pa dang /
skrag pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'thab pa dang / byis pa'i gdon dang / dmu rgod dang / nyon mongs pa dang / ngal ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / dbul
ba dang / rgyags pa dang / reg na mi bde ba dang / skal pa ngan pa dang / nad med pa ma yin pa dang / nor brlag pa rnams la ni pad+ma chen po zhi bas so/ /rlung dang /
mkhris pa dang / khrag dang / bad kan dang / 'dus pa dang / ma zhu ba dang / rims dang / sbyar ba'i dug dang / dug dang / mdze dang / 'brum bu phra mo dang / g.yan
pa dang / rkang shu dang / skran dang / chu'i dmu rdzing dang / mtshan par rdol ba dang / sha bkra dang / zad byed dang / khrag zad pa dang / khu ba zad pa dang / nad thams cad dang /
gnod pa dang / gnod byed dang / gdon dang / phra men rnams gso ba la ni pad+ma chen po sman gyi phyag rgya 'dzin pas so/ /thams cad rdo rjer byas pa dang / chos dang / go cha
dang / gtsug tor dang / gtsug phud dang / mtshams dang / phyogs dang / dkyil 'khor dang / sa dang / nam mkha' dang / rdo rje'i gdan dang / khang pa chen po dang /
rdo rje ra ba dang / me 'bar ba dang / thal ba'i ra ba dang / rdo rje dang / ri bong don yod pa la sogs pa dang / srad bus yongs su bskor ba dang / phur bus gdab pa dang / zas
dang / btung ba dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / phyag rgya dang / srung ba la ni pad+ma chen po thams cad srung bas so/ /tshe thams cad dang / stobs dang / kha dog dang / gzi brjid
dang / mdangs dang / lang tsho dang / brtson 'grus dang / spro ba dang / nad med pa dang / dpal dang / skal ba bzang po dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / dbang phyug dang /
'byor pa dang / dngos grub dang / blo dang / rnyed pa dang / bkra shis pa dang / ming dang / grags pa dang / snyan pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dam pa 'grub pa
@#/ /ni pad+ma chen po mchog grub pas so/ /dpal mchog dang po'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ chos thams cad sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje'i cho ga
rgyas pa'o// //de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /thams cad mi 'gyur nam mkha' che/ /thams cad dbang bskur kun gyi don/ /kun dbang rin chen thams cad
'dzin/ /ting nge 'dzin gyis rab byin brlabs/ /drag po chen po rab sad mdzad/ /chos rnams la ni rnam gzigs pas/ /kun don dbang phyug gdod nas byung / /nyi zla dang
ni gza' skar can/ /nam mkha' nyid du gyur pa yin/ /de nas rin chen ting 'dzin ni/ /nges par rdo rje can du brjod/ /de nas nam mkha' rdo rje nyid/ /ljang sngon bai DUR+ya mnyam
mdangs/ /rdo rje rin chen rnams dge ba/ /nam mkha'i snying por yang dag gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan thog ma 'di/ /mdzod spu kun gyi gnas na bzhugs/ /ting nge 'dzin la
rnam gzigs pas/ /'jig rten dbang phyug bdag po nyid/ /sangs rgyas thams cad sras bcas dang / /de bzhin rdo rje 'dzin pa mchog /rdo rje rin chen de yis ni/ /kun rig
kun gyis dbang bskur dang / /bsam pa thams cad rdzogs bya'i phyir/ /kun mchog kun la dbang bskur nas/ /shis pa brjod pa 'di gsungs so/ /oM sarba badzra satwa a ti pa
ti s+t+waM a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi b+hu r+b+hu ba swaH/ de nas bzang pas 'di gsungs shing / /legs par shis brjod dbang bskur bas/ /rdo rje rin chen che de las/ /chos kyi gtso bor byung bar gyur/ /
byung nas 'gro ba thams cad ni/ /ci rigs par ni kun dbang bskur/ /rdo rje kun gyis dbang skur nas/ /slar yang dkyil 'khor tshul gyis bzhugs/ /bde gshegs kun gyis
byin brlabs pas/ /rdo rje rin chen bla na med/ /shin tu dbang phyug chen po'i mchog /dngos grub gsol ba'i rtog pa gsungs/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyi rol ni/ /nam mkha'i
'khor lo nam mkha'i mdog /nyi ma zla ba skar ma dang / /gza' rnams kyis ni brgyan pa bri/ /de dbus nam mkha'i snying po ni/ /bdag nyid thams cad dgyes pa gzhag /dag
pa'i bai DUR+ya mdog 'dra/ /'od zer 'bar ba sna tshogs 'khrug /g.yon pa rin chen thugs kar gtod/ /g.yas pas nor chen rab stsol ba/ /de yi ngos su sems dpa' mchog /
bzhi po gzungs bcas dam pa yin/ /dbang bskur ba dang gter nyid dang / /nor bu chen po bla med dang / /'byor pa dpal ni phun sum tshogs/ /rang gi mtshan mas mchod
pas ni/ /de la de dag gi snying po 'di yin te/ badzra satwa dzaH/ badzra rat+na hUMH/ badzra d+harma baM/ badzra karma hoH/ de nas gzungs rnams kyi snying po bshad de/ oM pra ti badzri Ni phaT/ oM
@#/ /badzra prI ti hi hi/ oM tsin+ta ma Ni hoH/ oM badzra ma hA ma he haM/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis ni/ /cho ga rgyas pa ci bzhin bya/ /nor bu'i khu tshur gyis
bzhugs la/ /mkha' skyes la ni mgos phyag bya/ /bzhugs nas nam mkha' mkhas pa yi/ /dam tshig dam pa brjod par bya/ /khyed ni nam mkha' las byung ba'i/ /thams

cad kyi ni lnga pa yin/ /oM i sid+d+ha b+hur+b+b+hu ba sid+d+ha sid+d+ha swaH/ sid+d+ha ma hA badzra rat+na/ ba ba tra Ta trAM/ 'di ni bzlas pa tsam gyis ni/ /mkha' snying dngos grub thams cad dang / /phun
tshogs kun la shin tu ni/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rin chen bla na med pas gsungs so/ /de nas nor bu khu tshur can gyi lcags
kyus dgug par bya'o/ /oM b+hu rA ya hI dza/ b+hu ba pra bi sha hUM swa/ gr-i h+Na paM ba ba Ta Ta sid+d+ha ho trAM/ de nas bcom ldan myur du ni/ /byon nas dngos grub thams cad ni/ /
'byor pa shin tu g.yo ba la/ /don ni rab tu 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nas slob mas phyag rgya ni/ /me tog bcas pa mchog gis gzhug /bcug nas de nyid mchog
snying po/ /bden pa lan gcig brjod du gzhug /de nas 'byor pa'i mchog brtag pa/ /dpal gyi phun tshogs mchod pa che/ /'jig rten mchog gi dngos grub
rnams/ /bde bar gshegs pa bzhin du 'thob/ /de nas de phyir sgrub pa bshad/ /rdo rje rin chen rgyal mchog gis/ /dpag med zlos pas bsgrub bya zhing / /'di yi skyes mchog 'di nyid
la/ /'dod chags 'gro dang 'ong bar 'gyur/ /rin chen kun gyi dbang phyug rgyal/ /rga dang 'chi ba med par 'gyur/ /dngos grub kyi dam pa thams cad kyang de bzhin no/ /phyag rgya
bsgrub pa ni dga' ba nyid kyis so/ /dam tshig gi phyag rgya bsgrub pa ni dam tshig gi khu tshur gyis so/ /de bzhin du las bsgrub pa ni dngos grub bla na med pa yin no/ /phyag rgya chen po
bsgrub pa nyid de'i rgyud do// //de nas de phyir las rnams kyi/ /rab 'byams rgyu ni dam pa dang / /dngos grub chen po kun bsgrubs pa/ /go rims ji bzhin rab bshad
bya/ /'di lta ste/ 'byor pa thams cad dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / dbrog pa dang / bsag pa dang / len pa dang / 'dren pa dang / 'gugs
pa dang / gtod pa dang / gzhig pa dang / 'phen pa dang / 'degs pa dang / 'bebs pa dang / brdeg pa dang / sbyang ba dang / rnyed pa dang / nyo ba dang / btsong ba dang / kun tu
'gyed pa dang / nye bar dgod pa dang / brtan par bya ba dang / rdo rjer bya ba dang / 'byor ba thams cad bsgrub pa dang / 'byor pa thams cad kyi mchog bsgrub pa la ni rdo rje rin
@#/ /chen gyi dbang bskur bas so/ /dpal thams cad dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / dbrog pa dang / bsag pa
dang / len pa dang / 'dren pa dang / 'gugs pa dang / gtod pa dang / gzhig pa dang / 'phen pa dang / 'degs pa dang / 'bebs pa dang / brdeg pa dang / sbyang ba dang /
rnyed pa dang / nyo ba dang / btsong ba dang / kun tu 'gyed pa dang / nye bar dgod pa dang / brtan par bya ba dang / rdo rjer bya ba dang / 'byor ba thams cad bsgrub pa dang / 'byor
pa thams cad kyi mchog bsgrub pa la ni rdo rje rin chen dpal gyis so/ /phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang /
dbrog pa dang / bsag pa dang / len pa dang / 'dren pa dang / 'gugs pa dang / gtod pa dang / gzhig pa dang / 'phen pa dang / 'degs pa dang / 'bebs pa dang /
brdeg pa dang / sbyang ba dang / rnyed pa dang / nyo ba dang / btsong ba dang / kun tu 'gyed pa dang / nye bar dgod pa dang / brtan par bya ba dang / rdo rjer bya ba dang / 'byor pa
thams cad bsgrub pa dang / 'byor pa thams cad kyi mchog bsgrub pa la ni rdo rje rin chen phun sum tshogs pas so/ /mchod pa thams cad dgug pa dang / gzhug pa
dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / dbrog pa dang / bsags pa dang / len pa dang / 'dren pa dang / 'gugs pa dang / gtod pa dang / gzhig pa dang / 'phen pa dang /
'degs pa dang / 'bebs pa dang / brdeg pa dang / sbyang ba dang / rnyed pa dang / nyo ba dang / btsong ba dang / kun tu 'gyed pa dang / nye bar dgod pa dang / brtan par bya ba dang / rdo
rjer bya ba dang / 'byor pa thams cad bsgrub pa dang / 'byor pa thams cad kyi mchog bsgrub pa la ni rdo rje rin chen gyi mchod pa sgrub pas so/ /zhes kyang gsungs so/ /sems
can thams cad bde don du/ /rdo rje sems dpa' nor che ba/ /rang gi rgyal mchog lan gcig bsgrub/ /yi ge traM ni sbyar bar bya/ /dpal mchog dang po rtog pa'i rgyal po chen
po las/ bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa rdo rje rin chen gyi rtog pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// //de nas rgyal ba rdo rje 'dzin/ /'jig rten gsum po khams gsum
pa/ /'jig rten gsum bdag thams cad la/ /'jig rten gsum mchog 'dul mdzad pa/ /cho ga bzhin du bsgoms gyur zhing / /sems can don phyir cho gas bzhugs/ /
'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams/ /rtag tu rnam par gnas pa yin/ /mi mnyam pa yis bsten gyur na/ /dug nyid du ni nye bar 'gro/ /bdud rtsi nyid kyis bsten gyur na/ /
@#/ /bdud rtsi nyid du'ang 'gyur ba yin/ /'dod chags tshangs pa mchog 'byin pa/ /zhe sdang drag po'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /gti mug khyab 'jug brtan mdzad
nas/ /'jig rten gsum po byin gyis brlabs/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams/ /rtag tu gnas pas srid gsum gnas/ /chos kyis bsten nas gsum mchog ste/ /
chos min bsten pas ngan song gsum/ /'dod chags sbrang rtsir byed par bshad/ /zhe sdang rgyal bar byed par bshad/ /gti mug don ni sgrub byed ces/ /kun tu gsang ba'i
ming yin no/ /nga ni 'jig rten gcig pu nyid/ /'jig rten gsum du rab tu bshad/ /nga ni 'dod pa gcig pu nyid/ /tshangs pa drag po g.yung drung yin/ /de nas gsum po 'di
yi mchog /sbyang phyir rdo rje sbyang 'dzin pa/ /gzugs ni gsum po 'di dag nyid/ /bdag nyid kho na byung ba yin/ /gang phyir 'jig rten 'di dag ni/ /rtag tu yang ni 'di
skad smra/ /tshangs sogs kyis 'dul yang dag pa'i/ /sangs rgyas byang chub snod ma yin/ /de rnams sbyang phyir bcom ldan 'das/ /rdo rje 'chang chen rang nyid ni/ /gzugs ni
gsum po 'di mdzad nas/ /phyis ni sangs rgyas nyid mi 'gyur/ /de nas tshangs pa la sogs lha/ /'jig rten gsum mchog dbang phyug che/ /dkyil 'khor de ni gsang snying
po/ /rang gi rang grub phyir rab phul/ /oM b+hUr b+hu ba swaH/ /zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /sgo srung bzhis ni rab bsrungs pa/ /kha khyer gyis ni legs bskor ba/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor bri bar
bya/ /de yi nang ma nyid dang ni/ /dkyil 'khor gzhu yi dbyibs can la/ /sbrang rtsir byed dang rgyal byed nyid/ /bsgrub pa thams cad sgrub pa ni/ /go rims dag ni ci bzhin du/ /legs
par bri 'am gzhag par bya/ /pus mo gnyis kyis zhugs la der/ /rtse gsum dam tshig gis mtshan pas/ /zhugs te dam tshig bcings nas ni/ /yang dag par ni dgas par bya/ /
oM b+hur+b+hu ba swaH/ swa sti nA ma swAhA/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa yis/ /thams cad thams cad kyis bskor ba/ /thams cad grub phyir 'ongs pa la/ /de snyed pa yi gtor ma sbyin/ /
slob dpon rab tu zhugs pa yis/ /slob ma thams cad gzhug par bya/ /de nyid gsang ba brjod nas ni/ /dam tshig mchog ni sbyin par bya/ /gal te khyod kyis rtse gsum bcag /
snying po snod min la smras sam/ /ji skad smras pa'i chos rnams ni/ /gal te 'dir nas spyad dam/ /snying stobs rdul dang mun pa nyid/ /tshangs pa drag po g.yung drung ste/ /ming po
gsum po 'di nyid ni/ /nam yang brnyes par mi bya'o/ /nga zhig 'di rnams sgom pa slob/ /yang dang yang du zhugs nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor mchod par bya ba dang / /dngos
@#/ /grub thams cad thob par 'gyur/ /rang gi phyag rgya bslabs nas ni/ /de la gar gyi mchod pa dang / /'dod yon dam pa lnga rnams kyis/ /rtag tu dkyil
'khor mchod par bya/ /'jig rten gsum 'byin pa'i rgyud do// //de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin/ /sems can kun rje ston mdzad pa/ /'jig rten gsum phyung
don grub tu/ /slar yang sring mo rnams 'byin mdzad/ /kun tu chags dang zhe sdang rmongs/ /brtan par byed pa'i rgyu yin no/ /dga' dang phrag dog bud med ni/ /rab tu grags
pa'i grub kun ster/ /gang zhig 'jig rten kun tu bshad/ /tshogs kun gyis mchod lha mo rnams/ /zhi dang 'jigs ma de bzhin gsar/ /grub pa dang ni zhi bar bshad/ /phyi
rol sems can phan phyir dang / /rtogs don khong du chud bya'i phyir/ /de rnams kyi ni snying po dang / /dkyil 'khor de bzhin dam tshig bshad/ /hrI hUM shrI b+h+yo/ dkyil 'khor
bzang po sgo bzhi pa/ /srad bu gsum gyis dkyil 'khor bya/ /mtshams kyi thig ni ka ba che/ /bzhi po dag gi rim pa bzhin/ /de yi dbus su dkyil 'khor ni/ /bzhi po
dag ni de bzhin bya/ /rang gi snying po bzhi po ni/ /rang gi sgor ni phyogs par gzhag /skal bzang lag na ral gri mtshon/ /sring mo phub can zhi ba mo/ /phag mo lag na
gter nyid de/ /grub pa mo ni bsnyems dang bcas/ /de nas dang po'i dkyil 'khor du/ /kun nas de bzhin zhugs nas ni/ /sring mo rnams kyi rang gi rgyas/ /go rims dag ni ci bzhin
du/ /zhugs nas de bzhin cho ga bzhin/ /spos la sogs pas mchod par bya/ /de nyid gsang ba rab bsgrub pas/ /kun nas dgug pa dag tu bya/ /oM suM b+ha ga ra ti Sh+Tha ma ya hI b+hU ra/

rak+Sha sa mA ti Sh+Tha ma ya hi b+hur b+hu ba/ ba ra hA a mi R+ya ta ma ya swA hA/ sid+d+hi ke sid+d+hi sa ma ya hi I maM ke mU dra b+hiH/ hrIHhUM shrI b+h+yo/ /de nas lus ni thams cad kyis/ /de bzhin du ni
legs bzhugs la/ /de nas phyag rgya bcings bstan te/ /gsang ba mchog 'di brjod par bya/ /gal te gsang nyid ma bsrungs na/ /gang zhig sems can don zhugs dang / /
gang yang dkyil 'khor sgrub byed pa/ /de rnams khyed kyis bsad par 'gyur/ /chos dang ldan la bdud rtsi nyid/ /chos min pas ni dug pas lhags/ /ci snyed pa dang dus ci
bzhin/ /yul rnams nye bar bsten pa dang / /phyag rgya gar gyi mchod pa yis/ /ci bde bar ni rtag tu mchod/ /sring mo bzhi'i rgyud do// //de nas ston pa rdo rje
'dzin/ /sa yi dbang phyug kun gyi mchog /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug che/ /sgrub bdag ni rab sgrub nyid/ /'dod chags sogs dug gzhig phyir dang / /kun nas bdud rtsi
@#/ /nyid bya'i phyir/ /zhe sdang las byung klu yi ni/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de la snying po ni 'di yin te/ phuH/ zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi
pa/ /srad bu thams cad yang dag bri/ /sgo khyud klu yi gdengs ka mchog /mtshams kyi rtse mchog mjug ma mdud/ /de yi dbus su klu rgyal ni/ /mtha' yas gdengs ka
bcas pa ni/ /klu yi rigs ni brgyad po dag /shes rab can gyis kun tu bri/ /de nas khros dang zhugs nas ni/ /klu 'dzin pa yi shugs kyis ni/ /zhugs nas dkyil 'khor
de nyid du/ /sbrul gyi gdengs kas dgug par bya/ /oM hrIHa nI la dza ba be ga pr-i thi b+hin d-i ra She shA ya hi phuHsarba nA ga ku lA n+yA na ya phuH/ sa ma ya pra be sha ya phuH/ sarbA na
sA d+ha ya phuH/ ta ta sa sarba nA ga pu tra ka phuH/ de ltar byas na legs par bzhugs shing dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas slob dpon gyis dug med par bsam par bya'o/ /de
nas brtsams te dug thams cad zos pas kyang bdud rtsir 'gyur ro/ /nor rgyas dang rtse bar byed do/ /dug thams cad sbar ba dang / gzhig nus par 'gyur ro/ /de nas mna'i snying
po sbyin par bya ste/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams/ /'jig rten na ni 'di gsum dug /gal te bden pa las 'das na/ /'di dag gis ni rtag gsod 'gyur/ /khyod
kyis glog la brnyas mi bya/ /ser ba bzlog par mi bya zhing / /gal te dngos grub la dga' na/ /ci nas sbrul ni gsad mi bya/ /klu'i dkyil 'khor ro// //de nas ston pa rdo rje
'dzin/ /sdug bsngal thams cad sel ba'i mchog /sems can kun la bde ba'i phyir/ /gdon gyi dkyil 'khor phyung ba yin/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams/ /nyes byas kyis
ni dug nyid 'gyur/ /gdon dang rims dang sdig pa dang / /dmyal ba yang ni 'gyur ba yin/ /de nas gdug pa'i snying po ni/ /haM/ zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /gdon gyi dkyil 'khor
kun tu bri/ /de'i dbus dang por gdon la sogs/ /cho ga rgyas pa gdon par bya/ /de nas bshad pa bzhin zhugs nas/ /dgod cing myur bar dkyil 'khor du/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa zhug
nas ni/ /khros pas rkang pa g.yon pas mnye/ /de nas gdon dang rims sdig pa/ /dmyal ba thams cad rtag tu ni/ /sdig pa chen po byed pa yang / /rdo rjes rab tu 'jigs par
'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /sdug bsngal thams cad las 'don pa'i rgyud do// //de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin/ /kun mchog
dbang phyug dam pa yis/ /sems can kun don rab bsgrub phyir/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad gsungs pa yin/ de la snying po ni 'di yin te/ oM AHhUM hrIHtrAM/ de nas 'di ni
@#/ /gsungs tsam gyis/ /kun mchog dbang phyug dam pa ni/ /gzugs kun gyis ni kun mchog gi /dbang phyug dam pa mdzad pa yin/ /gsang ba chen po
lnga yis ni/ /gang tshe 'dul bar ma gyur pa/ /de tshe sna tshogs cher mdzad pa/ /'gro ba 'dul ba'i dam pa yin/ /de nas gang phyir dkyil 'khor che/ /dam pa yang dag bshad bya
ste/ /kun mchog sna tshogs rnam par rgyal/ /kun mchog dbang phyug dam pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor chen po bris nas ni/ /de yi dbus su cho ga bzhin/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rab
bzhag la/ /rdo rje lha mo tshogs dkyil 'khor/ /de yi ngos ni thams cad du/ /kun mchog bdag po'i sku rnams so/ /rdo rje mchog bcas mtshan ma ni/ /rang gi rigs kyis
bskor ba gzhag /rgyal po rdo rje sred med bu'i/ /gzugs 'dzin 'khor lo bsnams pa bri/ /khyab bdag rdo rje can rdo rje/ /gtum ma dbang rdo rje mdung bsnams pa/ /rdo rje pad
byung pad+ma can/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa tshangs gzugs ldan/ /nam mkha'i snying po 'dod pa'i gzugs/ /rdo rje dang bcas me tog mtshon/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni mtshams rnams
su/ /rigs kyi lha mo bri bar bya/ /rdo rje dpal mo dkar mo dang / /rdo rje sgrol ma mkha' rdo rje/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po 'di rnams kyi snying po 'di bshad par bya ste/

oM badzra nA rA ya Na ts+tshin+da pra ti ha na badzra tsakra te na ho/ /b+ha ga wa na badzra ta thA ga ta/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ badzra d+hA ra taM/ badzra ta thA ga ta hUM/ badzra kro d+ha ma hA yo gi ni ga Ne shwa ra/ ma hA badzra ku

lo gra ba ne ho/ b+ha ga bAn badzra tsan+d+re shwa rA ya/ ha ha ha ha hrIH/ badzra pad+mod b+ha ba ho/ b+ha ga bAn badzra lo ke shwa re/ ma hA pra me sid d+h+ya/ oM b+hUr b+hu ba swaH/ swa sti na maHswAhA/ he

badzra ku su mA yu d+ha/ sarba kA ma me sA d+ha ya hoHb+ha ga bAn badzra A kA sha gar+b+ha/ ba ba Ta Ta traM/ badzra A kA sha gar+b+ha a she ShaM mu drA/ na mo yai na sA d+he na/ b+ha ga ba te pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA yu

d+ha/ ts+tshin+d+ha ts+tshin+d+ha badzra Ni tsa kre Na te na sa t+ye na pA pa ka na/ oM d+hIH/ shrI shru ti smri ti bi dza ye swAhA/ badzra pa ra mi/ oM badzra gau ri ma hA bid+ya trai lo kya bi dza ye shwa ri badzra kro d+ha a g+ni sa ma

ye/ badza d+ha ri na mo stu ste/ tad+ya thA/ oM hi li mi li/ le li tA li badzra ka mu ka ye swAhA/ badzra sa ma ya na mo ye na sA d+h+ya na b+ha ga ba te/ bud+d+ha bo d+hi rbud+d+ha d+hA ra/ badzra d+harma pra yo

ge na/ te na sa t+ye na sid+d+ha mAM/ oM tA re tu t+tA re tu re swAhA/ badzra d+ha mo ta/ oM karma badzri Ni sid+d+h+ya sid+d+h+ya bi shud+d+h+ya sA d+h+ya ba ha/ ga ga nod+b+ha be/ yo ge na si da d+ha mAM pa ra ma ka re/
tad+ya thA/ ga ga na bi shud d+he/ sarba ma pa pri ya pa ri pU ra ni swAhA/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor gnas rnams su/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa rab spyod gnas/ /lha dbang dang ni ma mo nyid/ /
@#/ /'jig rten skyong rnams dgod par bya/ /tshogs kyi dbang phyug rdo rje yi/ /rol mo che bcu rdung byed pa/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor 'khyer dang / /sgo dang mtshams
su'ang de bri'o/ /sgo rnams kun tu 'jug pa ni/ /rang gi phyag rgya rab tu gzhug /dkyil 'khor dam pa lnga par ni/ /dang po'i sbyor bas 'jug par bya'o/ /de nas dbus su
'dug nas ni/ /dang po lcags kyu che de nyid/ /snying po 'di ni brjod byed cing / /'gugs pa 'di ni brjod par bya/ /oM ma hA su kha badzra satwa sid+d+hi hUM/ sarba ta thA ga tA na/ sa ma

ya a kaR+Sha ya dzaH/ badzra ku la dI paM da ma ye dA pra be sha ya hUM/ sarba lo ke shwa re pra be sha ya sa ma ya ban+d+ha na baM/ sa ma ya sarba rat+na dI paM ma hA ma Ni rA dzA nAM/ ba shI ku ru hoH/
hUM AHhUM hrIMHtrAM/ /de nas gsang ba chen po yi/ /snying po bzang po 'di brjod pas/ /rdo rje 'chang chen rgyal po ni/ /'khor lo thams cad dang bcas par/ /bkug cing rab
tu bcug pa dang / /bden pas bcings te dbang du byas/ /dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog thams cad/ /dngos grub kun gyis 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nas go rims ji bzhin
du/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad sgrub pa dang / /dngos grub de rnams nyid kyang ni/ /thams cad kyang ni bsgrub par bya/ /bde ba thams cad mi 'gyur gnas/ /bde ba
chen po zhes brjod do/ /rdo rje 'di ni bsgrub la sogs/ /'di ni tshe 'dir 'grub par 'gyur/ /de ltar sna tshogs pa'i don sbyang ba'i don gyi cho ga/ 'gro ba dpag tu med pa 'dul
ba/ mtha' med cing sna tshogs pa/ mnyam pa med pa'i phul du byung ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i rigs thams cad 'dzin pa'i bde ba'i mchog byed pa/ rgyal ba
thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ srid pa'i bde ba'i mchog byed pa gsungs pa yin no/ /dpal mchog dang po'i rtog pa'i rgyal po las/ rtog pa thams cad kyi rgyud phyi
ma'i rtsa ba'i rgyud kun gyi mchog dbang phyug dam pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so// //de nas gsang ba ras bris kyi cho ga gsungs pa ni/ sangs rgyas
kun gyi gsang ba che/ /dam tshig mchog gi sgrub pa dang / /bde ba chen po'i gzhal yas khang / /dngos grub kun gyis lus byas pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mchog chen po yi/ /
rin chen rgyal po sogs kyis brgyan/ /bde ba chen po chags pa yi/ /glu dang rol mo rjes chags pa/ /bla med dga' ba chen po yi/ /mchod pa kun gyis rab tu mchod/ /dga'
ba chen po dpal gyi gnas/ /rang gi bzhugs gnas mchog de la/ /rab tu dga' ba'i rgyal po mchog /mi 'gyur mchog tu yang dag bzhugs/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bdag
@#/ /rang nyid/ /rab tu dga' ba mi 'gyur mchog /kun tu bzang po 'khor ba dang / /byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /dngos grub chen po
kun gyi mchog /rdo rje bsnyems pa bdag po'i bdag /kun mchog chags pa chen po yi/ /dngos grub dbang phyug rjes grub pa/ /glu dang rol mo thog mtha' med/ /mchog
ni bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs/ /hUM/ de nas 'di ni gsung tsam gyis/ /rdo rje thams cad 'dzin pa ni/ /gsang ba lnga yi de nyid che/ /phyag rgya'i lha mo byung bar gyur/ /
rtag tu chags dang dngos grub che/ /rnam rgyal dbang phyug lhag pa'i lha/ /phyag rgya dam pa bzhi pa ste/ /sems dpa' byin gyis brlabs pa'i sku/ /de nas de rnams kyi snying po
ni 'di yin te/ kun mchog so sor rtog pa dang / /dngos grub kun gyi bde ba'i mchog /kun mchog rnam rgyal mthong ba 'am/ /thams cad dbang phyug mchod pa che/ /dngos
grub rnams dang phun tshogs dang / /dga' ba dag dang bdag po rnams/ /rdo rje lha mo thog mtha' med/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i sku yi mchog /ces bya'o/ /de nas mchog tu gsad
ba'i mi rnams ni dga' ba chen po dpal rdo rje don yod dga' ba'i dam tshig gi 'dod pa'i rdo rje ma dang / dga' ba chen po dpal don yod la chags pa'i dam tshig gi rdo
rje ki li ki li dang / dga' ba chen po dpal rdo rje don yod la chags pa'i dam tshig rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje ma dang / dga' ba chen po dpal rdo rje don yod la chags pa'i dam tshig
rdo rje 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ma'o/ /'di rnams gsang ba'i mtshan dag ni/ /mkhas pas gang zhig dang pas brjod/ /de ni phyag rgya thams cad kyi/ /dngos grub kun bdag bdag
por 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' mchog tu gseng bas gsungs pa yin no/ /de nas 'di sgrub bshad bya ba/ /dngos grub shin tu brtag pa ste/ /sdig
pa che la dga' ba dang / /sgrub pa gang zhig ma grub kyang / /rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa bzhin/ /de dag kyang ni myur du 'grub/ /nyin re 'am ni zla re 'am/ /de bzhin lo ni re
re la/ /ci mngon mngon 'dod bsgrub par bya/ /ci rnyed pa dang ci bde bas/ /ras la bcom ldan 'das bri bar bya/ /kun bdag dam tshig dbang phyug ste/ /gang zhig bris par gyur na
ni/ /mchog tu rtag pa'i thar pa thob/ /bzhad pa dang bcas zla ba'i 'od/ /sna tshogs pad+ma'i 'od 'bar ba/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang bskur sogs/ /sna tshogs rgyan dang na
bza' ljang / /sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs/ /rdo rje bsnyems pa'i mchog 'chang ba/ /g.yon pa dril bu mchog bsnyems pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu brtag /
@#/ /de yi logs na bzhugs pa rnams/ /de yi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor brten/ /rab tu dga' dang bde ba'i sku/ /gsang ba chen po dgod par bya/ /dang
po pad+ma ltar dkar dmar/ /gzhan ni pa la sha ltar dkar/ /gzhan ni ut+pal 'dab ltar sngo/ /rdo rje bsnyems ma ser po 'dzin/ /dang po dang ni gnyis pa dag /g.yas
kyi logs la brten pa ste/ /gsum pa dang ni bzhi pa dag /g.yon gyi logs su bzhugs pa yin/ /rdo rje ki li ki la ma/ /dbus kyi rang lha dgyes par spro/ /de yi logs
la rdo rje che'i/ /mda' ni gsor ba la brtson pa/ /bsnyems pa'i phyag gis yongs 'khyud pa'i/ /chu srin rgyal mtshan bsgreng dang bcas/ /de yi logs na bzhad dang
bcas/ /mchod pas bdag po la lta ba/ /sangs rgyas rin chen dbang bskur mtshan/ /thams cad spyan gyi phyag rgya gzigs/ /rang la bdag ni thugs gtad pa/ /zur
du blta zhing bzhugs pa'o/ /ras ris 'di ni mthong ba yis/ /rtag pa'i bsod nams thob par 'gyur/ /mchod pa dang ni brtags pa yis/ /mchog tu dga'
ba'i thar pa thob/ /ces bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de ltar mchog tu dga' ba rab tu 'dod pa ni/ /mchog tu dga' ba dag pa dam
pa'i dngos grub 'grub/ /gsal zhing rnam par rgyal ba yi/ /rgyal ba'i ras ris chen po 'di/ /thams cad gzigs pa rnams mchod pa/ /chen po yis ni dpal 'dir rol/ /'khor
lo de ni brtags byas nas/ /mchog tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /rnam par dben pa'i khang par ram/ /yang na skyed mos tshal sogs su/ /de bzhin gshegs mchog chen
po yi/ /ras ris rgyal po sogs kyis brgyan/ /dril bu dang bcas yid dga' ba'i/ /bla re phul bas mchog gyur ba'i/ /rdo rje glu yi mchod tshogs dang / /glu dang rol mo
rnam 'phrul ba/ /me tog spos sogs rab sbyor ba/ /mar me'i sbyor bas yang dag mchod/ /khang pa sum brtsegs dkyil 'khor du/ /mchog gi gsang ba bsgrub par
bya/ /yang na bdag nyid kho na mchog /rang gi lhag pa'i lhar bsgom bya/ /de nas 'khor lor ma zhugs kyang / /rang nyid kyis ni rtag zhugs nas/ /rdo rje kun 'chang slob dpon
ni/ /dngos grub kun la 'grub par 'gyur/ /rang nyid khrus byas dri zhim bsgos/ /ji snyed rgyan dang gos dang ldan/ /sna tshogs gos kyis yang dag klubs/ /phreng bcas kha
ni dri zhim pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis/ /me tog spos dang dri snod bcas/ /rdo rje glu ni 'di dag gis/ /gar byed grong khyer 'jug par bya/ /de la mchog tu gsang ba'i
@#/ /dpal dam tshig gsum 'jug la mchog tu gsang ba'i glu'i mchod pa mchog tu grub pa 'di yin te/ /dngos grub kun gyi bde ba nyams dga' ba'i/ /
thar pa'i grong du bcom ldan bde chen 'jug /mchog tu bde ba dam pa'i dngos grub kyis/ /dzaHhUM baM hoHrab tu grub par mdzod/ /rab tu zhugs te g.yon pa yis/ /rdo
rje'i mig gis mgon la 'dud/ /g.yon pa bsnyems pa cung zad bzhad/ /bstod cing mdzes pa'i mig btsums pa/ /de la mchog tu gsang ba dam pa dpal dam tshig
gsum gyi phyag 'tshal ba'i me tog gi sil ma dor ba'i mchog tu gsang ba rdo rje glu'i mchod pa mchog tu grub pa 'di yin te/ /mchog tu bde ba'i sems ni rol bar
ldan/ /sgeg pa'i phyag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'dud/ /dzaHhUM baM hoH/ hi hi hi hi hi/ mgon po snyim pa'i me tog bzhes su gsol/ /de nas me tog sil ma dor/ /
rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang bskur bas/ /rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya dang / /ldan pa'i don gsal sbyin par bya/ /de la mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dpal dam tshig gsum
gyi rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang bskur ba'i mchog tu gsang ba'i rdo rje'i glu'i mchod pa mchog tu grub pa 'di yin te/ oM/ sangs rgyas kun ldan rin chen mchog gis
brgyan/ /lha yi cod pan dang bcas khyod la 'dud/ /rdo rje 'chang bdag rin chen dbang bskur bas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' sa ma ya s+t+waM haM/ /de nyid kyis ni rdo rje gzung / /chos kyi dril bu
dkrol bar bya/ /dam tshig gis ni phyag rgya cher/ /byin gyis brlabs nas snying po bzlas/ /rdo rje la sogs thob bzung bas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' gnyis pa 'dra/ /rdo rje thams
cad 'dzin rgyal po/ /rdo rje can gyis byin brlabs 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dpal dam tshig gsum gyis bdag la byin gyis brlabs pa'i sgrub pa gcig
pu'i cho ga mchog tu grub pa bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de nas 'dir bsgrub bshad bya ba/ /dngos grub shin tu brtag pa yang / /gang gis sgrub po dam pa
dang | |sdig chen byed pa rnams kyang ni/ /rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa bzhin/ /ma grub rnams kyang grub par 'gyur/ /lugs ma 'am ni brdungs ma 'am/ /'dus byas pa
'am bris pa 'am/ /dang po'i sems dpa' bzhugs gsol nas/ /de yi mdun du cho ga bzhin/ /rtag tu rdo rje dril 'chang zhing / /dngos grub mchog ni bsgrub par bya/ /thams
cad dgug dang mchod pa che/ /bdag byin rlabs sogs bsgrub rnams so/ /de la ji ltar mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dpal dam tshig gsum gyi dngos grub thams cad
@#/ /dgug pa'i rgyud ni 'di yin te/ /rang lhag lha yi sbyor ba las/ /thams cad dgug pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /yan lag mchog gi rol bcas pas/ /
gar bya zhing ni dgug par bya/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog gi dngos grub mchog tu gsang ba'i dam tshig gi glu'i mchod pa ni 'di yin te/ dzaHmchog
dang po'i rdo rje 'chang ba rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba rab rtogs rab tu dga' ba khyod bdag sangs rgyas so sor rtogs/ /hUM mchog rdo rje las ni mchog tu mi 'gyur zad med
srid pa bar bsgrub bde dang yid bde dam tshig bdag la deng grub mdzod/ /baM mchog bdag gi sku 'dzin rnal 'byor thams cad rnam rgyal bsgreng ba rab mchog dag pa bde
bar 'gyur ba'i pad+ma'i rgyal po kye/ /hoHrab mchog ni mchog gi dngos grub dam pa thams cad dbang phyug dam par bdag gyur cig /rtag par bdag 'phel nam mkha'i
snying po khyod/ /hu lu hu lu'i sgrub pas dbab par mdzod/ /dam tshig chen pos yang dag dgug pa khyod/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi dam tshig ste/ /rab tu dga' ba
mchog bdag po/ /de la mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dpal dam tshig gsum gyi dngos grub thams cad kyi mchod pa chen po'i cho ga ji ltar yin/ rang lha'i rnal 'byor ji
bzhin du/ /mchod pa kun mchog sku rnams kyi/ /mchod de sngags pas glu rnams kyi sgra rol mo'i rnam 'phrul gyis rjes mchod/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mchog
gi dngos grub kyi mchod pa chen po'i cho ga'i mchog tu gsang ba'i dam tshig gi rdo rje'i glu'i mchod pa ni 'di yin te/ /thams cad rjes su chags pa bde ba dam pa'i thugs/ /rdo rje
sems dpa' khyod ni rab tu dga' ba yin/ /bde ba chen po gsal mthong bdag la brtan gyur cig /myur du so sor mkhyen nas rab tu 'dod pa bsgrubs/ /de la mchog tu
gsang ba dam pa'i dpal dam tshig gsum gyi dngos grub thams cad byin gyis brlabs pa'i sgrub pa chen po ji ltar yin/ rang lha'i sbyor ba ji bzhin du/ /phyag rgya kun gyis
byin brlabs pa/ /de nyid chen po'i mchog gis ni/ /rang nyid bsgrubs te snying po bzla/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog gi dngos grub byin gyis brlabs
pa'i gsang ba chen po dam pa'i dam tshig gi rdo rje glu'i mchod pa mchog tu grub pa ni 'di yin te/ oM/ nam mkha' skye ba mtshan ldan phyir/ /thog ma tha ma med pa'i mchog /
sems dpa' rdo rje che rang bzhin/ /rdo rje sems dpal bdag grub mdzod/ /kun mchog dngos grub chen po ste/ /dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa
@#/ /kun gyi rgyal/ /mi 'gyur mchog tu bdag grub mdzod/ /nyes pa mi mnga' rtag pa khyod/ /'dod chags kyis ni rjes chags pa/ /'dod chags
chen po dga' ba che/ /bcom ldan de nyid kyis grub mdzod/ /shin tu dag pa kun gyi mchog /gdod nas grol ba de bzhin gshegs/ /kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid/ /
byang chub sems dpar bdag grub mdzod/ /dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog /dbang phyug chen po phyag rgya'i mchog /grub pa'i rdo rje cher bstod pas/ /rdo rje bsnyems
bdag bdag mdzod cig /dpal mchog dang po'i bcom ldan khyod/ /gang gis don dang glu yis bstod/ /de ni dngos grub kun gyi mchog /dbang phyug chen po nyid
grub 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba mchog gi de kho na nyid kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i glu chen po mchog tu grub pa bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gis gsungs so/ /dngos grub cho ga
'di yis ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag rtogs/ /kun mchog dngos grub chen po yi/ /dbang phyug nyid ni rab bsgrub pa'o/ /kun nas 'od zer ston sogs dang / /so
sor ston pa'i rmad byung rnams/ /rdo rje'i tshig gis rang lha las/ /ngo mtshar gyur rnams mthong bar gyur/ /rtog pa kun gyi sna tshogs che/ /dngos grub dbang phyug bde
rnams kyis/ /myur du rang gis byin brlabs pas/ /rdo rje slob dpon gyis thob bo/ /zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' mchog gi dang pos gsungs so/ /de la mchog
tu gsang ba dam pa'i dpal dam tshig gsum gyis lha thams cad kyis bdag la byin gyis brlabs pa'i sgrub pa chen po'i rgyud ci ltar yin/ /rang lha rnal 'byor ji bzhin du/ /lha
kun bdag nyid sku rnams kyis/ /rang lha'i rnal 'byor bdag nyid kyis/ /rang lha nyid bsgrub par bya/ /de nas mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dpal dam tshig gsum gyi
kun mchog dngos grub chen po'i dbang phyug chen po'i bdag nyid la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs mchog tu mi 'gyur ba dam pa bla na med pa'i dga'
ba dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / bde ba dang / yid bde ba thams cad kyi dngos grub dam pa'i cho ga rgyas pa rjes su grub pa ni 'di yin te/ /rang lha'i rnal 'byor ji bzhin du/ /rdo
rje kun mchog sku rnams kyis/ /glu dang rol mo'i cho ga ni/ /rdo rje nyid kyis rjes chags 'gyur/ /rang lha'i sbyor ba ji bzhin du/ /dbyangs kyi rtsa ba rnam sad pas/ /glu dang rol
mo'i cho ga ni/ /dril bu nyid kyis rjes su brjod/ /rang lha'i sbyor ba ji bzhin du/ /sna tshogs phyag rgya'i bdag po mchog /glu dang rol mo'i cho ga ni/ /dam tshig gis ni
@#/ /rjes bsgrub bya/ /'di yis rtog pa thams cad la/ /rdo rje 'bebs pas rab sad pas/ /rang gi lha yi dam tshig ni/ /thams cad bzhi 'gyur
'grub par 'gyur/ /mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dpal dam tshig gsum gyi glu chen po dang / rol mo'i cho ga mchog tu gsang ba mchog tu grub pa bcom ldan 'das rdo
rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de nas de rjes gnas ci bzhin/ /ji snyed pa ni ci bde bas/ /me tog spos kyis mchod nas ni/ /khang pa 'am skyed mos tshal sogs su/ /
bdag nyid ci 'dod rab bsgrubs nas/ /ci snyed rgyan dang gos dang ldan/ /sna tshogs gos kyis yang dag klubs/ /me tog phreng bcas kha dri zhim/ /lugs ma 'am ni
brdungs pa'am/ /'dus pa 'am ni ri mor bris/ /dang po'i 'khor lo de mdun du/ /cho ga bzhin du bzhugs gsol nas/ /rang lha'i rnal 'byor ji bzhin du/ /rdo
rje dril bu rab sad pas/ /thams cad dgug dang mchod pa che/ /bdag byin rlab sogs 'grub par bya/ /sngon du lan gcig bsgrub byas nas/ /de nas de rjes ci 'dod
pa/ /ci 'dod ci spyod ci smra ba/ /thams cad bza' zhing thams cad byed/ /langs pa 'am ni 'dug pa 'am/ /rab tu dgod dam smra ba 'am/ /ji bzhin de bzhin
de dang der/ /ji 'dod par ni de bzhin gzhag /gsang ba mchog gi 'khor lo ni/ /me tog sogs kyis mchod nas ni/ /ji bzhin du ni rjes bsgrub bya/ /'dis ni 'dod pa kun dbang phyug /
'gro dang 'ong dang 'dod na 'phur/ /dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug 'grub/ /rga shi med pa'i gtso bor 'gyur/ /rdo rje sems dpa' grub chen po/ /phyag rgya kun gyi dbang phyug bdag /
rdo rje kun 'dzin rgyal ba ni/ /rdo rje mtshon cha thams cad 'dzin/ /mi thub pa dang mi sod cing / /thams cad byed cing kun gyi rten/ /sems can kun gyi rgyal po che/ /tshar
gcod rjes su bzung bar nus/ /kun mchog rjes su chags pa che/ /'dod pa grub pa bde ba mchog /kun las rnam rgyal grub 'gyur te/ /kun mchog dbang phyug dam pa
yin/ /dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog /dbang phyug chen po'i go 'phang nas/ /rgyal po rdo rje kun 'dzin pa/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rab 'grub 'gyur/ /de ltar
mchog tu rjes chags dga' ba pad+ma'i ra ba che/ /mchog tu gsang ba grub pa'i bla na med pa'i dngos grub stsol/ /mchog gi rgyal mtshan bsgreng bas gang zhig rjes
su bsten pa ste/ /mchog gi dngos grub dbang phyug chen po nyid des nyams myong ba/ /zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /dpal mchog dang
@#/ /po las/ gsang ba chen po dam pa'i dpal dam tshig gsum dang / dngos grub thams cad dgug pa dang / mchod pa chen po dang / bdag la
byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa'i sgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// //gsang ba mchog ni dgyes pa dang / /sangs rgyas kun gyi rjes bstan pa/ /rdo rje sems
dpa' rang gi gnas/ /thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs/ /thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che/ /kun tu bzang po kun bdag
nyid| |rdo rje bsnyems tshul bdag po'i bdag /'di ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das/ /lhag pa'i lha ni gcig pu nyid/ /ces bya ba 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar mchog
tu rjes chags dga' ba pad+ma ra ba che/ /mchog tu bsngags pa bla na med pa'i dngos grub stsol/ /mchog gi rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba gang zhig rjes su bsten pa ste/ /mchog
gi dngos grub bde ba chen po nyid des nyams myong ba/ /zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /dpal mchog dang po las/ dga' ba chen
po'i dpal rdo rje don yod pa'i dga' ba'i dam tshig rnal 'byor thams cad kyi dbang phyug de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpal rang gi dam tshig gi dkyil
'khor mchog tu gsang ba yongs su rdzogs so// //de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig chen po'i slob ma'i cho ga rgyas pa rjes su gzung
ba bshad par bya'o/ /zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de la dang po kho nar re zhig de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba dam
pa'i sngags 'di lan gcig brjod pas sems bskyed du bcug ste/ oM sarba yo ga tsit+taM ud pA da yA mi/ 'di brjod pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
dang mi 'bral zhing phyir mi ldog pa dang / bdud thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i phyag rgya byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du yang
rtogs par bya'o zhes bya ba yang gsungs so/ /byang chub sems ni bla med pa/ /mchog tu bskyed par byas nas ni/ /snying gar rdo rje rab bzhag nas/ /su ra ta sa ma ya s+t+waM ho/ /
snying pos rdo rje ci bder bsgrub/ /'di yis rdo rje bskul ba na/ /'dod pa kun las 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nyid bskul bas myur du ni/ /byang chub sems ni bla med pa/ /
kun mchog dngos grub chen po'i phyir/ /rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba'i mchog bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /gar byas spyi bor
@#/ /thal mo sbyar/ /gos kyis gdong ni g.yogs pa rnams/ /ci 'dod dngos grub 'dod pa yis/ /slob ma thams cad gzhug par bya/ /ci 'dod
dngos grub sems dpa' yis/ /slob ma me tog 'dor du gzhug/ phyag rgya gang la de babs pa'o/ /de de'i lha mo bsgrub par bya/ /de nas gdong g.yogs dkrol byas la//
rnam pa kun gyi yon blangs nas/ /sangs rgyas rin chen dbang bskur gyis/ /dam tshig gsum ni gsal bar sbyin/ /de la rdo rje chen po mna'i chus dbang bskur te/ 'di
ltar brjod par bya'o/ /'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu/ /dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed/ /dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub ni/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'dis 'grub/ /rdo rje
dril bu'i phyag rgya ni/ /gal te dkyil 'khor ma mthong smras/ /skye bo 'dus pa'i nang na gnas/ /dad pa med pas bzhad gad smod/ /ces bya ba mna' bsgag go/ /de la sangs
rgyas kyi rin po che'i dbang bskur ba'i cho ga ni 'di yin te/ rdo rje chu yis dbang bskur nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i mchog dbang bskur ba'i gnas
su bzhag ste/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta mahA sa ma ya a d+hi pa ti s+t+waM a b+hi Shiny+tsA mi ma hA badzra d+ha ra zhes bya ba'i sngags 'dis rdo rje lag tu sbyin par bya'o/ /'di ni sangs rgyas
thams cad nyid/ /rdo rje 'chang gi rdo rje ste/ /rdo rje 'chang gi brtul zhugs che/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang / /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /byang chub mchog gi sems
chen po/ /yongs su mi spang rtag tu bsgrubs/ /shin tu gsang bde 'di yin te/ /oM badzra karma bA d+hi d+hi shrI badzra nA ma sid d+hi sa ma ya staM b+hUr b+hu ba swaH/ gang la rdo rje'i ming btags
pa de la kye'i sgra dang por sbyar bar bya'o/ /de'i ming de yang ji srid byang chub snying po'i mthar thug pa'i bar gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i yang ming du 'gyur ro/ /de la mchog tu
gsang ba dam pa'i dpal dam tshig gsum sbyin pa ni 'di yin te/ /thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che/ /kun tu bzang po kun bdag
nyid| |rdo rje bsnyems tshul bdag po'i bdag /ces bya ba bcom ldan 'das dpal mchog dang po'i skyes bu mchog gi de kho na nyid kyi gsang ba lnga'i de kho na nyid bshad
par byas nas rdo rje sbyin par bya'o/ /'di bcom ldan 'das srid pa'i bdag po dam pa kun gyi mchog dbang phyug gi dam pa de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid chos kyi mchog
gi bka' yang dag par stsol bar mdzad pa ni/ /srid pa rang bzhin nyid kyis dag /rang bzhin gyis ni srid bral byas/ /rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' mchog /srid
@#/ /pa mchog ni mdzad pa yin/ /mchog tu gsang ba'i chos nyid 'bebs pa ni dril bu'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod
par bya ba 'am lha sgrub pa'i tshe dkrol bar bya'o/ /de nas chos thams cad kyi de kho na nyid rab tu sad pa'i phab pa rnams kyis sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par byed
pa yin no/ /rdo rje thams cad 'bebs par byed pa dang / rab tu sgrub par byed pa dang / dbang du byed pa dang / rab tu dang bar byed pa zhes bya bar bsgrub par 'gyur
ro| |de nas srid pa dag pa'i thabs kyi mchog rtog pa thams cad kyi gsang ba chen po dam tshig la rtag tu bsten par bya'o zhes bya ba'o/ /de la 'di ni deng khyod kyi/ /
srid bde shin tu myur ba ni/ /sdug bsngal chen po dag bya'i phyir/ /shin tu bde ba dam pa'i thabs/ /dam tshig 'di ni rtag tu bskyed/ /'dod pa'i longs spyod
thams cad la/ /ci 'dod par ni brten bzhin du/ /rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis/ /bdag dang gzhan la mchod par bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
bla na med pa'i mchog tu gsang ba'i theg pa chen po'i yang chen po dam tshig gi sbyor ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyi dam tshig go /'di ltar/ de bzhin gshegs
pa kun gyis kyang / /'da' pa ru ni mi mdzad pas/ /phyag rgya dam tshig ces ni bsgrags/ /yid kyi sku ni brtan phyir ro/ /zhes bya ba mchog tu gsang ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
sems dpas gsungs so/ /de la 'di brjod par bya ste/ /ji srid 'khor ba'i gnas su ni/ /mkhas mchog 'dug par gyur pa'i tshe/ /ji srid mtshungs med sems
can don/ /mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus/ /gsang ba dam pa dam tshig thabs/ /bsod nams byin gyis brlabs bsgrubs pa/ /rtag tu dngos grub kun dbang
phyug /sems can don ni byed pa yin/ /dam tshig 'dis ni mchog sgrub cing / /ci bde bar ni bsgrub byed pa/ /nyes pa spyad kyang sdig kun gyis/ /rnam pa kun tu gnod
mi 'gyur/ /'dod pa chen po grub par 'gyur/ /kun bdag dam tshig dbang phyug dang / /thams cad rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po/ /kun mchog dbang phyug dam pa'o/ /las kyi
tshogs kyi dngos grub kyis/ /ma lus bsgrubs pas 'grub par 'gyur/ /bdag gzhan thams cad rgyas btab pas/ /yang na bsgrub bya kun la yang / /don yod mchog
tu grub pa dang / /rnal 'byor thams cad rjes sgrub byed/ /dpal ldan sdug bsngal kun 'phrog byed/ /dam tshig 'da' bar dka' ba'o/ /zhes bya ba mchog tu gsang
@#/ /ba bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /rdo rje la sogs thob 'dzin pas/ /dngos po kun gyi bde ba kun/ /phab pas rdo rje slob ma
yis| |dkyil 'khor du ni nyams su myong / /de nas thams cad gzengs ba stod pas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid dngos/ /rdo rje'i ming gis dbang bskur bas/ /de bzhin gshegs
ni lung bstan bya/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi lung bstan pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i cho ga 'di yin te/ sangs rgyas kun gyi phyag rgya che/ /gzengs bstod pa yi
gang lung bstan/ /de ni sangs rgyas thams cad nyid/ /rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur ba'o/ /oM 'di ni ngas khyod lung bstan te/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /srid pa
shin tu grub pa'i phyir/ /srid pa'i ngan 'gro las khyod bton/ /he badzra na maHta thA ga ta sid+d+hi sa ma ya s+t+waM/ b+hur b+hu ba swaH/ gang la gzengs bstod pa 'di dang / phyag rgya chen po
por lung bstan pa mchog tu gsang ba'i cho gas byas pa de la rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / rdo rje 'chang dang bcas pa'i byang chub
sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang gi dam tshig gi slob dpon rnams dang / mgrin gcig tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par mdzad do/ /'di lta ste/ gzengs bstod pa 'di nyid kyi phyag rgya chen po dang / mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dngos grub kyis byin gyis brlabs pa 'di
dang | sngags kyi stobs la dad par bya'o/ /de nas ci lta ba bzhin du zhugs pa rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa la sogs pa'i dbugs dbyung ba spyin par bya'o/ /
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje 'chang dang bcas pa ci snyed pa byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad rang gi dam tshig la rjes
su chags pa 'dir dgug pa dang / rab tu gzhug pa dang / dbang du bya ba dang / bsgrub pa dang / rjes su bsgrub pa rnams kyi rdo rje'i dbyings thams cad brtan par 'gyur ba nying
kyis| 'di brtan par 'gyur ba chos kyi dbyings thams cad kun tu khyab pa nyid kyis kun tu zhugs pa/ nam mkha'i khams thams cad kyi rgya che ba nyid kyis 'dir rab tu bzhugs
shing | legs par rab tu bzhugs pa gang yin pa de dang de dag /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang gi dam tshig la rag las pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la lhag
par dmigs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang gi dam tshig gi slob dpon de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'di yin no zhes bya bas byin gyis brlabs
@#/ /nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rang gi dam tshig gi slob dpon gyis dam tshig gi mgrin gcig tu khyed rnams la dbugs dbyung ba
mdzad pa yin te dad par bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i dbugs dbyung ba 'di yin te/ gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni/ /mthong ba dang
ni zhugs pas kyang / /sdig pa kun las nges grol zhing / /khyed rnams der nyid legs par gnas/ /bde chen theg pa 'di las ni/ /slar 'chi ba ni yod min te/ /mi tshugs pa
dang mi sod pas/ /cis kyang mi 'jigs rol bar gyis/ /srid pa'i sdug bsngal ldog pa ni/ /srid pa shin tu grub pa'i phyir/ /ston pa mchog tu gyur pa khyod/ /srid pa shin tu grub
pa yin/ /dam tshig sdom pa grub pa 'di/ /khyod kyis rtag tu bsrung bar bya/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis mthun par gsungs/ /dam pa rtag pa'i bka' yin no/ /gang zhig bskyed pa
tsam gyis ni/ /sangs rgyas nyid du dogs med pa'i/ /byang chub sems ni gtang mi bya/ /phyag rgya rdo rje gang yin pa/ /dam pa'i chos ni mi smod cing / /nam yang btang bar mi bya'o/ /
mi shes pa 'am rmongs pa yis/ /des ni smad par mi bya'o/ /rang gi bdag nyid yongs spangs nas/ /dka' thub rnams kyis gdung mi bya/ /ci bde bar ni bde bar gzung / /'di ni ma
byon rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya rnams/ /nam yang yongs su brang mi bya/ /slob dpon smad par mi bya ste/ /'di ni sangs rgyas kun dang 'dra/ /sangs rgyas kun mtshungs bla ma yi//
slob dpon la ni gang smod pa/ /des ni sangs rgyas kun smad pas/ /rtag tu sdug bsngal thob 'gyur te/ /rims dang dug dang sbyar dug dang / /mkha' 'gro rnams kyis gtses pa dang / /
gdon dang log 'dren gtum po yis/ /bsad nas sems can dmyal bar ltung / /de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis/ /rdo rje slob dpon blo gros che/ /dge ba rab tu mi spyoms pa/ /
nam yang smad par mi bya'o/ /bla ma la ni gus bcas yon/ /rjes mthun khyod kyis sbyin par bya/ /des ni rims sogs gnod pa rnams/ /phyir zhing 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rang gi dam
tshig slob dpon ni/ /sbyin min bu dang chung ma dang / /rang srog gis rtag bsten bya na/ /longs spyod g.yo ba smos ci dgos/ /gang gis bskal ba bye bar ni/ /grangs med par ni rnyed
dka' ba'i/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyang brtson ldan la/ /tshe 'di nyid la ster bar byed/ /rtag tu rang gi dam tshig bsrung / /rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa mchod/ /rtag tu bla ma la yang
dbul| |'di ni sangs rgyas kun dang 'dra/ /de byin sangs rgyas thams cad la/ /rtag tu sbyin pa nyid du 'gyur/ /de byin bsod nams tshogs yin te/ /tshogs las dngos grub mchog
@#/ /tu 'gyur/ /de phyir 'di ni legs gnas pas/ /deng khyod skye ba 'bras bur bcas/ /rang byung dam tshig lha dang mnyam/ /deng khyod 'gyur bar the tshom med/ /sangs rgyas
rdo rje 'dzin bcas pas/ /kun gyi deng khyod dbang bskur bas/ /khams gsum gyi ni rgyal po che/ /rgyal po'i bdag por bstan pa yin/ /de ni bdud las rnam rgyal te/ /grong khyer mchog
tu rab tu zhugs/ /khyed rnams kyis ni sangs rgyas nyid/ /deng 'dir thob pa the tshom med/ /ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / rdo rje 'chang dang / /byang chub sems
dpa' chen po'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa'i bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' mchog tu bden pas gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
mchog tu gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpal rang gi dam tshig gi slob dpon dang / /slob ma'i tshogs rnams kyis dbugs dbyung ba ni 'di yin te/ /phyir mi ldog
pa'i phyag rgya yis/ /byang chub sems dang lhan cig bskyed/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyang rtogs bya ste/ /zhes bya ba'o/ /de'i rgyu gang yin zhe na/ gang gi phyir khyed rnams kyi bdag nyid thams
cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi sems chen po bskyed pa tsam gyi mthu nyid kyis phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba yin no/ /phyir mi ldog pa nyid kyi phyir nges pa'i phung po
la rnam par gnas pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges pa nyid/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par rjes
su rtogs par bya'o/ /zhes bya'o/ /de nas thams cad kyi dpal dam tshig gi slob dpon gyi mchog tu gsang ba'i dbugs dbyung ba 'di yin te/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag sbyor ba/ rnal
'byor kun dang rjes sbyor ldan/ /sangs rgyas nyid du rtogs bya ste/ /mkhas pas mchog tu brtag pa'o/ /zhes bya'o/ /de'i rgyu gang yin zhe na/ gang gi phyir khyed rnams kyi bdag nyid thams
cad 'di de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang gi dam tshig yongs su gzung ba gdon mi za ba nyid kyi phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
mngon par sangs rgyas pa nyid du rtogs par bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpal rang gi dam tshig gi rjes su sgrub pas mchog gi dngos grub rnams de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad nyid du de dag rtogs par bya'o/ /de'i phyir gnas skabs thams cad du yang ci nus pas sdug bsngal dang / yid mi bde ba thams cad kyi skabs mi 'byed pa khyed
rnams kyis rang gi bdag nyid thams cad kho na rjes su bsrung zhing gsad par mi bya'o/ /ci snyed pa'i longs spyod dang / nye bar spyod pa thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams
@#/ /cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po'i dam tshig gi sbyor bas yang dag par mchod la/ bde bar gzung ba dang / yang dag par 'phel bar
bya'o/ /bdag nyid la ci lta ba bzhin du mngon par brtson pa de bzhin du gzhan rnams la na tshod bskyed pa yin no/ /lta ba log pa dang / phyi rol mu stegs pa dang / nyan thos pa thams
cad dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung bas lus 'di shin tu gsang ba yin no/ /ngag ni shin tu mi smra bas so/ /sems ni shin tu 'gog pas so/ /gang gis kyang khyod kyi lus
ngag yid gsum gyi rdo rje rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje dpal la rang gi dam tshig gi bla na med pa'i dngos grub mchog tu rtogs par 'gyur ba zhes bya
ba yang gsungs so/ /'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad kyis/ /cis kyang mi 'jigs rol bar gyis/ /dam tshig 'di ni 'da' dka' ste/ sdig pa med kyis ma 'jigs shig /ces bcom
ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' mchog tu bden pas gsungs ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs la dgongs
pa yin no/ /de ltar yid ni rab dang rdo rje nyid du gyis/ /rang gi dam tshig mi zad pa bde ster bsten par gyis/ /de ni 'gro la myur bde rdo rje sems dpa' dang / /rab tu mnyam zhing rtag pa nyid
du rtogs par gyis/ /de nas ro dang bza' dang spyod pa gar dang glu/ /rol mo'i mchod sogs kyis ni mgon mchod pa/ /rdo rje bla ma chen pos de phul nas/ /rang dang gzhan dag ci
'dod mchod par bya/ /myos byed myos bral btung ba ni/ /ci 'dod par ni bsten pa yis/ /glu dang rol mo'i cho ga sogs/ /ji bzhin rjes 'gro'i bzlas pa bya/ /rang gsang cho gas blangs
pa yi/ /glu dang rol mo gar rnams kyi/ /sna tshogs phyag rgya'i mchod pa dang / /rdo rje sems dpa'i rol mo sogs/ /bud med sogs dang ldan pa'am/ /rang gi slob ma dang bcas pa/ /ci 'dod
pa yi longs spyod kyis/ /mchod pa byas pas myu ba 'grub/ /ces bya ba mchog tu gsang ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de la gsang ba'i cho ga'i glu'i khyad par ni
'di yin te/ hUM/ bcom ldan 'das mchog dang po'i rdo rje sems dpa'i 'o/ /a/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi'o/ /hi/ dpal 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i 'o/ oM pad+ma'i
snying po'i 'o/ /ha/ nam mkha'i snying po ste/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i rgyal po nam mkha'i snying po yin no/ /zhes bya ba gsungs so/ /rang gsang snying po'i glu dag ni/ /yi ge lnga
pos bya ba ste/ /rang gsang cho gas blangs pa 'di/ /mchog tu gshegs pa kun gyi yin/ /de nas mchog tu gsang ba rdo rje glu yi mchod pa ni/ /rdo rje dril bu mnyam sogs bcas/ /
@#/ /rnam par dben par rol mo dkrol/ /rang gsang cho gas glu blangs pa/ /gsang ba'i rol mos rab tu bsgrub/ /de nas mchog tu shin tu gsang ba'i rdo rje
gar gyi mchod pa ni/ /'dzin pa dang bcas gzung ba che'i/ /gar ni rab tu byas nas kyang / /dkyil 'khor 'dra ba'i gar byas nas/ /yongs su bskor bas rab mchod bya/ /de nas
mchog tu gsang ba'i phyag rgya sna tshogs pa'i mchod pa ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs lha'i/ /rtog pa thams cad rnam 'phrul ba/ /gtam rgyud phyag mtshan phyag rgya
yis| |gang zhig gar de rol mo yin/ /gser ram yang na dngul dang ni/ /de bzhin shing las byas pa yi/ /rang gi lha yi gdong rnams kyis/ /grub pa'i phyag rgyas gar
rnams bya/ /dkyil 'khor gang dang gang brten pa/ /phyag rgya sna tshogs mchod pa yis/ /slob ma'i tshogs ni de dang de/ /bzla zhing thams cad mchog tu gzhug /sna tshogs cho
ga 'di yis ni/ /sdig pa kun las rnam grol 'gyur/ /bsod nams kun kyang 'phel 'gyur te/ /rtag tu srung bar 'gyur ba yin/ /rims dang gdon dang dug dang nad/ /sbyar
dug mkha' 'gro'i 'tshe ba dang / /bdud dang gsod par byed pa rnams/ /'dis ni rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ /dngos grub dag ni phun sum tshogs/ /dga' ba de bzhin bdag po
rnams/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid kyi/ /rnal 'byor dam pa thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba shin tu gsang ba'i bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de
nas phyag rgya sna tshogs pa'i mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa lhag pa'i lha thams cad re re'i mchog gsang ba 'jug pa'i rdo rje glu'i mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa mngon par brjod nas
rdo rje slob dpon gyis byas pa'am de las gzhan ci 'dod pa'i glu dang / rol mo rnams kyis rtog pa thams cad kyi sna tshogs pa'i dam tshig chen po'i mchog tu grub pa
zhes bya ba ste/ de re zhig thog ma kho nar bcom ldan 'das dpal mchog dang po'i rdo rje sems dpa' mchog tu gsang ba'i dam tshig gi 'jug pa'i glu'i mchod pa ni/ thams
cad rjes su chags pa bde ba dam pa'i thugs/ /rdo rje sems dpa' khyod ni rab dga' dam tshig ste/ /bde ba chen po brtan zhing mtho ba gsal gyur cig /so sor rtogs nas
mngon du phyogs shing myur sgrubs shig /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rigs kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i dam tshig gi 'jug pa'i rdo rje glu'i mchod pa ni/
rdo rje sems dpa' bsdus pas na/ /rdo rje rin chen bla na med/ /rdo rje chos ni glur blangs pas/ /rdo rje las ni byed par 'gyur/ /de nas rdo rje rigs thams cad kyi mchog tu
@#/ /gsang ba'i dam tshig gi 'jug pa'i rdo rje glu'i mchod pa ni/ hUM/ rdo rje mda' gzhu dang bcas khyod la 'dud/ /rdo rje chags pa'i dam tshig dpal khyod
'dud/ /kha T+wAM 'jig dus rdo rje khyod la 'dud/ /rdo rje dril bu bskyod pa'i dpal khyod 'dud/ /de na pad+ma'i rigs thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i dam tshig gi 'jug
pa'i rdo rje glu'i mchod pa ni/ /la lar skye bo ma rungs pa yi srog 'phrog byed pa shin tu drag po'i sku/ /la lar 'gro ba mtha' yas 'dul phyir shin tu rno ba'i 'khor lo 'dzin
pa'i sku/ /la lar pad+ma'i gdan gyi shin tu zhi ba'i sku ste 'gyur ba med pa ste/ /la lar shin tu 'bar ba'i 'dod pa'i dam tshig pad+ma'i rgyal po bdag bsgrubs shig /de nas
nor bu'i rigs thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i dam tshig gi 'jug pa'i rdo rje'i glu'i mchod pa ni/ /dbang bskur thams cad dbang phyug dam pa las/ /yang dag
bsgrubs shing mi zad gter gyi mchog /kun mchog rgyal mtshan rnam rgyal bsgreng ba las/ /rdo rje rin chen dpal bdag legs mchod 'gyur/ /de nas ming po gsum
gyi ni b+hUr b+hu ba swaH/ de nas sring mo bzhi rnams kyi/ /hrI hUM shrI b+h+yo/ /de nas klu'i rigs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi ni/ phu phu/ de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon
chen po lag na rdo rje'i sdig pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rdo rje glu'i mchod pa ni/ sarba maM ga maN+Dal mi daM badzra d+ha rA kra ma bi ma rad bi ki ra b+hany+dza ud sA da ya/ /nA sha ya/
ha na da ha/ pa tsa b+hasmiM ku ru kro d+ha hUM ka ra man+t+ri Na/ /de nas thams cad kyi mchog dbang phyug dam pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i mchog tu gsang ba'i dam tshig gi rdo rje glu'i
mchod pa ni/ la lar dri med zla ba'i dkyil 'khor stong gi 'od kyi sku ni rnam par mdzes/ la lar 'jig dus nyi ma 'char ka bye ba'i 'od zer tshogs ni 'jigs cher 'bar/ /
la lar mdangs dang 'od zer dang ldan bde zhing zhi ba'i rgyal pa'i sku 'dzin pa/ /la lar shin tu mdzes pa'i gzugs 'chang mchog gi mda' dang bcas pa'i gzhu 'dzin
pa/ /la lar gdul bya rnam par sbyang phyir brtson pa'i rdo rje sems khyod mkha' bzhin bzhugs/ /ma lus 'dul ba mkhas pa'i bde ba dam pa nyid phyir bdag la grub
gyur cig /de nas mchog tu gsang ba'i cho ga dam pa'i gsang ba'i mchog dpal dam tshig gsum gyi 'jug pa'i rdo rje glu'i mchod pa mchog tu grub pa ni 'di yin te/
dngos grub kun gyi bde ba nyams dga' ba'i/ /thar pa'i grong khyer bcom ldan bde chen 'jug /mchog tu bde ba dam pa'i dngos grub kyis/ /dzaHhUM baM hoHrab tu
@#/ /grub par mdzod/ /de nas shin tu mchog tu gsang ba'i cho ga mchog tu gsang ba bla na med pa'i dam pa dpal dam tshig bla na med pa'i
mchog tu shin tu gsang ba'i rdo rje'i glu'i mchod pa mchog tu shin tu grub pa zhes bya ba mngon par brjod nas shin tu mchog gi de kho na nyid kyi rdo rje glu'i mchod pa'i
glu dang gar gyi cho gas ci lta ba bzhin du rjes su bsgrubs nas so sor rjes su bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba dang / /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu shin
tu gsang ba bla na med pa'i rtog pa thams cad kyi sna tshogs pa'i dam tshig chen po'i mchod pa mchog tu shin tu grub pa yin no/ /zhes bya ba yang gsungs so/ /sna tshogs
cho ga 'di yis ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bsdus pa yin/ /kun mchog sna tshogs chen po yin/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug rab tu grub/ /ces bya ba shin tu gsang ba bcom
ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de ltar dpal mchog dang po'i rtog pa'i cho ga rgyas pa gtam rgyud sna tshogs can/ /mchog tu gsang ba'i rol mo bla na
med pa'i dngos grub nyams dang ldan pa ste/ /gang gis sna tshogs pa'i rgyal mtshan mthon po dang ldan kun tu rjes bsten pa/ /mchog gi dngos grub bde ba chen po
nyid ni de yis yang dag nyams su myong / /don yod mchog tu bsod nams ldan/ /cho ga mchog tu rtag pa ste/ /kun mchog gsang ba chen po ni/ /dngos grub thams
cad myur grub byed/ /gang zhig grong mchog rab dgyes par/ /zhugs te sgrub par byed rnams ni/ /shin tu mchog gi 'dod pa yi/ /dngos grub dbang phyug bde nges thob/ /
gang gis dngos grub ma thob dang / /bsod nams phun tshogs byed pa rnams/ /dkyil 'khor mchog tu rab zhugs na/ /sgrub po 'dir ni rab grub 'gyur/ /gal te rdo rje sems
dpa' mchog /snying po sogs kyis ma grub dang / /nye ba'i snying pos bsgrubs byas kyang / /ma grub 'dir zhugs 'grub par 'gyur/ /dpal mchog dang po'i rtsa rgyud du/ /de bzhin
myur du grub pa yin/ /ji ltar dang po'i khyim zhugs nas/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor grub pa ltar/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad grub pa yis/ /de ltar thams cad grub pa min/ /
ji ltar mchog tu gsang ba yi/ /khang bzang dam pa mthong ba yis/ /dam tshig rnams las nyams pa dang / /sgrib pa kun gyis bsgribs pa dang / /bdud sogs gdon
gyis reg pa yang / /rtag pa'i thar pa thob par 'gyur/ /dkyil 'khor du ni ma zhugs pa'am/ /yang na dkyil 'khor ma grub pa/ /slar yang mchog tu rab zhugs na/ /de dag
@#/ /myur du grub par 'gyur/ /sgrub min yang 'dir cung zad med/ /dngos grub las dang bde de bzhin/ /dngos grub thams cad bzhi 'gyur
du| |rtog pa kun las bsgrub par bya/ /zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /dpal mchog dang po las/ de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad kyi dpal dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga shin tu gsang ba rdzogs so// //de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
'jig rten gsum gyi dam tshig mchog gi gsang ba'i cho ga'i mchog ni 'di yin te/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /dam tshig chen po gsum 'di yin/ /
byang chub sems dpa' mchog 'dzin pa'i/ /ras la dkon mchog gsum bri bya/ /go cha dang bcas rdo rje mchog /go cha sogs kyis legs par brgyan/ /
rdo rje mtshon cha brjod pa dang / /pad+ma rin chen 'chang ba'o/ /'khor lo de ni brtags nas su/ /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa 'o/ /ci rigs par ni bsgrub byas
na/ /sum 'gyur du ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig chen po zhes bya ba'i snying po mchog gi dngos grub ma lus pa ster ba 'di
yin te/ oM b+hu khaM/ khyim mam yang na nags tshal lam/ /snga ma bzhin du brgyan nas ni/ /mtshon cha mchog gi cho ga yis/ /thams cad byas nas 'di brjod bya/ /
de nyid kyis ni bcom ldan 'das/ /byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /lta ngan rnams la phan pa'i phyir/ /'di dag mya ngan 'das pa ston/ /ma lus 'dul ba
la brtson pas/ /brtan zhing nges pa'i cho ga dgos/ /shin tu srid pa la gnas mchog /cho ga la sogs dgos pa yin/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun zhes/ /dkon
mchog gsum du gyur pa yin/ /srid pa shin tu grub pa yi/ /rnam par dag pa'i dpal mdzad mchog /ces bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog
tu gsang ba'i rdo rje'o/ /de nas mchog tu gsang ba'i chos nyid kyi dril bu ni/ /thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de/ /nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med/ /nam mkha'
dang mnyam sbyor ba yis/ /kun mchog mnyam pa nyid du gsal/ /zhes bya ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /de nas dam tshig chen po gsum gyi sdom pa zhes bya ba
ni/ /longs spyod kun la longs spyod pa/ /rang lha bdag nyid kyis bsten na/ /dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa'i mchog /bdag gis bya zhes brjod cing mchod/ /ces
@#/ /bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnal 'byor bsgrub pa'o/ /thabs kyi cho ga 'di yis ni/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams kyang / /bza' min pa
yang bza' byas na/ /rtag pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i dam tshig chen po gsum mo/
/de ltar brjod nas snying po byin la phyag rgya bcing ba slob tu bcug nas ci ltar mngon par 'dod pa bsgrub par bya'o/ /de nas rdor 'dzin slob dpon gyis/ /rdo rje mchod
pas mchod nas ni/ /ci 'dod pa yi mchod pa yis/ /slob ma thams cad mchod du gzhug /longs spyod kun la longs spyod kyang / /dkon mchog gsum
po la phul ba/ /'dod pas bdag dang gzhan rnams la/ /mchod pa nyid du 'grub par 'gyur/ /dpal mchog dang po las/ /mchog tu gsang ba'i cho ga'o// //
de nas rdo rje chen po khro bo'i rgyal po'i mchog tu gsang ba'i cho ga ni/ /ras la bcom ldan bri bya ste/ /rdo rje'i rigs kun bdag po ni/ /rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar/ /
cho ga ji bzhin mchog tu 'o/ /de yi pad 'dab gcig bzhugs pa/ /de yi 'od kyis dkyil 'khor sten/ /gsang ba'i rdo rje rnal 'byor che'i/ /mkha' 'gro ma rnams
logs la bri/ /dang por dmar dang dkar ba dang / /gzhan ni thal ba ltar dkar ba/ /gsum po dkar dang lta ba ste/ /bzhi ba gser ltar dri med pa'o/ /rdo rje gtum po'i
dbang phyug grub/ /rdo rje kha T+wAM bsgrengs dang bcas/ /rdo rje 'dod pa me ltar 'bar/ /de yi logs la mtshan ma gtod/ /rdo rje khyab 'jug ma rdo rje'i/ /'khor lo gtod pa de
bzhin gzhan/ /rdo rje dril bu ba dan nam/ /de yi logs na g.yon bsnyems ma/ /cung zad mche ba gtsigs pa yis/ /khro dang bcas pas zhal bzhad pa/ /rang bdag
la ni thugs gtad cing / /sku ni zur gyi phyogs pa bzhugs/ /de nas 'di yi snying po ni/ /hUM/ de nas nye ba'i snying po ni/ /rdo rje dril sogs lhan cig tu/ /rnam dben rol
mo brdungs pa yis/ /hi yi glu dang rol mo ni/ /brdung zhing zur bzhi rab tu bsgrub/ /ces bya ba ni 'dir bzlas pa'i cho ga'o/ /'khor lo der ni bstan byas nas/ /gsang
ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni/ /mtshon cha mchog gi cho ga yis/ /cho ga thams cad rgyas pa 'o/ /de nas de kho na nyid dang / chos dang / dam tshig gi cho ga sbyin pa ni/ /rtag
tu chags pa las byung khro/ /rdo rje me yi phung bo'i sku/ /'bar ba'i rdo rje khro bo che/ /rab 'bar ba yi tshogs kyi sku/ /rdo rje 'bar ba'i rnal 'byor che/ /mkha' 'gro ma rnams
@#/ /kun tu 'bar/ /zhes bya ba ni rdo rje'o/ /de nas chos ni/ thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de/ /nam mkha' la yang mchan nyid med/ /
nam mkha' dang mnyam rnal 'byor pas/ /thams cad myur ba nyid du sgrub/ /nam mkha' kun mchog sbyor ba yis/ /thams cad nam mkha' zhes brjod cing / /rdo
rje'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pas/ /'jig rten gsum yang za bar byed/ /ces bya ba ni rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi mkha' 'gro ma'i mchog tu gsang ba'i dam tshig go /cho ga
'di yis thams cad du/ /mnyam par gzhag pas bsgrub par bya/ /kun mchog dngos grub chen po yis/ /las kyi tshogs rnams mi zad pa'o/ /zhes bya ba'o/ /
de ni ci lta ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho gas rang gi phyag rgya rnams kyis gar gyi mchod pa byas nas 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /dpal mchog dang po las/
rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi cho ga'o// //de nas mchog tu phra ba dang / /shin tu bzad pa'i rdo rje yi/ /grub mchog gsang ba'i rnal 'byor gyi/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi
'khor lor bshad/ /grong khyer skyed mos tshal sogs ni/ /ji lta ba bzhin rgyas byas nas/ /rdo rje 'dzin kun slob dpon gyis/ /ji bzhin du ni rab bsgrubs pa'i/ /yid 'ong
bzhi dang lhan cig tu/ /rang gi phyag rgyas me tog gtor/ /ji lta ba bzhin grong khyer 'jug /g.yon pa'i kha ni gyen du gtod/ /rdo rje drag po bzhad chen po/ /sgra sgrogs mchog gi phyag
rgya yis/ /'jug ste mgon la phyag 'tshal bya/ /de la phyag ni 'di yin te/ /oM zhes bya ba brjod byas la/ /shin tu dga' ba'i dbugs rlung gis/ /ru lu ru lu l+laM/ drug ldan par
ma'i ru lu ru lu l+laM ste/ 'di ni rdo rje drag po'i phyag 'tshal pa'i sgra sgrogs pa'i mchog ces bya ba 'dir rdo rje phyag gi phyag rgya ste/ phyag rgya thams cad dang / gzhan rmongs pa dang / thogs
pa med pa'i dngos grub thams cad dang / las thams cad la dgongs shing mchog tu grub pa zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' mchog tu shin tu gsang bas 'di gsungs
so/ /de nas yid 'ong dam bcas pas/ /me tog sil ma dor nas ni/ /rdo rje pad+ma'i dbang bskur gyis/ /dam tshig gsum ni gsal bar sbyin/ /de la rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya ni 'di yin

te/ pad+ma'i thod pa las bya ste/ de yang rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs pas na rdo rje pad+ma zhes bya ba'o/ /de nas 'dir phyag rgya bcing ba ni/ sor mo thams cad phan tshun sbyar/ /kun mchog rtse mo dang

bcas pa/ /mthe bo rdo rjes bkab pa ni/ /rdo rje pad+ma zhes 'grub bo/ /rdo rje pad+ma'i phyag rgya 'dis rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang bskur ba'i sbyor ba dang / rdo rje pad+ma'i rin po che'i cod pan gyi dbang bskur bar
@#/ /bya'o/ /'dis dpang bskur ba tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis shin du gdug pa dang / drag po dang / rab tu gtum pa dang / ma rungs
pa'i sems can thal bar brla nas thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba khams gsum ma lus pa'i stobs chen po dang ldan pa'i 'khor los bsgyur ba'i de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad ces bya bar byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ba dang / mchog tu rtag pa'i srung bar yang 'gyur ro zhes mchog tu shin tu gsang ba bcom ldan 'das rdo
rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de nyid kyis ni rdo rje bzung / /chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya/ /dam tshig gi ni phyag rgya cher/ /byin gyis brlabs nas snying po bzla/ /rdo rje
la sogs thob par gzung / /rdo rje sems dpa' gnyis pa 'dra/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor dbang phyug grub/ /rdo rje can gyis byin rlabs 'gyur/ /bud med rnams kyang 'bebs
gyur nas/ /ston pa'i rdo rje phab pa yis/ /rdo rje dang bcas phyag mtshan 'dzin/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams rab tu 'gyur/ /de la thog mar re zhig rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar
ba chen po thal bar rab tu rlog pa zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chen po'i khro bo'i rgyal po'i bdag po mchog dang po yang dag par 'bebs
par byed pa ste/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rje chen po'i thabs kyis 'khon du 'dzin pa'i khro bo'i me 'bar ba'i rdo rje/ rdo rje dang bcas pa'i kha T+wAM ga'i rgyal mtshan
dang nges par sbyor ba/ ba dan dang bcas pa'i dril bu 'chang ba/ rdo rje bsnyems pa'i bdag po shin tu khro ba 'bebs pas sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i smin mtshams kyi khro gnyer
shin tu 'jigs shing 'jigs par byed pa'i spyan ser po dang ldan pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i 'jigs pa chen pos 'jigs par byed pa'i spyan gyis
lta ba'i phyag rgya 'dis stong phrag brgya bzlas pas 'grub par mdzad do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su chags pa dang / dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / dbang du bya
ba dang / 'bebs par nus pa'o/ /thams cad nam mkhar sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / lan gcig brjod pa tsam gyis khams gsum ma lus pa'i rdo rje bdud rtsi la sogs
pa'i bdud thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gdug pa dang / drag po dang / rab tu gtum pa dang / ma rungs pa'i sems can rnams dang / mkha' 'gro
ma drag po thams cad dang / gang zhig nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams te de dag kyang thal bar rlog par 'gyur na/ dgra bo la sogs pa gzhan rnams lta smos
@#/ /kyang ci dgos/ don yod cing thogs pa med pa dang / dngos grub thams cad dang / las kyi tshogs rnams la dgongs shing mchog tu grub
pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po'i thabs shin tu drag po 'di'i man ngag gi bzlas pa ni/ sna'i dbugs phra ba nyid kyis bden pa'i rdo rje tshig gis
grub pa'i yid kyi 'dod pa'i las thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi tshogs rnams la dam pa'i mchog tu grub pa'o/ /hUM/ de nas mchog tu gsang ba'i rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang
phyug ma'i lha chen po rnams kyis bshad par bya ste/ de la thog mar re zhig rdo rje chen po 'dod pa'i me 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i lha mo chen mo rdo rje gzhu dang mdang gtod pa'i
spyan g.yon pa ste/ rdo rje spyan gyis lta ba'i phyag rgya 'dis thams cad sgrub par mdzad pa dang / sgeg pa dang bcas shing g.yo ba'i spyan gyi zur gyis gzigs pa'i
phyag rgyas btab ba tsam gyis thams cad la rgyas 'debs par mdzad pa dang / don yod cing thogs pa med pa dngos po thams cad dang / las kyi tshogs rnams
la dgongs shing mchog tu grub pa'o/ /de bcom ldan 'das yum 'di'i rdo rje phra mo'i g.yon pa'i khro bo'i bzlas pa ni yid kyis 'dod pas dngos grub thams
cad dang / las kyi tshogs rnams la mchog tu grub pa'o/ /hrIH/ gnyis pa ni rdo rje chen po 'dod pa'i me 'bar ba'i dam tshig gi lan zhes bya ba'i lha mo ste dbus su
rang gi lhag pa'i lha bstod pa'i zhal 'dzum pa'i spyan cung zhig 'dzums shing / dga' ba chen po rdo rje'i spyan gyis lta ba'i phyag rgya 'dis thams cad sgrub par mdzad pa dang
tsum pan dang / 'khyud pa la sogs pa'i reg pa'i phyag rgyas btab pa tsam gyis thams cad la rgyas 'debs par mdzad pa dang / phyag rgya thams cad 'joms par mdzad
pa dang / thams cad kyis gsod par mdzad pa dang / don yod cing thogs pa med par dngos grub thams cad dang / las kyi tshogs rnams la dgongs shing mchog tu grub
pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das yum 'di'i bya rog gi mgrin pa'i dbyangs kyis rdo rje ngang gi khro bo'i bzlas pa ni yid kyi 'dod pas dngos grub thams cad dang / las
kyi tshogs rnams la mchog tu grub pa'o/ /hUM/ gsum pa ni rdo rje chen po'i 'dod pa'i me 'bar ba thal bar rlog pa zhes bya ba'i lha mo chen mo ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
rdo rje chen po dang / kha T+wAM ga'i rgyal mtshan 'chang ba dang / sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i bzhad pas smin mtshams kyi khro gnyer gyi khro bo'i spyan te/ rdo rje chen po'i khro bo ki li gi
@#/ /la khro bo'i spyan gyis lta ba'i phyag rgya 'dis thams cad sgrub par mdzad pa'o/ /badzra zhes bya ba dang / ru lu ru lu ru lu h+ni zhes bya ba tsam gyis
bdud thams cad 'joms pa dang / don yod cing thogs pa med pa'i dngos grub thams cad dang / las kyi tshogs rnams la dgongs shing mchog tu grub pa'o/ /hi/
bzhi pa ni rdo rje chen po 'dod pa'i me 'bar ba thal bar rlog pa 'chi ba slong ba zhes bya ba g.yon bsnyems pa g.yas pas rang gi spyi bor rdo rje dril bu bskyod par mdzad pa/
sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i spyan shin tu gdangs pa ste/ rdo rje rgyal po drin gyi spyan gyis lta ba'i phyag rgyas thams cad sgrub par mdzad pa/ thal lcag la sogs pa dang /
bzhad gad dang / rdeg pa dang / phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'i 'chi ba thams cad slong bar mdzad pa/ don yod cing thogs pa med pa dngos grub thams cad dang / las kyi
tshogs la dgongs shing mchog tu grub pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das yum 'di'i dril bu'i dbyangs kyi rdo rje khro bo'i bzlas pa ni yid kyi 'dod pas dngos grub
thams cad dang / las kyi tshogs thams cad la mchog tu grub pa'o/ /Sh+Ta/ de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog /chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa/ /
nam mkha'i khams ltar grangs med cing / /rdo rje nyi ma las byung ba/ /nam mkha' kun gyi gnas skabs kyi/ /dkyil 'khor 'di la rab zhugs pa/ /rdo rje mchog gi
rnal 'byor gyi/ /dbang phyug ma lus kun nas 'bebs/ /de nas rdo rje rnal 'byor pa ston pa des rnal 'byor pa rang gi logs dag tu dgod pa yin te/ /zla ches dkyil
'khor rnam pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor du ni dgod par bya/ /bkod nas thams cad kun mchog gi /dngos grub dam pa bsgrub par bya/ /thams cad dgug dang mchod pa che/
bdag byin brlab sogs grub pa yis/ /shin tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor de/ /brtag pa dang ni bsgrubs nas kyang / /rdo rje 'dzin kun slob dpon gyis/ /rdo rje slob ma
rnams gzhug bya/ /de la re zhig thog ma kho nar slob dpon gyis bcug ste tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du dam tshig gsum gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams
logs dag tu bzhag nas skyes pa rnams kyang gzhug cing byang chub kyi sems kyis rdo rje chen po'i khro bo'i dam tshig dang sdom pa dag len du gzhug par bya'o/ /khye'u
dang / bu mo rnams rab tu bzhag la tshogs dang bcas pa'i rang nyid kyis zhugs te bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba thams cad bya'o/ /de nas 'dir slob ma
@#/ /gzhug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ni/ /byang chub sems ni bla med pa/ /mchog tu bskyed pa byas nas ni/ /gar byas spyi bor thal sbyar mchod/ /
slob ma thams cad gzhug par bya/ /ci 'dod pa yi dngos grub bskyed/ /slob ma me tog dor du gzhung / /rnal 'byor ma ni gang la babs/ /de dang de yi lha mo
'grub/ /de nas gdong g.yogs bkrol nas ni/ /rnam pa kun tu yon blangs nas/ /rdo rje pad+ma'i dbang bskur gyis/ /dam tshig gsum ni gsal bar sbyin/ /'dir
mna' bsgag pa dang / dbang bskur ba ni de nyid do/ /de la 'dir dam tshig gsum sbyin pa ni 'di yin te/ /mi phyed pa dang so sor rtogs/ /gdug pa thams cad
gnon pa dang / /sangs rgyas kun dngos rdo rje ste/ /byang chub sems ni che zhing brtan/ /mtshon cha de ni rgyal kun gyis/ /kun tu bzang po'i lag tu sbyin/ /bstan
pa thams cad grub pa'i phyir/ /de phyir phyag na rdo rje yin/ /de nas rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'i mchog tu gsang ba ni/ /rtag tu chags pa las byung khro/ /rdo rje
sems dpa' gdul bya'i phyir/ /rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar/ /mchog tu 'jigs par byed pa yin/ /de nas mchog tu gsang ba'i rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi mkha'
'gro ma rnams kyi gsang ba mchog gi de kho na nyid ni/ /rdo rje nyi ma 'char las byung / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i grib ma 'di/ /sprul te ma lus bdung la sogs/ /gdug
pa'i khrag ni gsol bar spyod/ /ces bya ba ni gsang ba mchog gi de kho na nyid do/ /de nas 'dir mchog tu gsang ba'i chos nyid 'bebs pa'i dril bu ni/ /shin tu gdug
cing drag pa dang / /bdag po drag po'i bu rnams dang / /shin tu gnyid ni log pa dag /rdo rje mchog ni 'dzin pas gsungs/ /zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs
so/ /mchog tu gsang pa'i chos nyid 'bebs pa'i rdo rje kha T+wAM ga'i rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyi dril bu thams cad 'bebs pa dang / rab tu sgrub par byed pa dang / thams
cad ltung bar byed pa dang / slong bar byed pa'o/ /de nas rnal 'byor mchog gi dam tshig ni/ khrag chen ga bur dang bcas pa/ /tsan+dan dmar dang sbyar ba ni/ /tshogs kyi
nang du rab zhugs nas/ /rdo rje dang bcas rdo rje 'dzin/ /srin lag mthe bo'i rtse mo yis/ /nam mkha' thams cad sbyor mchog ldan/ /zla ba'i btung ba bzhin myangs na/ /
rtag pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /'dod pa kun la longs spyod cing / /ci 'dod pa ni bsten bzhin du/ /nam mkha' kun mchog sbyor pa yis/ /dngos grub thams
@#/ /cad thob par 'gyur/ /nam mkha' kun mchog sbyor ba yis/ /nam mkha' thams cad ces brjod cing / /rdo rje'i phyag rgyas btab pa yi/ /'jig
rten gsum yang bza' bar bya/ /dngos grub las dang de bzhin bde/ /'di la cung zad mi 'grub med/ /las kyi tshogs kyi dngos grub kyis/ /dngos grub ma lus sgrub
par 'gyur/ /don yod mchog tu grub pa dang / /gdug pa thams cad gnon par byed/ /sdug bsngal kun 'phrog dpal dang ldan/ /rnal 'byor 'di ni las kun byed/ /
ces bya ba mchog tu gsang ba'i bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de nas/ /ro dang bza' dang spyod pa gar dang glu/ /rol mo'i mchong pa sogs kyis
mgon la mchod/ /phul ba de yis rdo rje bla ma che/ /dad bas bdag dang gzhan rnams mchod par bya/ /myos byed myos byed btung ba ni/ /ci 'dod par ni bsten pa yis/ /
rdo rje nyi ma me 'bar sogs/ /ji bzhin rjes 'gro'i bzlas pa bzla/ /rang gsang cho gas blangs pa yi/ /glu dang rol mo gar rnams dang / /sna tshogs phyag rgya'i mchod pa
dang / /khams gsum rnam rgyal la sogs pa/ /bud med tshogs dang bcas pa yi/ /mchod pa rgya chen thams cad dang / /ci 'dod pa yi longs spyod kyis/ /
mchod pa byas nas rab tu bsgrub/ /ces bya ba mchog tu gsang ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa la
sogs pa'i dbugs dbyung ba sbyin par bya ste/ /'gro ba kun gyi khams rnams kyi/ /phra rab rdul dang mnyam pa nyid/ /rtog pa'i rgyal po grub pa ste/ /sangs rgyas la sogs
mchog grub pa'o/ /gang zhig blo ni dpag med pa'i/ /khyad par du ni dmigs mi 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pas bde ba ni/ /dam pa thams cad bsdus pa'o/ /zad pa
thams cad zad 'gyur dang / /'phel ba thams cad 'phel bar 'gyur/ /gang zhig mthong bas mi snang 'gyur/ /gang nas kyang ni 'jigs med byed/ /drag po dbang
po nye dbang zla/ /nyi ma mkha' 'gro tshogs dkyil 'khor/ /khros nas yi ge hUM tsam gyis/ /ma lus pa ni thal bar byed/ /rnal 'byor mkha' 'gro ma'i dkyil
'khor/ /mchog tu zhugs te mthong nas ni/ /sdig pa kun las rnam grol te/ /khyed rnams dang ni rab tu gnas/ /sar khyod 'chi ba yod mi te/ /khyad par du
ni ngan 'gro med/ /gzhan gyis mi thub mi sod cing / /cis kyang mi 'jigs dga' bar gyis/ /shin tu srid pa'i dngos grub rnams/ /ston pa'i mchog tu gyur
@#/ /pa yin/ /dam tshig sdom pa grub pa 'di/ /rtag tu yang ni bsrung bar bya/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis mthun par gsungs/ /dam pa brtag
pa'i bka' yin no/ /byang chub sems ni spang mi bya/ /dam chos de bzhin dam tshig dang / /slob dpon smad par mi bya ste/ /gang phyir rdo rje 'dzin kun de/ /sems can
kun la phan phyir dang / /theg pa thams cad 'grub pa'i phyir/ /gdug pa 'dul bas dag pa zhes/ /rdo rje mchog ni 'dzin pas gsungs/ /shin tu gdug cing
gtum pa dang / /bdag po'i grogs po bu rnams kyang / /phyag rgya'i rnal 'byor mngon spyod kyis/ /shin tu gnyid ni log tu gzhug /rtag tu rang gi dam tshig srungs/ /
rtag tu de bzhin gshegs rnams mchod/ /rtag tu bla ma la yang dbul/ /de la phul na 'bras bu che/ /de bya ni sangs rgyas thams cad la/ /rtag tu byin pa nyid du 'gyur/ /
