thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rab tu zhi ba'o/ /rtag tu bskyod pas rab tu dga' ba 'bebs shing de nas bsgrub pa'o/ /skye gnas g.yo bas bud med dang / skyes pa dag
gi rab tu dga' ba la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i 'dod pa thams cad kyi bde ba chen po shin tu mtha' yas pa'o/ /kha sbyor btsir bas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du 'dus
pa dang bral ba yang ngo / /rtags kyi sen mo g.yon pa'i mthil brud pas shin tu brtan pa'i 'dod pa la chags pa nyid du 'gyur ro/ /gzhan gyi 'dod pa la mi
lta zhing gzhan la mi 'gro bar shin tu bde ba dang / yid bde ba ster ba'i bud med thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /skye gnas su sen mo brud pas skyes bu rnams so/ /de
nas thams cad kyi bdag nyid kyi gsang ba'i phyag rgya bcu ste/ de la lus thams cad kyi phyag rgya ni rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis 'khyud la ma mchu so rnams kyis bzung ste/ rmongs
pas bde ba ster du gzhug /bsgrub pas rab tu dga' ba'i dngos grub kyis rdo rje sems dpa' shin tu 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /mchog dang po'i dngos grub kyis su ra ta s+t+waM
zhes bcom ldan 'das la brjod cing de kho na nyid bskul bas grub par 'gyur ro/ /rab tu dga' ba'i ye shes kyis thams cad sgrub pa'o/ /lag pa g.yon pa'i khu tshur
gsang bar reg na thams cad bsgrub pa'o/ /bde ba chen po rdo rje las byung ba'i rdo rje chen po'i lta bas thams cad grub pa'o/ /smin ma gyen du bteg pas ltung ba slong
ba'o/ /rang gi ma mchu nang du myang bas skal ba bzang po chen po sgrub ba'o/ /rang gi lce bskyod pas rang nyid kyi bden pa thams cad dang / de kho na nyid gsal zhing mi slu
bar smra ba'o/ /rang gi lus la 'bebs pas gzugs thams cad yongs su bsgyur ba ste/ rdo rje sems dpa' 'am/ sangs rgyas su yang 'gyur ba yin no/ /rang gi bdag
@#/ /nyid rdo rje bsgoms pas nam mkha' la 'gro ba'o/ /de nas dang po las thams cad kyi phyag rgya bcu ni rdo rje thal mo kha T+wAM gso/ /dngos grub thams
cad rdo rje khu tshur dag gis so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur dag gis dngos grub thams cad do/ /thams cad gsod pa ni khro bo'i khu tshur dag gis so/ /thams
cad sbyar ba ni pad+ma'i khu tshur dag gis so/ /nor thams cad dbrog pa ni nor bu'i khu tshur gyis so/ /thams cad 'bebs pa ni thams cad 'bebs pa'i khu tshur gyis so/ /
thams cad gar byed du gzhug pa ni kha T+wAM ga gtor ba'i khu tshur dag gis so/ /thams cad smrar gzhug pa ni mdzub mo mnyam pa'i lce'i khu tshur dag gis so/ /thams
cad bskyod pa ni brtan pa'i khu tshur dag gis so/ /thams cad gzhug cing don yod par bsgrub pa ni rdo rje lcags kyu'i khu tshur gyis so/ /de nas rdo rje khu tshur gnyis
kyis ci 'dod pa'i lag pa'i sor mo'i phyag rgya bcu ste/ don yod cing thogs pa med par skad cig mas myur du grub par byed pa 'di lta ste/ /pi wang dang / gling bu
dang / rdza rnga dang / mu kuN+Da dang / cha lang dang / rnga bo che dang / rnga zlum dang / rnga pa Ta ha dang / guny+dza dang / ti mi li ste/ 'di rnams kyis rgyas btab na thams cad du
rjes su chags pa dang / dbang du byed pa dang / 'bebs pa dang / rims dang / dug dang / sbyar dug dang / gdon las grol ba dang / gsod pa dang / 'thab mo las rnam
par rgyal ba dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad thob pa yin no zhes bya ba gsungs so/ /'dod chags chen po rnam dag phyir/ /rdo rje sems dpa' chen po yin/ /phyag rgya'i
rtog pa rab tu brtags/ /rdo rje slob dpon slob ma mchog /de nyid dad pa'i rjes 'brang la/ /rtogs pa tsam gyis skad cig gis/ /don yod kun grub bde bar gsol/ /zhes
bya'o/ /dpal mchog dang po las/ mchog tu grub pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'i rgyud rdzogs so// //de nas mchog tu mkhas shing mtha' las 'das pa tshad
med cing gzhal du med pa ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i mchog gi dngos grub chen po'i bdag nyid la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyis las kyi tshogs mchog
tu dam pa grub pa zhes bya ba rdo rje gar las byung ba'i tshogs thams cad kyi phyag rgya stong bshad par bya'o/ /zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /
phyag rgya chen po mnyam gzhag nas/ /sgeg bcas mdzub sogs bkrol ba yis/ /las kyi phyag rgya chen po rgya/ /thams cad gar gyis bsgrub par bya/ /bde ba chen po rdo
@#/ /rje gsang ba'i lcags kyus khyad par du las kyi phyag rgya bcing ba ste brgya phrag dang po mchog tu bsgrubs te rdo rje dam tshig lha mo rnams kyi
phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje bsdams pa bcings nas ni/ /kha sbyor nang du gsal ba ste/ /mchog dang po yi gsang chen gyis/ /las kyi phyag rgya rgya gzhan yin/ /zhes bya ba rdo rje
lha mo gsang ba thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje las kyi mchod pa che'i/ /thal mos sbyi bor bzung nas ni/ /las kyi phyag rgya grub pas na/ /dbang po rnams dang sbyar
bar bya/ /zhes bya ba rdo rje thams cad kyi mchod pa chen po'i lha mo rnams kyi phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje bsnyems mas gar bya zhing / /sgeg bcas mthe'u chung sogs bkrol
bas/ /de nyid bcings nas gar bya zhing / /phyi ma 'di ni 'byung ba yin/ /zhes bya ba rdo rje thams cad kyi las don yod pa'i dam tshig grub pa'i dbang phyug chen po'i mchog
gi phyag rgya brgya'o/ /rdo rje thal mo mnyam gzhag nas/ /thams cad kyis ni bsgrub par bya/ /mchog dang po yi las chen po'i/ /phyag rgya mchog ni gzhan yin
no/ /zhes bya ba rgyal mo thams cad kyi phyag rgya/ mda' lnga bsdus pa bcings nas ni/ /las kyi phyag rgya bde ba brgya/ /rab tu dga' mchog sgra bkrol bar/ /bde ba
nyid du mngon par sbyar/ /zhes bya ba rdo rje thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i 'dod pa ma'i phyag rgya'o/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis/ /ji bzhin phyag rgya mchog sbyor bas/ /
las kyi phyag rgya sna tshogs brgya/ /mchog dang po ni rab tu brtag /ces bya ba rdo rje thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje lha mo'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje lha mo'i kha T+wAM ga /lus kun
gyis ni gar bya zhing / /rdo rje gar mchog glu blang zhing / /dang po'i phyag rgya chen po zhes bya ba'o/ /ji ltar gong du rgyas gsungs pa/ /rol mo mchog gi phyag rgya'i tshogs/ /
rol mo brdung zhing glu len pa/ /phyag rgya kun gyi gsal ba brgya/ /zhes bya ba rdo rje thams cad kyi lha'i bu mo'i tshogs kyis phyag bya ste phyag rgya stong mchog tu grub pa'o/ /de la
sogs pa mtha' yas mchog /chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa/ /nam mkha'i mtha' ltar grangs med pa'i/ /phyag rgya'i rgyal mo grub mchog ster/ /kun mchog
dngos grub chen po yi/ /dbang phyug chen po'i mchog grub phyir/ /nam mkha' kun gyi go skabs kyis/ /dkyil 'khor 'dir ni rab tu zhugs/ /dam pa mchog tu grub par
byed/ /mchog gi dam pa rgyud chen po/ /dam pa mchog gi dngos grub ster/ /rdo rje slob dpon slob ma mchog /de nyid dad pa'i rjes 'brangs la/ /phyag rgya kun gyi tshul
@#/ /'di ni/ /bstan par bya ste gzhan la min/ /de ltar mchog tu mi 'gyur dam pa'i dngos grub bde ba yi/ /mchog tu rnam dag rdo rje bde grub
mtha' yas 'bras bur ldan/ /dpal mchog dang po'i gsang ba'i de nyid mchog gi sku'i tshul lo/ /mchog tu rtag pa'i rtog pa'i tshul 'di yongs su mthar thug
pa'o/ /dpal mchog dang po las/ dam pa mchog tu grub pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'i rgyud rdzogs so// //de nas sems dpa' chen po kun/ /rdo rje 'dzin dang
bcas pa'i mchog /rdo rje 'chang chen gtso bo ni/ /mgon la bde gshegs rnams kyis gsol/ /kun mchog nam mkha' chen po yi/ /dngos grub dbang phyug rab grub
phyir/ /rtog pa thams cad kun bsdus pa'i/ /de nyid sems dpa' chen pos gsungs/ /rnam rtog med pa'i chos rnams la/ /rtog pa'i don 'di gang brjod pa/ /gang
gis rgyud 'di phyi ma la/ /dang po'i gnas mchog ji ltar lags/ /de bzhin rdo rje sems dpa' nyid/ /rab dga' nyid dang bzang ba nyid/ /rdo rje bsnyems bdag ji
ltar lags/ /sems dang sems dpa' ting 'dzin dang / /de bzhin rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin/ /rdo rje 'chang chen nyid dang ni/ /byang chub spyod pa ji ltar lags/ /bdud
dang bdud las rgyal ba nyid/ /byang chub sangs rgyas ji ltar lags/ /rdo rje gtum po mthar byed nyid/ /phyag na rdo rje ji ltar lags/ /ji ltar dang po'i rigs byung dang / /
'dod pa thar pa ji ltar lags/ /ji ltar mgon po rnam gsum dang / /khyod ni ji ltar thams cad nyid/ /dang po'i snying po ji ltar byung / /de ci nye snying ji ltar lags/ /bde
chen rdo rje chen po yi/ /don yod dam tshig ji ltar lags/ /dkyil 'khor zhes bya ji skad gsungs/ /de yi rnam smin ji ltar bu/ /thig gdab ba dang brtag pa yis/ /dngos
grub ji ltar gsungs pa lags/ /gsang ba lnga yi de bde ba/ /ji ltar gyur pa ji lta bu/ /dkyil 'khor bdag po rnams dang ni/ /rigs rnams gsal ba ji ltar lags//
thams cad dbang bskur de nyid dang / phyag mtshan tshogs kyi de nyid dang / /thams cad dgug gzhug mchod pa che/ /bdag byin brlabs sogs sgrub pa che/ /de ni de nyid
gsang ba dang / /don yod pa ni mchog nyid de/ /mi 'gyur dam pa 'grub pa'i phyir/ /thams cad bdag cag rnams la gsungs/ /zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog gi mdo gsungs so/ /de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin/ /rtog pa kun gyi bdag po ni/ /the tshom tshogs rnams gsan nas su/ /'di yi lan
@#/ /ni gsungs pa yin/ /de la rtog pa'i don gyi rgyud ji ltar yin zhe na/ rnam rtog med pa'i chos rnams las/ /sems can don yod yongs brtags
bas/ /des na rtog par gsungs pa ste/ /rtog pa yongs su dag phyir ro/ /de nas rgyud phyi ma ji ltar yin zhe na/ rgyud ni rgyun zhes bya bar bshad/ /phyi ma sngar dang
yang dag byung / /de nyid gsang ba'i gsang ba dang / phyi ma dang bcas rgyud du 'dod/ /de la dang po gnas zhes bya ba'i rgyud ji ltar yin zhe na/ nam mkha' kun
la rab tu gnas/ /rdo rje kun mchog rang bzhin mchog /bde ba chen po dga' ba che'i/ /grong khyer der ni mi 'gyur mchog /ces bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
sems dpa' rtog pa thams cad kyi rtog pa'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba 'di gsungs so/ /de la thog ma tha ma med pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' ji ltar yin zhe na/ nam
mkha' skye ba mtshan ldan phyir/ /thog ma tha ma med pa'i mchog/ /sems dpa' rdo rje che rang bzhin/ /rdo rje sems dpa' zhes byar brjod/ /de nas bcom ldan
'das de gang yin zhe na/ dkon mchog dngos grub chen po yi/ /dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rgyal/ /rab tu dga' ba mi 'gyur mchog
de la bcom ldan 'das dga' ba chen po nyid ji ltar yin zhe na/ nyes pa med cing shin tu rtag/ 'dod chags kun gyi rjes chags pa/ /de nyid 'di yis gsang ba 'di/ /
'dod chags chen po dga' ba che/ /de la ci kun tu bzang po nyid ji ltar yin zhe na/ shin tu dag pa kun gyi mchog /gdod nas grol ba de bzhin gshegs/ /kun tu
bzang po kun bdag nyid//byang chub sems dpa'i cho ga mchog /de la rdo rje bsnyems pa'i bdag po bcom ldan 'das ji ltar yin zhe na/ kun mchog dngos grub
chen po yi/ /dbang phyug chen po'i phyag rgya'i mchog /rdo rje dbang phyug chen bstod pas/ /rdo rje bsnyems pa'i bdag po'i bdag /ces bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das mchog
dang po'i skyes bu'o/ /mchog dang po yi de nyid 'di/ /rdo rje sems dpa' gang gang brjod/ /dngos grub kun gyi 'byor ba rnams/ /de la thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/
zhes bya ba mchog gi de kho na nyid bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de nas de'i 'og tu las kyi bya bas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi mchog
nyid du bshad par bya'o/ /zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de la bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi sems can ji ltar yin zhe na/ bsam
@#/ /gyis mi khyab rgya che ba/ /thab dngos kun bde mi 'gyur ba/ /thams cad khyab cing dri ma med/ /byang chub sems ni bdag brtan pa/ /de nas 'di'i
las kyi khyad par ni/ /sems nyid brtan pa nyid sems pas/ /ting 'dzin de la mnyam par gzhag /rnam shes las ni rdo rje kun/ /rdo rje las ni 'dzin gyur te/ /bcom
ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin ji ltar yin zhe na/ sems dpa'i byin rlabs sbyor ba ni/ /bdag la byin rlabs mchog bsgrub pa/ /nyin re sgrub par byed na des/ /rdo rje sems
dpa' nyid thob 'gyur/ /de la bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa ji ltar yin zhe na/ snying stobs rdul dang mun pas kyang / /gang phyir sems can don gyur
pas/ /de phyi nga ni kun tu bzang / /byang chub spyod pa'i rjes 'jug pa'o/ /de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das bdud nyid dang 'dul bas rgyal ba ji ltar yin zhe na/ sems
nyid kho na bdud nyid de/ /sems nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ /rang sems gdul bar bya ba'i phyir/ /bdag ni bdud nyid gyur pa yin/ /de la ji ltar bcom ldan
'das mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang / sangs rgyas yin zhe na/ rang sems so sor rtog pa'i phyir/ /byang chub sems mchog rdo rje nyid/ /de phyir de nyid sangs
rgyas nyid/ /bdag byin rlabs mchog grub phyir ro/ /de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje yin zhe na/ mi phyed so sor rtogs pa dang / /gdug pa thams cad nges
par gnon/ /sangs rgyas kun dngos rdo rje ste/ /byang chub sems ni brtan pa bdag/ /kun tu bzang po'i lag tu ni/ /mtshon cha de ni rgyal bas byin/ /brtan pa thams cad grub
pa'i phyir/ /des na phyag na rdo rje des/ /de la ji ltar dang po'i rigs las byung ba shes pa'i rgyud yin zhe na/ shes rab pha rol phyin pa yum/ /yab ni thabs la mkhas pa
ste/ /rdo rje sems dpa' gdul bya'i phyir/ /rigs rnams rab tu byung ba'o/ /de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das 'dod dang / thar ba yin zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das ni chags pa
che/ /dngos grub thams cad rjes chags phyir/ /dngos grub thams cad mi 'gyur bde/ /bde ba chen po zhes brjod pa'o/ /de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das rnam pa
gsum yin zhe na/ bdag ni dus gsum mtha' yas phyir/ /nga ni srid gsum gdul bya'i phyir/ /gsum mchog 'jig rten gsum kun phyir/ /'jig rten gsum
pa khams gsum nga / /de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das thams cad nyin yid zhe na/ nga nyid brtan pa thams cad bde/ /bsod nams kun mchog che ba'i phyir/ /g.yo
@#/ /ba sems kyis 'dus byas phyir/ /sgyu ma thams cad nga yin no/ /zhes bya ba rang gi las kyi bya ba'i de kho na nyid rdo rje sems dpas gsungs
so/ /de la ji ltar dang po'i glu byung ba shes pa yin zhe na/ srid pa shin tu grub pa yi/ /dbang phyug chen po mchog grub phyir/ /gzi can sems can don mdzad phyir/ /
bskal ba thog mar bcom ldan gsungs/ /de nas de gang yin zhe na/ 'dod chags chen po bcom ldan 'das/ /rab tu dga' ba mi 'gyur mchog /gsang ba'i
phyir ni snying por brjod/ /yi ge hUM ni mi 'gyur mchog /de nas nye bar snying po yi/ /de kho na nyid shes pa ni/ /de nyid gsang zhing gsang ba dang / snying po rab tu brjod par
bya/ /snying po'i rjes su sgrub par 'grub/ /nye ba'i snying po nyid du brjod/ /de la ji ltar bde ba chen po'i rdo rje don yod pa dam tshig gi bshad pa'i rgyud yin zhe na/ /dngos
grub kun gyi mi 'gyur bde/ /bde ba chen po zhes brjod do/ /rdo rje de nyid don yod grub/ /dam tshig 'da' bar dka' ba'o/ /zhes bya ba'i mchog gi dam pa'i glu bcom
ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de la ji ltar dkyil 'khor gyi don shes pa yin zhe na/ ji lta gnas dang 'khor lo dang / ji ltar dgod par 'gro ba
dang / /'khor dang bcas pa dgod pa gang / /de 'dra'i 'khor lo mchog gis sprul/ /de nas rnam par shes pa ni/ /rdo rje sems sogs lha rnams kyis/ /'khor lo mngon sum
mthong ba yis/ /rtag pa'i bsod nams ci 'dra ba/ /phyir na bris na'ang de bzhin no/ /de nas thig gdab pa'i cho ga ni/ /shes rab can gyis dkyil 'khor bris/ /phyogs kun mnyam
pa nyid dmigs la/ /shar dang nub dang byang dang lhor/ /thig bzhi btab pas dkyil 'khor brgyad/ /rdo rje thig gis yongs bskor bar/ /ka ba brgyad kyis nyer mdzes shing / /sgo
bzhi rta babs kha khyer dang / /dra ba dra phyed la sogs brgyan/ /der bdag po'i don shes pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' ji lta bu zhe na/ nam mkha' skye ba mtshan ldan phyir/ /thog
ma tha ma med pa'i mchog /sems dpa' rdo rje che rang bzhin/ /dpal mchog dang po zhes byar brjod/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de gang zhe na/ kun mchog dngos grub
chen po yi/ /dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rgal/ /rab tu dga' ba mi 'gyur mchog /ces bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs
so/ /de nas spyan ras gzigs dbang gi /pad+ma rA ga dang mtshungs pa/ /thams cad dag pa bla na med/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rang bdag nyid/ /spyan ras gzigs kyi
@#/ /dbang phyug nyid/ /de nas pad+ma'i rigs kyi de kho na nyid ni/ /rdo rje chos ni rab grub phyir/ /sems can thams cad rnam dag phyir/ /pad+ma chen
po'i rigs dag pa'i/ /ting 'dzin ye shes kun nas bsdus/ /zhes bya'o/ /de la ji ltar nam mkha'i snying po yin zhe na/ /thams cad nam mkha'i bcom ldan 'das//
sems can bsod nams mthong zhing che/ /nam mkha'i snying po sems dpa' dang / /de nas nor bu'i rigs kyi ni/ /dbang bskur ba dang gter dang ni/ /rdo rje rgyal
mtshan mchod pa che/ /nor bu chen po'i rigs grub pa/ /bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs pa'o/ /zhes bya ba dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi de kho na nyid chen po bcom
ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /rdo rje rigs thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba shes pa ni/ sangs rgyas rin chen rdo rje phyed/ /rdo rje rin chen rdo rje la/ /spyan
ras gzigs la rdo rje sku/ /nor bu nor bu 'dzin pa'o/ /de nas mchog dang po'i phyag mtshan gyi de kho na nyid do/ /kun mchog dngos grub chen po yi/ /dbang phyug chen
po'i mtshon cha che/ /gsang ba lnga yi de nyid che/ /rdo rje rtse lnga zhes brjod do/ /de nas rigs thams cad kyi phyag mtshan gyi de kho na nyid shes pa ni/ sangs rgyas thams
cad sangs rgyas nyid/ /sna tshogs bya ba rdo rje can/ /'jig rten dbang phyug rdo rje chos/ /nor bu nor bu bsags pa'o/ /zhes bya ba dbang bskur ba thams cad kyi phyag mtshan gyi de
kho na nyid bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /de la ji ltar thams cad dgug pa'i rgyud yin zhe na/ rtog pa kun gyi gsang chen gyi/ /rdo rje lcags kyu dril
bcas pas/ /bkug te de nas rjes bsgrubs pa/ /dril bu nyid kyi ba ba yin/ /ji ltar mchod pa thams cad kyi cho ga yin zhe na/ rtog pa kun gyi gsang chen gyis/ /rab tu
dga' bas mchod nas ni/ /glu dang rol mo rnam 'phrul bas/ /mchod de slar yang rnal 'byor mchod/ /de la ji ltar dngos grub thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i dam
tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid yin zhe na/ rtog pa kun gyi gsang chen gyis/ /phyag rgya kun gyis legs byin brlabs/ /dam tshig chen po 'di nyid kyis/ /rang nyid bsgrubs
nas snying po bzlas/ /thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che/ /kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid/ /rdo rje bsnyems pa'i bdag po'i
bdag /ces bya ba mchog dang po'i skyes bu'o/ /de la ji ltar rang lhag pa'i lha thams cad kyi sgrub pa chen po'i rgyud yin zhe na/ /brtan pa dang ni g.yo ba dang / /rtog
@#/ /pa kun las bsgrub bya gang / /rang gi lhag pa'i lha sbyor bas/ /de dag thams cad bsgrub par bya/ /de nas thams cad rjes su sgrub pa'i rgyud ni/
rdo rje dril bu 'dzin gyur nas/ /rdo rje dril bus rab sad cing / /rtog pa thams cad rjes bsgrubs pas/ /mchog dang la sogs 'grub par 'gyur/ /de la ji ltar 'bad pa
med pa thams cad sgrub pa'i rgyud yin zhe na/ bsgrub bya ci 'dod bsgrubs nas ni/ /phyi nas ji ltar 'dod pa yi/ /ci 'dod spyod pa la spyod cing / /thams cad byed cing
thams cad bza'/ /langs pa'am ni 'dug pa 'am/ /gang dang de ru 'chag pa 'am/ /dgod pa dang ni smra ba 'am/ /gang der ji bzhin de bzhin no/ /dbang po gang dang
gang lam gyur/ /de dang de yi ngo bor bya/ /mnyam par bzhag nas rnal 'byor gyis/ /rang gi lhag pa'i lha sbyor bya/ /de nyid rnal 'byor 'di yis ni/ /thams cad nyid ni
bsgrub par bya/ /sangs rgyas kun dngos thams cad ni/ /rtag tu mthong zhing grub par 'gyur/ /dam tshig chen po de nyid ni/ /mkhas pa gang zhig dad pas klog /de ni
sdig kun dang bral bas/ /dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid do/ /de ltar dpal mchog dang po'i cho ga ma nyams
mchog gi bla ma gsol/ /mchog tu gsang ba bsgrub pa'i cho ga bde mchog myur du grub phyir gsol/ /rdo rje mchog 'dzin dang bcas bde gshegs sras bcas rnams
kyis byin brlabs pa/ /bde chen dam pa rdo rje 'dzin pa dga' chen mchog gis de gsungs so/ /dpal mchog dang po las/ mchog tu gsang ba'i cho ga /de nas ston
pa rdo rje 'dzin/ /mkha' ltar thug med kun tu 'gro/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis bstod nas ni/ /rtog pa'i mthar thug don gsungs so/ /bdag gi snying po dang 'di mchog chen
gso ba yin/ /mtha' yas pa dang thog med mthar thug med pa ni/ /mchod bya chen po thams cad rnams kyi tshul chen po/ /nam mkha' dang mtshungs mchog gi dngos
'phel gsol/ /de ni sus kyang mthar thug byed par nus pa min/ /sems can rnams ni dman la zhen cing nyung la dga'/ /dad pa med cing slu ba byed la ma sbyangs
pa| |rtag tu rjes su chags shing chags bral la chags pa/ /de rnams la ni phan phyir 'di ni mthar thug pa'o/ /gang gi khyim na 'di gnas gang gis rab tu bsgrub pa
@#/ /'am| |yang na ji bzhin gsungs pa rtag tu 'dir sgrub byed/ /so sor nyams su myong ba'i mthu yis thams cad du/ /bdud kyi las tshogs
rnams kyis de ni gnod mi nus/ /rdo rje 'chang sogs sku ni gang gis sgrub byed pa/ /gzugs brnyan la sogs thams cad 'dir ni ji bzhin gsungs/ /des ni thams
cad so sor nyams myong nus par ldan/ /bdud kyi las tshogs rnams kyis de ni gnod mi nus/ /gang zhig rdo rje la sogs gzugs brnyan la sogs pa/ /ji ltar 'dod
pa 'di dag thams cad sgrub par byed/ /rab tu 'dod pas yi ge hUM las bris nas ni/ /'dod pa'i dngos grub de yis ster zhing thob par 'gyur/ /rgyal po rnams kyis
rnam par sbyangs par mdzad pa ni/ /gang la don kun dag phyir mdzad par mi 'gyur min/ /'di ni bgegs byed bdud rnams kyang ni yod ma yin/ /rtogs pas dngos
grub 'phel zhing byin gyis brlabs pa yin/ /nga ni bdud nyid mi 'gyur brtan med nyid mi 'gyur/ /brtan pa nyid phyir nga ni brtan par mdzad pa yin/ /rtag pa 'di ni mchog
chen gang gis sgrub byed pa/ /de la nga ni dngos grub myur du sgrub par byed/ /dngos grub chen po la thams cad du rjes su chags shing shin tu mnyes pa dang / shi na
tu brtan pa dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / rtag tu rgya che bar 'gyur ba yin no/ /gang zhig mchog gi rgyal po'i snying po sgrub byed pa/ /rgyal ba thams cad dgyes shing rgyal ba dgyes
par mdzad/ /de dag grags pa chen po thob nas bde ba'ang thob/ /de phyir 'di la dad cing gus par bya ba yin/ /de nas rgyal ba rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes
bya ba byin te/ yab mchog sangs rgyas sras ni legs so legs/ /sras mchog sangs rgyas sras ni legs so legs/ /rdo rje mchog ni rdo rje 'byung ba legs/ /dam pa'i
chos kyi bdag nyid legs so legs/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis yang dag byin brlab pa/ /rtag tu mi 'gyur don yod grub pa che/ /ji ltar dang po'i grub pa de bzhin du/ /phyi
nas kyang ni de bzhin grub par 'gyur/ /de ltar dag chen gsungs nas ni/ /sras dang bcas pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /rdo rje sems dpa' chen po yi/ /gsungs la rjes su
yi rang mdzad/ /dpal mchog dang po las/ rtog pa'i rgyal po thams cad kyi mchog rdzogs so// //thugs dam pa'i snying po tho lding du rgya gar gyi mkhan
po paN+Ti ta mkhas pa chen po maN+t+ra kA la sha dang / sgrub bsgyur gyi lo ts+tsha ba lha btsan po dge slong bla ma zhi ba'i 'od kyi zhal snga nas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// //
@#/ /lo ts+tsha chen po rin chen bzang po yis/ /dpal mchog dang po'i rgyud 'di bsgyur ba la/ /bar bar dpe ma rnyed pas ma 'gyur nas/ /bdag gis
'bad pas dpe btsal rnyed pas bsgyur// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya pradz+nyA pa ra mi ta na ya sha ta pa ny+tsa sha ti kA/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa'i tshul brgya lnga bcu ba/ /bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/bcom
ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mkhyen pa'i bye brag rnam pa tha dad pa dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che thams cad kyi cod pan gyis/ khams
gsum du dbang bcu rdzogs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ma/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa/ rnal 'byor can chen po'i dbang phyug /de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgyas chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid thugs su chud pa/ sna tshogs kyi bya ba mdzad de ma lus pa na sems can gyi khams
lus pa med pa thams cad kyi re ba thams cad yongs su bskang ba'i 'phrin las mdzad pa/ thugs rje chen po rnam par snang mdzad chen po/ rtag pa khams gsum
gyi mnyam pa nyid la bzhugs pa/ sku dang / gsung dang / thugs thams cad rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa/ lha'i rgyal po gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi gnas/ /'dod pa'i khams
thams cad na/ nor bu rin po che chen pos rab tu spras pa dang / ba dan kha dog sna tshogs dril bu brgyus pa rlung gis bskyod pa dang / me tog gi phreng ba dang / rnga ma dang / rgyan
phreng dang / chun 'phyang dang / zla ba lta bus mdzes par byas pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bzhugs pa/ shes pa bstod pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag
brgya dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / nam mkha'i snying
po dang / rdo rje khu tshur dang / 'jam dpal dang / sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / nam mkha' mdzod dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po bdud kyi stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms pa dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag brgya dang thabs cig ste/ yongs su bskor cing
mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid rnam par dag pa'i sgo zhes bya ba/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du
@#/ /dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su byang ba/ yang dag par ston te/ 'di ltar
rab tu dga' ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems pa'i gnas so/ /'dod chags kyi mtha' rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ /'di lta ste/
byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /reg pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /sdug pa'i 'ching ba rnam par dag pa'i
gnas so/ /lta ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /dga' ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ /'di lta ste/ byang chub
sems dpa'i gnas so/ /sred pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ /'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /bsnyems pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni
'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /rgyan rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /yid tshim par byed pa
rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /snang ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /
lus bde ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /gzugs rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i
gnas so/ /sgra rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /dri rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas
so| |ro rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/ /reg rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas
so| |de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyi rnam par dag pa ste/ chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyi stong pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
yongs su dag pa'o/ /lag na rdo rje/ /su la las chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid rnam par dag pa'i sgo sgrub pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di lan gcig thos na
yang / de byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du sgrib pa thams cad dang / chod pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa chen po bsags kyang
@#/ /sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa ngan song du nam yang skye bar mi 'gyur/ sdig pa yang byas ma thag tu sdug bsngal med par byang bar 'gyur
ro| |su zhig 'dzin pa dang / nyin re bzhin klog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / tshul bzhin yid la byed pa de tshe 'di nyid la chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid rdo rje'i ting nge
'dzin thob pas/ chos thams cad la dbang bsgyur bar 'gyur ro/ /chos thams cad la dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba myong bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub
sems dpa' chen po'i tshe bcu drug gis de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ rdo rje 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad pa/ theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa/ dkyil 'khor thams cad pa/ /rdo rje 'dzin mtha' dag gi sems can gyi mchog khams gsum ma lus pa dag
na| 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba/ sems can gyi khams lus pa med pa 'dul ba/ don thams cad grub pa/ dam tshig chen po pa/ rdo rje
gsang ba'i sems can du mas g.yog byas pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi don 'di ston te/ bzhin rab tu 'dzum zhing lag pa g.yon pa rdo rje bsgyings
te/ thog ma'i rdo rje chen po gsor nas/ rang gi snying gar gtod pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin cing / bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshil gces bya ba rang gi de kho na nyid kyi snying
po 'di smras so/ /hUM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs
par byang chub par sgrub pa zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do/ /rdo rje sra ba nyid kyis phyir/ rdo rje mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa
ni| byang chub chen po'o/ /don gcig pa'i phyir don gyi mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni/ byang chub chen po'o/ /ngo bo nyid kyis rnam par dag pa'i phyir
chos kyi mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni/ byang chub chen po'o/ /thams cad la rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir/ thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid mngon par
rdzogs par byang chub pa ni/ byang chub chen po'o/ /lag na rdo rje/ su la la chos mngon par sgrub pa bzhi po 'di dag nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / sgom pa de
sdig pa thams cad spyod kyang / byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du ngan song thams cad las yang dag par 'das par 'gyur ro/ /myur du bla na med pa yang dag par
@#/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas de skad ces bka' stsal nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes kyi khu tshur
yongs su 'dzin pa/ don gnas 'di nyid rgya cher ston cing / bzhin rab tu 'dzum dmul te/ chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi snying po rab tu smras so/ /a| de nas
ma rungs pa thams cad 'dul ba bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas kyang yang chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyis rnam par rgyal ba bsdu ba zhes bya
ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub pa 'di bshad de/ 'dod chags kyi spros pa med pa nyid kyis zhe sdang gi spros pa med pa nyid do/ /zhe sdang gi spros pa med pa nyid kyis
gti mug gi spros pa med pa nyid do/ /gti mug gi spros pa med pa nyid kyis chos thams cad spros pa med pa nyid do/ /chos thams cad kyi spros pa med pa nyid kyis shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spros pa med pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /lag na rdo rje/ su la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang /
sgom pa nges 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir khams gsum du skyes pa'i sems can thams cad bsad kyang ngan song du 'gro bar mi 'gyur te/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje chos nyid 'di'i don rgya chen po ston te/ 'jig rten gsum
las rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya bcings nas khro gnyer dang bcas shing smin ma bteg ste/ 'bar bar lta la pad+ma'i gdong khro zhing dgod de/ mche ba gtsigs nas
rkang pa g.yon pa brkyang ba'i tshul du gnas pas gnas nas/ rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so/ /hUM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nge bo nyid dag pa'i
chos nyid thob pas/ yang chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad
de| 'dod chags thams cad rnam par dag pas 'jig rten na zhe sdang thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /dri ma thams cad rnam par dag pas 'jig rten na sdig pa
thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /chos thams cad rnam par dag pas 'jig rten na sems can thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /shes pa thams cad
rnam par dag bas 'jig rten na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rje/ su la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan pa
@#/ /dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / sgom pa de 'dod chags dang / dri ma thams cad kyi nang na 'dug kyang pad+ma lta bur 'dod chags kyi nyes pa rnams
dang | dri ma rnams dang / glo bur gyi nyon mongs pa rnams kyis gos par mi 'gyur te/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
bar yang 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don gyi gnas 'di nyid rgya cher ston cing bzhin rab tu 'dzum dmul te/ pad+ma'i 'dab
ma kha 'byed pas 'dod chags la sogs pa'i dri mas mi gos pa la lta zhing / 'gro ba thams cad kyi phyir pad+ma gzugs sna tshogs zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so/ /hrIH/ de nas
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa khams gsum thams cad kyi dbang pos yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba las byung ba'i ye shes kyi snying po zhes
bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/ dbang bskur ba sbyin pa ni khams gsum thams cad kyi rgyal srid thob par 'gyur ro/ /nor sbyin pa ni re ba thams cad
yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /chos sbyin pa ni chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ /zang zing gi sbyin pa ni lus dang / dag dang / sems kyi bde ba thams cad
thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po bzhin rab tu 'dzum te/ rang gi mgo la rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur ba'i phreng ba
'ching zhing don 'di nyid rgya cher ston te/ dbang bskur ba thams cad kyi dam tshig rin po che zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so/ /trAH/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur 'dzin pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i gnas rdo rje zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin
pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid du 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa ni chos thams cad thob par 'gyur ro/ /de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad thob par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i phyag
rgya yongs su 'dzin pa ni lus dang / ngag dang / sems thams cad rdo rjer rdo rje'i dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /su la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di
@#/ /nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / lung 'bogs pa dang / skom pa des dngos grub thams cad dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang /
shes pa thams cad dang / dgos pa thams cad dang / lus dang / ngag dang / sems thams cad rdo rjer rdo rje'i dngos grub dam pa thob nas/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i khu tshur dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje'i
phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pas don gnas 'di rgya cher bstan te/ de bzhin rab tu 'dzum zhing rdo rje sra ba'i phyag rgya dngos grub thams cad kyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i snying po
'di smras so/ /aH/ de nas bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad spros pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas yang 'khor lo ltar yi ge bskor ba zhes bya ba shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/ ngo bo nyid med pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid do/ /mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad mtshan ma
med pa'o/ /smon pa med pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad smon pa med pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pas chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'od
gsal ba'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba don 'di nyid rgya cher ston te/ bzhin rab tu 'dzum bzhin du bdag gi ral gri des de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad la 'debs shing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po'i mchog 'di smras so/ /aH/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor der 'dus
pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor lo chen po la 'jug pa zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do/ /rdo rje mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa ni de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo la 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /don gyi mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor lo la 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /chos
thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa ni dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo la 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa ni 'khor lo thams cad la 'jug par
'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba chos mnyam pa nyid kyi don rgya cher ston cing bzhin 'dzum nas/ rdo rje'i 'khor lo
bskor zhing rdo rje'i 'khor lo thams cad la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so/ /hUM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa thams cad kyi cho ga
@#/ /rgyas pa'i snod kyis mchod pa thams cad kyi mchog ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do/ /byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa ni/
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i cho ga rgya che ba'o/ /sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su skyob pa na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i
cho ga rgyas pa'o/ /dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ger 'dri ba
dang | yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / brjod pa dang / ston pa dang / nyan pa dang / sems dang / sgom pa dang / mchod pa byed pa ni de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i mdzod don de nyid rgya cher ston te/ bzhin rab
tu 'dzum zhing las thams cad don yod pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so/ /oM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa/ sems can thams
cad 'dul nus pa/ yang ye shes kyi khu tshur yongs su 'dzin pa/ sems can thams cad 'dul ba shes pa'i snying po zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul
'di bshad do/ /sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas/ khro bo mnyam pa nyid do/ /sems can thams cad 'dul ba nyid pas/ khro bo 'dul ba nyid do/ /sems can thams cad
chos nyid pas khro bo chos nyid do/ /sems can thams cad rdo rje nyid pas khro bo rdo rje nyid do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad 'dul ba ni byang chub po/ /de nas
byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms pa don de nyid rgya cher ston te/ bzhin rab tu 'dzum zhing rdo rje mche ba'i phyag rgya dang / rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi gzugs
kyis rdo rje khro bo'i gad mo zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so/ /ha| de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa/ chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la gnas pas yang chos
thams cad kyi mchog ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do/ /thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do/ /thams
cad don nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don nyid do/ /thams cad chos nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chos nyid do/ /thams cad las nyid pas shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa las nyid du rig par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi don yod pa'i dam tshig
@#/ /gi dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ don yod pa thams cad kyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i snying po
'di smras so/ /hUM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad pa/ rnam par snang mdzad kyis yang sems can thams cad byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po thams cad kyi rang bzhin yin pas sems can thams cad ni
de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po can no/ /thams cad rdo rje'i snying pos dbang bskur ba nyid pas sems can thams cad ni rdo rje'i snying po can no/ /ngag thams cad rab tu
'byung bas sems can thams cad ni chos kyi snying po can no/ /sems can thams cad kyi bya ba byed pa la sbyor bas/ sems can thams cad ni las kyi snying po can no/ /de
nas phyi rol kyi rdo rje'i rigs rnams kyis ca co'i sgra phyung nas chos nyid kyi don rgya cher ston cing snying po phul te/ de nas rdo rje'i dbang phyug chen pos rang gi de kho na'i snying
po 'di phul lo/ /drI/ de nas ma mo thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ mgrin gcig tu thams cad dgug pa dang / gzung ba dang / gzhig pa dang /
sgrub pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba rang gi de kho na'i snying po 'di phul lo/ /b+h+yoHde nas sbrang rtsir byed la sogs pa ming po gsum gyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ tshigs
mthun par rang gi de kho na'i snying po 'di phul lo/ /swAHde nas sring mo bzhis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ rang gi de kho na'i snying po 'di phul lo/ /hA| de nas bcom ldan
'das de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas mu med la mthar thug cing mu med pa'i chos dang ldan pas yang chos 'di mthar thug par byin gyis brlab par bya ba'i phyir chos thams
cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi mthar thug pas byin gyis brlabs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa
nyid pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mtha' yas pa nyid do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid pas rdo rje thams cad mu med pa nyid do/ /shes rab kyi phyin pa du
ma nyid pas chos thams cad du ma nyid do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthar thug pa med pa nyid pas chos thams cad mthar thug pa med pa nyid yin no/ /su la la shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyam pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / glog pa dang / ston pa dang / brjod pa dang / sgom pa des sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems
@#/ /dpa'i spyod pa thug pa med pa'i mthar phyin te/ sgrib pa thams cad zad nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ rdo rje 'dzin par myur du 'gyur ro/ /de nas
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di don yod pa dang / thogs pa med par myur du 'grub par bya ba'i phyir/ /lag na rdo rje la legs
so zhes bya ba byin no/ /sems can chen po legs so legs/ /bde ba chen po legs so legs/ /theg pa chen po legs so legs/ /blo gros chen po legs so
legs/ /cho ga 'di ni legs par smras/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin kun gyis/ /'bras bu yod pa 'dul ba'i mchog /rdo rje mdo sde byin gyis brlabs/ /cho ga'i rgyal po
bla na med/ /gang rnams 'di dag 'dzin pa ni/ /bdud la sogs pa thams cad kyis/ /de dag mi sod mi tshugs so/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang / /dngos
grub dam pa thams cad kyang / /sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa bzhin/ /ring por mi thogs thob par 'gyur/ /de skad gsungs nas gsang grub phyir/ /rdo rje can gyis
bshad pa la/ /kun mchog sangs rgyas mkhas bcas pa/ /thams cad kyis ni mngon par bstod/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par
snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i chos nyid brnyes pa chos thams cad spros pa med pas yang bde ba chen po rdo rje'i don yod pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba
rdo rje don yod pa'i chos mnyam pa nyid kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo mchog dang po thog ma dang / tha ma da dang / dbus med pa'i dam pa 'di gsungs so/ /byang chub sems
dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'dod chags chen po dngos grub dam pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba chen po dngos grub dam par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa'
chen po rnams kyis bde ba chen po dngos grub dam pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub chen po dngos grub dam par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams
kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub chen po dngos grub dam pa ni bdud chen po'i stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms pa dngos grub dam par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub
sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bdud chen po'i stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms pa dngos grub dam pa ni khams gsum pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug chen po dngos grub dam par
'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi khams gsum pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug chen po'i dngos grub dam pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa na sems can
@#/ /gyi khams lus pa med pa yongs su sbyong bar 'dod pa'i rgyu'i phyir/ 'khor ba la yang chags shing brtson 'grus che ba'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po
rnams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa na sems can gyi khams lus pa med pa yongs su bskyab pa dang / sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba dang / mchog tu
shin tu bde ba chen po'i dngos grub dam par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ji srid 'khor ba'i gnas su ni/ /mkhas mchog 'dug par 'gyur ba'i tshe/ /de srid mtshungs
med sems can don/ /mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus/ /shes rab pha rol phyin thabs dang / /ye shes gnas su bsgrubs pas ni/ /chos kun rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ /
'khor ba yongs su dag par gyur/ /chags la sogs pas 'dul na ni/ /'khor ba'i bar du rtag par yang / /'jig rten sdig byed de sbyang phyir/ /'khor ba srid du
bdag nyid 'dul/ /ji ltar pad+ma rab dmar yang / /tshon gyi nyes pas mi gos pa/ /de bzhin gnas pa'i nyes pa yis/ /'gro phan rnams la mi gos so/ /'dod chags
chen po rnam par dag /bde ba che zhing nor che la/ /khams gsum dbang phyug thob pas na/ /sems can don rnams brtan par byed/ /lag na rdo rje/ su la la nang par
langs nas mchog dang po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyin re zhing 'don pa dang / nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / sgom
pa de yid bde ba dang / bde ba thams cad thob par 'gyur ro/ /bde ba chen po pa rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig dngos grub kyi mchog kyang tshe 'di la thob par 'gyur ro/ /de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba mchog kyang 'grub ste/ rdo rje 'dzin thams cad kyi chen po 'am/ de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan
'das kyis gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal ba/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo'i sngags kyi tshig nyi shu rtsa lnga po
'di rnams so/ /oM byang chub kyi sems rdo rje/ oM kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa/ oM yid bzhin gyi nor bu/ oM 'gog pa med pa/ oM skye ba bzlog pa/ oM rnam par shes
pa thams cad/ oM 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos nyid chen po/ oM brtson 'grus kyi go cha/ oM kun tu 'gro ba/ oM rdo rje sra ba'i sems/ hUM phaT/ oM de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad/ oM ngo bo nyid rnam par dag pa/ oM chos nyid shes pa rnam par dag pa/ oM de bzhin las rnam par sbyong ba/ hUM oM nges par gnod mdzes
@#/ /rdo rje can/ phaT/ oM 'dod pa la 'dod chags pa/ oM spong ba'i rdo rje can/ oM hUM thams cad 'dul ba/ oM hrIH/ oM a zhes bya ba'i sgo/ /oM shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ AM baM hUM a oM/ oM de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i mchog /oM de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung ram par dag pa/ oM de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rdo rje aHoM a/ sdig pas bcings pa thams cad chos shig /ngan song gi rgyud thams cad las thar par gyis shig /oM
dam tshigs thams cad kyi rdo rje hUM traT/ sdig pa gzhom pa'i phyag rgya dang sngags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dngos grub dam pa rdo rje 'dzin chen
po dang / de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rje/ 'di ni sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa rnams kyi rna lam du thos par mi 'gyur ro/ /'di ni sems
can dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa rnams kyis mnyan pa 'am/ yi ger 'dri ba 'am/ yi ger 'dir gzhug pa 'am/ bklag pa 'am/ 'chang ba 'am/ bsgom pa 'am/
bsti stang du bya ba'am/ ri mor bya ba 'am/ mchod par mi nus so/ /gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tha na yi ge 'bru
gcig tsam thos na yang sems can de dag ni gzhan na sangs rgyas mang po la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa yin na mtha' dag rdzogs pa lta ci smos/ lag na rdo rje/ gang la la dag
sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig gang gA'i klung brgyad cu'i bye ma snyed la bkur sti ma byas pa dang / bla mar ma byas pa dang / bsti stang ma byas pa dang / mchod pa ma byas pa de dag gis
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo'i chos kyi rnam grang 'di thos par mi nus so/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang na spyod pa'i sa phyogs de mchod rten du 'gyur ro/ /chos
kyi rnam grangs 'di gang gi lus la thogs sam/ glegs bam la bris te spyod pa'i gang zag de phyag bya ba'i gnas su 'gyur ro/ /de bskal ba bye ba mang por skye ba dran par 'gyur
ro/ /de la bdud sdig to can par chad byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha gzhan rnams kyang de la bsrung pa dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba'i phyir rtag tu phyi bzhin
'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /ya nga ba ma spangs par 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro/ /mdor na sangs rgyas
kyi zhing gang dang gang du 'dod pa de dang der skye'o/ /de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di phan yon mang mod kyi ngas phyogs tsam zhig
@#/ /brjod do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang / byang chub
sems dpa' de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshul brgya lnga bcu pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ sarba ta thA ga ta kA
ya bAk+tsit+ta guh+ya a lang kA ra byA ha tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma/ bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pas sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi gsang ba rgyan gyi bkod pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi
rgyal po/ bla ma dang / 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi zhabs kyi pad+mo gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje ye shes rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje
ye shes phyag rgya chen po'i dam tshig gi byin gyis brlabs kyis rdo rje'i sku chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje ye shes
rin po che chen po'i cod pan gyi rtse mo'i gtsug phud kyis dbang bskur ba brnyes pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung ba dang / thugs rdo rje ye shes kyi ting nge
'dzin chen po dang ldan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje ye shes kyi las sna tshogs pa chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje ye shes mchod pa chen po spro ba'i dam tshig gi gsang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje
ye shes dkyil 'khor chen po dam tshig gi de kho na nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje ye shes gsang ba chen po'i snying po dang / de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje ye shes kyi mnga' bdag chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs
rdo rje ye shes kun tu bzang po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje se shes dpe med cing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa nam mkha' lta bu dang /
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje rigs dang / snying po dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / rig pa gnyis su med par gyur ba dang /
@#/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje ye shes pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po la dga' ba dang / de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje ye shes lhag pa'i snying po mdzes pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs
rdo rje ye shes rgyan chen po bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i snying po la nam mkha'i khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul dang mnyam pa'i rdo rje ye shes chen po la 'ba'
zhig dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ /de'ang 'di lta ste/ sgo mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje yum chen mo dang / nam mkha'i sgo zhes bya ba'i rdo rje yum chen mo dang / a bo
dza'i sgo zhes bya ba'i rdo rje yum chen mo dang / 'gyur ba med pa'i sgo zhes bya ba'i rdo rje yum chen mo dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma zhes bya ba'i rdo rje yum chen mo dang /
gzhan yang ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'i rdo rje btsun mo stong phrag brgyal 'ang 'di lta
ste/ mda'i mtshon cha'i lag ces bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo dang / dbang phyug la lta ba'i rim zhes bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo dang / nye bar zhi ba'i bzhin ras zhes bya ba'i

rdo rje btsun mo dang / gyen du lta ba'i bzhin ras zhes bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo dang / 'dod pa'i zla mtshan rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo dang / brda' sprod pa ma zhes bya ba'i rdo rje btsun
mo dang / 'bri ba'i sgo zhes bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo dang / rol pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo dang / 'dod pa'i mchog ces bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo dang / dbang phyug gi
bde ba'i sgo zhes bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo dang / dmigs pa'i sgo zhes bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo dang / brang las skyes zhes bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo ste/ de dag la sogs pa rdo rje btsun
mo rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar to/ /gzhan yang / dpag tu med pa'i rdo rje pho nya mo chen mo rnams dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de yang 'di lta ste/ snying
bskul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje pho nya mo chen mo dang / gdug pa thams cad 'gugs pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje pho nya mo chen mo dang / rjes su mnyes pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rdo rje pho nya mo
chen mo dang / khrag 'gugs pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje pho nya mo chen mo dang / thams cad 'phrog pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje pho nya mo chen po la sogs pa'o/ /gzhan yang / 'jig rten gyi
khams rgyas pa'i rdo rje sgo srung ma chen mo rnams dang yang thabs gcig ste/ de'ang 'di lta ste/ rdo rje 'bebs pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje sgo srung ma chen mo dang / dam tshig gsum
@#/ /ldan zhes bya ba'i rdo rje sgo srung ma chen mo dang / 'jig pa'i yan lag can zhes bya ba'i rdo rje sgo srung ma chen mo dang / thog ma pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje sgo
srung ma chen mo dang / gdul dka' 'dul zhes bya ba'i rdo rje sgo srung ma chen mo la sogs pa'o/ /gzhan yang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rdo rje bran mo chen mo rnams dang yang
thabs gcig ste/ de'ang 'di lta ste/ sku gsung thugs thams cad rdo rjes 'ching ba ma zhes bya ba'i rdo rje bran mo chen mo dang / 'jigs pa'i me'i gdong zhes bya ba'i rdo rje bran
mo chen mo dang / gtsigs shing rnam par 'gyur ba'i gdong zhes bya ba'i rdo rje bran mo chen mo dang / 'jig rten gsum 'ching ba zhes bya ba rdo rje bran mo chen mo dang /
bskal bar gnas pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rdo rje bran mo chen mo'o/ /gzhan yang / dpe med pa'i rdo rje rol pa mo chen mo rnams dang yang thabs gcig ste/ de'ang 'di lta
ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje dgyes pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje rol pa chen mo dang / kun nas 'bebs pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje rol pa chen mo
dang / 'jig rten gsum rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje rol pa chen mo dang / rab tu dga' ba'i rjes su 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i rdo rje rol pa chen mo dang / thams
cad dga' bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje rol pa chen po la sogs pa'o/ /gzhan yang / nam mkha'i khams thams cad rgyas par gang ba'i rdo rje'i yab rnams dang yang thabs gcig
ste| de'ang 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ces bya ba'i rdo rje'i yab chen po dang / mkha' 'gro'i rdo rje dbang phyug dang / dri yi dbang phyug dang / stug po bkod pa dang / zla ba'i
'od dang / 'dun pa srel dang / skye bo yongs su dor ba dang / legs par sbyangs pa dang / 'dod pa'i rdo rje dang / gdung ba skyed pa dang / 'dul bar byed pa dang / gdug pa
thams cad sel bar byed pa dang / de kho na nyid kyi mgon po dang / gnas pa po dang / brtse ba can dang / chos 'chang ba dang / bskyod pa po dang / spo ba po dang / 'ching ba po dang /
skor ba po dang / de dag la sogs pa rdo rje yab rnams so/ /gzhan yang / mtha' yas pa'i rdo rje pho nya mo 'phrog pa'i rdo rje bran po rdo rje'i tshogs dang thabs gcig ste/ de'ang 'di lta

ste/ rdo rje rlung zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje me dang / rdo rje mi 'khrugs pa dang / rdo rje chu dang / gzhan yang / rdo rje rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di lta ste/ zhi bar byed pa dang / rgyas par byed pa
pa dang / dbang du byed pa dang / mi shes pa thams cad zad par byed pa ste de dag la sogs pa'o/ /gzhan yang / mchog tu rgya chen po sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rab tu gnas
@#/ /pa'i mchod pa dang ldan pa bcom ldan 'das ston pa rtag pa mchog gi mnga' bdag ste/ /kun tu bzang po'i sku yi ni/ /'jig rten gsum gyi dkyil
'khor spros/ /bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin legs bzhugs/ /gsang ba rgyan gyi sbyor bas so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyed par byed pa'i yum gsang ba'i rdo rje
'dus pa thob ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yab dang lhan cig tu dga' ba'i bde ba rjes su byung ste 'khor dang bcas pa rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar
lhags te/ rdo rje'i glu 'dis mngon par bstod nas zhu ba zhus pa/ /sangs rgyas kun don khyod phyag 'tshal/ /rdo rje 'byung ba khyod la 'dud/ /thugs kyi rin chen mchog
khyod 'dud/ /chos kyi blo gros khyod la 'dud/ /chos rnams kun mchog khyod la 'dud/ /sna tshogs dgongs pa khyod la 'dud/ /dam tshig mchog gi khyod la 'dud/ /
rdo rje sems dpa' phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /grags pa chen po bdag cag ni/ /mgon po khyod la zhu ba zhu/ /sangs rgyas thams cad skyed byed yum/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni dkyil
'khor mchog /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i yum rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum rnams de skad ma smra zhig /'jig rten thams cad la khyab pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po chen po 'di la ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams
dad par mi 'gyur zhing / rang gi sems yongs su sun 'byin la des ma mthong ba'i chos la ma dad pas rang gi sems yang dag par sun phyung ste/ mnar med pa rnams su
skyes nas bskal pa stong phrag mang por mnar med pa'i sdug bsngal rjes su 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de brgya lam na mnar med pa'i sdug bsngal las grol te/ mi rnams su
skyes par gyur kyang rnam par 'gyur ba'i bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /brjed ngas pa rnams dang / blo gros chung ba rnams dang / khyi dang / bya rog dang / byi la dang / phag dang / stag
dang / glang po che dang / seng ge'i nga ro 'dra ba dag tu 'gyur ro/ /de dag 'dre bar mi bya zhing blta bar mi bya'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bskyed pa'i yum
de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar sems can de rnams kyi mnar med pa'i sdug bsngal zad par 'gyur/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ gang gis 'di'i ming gzung na yongs su zad par 'gyur ro/ /bsod nams de'i rgyus de'i las kyi sgrib pa zad de bla na med pa yang dag par
@#/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi skal ba can du 'gyur ro/ /de nas de dag yid dga' ba skyes nas yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
bcom ldan 'das/ bstan du gsol/ bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs kyi rgyus dkyil 'khor chen po'i rgyal po sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir
gang ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams kyis dran pa tsam gyis sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kun tu bzang po chen po/ 'od 'phro ba
gsal ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /rang gi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje rnams las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i
dam pa 'di bka' stsal ba/ /dkyil 'khor kun gyi yum gyur ba/ /stong nyid ye shes nyid du bshad/ /ci zhig nga yis bstan par bya/ /rtogs pa thams cad rnam par
spangs/ /sems can rnams la phan bzhed pa/ /gang zhig cung zad bstan par bya/ /de kun sgyu mas sgyu ma'o/ /'gro ba sgyu ma lta bur shes/ /des na sgyu ma lta bu yis/ /
sgyu ma lta bu'i dkyil 'khor bya/ /nam mkha'i khams kyis khyab pa yis/ /thams cad yum gyis yang dag 'khrugs/ /phyi rol yang ni brtag par bya/ /gsang ba'i
dkyil 'khor yum rnams kyis/ /dben zhing dga' ba'i gnas su ni/ /yid kyi legs par 'dus byas pa/ /nam mkha' la ni thig gis gdab/ /thog mar de yi dam pas so/ /
de nas rnal 'byor chen pos thig /gsang ba'i yum gyi dkyil 'khor ro/ /mu khyud dag gi rnam bdun du/ /kun nas yongs su bskor bar bya/ /dbus kyis cha ru dkyil 'khor
ni| |'khor lo lta bur bri bar bya/ /kun nas brgyad gnyis mdzes pa ni/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi yi dbus su'o/ /'khor lo'i lte ba'i dbus su ni/ /pad+ma ze'u 'bru ldan pa bri/ /mtshams
dang mtshams su 'ang bam ni/ ji lta ba bzhin bsnyems bcas pas/ /srad bu lnga yis yang dag 'khrugs/ /srid bu bzhi yis nye bar sbras/ /sgo bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan/ /rta
babs seng+ge dag gis brgyan/ /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan sogs/ /bla res steng du bres pa dang / rin chen rdo rje pad ldan sngon/ /dpag bsam shing gi lcug mas khyab/ /
bum bzang rin chen ldan pa'i mchog /rgyan phreng glang po ldan pa ni/ /phyi rol gnas te legs par bri/ /rtog dang mi rtog rnam spangs te/ /dkyil 'khor rgyal po'i dbus su
ni/ /gsang ba rgyan gyi rdo rje bya/ /mnyam par gzhag cing spro ba yis/ /sems kyis bri ba nyid du bya/ /de nas lha mo zhal bzhi ma/ /shes rab pha rol phyin dge ba/ /phyag
@#/ /bzhi ba la spyan yangs ma/ /phyag gnyis kyis ni chos 'chad cing / /zhi ba'i g.yas par rdo rje ste/ /g.yon pa pad+mas rnam par brgyan/ /dkar dang
dmar po cher sngo ba/ /sngo bsangs rin chen mchog mdzes 'od/ /gtsug na rin chen gtsug tor che/ /gtsug rgyan con pan dam pa can/ /skal ba chen po 'od ldan ma/ /
rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par klubs/ /gos kyis stod ni legs bsgribs pa/ /bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor 'dzum bcas shing / /sna tshogs gos ni legs gyon pa/ /dbu ma'i
zhal ras gser gyi 'od/ /zhabs gnyis dbus su 'khor lo ste/ /mdun na rin chen bdun gnas pa/ /pad+ma mchog ldan seng+ge'i khri/ /zla ba rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gdan/ /nyi
ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od 'phro ba/ /rgyab tu nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /dpa' bo de yis bri bar bya/ /'di yi mdun du bri bya ba/ /dpa' bo mtha' yas pa yi zhal/ /stong phrag
du ma'i phyag ldan ma/ /mtshan nyid thams cad yang dag rdzogs/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /phyag gis rdo rje pad+ma 'chang / /sna tshogs phyag rgyas phyag
gzhan dkrigs/ /gtsug ldan dar gyi cod pan can/ /dbu rgyan pad+ma'i bzhin ras ma/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dag la bzhugs/ /de 'od nyi ma lta bu'i 'od/ /dpa'
bo'i rnal 'byor ldan pa yi/ /dpa' bo des ni bri bar bya/ /rdo rje sems dpar bdag bsgoms te/ /der ni bsnyems pas 'gro bar bya/ /dpa' bos lho ru bri bya ba/ /gshin rje'i 'dab
ma mdzes pa la/ /mchog sbyin nam mkha' dge ma yang / /rin chen khri la legs par bzhugs/ /bzhin ras sngo la spyan dkar ba/ /'dzum bcas nor bu'i 'og pag can/ /
mgul rgyan rin chen phreng ba mchog /rkang gdub gdu bu rin po che/ /yid bzhin nor bu'i lag pa can/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin dgongs ma/ /de nas blo ldan rab song ste/ /nub
tu yang ni de bzhin du/ /dpal dang ldan pas legs par bri/ /chu las skyes ma yid 'phrog ma/ /dmar po'i gos 'dzin dag pa ma/ /gtsug na cod pan gyis spras ma/ /sprul
rgyan sna tshogs lus can ma/ /dar dang rin chen gyis klubs ma/ /pad+ma 'byed pa'i sbyor ba yi/ /phyag gi lo 'dab dang ldan pas/ /zla ba'i gdan la yang dag bzhugs/ /nyi ma
du ma'i snang ba can/ /ji ltar rigs pa bri bar bya/ /de nas byang du phyin nas su/ /song ste dpa' bos bri bya ba/ /mi g.yo bzhin ras grags chen ma/ /mar gad 'bar ba
mtshungs pa mo/ /dkar po'i dar gyis yang dag klubs/ /gtsug na nor bu cod pan bzang / /gtsug rgyan sna tshogs dag gis spras/ /rdo rje dril bu'i lag bkra ma/ /sna
@#/ /tshogs rgyan dang gos ldan pas/ /zla ba'i gdan la yang dag bzhugs/ /'od kyis gtams pa'i dkyil 'khor mchog /de nas mtshams kyi
'dab ma la/ /me tog bdug pa dri ldan ma/ /rdo rje snang byed dag pa ma'i/ /mchod pa sngags rig pa yis bris/ /gzugs sgra dri dang ro dang reg /rang gi bdag po'i phyogs
su'o| |'dab ma 'dab mar thams cad du/ /bzhad dang sgeg dang dbyangs chen po/ /gar gyi phyag rgya grags chen po/ /sngags pas 'bad de bri bar bya/ /pad+ma la skyes
'dab ma la/ /thams cad du ni 'grub pa bri/ /sgo rnams dag ni thams cad la/ /sgo skyong ba ni rnam bzhi dang / /phyi rol du yang lha la sogs/ /ming ni yang dag bri bar bya/ /
de nas khrus byas lus byugs la/ /me tog bdu ga sogs kyis bdug ste/ /sna tshogs gos ni rab gyon la/ /me tog phreng dang gos kyis brgyan/ /gtsug phud cod pan
dang ldan zhing / /mdzes pa'i dar gyis yang dag klubs/ /rdo rje dril bu lag par ldan/ /sbyor ba bzang po'i rnam gzhag gis/ /de nas thams cad dgug par bya/ /rdo rje
ma mo dka' thub che/ /bzlog dang rnal ma'i phyag rgya yis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bzlas nas su/ /rdo rje'i sbyor bas gar bya zhing / /lan gsum du ni g.yas bskor bas/ /
rdo rje ma mo'i dkyil 'khor rnams/ /dam tshig ldan pa thams cad byon/ /glu dbyangs kyi ni rgyal pos bskul/ /rang gi slob ma'i tshogs gar gyis/ /dregs pa yis ni g.yas dang
g.yon/ /'gying ba dang ni 'dud par bya/ /'dir gshegs 'dir gshegs sems can don mdzad brtson pa po/ /ser sna mi mnga' sangs rgyas tshogs mchog mtha' dag dang / /
bde gshegs dam pa'i yum gyur srid pa'i bskyed pa po/ /pha rol don mdzad dus la de ring bab pa lags/ /zhes so/ /de nas de dag rang nyid kyi/ /rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul
bas byon/ /mtshan ma dag ni bzang po rnams/ /dkyil 'khor dag tu blta bar bya/ /rang ngam gzhan la 'bab sogs pa'i/ /mtshan ma ji ltar mthong ba na/ /de tshe nges par ma
mo ni| |bde gshegs thugs kyi dgongs par byon/ /de nas mchod yon zhabs bsil cho ga ji bzhin rab brtags te/ /de tshe babs pa'i sems can bsod nams ldan la
bri bar bya/ /gal te de ni mi smra ba na hUM gi yi ge dang / /ldan pa'i glu dbyangs kyis ni yongs su bskul ba nyid du bya'o/ /de nas shes rab ldan ma gzhug /slob ma'i gtso bo thal
sbyar te/ /mig la mig dar gyis g.yogs la/ /rab dga' bdag yin yang dag dga'/ /ma mo thams cad la dmigs te/ /der ni me tog dor bar bya/ /me tog gang
@#/ /la lhung gyur ba/ /ma mo de ni de yis 'grub/ /de nas go rims ji bzhin du/ /sgo skyong ba nas brtsams nas su/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i bar/ /
slob ma la ni bshad par bya/ /dam tshig thob par gyur nas su/ /sdom pa dag ni gzung bar bya/ /ma mo'i sngags dang phyag rgya ni/ /mnyam par gzhag pas bstan par bya/ /gzhan
du slob dpon blo ngan ni/ /nges par dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur/ /de nas kyang yang dag 'grub cing / /myur du dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur/ /bgegs dang log par 'dren pa
'am/ /rims dang gdon dang dug sogs kyis/ /gdungs te nad kyis rgyun du ni/ /'chi ba ru yang 'gyur ba yin/ /rdo rje slob dpon smad pa na/ /rtag tu dmyal ba nyid du ni/ /
rab tu rmongs pa'i slob ma 'gro/ /mkha' las rdo rje ji bzhin no/ /des na bu kye dam tshig ni /khyod kyis rtag tu srung bar byos/ /ma mo kun gyi sdom pa ni/ /theg pa chen
po'i cho gas gnas/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs te/ rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyis yum rnams kyi dam tshig bka' stsal ba/ /rin
chen sems kyi dam tshig gis/ /rnam pa gsum ni sbyang bar bya/ thog mtha' bar gyi sbyor ba yis/ /chung 'bring mchog gi dbye ba yis/ /de 'dra'i dam tshig yang dag
pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis bka' stsal to/ /ji srid sems ni sbyangs kyi bar/ /'bad pa yis ni bsgom par bya/ /bud med thams cad mthong ba na/ /lan gsum du ni bskor nas
kyang / /spyi bor phyag ni byas nas su/ /lan gsum par du gsol ba gdab/ /bdag gi ma khyod bu yin te/ /ji srid byang chub thob par du/ /byang chub yan lag nu ma las/ /byung
ma rang gi 'o mas skyongs/ /de nas sbyor ldan rab dge ba'i/ /dbang bskur ba ni sbyin par bya/ /gser la sogs pa'i bum pa ru/ /dri yi rgyas ni yongs bkang la/ /dar dang ras sogs
kyis g.yogs te/ /me tog chun pos mgul brgyan nas/ /rin chen sman gyis rab bkang ba'i/ /gcig lhag bcu drug bzang po la/ /ma mo'i snying bo nyid kyis ni/ /brgya rtsa brgyad
du bzlas pa yis/ /sngags shes pas ni dbang bskur ro/ /slob ma zhi ba bzang po yis/ /thog mar zhu ba byas nas kyang / /zhabs gnyis la ni mgos btud nas/ /bdag ni che go mo
rdo rje/ /byang chub sems ni rnam bsgoms pa'o/ /slob dpon zhabs kyi chu skyes la/ /dbang bskur phyir ni zhu ba bgyid/ skal ba chen po bdag la stsal/ /slob dpon mchog tu
rmad byung ba/ /dbang bskur rgyal ba thams cad kyis/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub pa/ /des ni bdag gi sems can rnams/ /don gyi dam pa bdag gis bgyi/ /sangs rgyas kun
@#/ /gyis don bgyid pa/ /brtul zhugs bzang po khyod kyi drin/ /de nas dbang bskur sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang gnas/ /slob mas ye
shes rdo rje yi/ /go 'phang la ni gzhag nas su/ /bum pa bzang po gcig gam ni/ /yang na bcu drug dag gam ni/ /lnga 'am yang na bcu yis ni/ /dkyil 'khor du ni dbang
bskur ro/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni mdun du ni/ /dkyil 'khor pad+ma bri bar bya/ /pad+ma lo 'dab brgyad pa la/ /ge sar lte ba ldan par bri/ /de yi dbus su rdo rje bri/ /sna tshogs rdo rje 'od
zer phreng / /de yi mdun du 'khor lo bri/ /chen po rin chen bdun gyis bskor/ /lho yi phyogs su rin po che/ /nub tu pad+ma nyid yin te/ /byang du ral gri chen po'o/ /'bar ba'i phreng
'khrugs 'od zer can/ grwa yi phyogs ni thams cad du/ /me tog bdug pa dri zhim pa/ /'od ldan pa ni skal ba che/ /sgo dang sgo ru bzhi nyid do/ /phyi rol tu yang mi 'chi kun/ //
gcig nas gcig tu rgyal sgrogs pa/ /bde byed gcer bu'i cha lugs te/ /ming thos pa dang ldan pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni/ /slob ma bsnyems dang bcas pa bzhag /
chos kyi rang bzhin gtam brjod do/ /de ring khyod ni rigs su skyes/ /'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po che/ /rtag pa dam pa'i dbang phyug pa/ /thabs dang shes rab ldan pa'i dpal
dag pa'i dbang phyug kun gyi bdag /rdo rje pad+ma lag byin te/ /gnang ba bzang po rab tu sbyin/ /bu yis bya ba chen po gyis/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi go 'phang gnas/ /der ni sbyor ba 'ongs nas
su/ /gsang ba'i sdom pa sbyin par bya/ /'di la mchog tu dga' ba ste/ /yum rnams rab tu rmad byung ba'o/ /dus su 'dod pa nyid du gyis/ /dam tshig mchog tu gyur ba'o/ /brtul zhugs
bzang pos ci 'byor bas/ /de nas yon ni phul byas nas/ /slob dpon gyi ni zhabs la btud/ /ma dang chung ma bu mo dang / /srid mo sring mo'i bu mo dang / /bu rnams dang ni bdag nyid
dang / /rgyal po longs spyod gter dang ni/ /nor dang 'bru dang grong shing rta/ /glang po rta dang ba glang sogs/ /ma he dang ni ma he mo/ /gzhan dang gzhan yang ci 'dod pa/ /bla ma la
ni chen pos dbul/ /bya dang mi bya rdzas kyi mchog /thams cad kyang ni dbul bar bya/ /de nas bcom ldan ma rnams la/ /rgyan phreng rnams dang bzhad gad dang / /sgeg dang rtse
'jo dga' ba dang / /rab tu dga' ba'i bde chen dang / /bza' btung bca' ba la sogs pa'i/ /rnam pa du ma thams cad kyis/ /mchod nas gshegs su gsol bar bya/ /sems can
kun gyi don dang ni/ /bdag gi yang ni ches cher mdzad/ /bde gshegs gang du gshegs pa der/ /ma mo thams cad gshegs su gsol/ /shes rab ldan pas yon phul
@#/ /te/ /slob ma'i mchog dang bcas pa yis/ /gar byas lag pa mgor bzhag ste/ /rims kyis 'gyed dang 'dud par bya/ /de nas bzang mo rnam mnyes
te/ /thams cad sgrub par byed pa'i mchog /bdag gis skal bzang stsal nas kyang / /rang gi sras kyi gnas su gshegs/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung
dang / thugs rdo rje ye shes yum chen mo rnams kyi phyag rgya ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs so// //de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i
yum bcom ldan 'das ma rnams kyis yang gsang ba'i dus pa las byung bar rang rang gi sgrub pa'i thabs rgyas pa bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces zhus so/ /shes rab ye shes
mchog sgrub pa'i/ /sems dpa' chen pos gsung du gsol/ /thabs kyis sems can thams cad kun/ /sangs rgyas byang chub 'bras thob pa/ /rdo rje ye shes mchog gyur ba/ /
rdo rje'i sku ste rdo rje mchog /dngos grub kun gyi bde ster ba/ /rdo rje chen pos gsung du gsol/ /thugs kyi rin chen ldan pa'i mchog /gzi brjid rdo rje snang ba can/ /sems can rnams
kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / /'grub pa'i yon tan 'byung gnas gsungs/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rnal 'byor che/ /rnal 'byor chen po dbang phyug che/ /dpa' bo'i sbyor bas gar gnas pa'i/ /
dpa' bo chen pos bshad du gsol/ /las kun gyi ni 'bras brnyes pas/ /sna tshogs mkhyen pa dbang phyug che/ /sems can rnams kyi yab chen po/ /sna tshogs dam pa bshad du gsol/ /
zhes bya bas so/ /de nas bcom ldan rtag pa'i rgyal/ /dam pa'i dbang phyug kun mkhyen pas/ /gsung mchog nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i/ /zab mo yi ni chos bka' stsal/ /'di ni
sgrub po gang yang med/ dngos grub bam ni sgrub thabs kyang / /thabs cad rnam par rtog las byung / /rnam rtog kyang ni dmigs ma yin/ /bdag med sangs rgyas rnams kyang med/ /chos
rnams med cing chos nyid med/ /sbyor ba med cing sems can med/ /de bzhin pha dang ma yang med/ /byed pa med cing skyong ba med/ /'bras bu med cing rgyu yod min//longs spyod med cing za
po med/ /shes med shes pa po yang med/ /rnam shes med cing shes bya med/ /brdzun min bden pa'ang ma yin pa/ /des na snang ba thams cad ni/ /sgyu ma lta bu nyid las byung / /de ltar chos
rnams rnam rig pa/ /grol nas gos par mi 'gyur te/ /dngos grub chen po 'grub par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas byang chub bde chen po/ /zab mo'i chos ni thos pa na/ /mkhas pa gang zhig dad
gyur na/ /snying po phyag rgya sngags rig rnams/ /gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur/ /sbyor ba 'di ni bcom ldan gsungs/ /thams cad dag par byed pa'i mchog /gsang ba'i rgyan la legs
@#/ /bzhugs nas/ /sems can rnams la bstan pa po/ /de nas yum rnams tshim gyur te/ /rang byung ba la zhu ba zhus/ /grub pa'i sgrub thabs rab sbyor ba/ /mnga' bdag
rnal 'byor rnams kyis gsungs/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum las kyi dam tshig 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
zhugs nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /de yi stong du ma nyams pa/ /nam mkha'i mtha' klas khyab pa yi/ /phyogs kun tu ni rab 'phro ba'o/ /de
yi steng du gzi brjid che/ /dus mtha' me dang mtshungs 'dra ba/ /de yi steng du sa chen po/ /gser gyi ri bo dang mtshungs pa/ /de yi steng du chur shes bya/ /zla ba gang ba kha ba 'dra/ /sngags pas
cho ga bzhin du bsam/ /rin chen bzhi yi rang bzhin bzang / /stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi yi/ /dpag tshad kyi na tshid tsam pa/ /grub bzhi ba la sgo bzhi ba/ /rta babs bzhi yi rtse mo can/ /ri
bo chen po cog brgyad pa/ /dbus su rdo rje'i ri bo mchog /de yi steng du rdo rje che/ /kun tu phyogs pa yongs su bsgom/ /sngo bsangs mar ga ta 'dra ba/ /sna tshogs 'od kyis yang dag
'khrugs/ /de yi steng du rdo rje che/ /rtse mo lnga ba rnam par bsam/ /dkar po shel dang 'dra ba'o/ /'od zer lnga yis rnam par spras/ /de yi steng du rin po che/ /chu skyes sngon po'i 'dab
'dra ba/ /sna tshogs 'od zer stong gi phreng / /phyogs bcu nam mkha' khyab pa'o/ /de yi gtsug tu pad+ma che/ /nam mkha' khyab pa yi ni mchog /lo ma stong phrag du ma can/ /lte ba dang ni ze'u 'brus
dkrigs/ /de yi mdun du nyi ma che/ /'od zer stong phrag du ma can/ /de yi steng du zla ba che/ /dkar po'i 'od zer 'bar bas dkrigs/ /nam mkha'i khams ni gang ba yin/ /gzi brjid dkar po 'phro
ba'o/ /de yi dbus su ma mo bri/ /dus gsum bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang / /yongs su dag pa mkha' 'dra ma/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'phro ba mo/ /phyag gnyis ma la thugs zhi ba/ /bsam gtan
spyan ldan bsam gtan yid/ /bsam gtan mchog gi phyag rgya yi/ /ser mo gzhon nu rab bzhad pa/ /dkar po'i gos 'dzin mdzes pa mo/ /dkar po yi ni rgyan gyis brgyan/ /ral ba'i thor tshugs
cod pan bzang / /gtsug gi nor bu 'od ldan pa/ /ye shes gdan la mnyam par bzhugs/ /ba spu rnams kyi rtse bug gnas/ /rgyal ba rab tu 'phros pa ste/ /byang chub pha rol son par mdzad/ /de
yi thugs kar rnam bsam pa/ /yi ge mchog tu mi 'gyur ba/ /yi ge rnams kyis yang dag dkrigs/ /thams cad du ni legs 'phro ba'o/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni mdun gnas pa/ /rab tu thal
mo sbyor ba 'o/ /de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /rig sngags khro bo'i tshogs kyang ni/ /chos nyan pa yi tshul du yang / /dkyil 'khor du ni gzhag par bya/ /sgo ni phyogs ni thams
@#/ /cad du/ /sgo skyong ba ni bzhi rnams so/ /sbyin pa la sogs ci rigs par/ /bcu drug po'ang gzhag par bya/ /me tog bdug pa mar me che/ /ji lta ba bzhin gzhag par
bya/ /lha klu de bzhin gnod sbyin dang / /dri za lha min dmyal las byung / /'di rnams thams cad lhun po la/ /kun nas yongs su gzhag par bya/ /de nas me tog phreng ldan 'jug /dri dang me
tog yang dag ldan/ /gos dkar 'dzin pa dpal dang ldan/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /shes rab 'phro dang lhan cig tu/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rjes dran pas/ /bdag dag
pas ni dag par bya/ /shes rab sbyor bas gang gnas pas/ /sgo yi drung du legs 'khod la/ /glu 'di yis ni spyan drang bya/ /thugs rje mnga' ba chos kyi dbang phyug sangs rgyas yum/ /rang
gi yab kyi tshogs dang sras dang bcas te byon/ /spyon cig spyon cig lha dang sring mor bcas mchod pa'i/ /'jig rten dbang phyug yang dag byang chub thugs mnga' ba/ /spyon cig
spyon cig thugs rje'i bdag nyid 'jig rten gnyen/ /chos kyi yi ge bde bar gshegs pas rjes bskos pa/ /mkha' ltar yongs dag dri med dam bca' dran par mdzod/ /ma
mo rnams ni mchog glus bskul bas byon par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das ma byon par mthong nas rang gis me tog gi snyim pa dang / mchod yon dang / zhabs bsil
dbul par bya'o/ /oM bdag gi mchod yon zhabs bsil 'di/ /ci bde bar ni bzhes su gsol/ /de nas de dang lhan cig tu/ /'dres pa ru ni gyur bar bsam/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta

pra dz+nyA dz+nyA na sa ma ye hUM sa ma ya s+t+waM/ de nas 'di yis brtan par bya ste/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsa la sa ma ya ma tsa la s+t+waM/ de nas 'dis mnyes par bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma na san+tu sti sa ma

ye hUM/ e h+ye hi dzaHe h+ye hi dzaH/ de nas dpag tu med pa'i ngo mtshar chen po lta ba'i phyir/ /oM sarba ang+ga puN+Da ra ma hA b+ha ga bA na sa la sma ra sma ra s+pha ra s+pha ra sarba ang+ga a bA yu bik+Sh+Nu ma hA
bud+d+ha sa mu drAn hUM hUM aM/ 'di yis ma mo bskul nas su/ /sangs rgyas sprin ni 'od po che/ /dkyil 'khor ba la spro bar bya/ /de nas gsang sngags 'di yis ni/ /bsngags te me tog dor bar
bya/ /oM sarba ang+ga puN+Da rI ka pra tI ts+tsha d+hAM ku su mAny+dza liM hUM a/ de nas ji ltar bshad pa bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi bum pa rnams la rig sngags 'dis ji ltar bshad pa ltar legs par
byin gyis brlabs la rang gis dbang bskur rang gi snying po rang gis blang bar bya'o/ /de nas las thams cad kyi nus pa dang ldan pa dang / dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de
nas me tog la sogs dang / /bza' dang btung dang ro dag gis/ /mchod la sngon gyi rim pa bzhin/ /slob ma'i rgyal po gzhug par bya/ /'khor los bsgyur ba'i rim pa yi/ /sbyor
@#/ /ba yis ni dbang bskur ro/ /rdo rje rin chen de bzhin pad/ /las kyi rdo rje de bzhin no/ /zhags pa lcags kyu dril bu dang / /lcags sgrog rnga yab dang ni gdugs/ /
ral gri mig sman thur ma gnyis/ /rgyal po'i nye bar spyod pa dang / de la rgyan rnams bstan nas su/ /dkyil 'khor der ni dbang bskur ro/ /rgyal ba'i yum gyis dbang bskur ba/ /las
kun byed par rab tu bshad/ /dam tshig gam ni sdom pa yang / /rang gi slob ma mnyan du gzhug /zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa'i las/ /dbang dang drag shul spyod pa ni/ /legs par rnam
par dag sems kyis/ /ci 'dod par ni bya ba byos/ /las rnams kun gyi 'bras bu yang / /sbyor ba 'di yis 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' chen
pos slar yang las dam pa rgyas par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /ji lta'i gzugs kyi snod byas la/ /dkyil
'khor gyis ni dbus su gzhag /zho dang mar gsar 'o ma ni/ /tsan+dan dmar po dang bsres te/ /ga pur dang ni ldan byas la/ /yid la byed pas bzlas te bsgrub/ /zla ba nyi ma
gzas bzung tshe/ /sbyor ba bzang po'i rnam gzhag bya/ /thog mar me ni spar byas nas/ /'bad pa yis ni rlung gis bus/ /gser gyi snod du bsdu bar bya/ /ba ru na yi khu bas
sbyar/ nyi ma dang ni zla ba la/ /slar yang rdzas de bskam par bya/ /de nas de ru lha mo yi/ /khrag dang sa bon blugs par bya/ /de yis myur du rdzas dag ni/ /'grub par 'gyur te the tshom med/ /
grub nas thog mar lha mo la/ /cung zad tsam zhig dbul bar bya/ /de bzhin du ni slob dpon la/ /skal ba nyis 'gyur dbul bar bya/ /de nas grub pa gzhan rnams dang / /rang gi slob mar
skal ba bzhin/ /de nas byin brlabs sbyor ba yi/ /phyag rgya dang ni lhan cig tu/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /zas kyi sa bon dang ni bza'/ /skad cig de la gzugs brjes te/ /rdo rje
sems dpa' lta bur gyur/ /gang dang gang gi gzugs rnams su/ /bsgrub par 'dod pa'i sngags pa yis/ /de dang de yi bsam gtan gyis/ /blo gros brtan pas bza' bar bya/ /de
dang de yi gzugs su ni/ /gdon mi za bar brje bar 'gyur/ /gzhan pa yi ni rdzas dag kyang / /'di nyid kyis ni bsgrub par bya/ /mig sman gyis ni mig byugs pas/ /khor yug tu ni
mi snang 'gro/ /snying la ldong ros kyis byugs na/ /yid kyi spyod yul nyid du 'gro/ /ba bla yis ni lus byugs na/ /mkha' la nye bar 'gro bar 'gyur/ /mig sman nag po blangs nas su/ /
nag po'i phyogs la bza' bar bya/ /de yi bshang ba'i mar khu las/ /dud pa mkhas pas bsgrub par bya/ /de yis mig la byugs nas ni/ /sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi gzigs
@#/ /zhing / /stobs ni dpal ldan rdo rje'i mtshon/ /nyid 'gyur rga dang 'chi ba med/ /mig sman dang ni ba lang mar/ /ma he dang ni ra nyid dang / /mi yi mig sman
nyid dag ni/ /mkhas pa yis ni blangs nas su/ /sngags pas bzung ste btso bar bya/ /mig sman chen po mchog tu bzang / /'di yis mig la byugs na ni/ /grub pa yid du
'ong bar 'gyur/ /mi snang 'grub pa thams cad kyis/ /blo gros chen po rgyal por 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi sa chen po/ /nges par thob 'gyur gzhan du min/ /rdzas kyi
gnas skabs le'u 'di/ /mtshungs med chen po nyer bshad do/ /gos dang gdugs sogs ral gri dang / /mtshon cha dam pa bsgrub par bya/ /snying po snying gar byas
nas ni/ /bsgoms na myur du 'grub par 'gyur/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po ches/ /pad+ma'i sems dpa' bzhin ras mchog /de yi zhal du byas nas su/ /de dang ldan
pas bsgom par bya/ /mnga' bdag gang gis dbang phyug ltar/ /skad cig de la de 'gyur ro/ /de nyid kyi ni spyi bo'i char/ /mchog gi dam pa bsam gtan bya/ /skad cig de
la mchod pa che'i/ /sangs rgyas su ni de 'gyur ro/ /de yi spyi gtsug nyid du ni/ /sna tshogs rdo rje bsgom par bya/ /de ni kun gyi rgyal dbang po/ /las kun byed pa'i don grub
'gyur/ /rdo rje snying gar bsam par bya/ /de yi dbus su snying po blta/ /de nas rdo rje rig pa 'dzin/ /mnga' bdag rdo rje'i dbang po 'grub/ /rin chen chen po cha brgyad pa/ /snying ga ru ni
mkhas pas bsgom/ /der ni snying po bsam pa yis/ /rin chen rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ /pad+ma chen po 'dab brgyad pa/ /yid la bsgoms pas skad cig la/ /pad+ma che ldan mnga'
bdag gis/ /pad+ma'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ /de la sogs pa mtha' yas pa/ /ji lta'i sbyor ba'i cho ga yis/ /mchog dang dman pa 'bring po yi/ /dngos grub dam pa bsgrub
