gar 'khor lo'i tshul du ni/ /g.yas pa'i rtse mo lcags kyur bya/ /sbyin pa sbyin pa'i pha rol son/ /de bzhin bcing ba legs bsdam bya/ /gnyi ga de bzhin lcags kyu ste/ /de
ltar 'og ma bcug nas su/ /snying gar bzhag pa las rjes 'brang / /de nyid dgug par sbyor ba ni/ /thams cad dgug pa rab tu 'grub/ /de bzhin sbyin pa bskums nas su/ /
yang dang yang du brkyang bar bya/ /snying gar bskor ba zhes su bshad/ /de nyid 'og tu bstan pa ni/ /dam tshig can zhes rab tu grags/ /rdo rje chos su bshad pa ste/ /kha ru g.yo
par byed pa mchog /las las rnam par tshim zhes bya/ /las kun byed pa'i dam pa ster/ /lag pa bcings pa las bkrol te/ /shes rab mdzod du rab tu brtag /'di ni dam tshig
cher mdzes pa/ /de phyir de ltar chos mdzad do/ /g.yas pas rab tu bsgrims pa ni/ /mi snang mdzod de des na las/ /rin chen pad+ma ldan pa'i gdong / /snying gar bzhag pa snying por 'gyur/ /
bsdams nas go char byas nas su/ /bskor ba dam tshig ces su 'dod/ /'khyud pa chos ldan zhes su grags/ /bsnun pa las byed pa ru brjod/ /bsdams las nyi ma rnam par spro/ /bskor
ba dam tshig mchog yin no/ /lag pa'i mtha' ma chos chen po/ /kun sdud las kun byed pa'o/ /bsdams las sbyin pa bsgreng bar bya/ /rtse mo gsum bya gnas mdzes pa'o/ /de nyid steng du
bskor nas su/ /spros pas chos sgrub byed pa 'o/ /rdo rje ba ru sbyar ba las/ /dbang bskur dam pa sgrub par byed/ /de nyid steng du spro ba ni/ /las kun byed pa'i mchog yin no/ /snying gar legs
bzung snying po ste/ /mdzod spur bzhag pa dam tshig mchog /khar bzhag pa ni chos shes bya/ /las rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa'o/ /'di ni bcom ldan rdo rje can/ /re ba kun rdzogs
mdzad pas gsungs/ /rdo rje bsdams pa rnam par bcings/ /pad+ma'i rnam pa mchog tu bya/ /ster byed pa ni mig ltar bya/ /snying gar bzhag pa kun mchog 'grub/ /de nyid mig bzhag
@#/ /las yin no/ /bzhad pas chos de dam pa'i chos/ /dam tshig gsang ba'i mig yin te/ /pad+ma'i mdzod la rab tu gnas/ /thal mo yang dag sbyar ba ni/ /snying po
mchog tu rmad byung pa'o/ /kha ni cung zad phye ba ni/ /dam tshig mchog gi mchog yin no/ /snying gar shin tu gsal phye ba/ /ma lus las ni rab tu sgrub/ /rdo rje'i nang du pad+ma ni/ /
chos ste mchog tu rmad byung ba'o/ /'di rnams kyis ni myur 'grub ste/ /sngags pas sngags kyis bskul bas so/ /de bzhin 'ching ba legs bcings te/ /snying gar 'khor lo nyid
du bya/ /'khor lo gsum pa nyid du 'gyur/ /rtsibs bzhis legs brgyan chos su blta/ /bskor ba las kyi rdo rje 'o/ /'di rnams ji lta bzhin sbyar na/ /grub pa'i dam pa 'grub
par 'gyur/ /rdo rje bsdams pa legs bsgreng ste/ /shes rab myu gu dag tu bya/ /sbyin par rin chen ltar byas pa/ /sems dpa'i gnas su nges par sbyar/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad
kyi/ /las rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa'o/ /snying gar chos kyi dam tshig dang / /snying po rig sngags legs par sbyar/ /de bzhin shes rab gnyis po sgreng / /'og gi 'khrug pa de bzhin
no/ /mthe chung bzang po'i kha sbyar ba/ /kun gong rdo rje ldan par bya/ /gnas ni bzhi yi sbyor ba yis/ /phyag rgya bzhi ni rab tu 'grub/ /spyi bor las su bshad pa ste/ /snying gar snying po brtag
par bya/ /bskor ba yis ni dam tshig ste/ /ngag gis kun bskul chos yin te/ /bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/ /bcings nas shes rab dag ni bsgreng / /'od ldan dag ni rtsa bar
sbyar/ /'di ni dang por shes par bya/ /thams cad nas ni thams cad 'gro /bcings las de bzhin shes rab cig /rtse mo mche ba gdug yid 'phrog /de bzhin du ni 'di sbyar bas/ /
las rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa'o/ /gsang ba'i bcing ba legs bcings te/ /rdo rje nang du de bzhin no/ /snying gar rnal 'byor pa yis sbyar/ /ji snyed las kyis ming bzang po/ /rdo
rje rab brkyang mgrin par gzung / /kun tu bskor ba rab tu bya/ /'di yis las rnams thams cad ni/ /byed 'gyur bsrung sogs go 'phang bzang / /lhag ma cho ga bzhin rnal 'byor/ /rnal
'byor de nyid rab tu sbyar/ /phyag rgya rtags dang mi rnams ni/ /lha rnams kun la sbyar bar bya/ /'di ni bcom ldan rnal 'byor che'o/ /dbang phyug dpal rdor sems dpas gsungs/ /de nas de rnams
legs tshim nas/ /phyag 'tshal nas ni thal sbyar te/ /zhu ba rdo rje bla na med/ /dpa' bo rdo rje can la zhus/ /yongs su rtog pa kun spangs pa'i/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni rang byung la/ /yab dang yum ni
bla na med/ /ci phyir 'di dag brtag pa lags/ /'khor ba las ni legs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas ji ltar 'byung ba lags/ /grong gi chos ni brten pa las/ /ji ltar thar pa rab tu 'grub/ /gang
@#/ /du rnal 'byor pa grol 'gyur/ /gang na 'chi ba rab tu gnas/ /gang gis rnal 'byor pa rab 'grub/ /gang las rnal 'byor pa zhes bgyi/ /gsang sngags ji ltar gsang
sngags lags/ /snying po zhes bya'i snying po gang / /phyag rgyas gang phyir phyag rgyar 'gyur/ /rig sngags rig pa ji ltar lags/ /ji ltar lha rnams dgug pa dang / /gzhug pa rnal 'byor pa yis
bgyid/ /rnam par grol rnams bcing ba dang / /mnyes dang bskul ba de bzhin du/ /ji ltar gnyis su med 'gyur zhing / /tsum pa 'khyud pa nyid dang yang / /mthong nas rjes su chags pa dang / /
lag pa'i dgos pa ji snyed pas/ /phyag rgya ji ltar 'grub par 'gyur/ /gar dang glu dang cher dgod pa/ /sgeg dang smra ba ji ltar lags/ /gzugs dang sgra dang da bzhin dri/ /gtso bo ro dang
reg par 'gyur/ /me tog bdug pa mchog dang dri/ /mar me gsal ba mchog gang lags/ /mchod pa thams cad ji ltar 'grub/ /ji ltar mchod pas 'grub par 'gyur/ /rgyal
bas zhu ba 'di dag gis/ /phreng ba rdo rje can la zhus/ /zhes so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen pos zhu ba thams cad rnam par dpyod pa longs spyod pa rdo rje zhes
bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhu ba rgyas pa 'di dag phyung ngo / /shes rab yum du legs bshad de/ /yab ni thabs la
la mkhas pa'o/ /'di ni bsten pa nyid kyis ni/ /grong las thar pa rab tu 'grub/ /bag chags sbyor ba dang ldan pas/ /gnyi ga dag ni gdon yin te/ /grol dang ma grol zhes su bshad/ /
de ni rnal 'byor pa ru brjod/ /gsang sngags yid du bshad pa ste/ /snying po yang ni de bzhin no/ /yid la rnam par gzhag na ni/ /gsang sngags mkhas pas 'grub par 'gyur/ /thar pa chos
kyi rgya mtsho yin/ /lha rnams gang la rgyas btab pa'i/ /phyag rgya 'di yis 'grub 'gyur te/ /dngos grub bde ba bla na med/ /rig sngags ye shes ma lus te/ /rig sngags pha rol phyin par bshad/ /
de shes pa ni 'grub 'gyur te/ /grub nas bde ba rnam par gsum/ /shes rab la ni shes rab ni/ /gzhug dang dgug pa de bzhin no/ /gshegs su gsol ba btab par shes/ /bcings
pa brtan par byed pa 'o/ /mnyes pa yis ni legs tshim yin/ /bskul ba 'phro ba nyid du bshad/ /bsam pa gcig tu gyur pa ni/ /gnyis su med pa zhes su brtags/ /ro gcig de
nyid bshad pa ni/ /'jig rten pa yi lha ru brjod/ /tsum pa rdo rje rnal 'byor te/ /rdo rje ye shes zhes su bshad/ /shes dang mi shes mnyam sbyor bas/ /rdo rje'i ye shes zhes bshad do/ /
shes dang mi shes mnyam sbyor bas/ /tsum pa na zhes nges par bshad/ /gnas pas rtags zhes bshad pa ste/ /rtags ni lus zhes brjod pa yin/ /de yi 'khyud pa reg par shes/ /
@#/ /chags pa mthong ba'i phyag rgya 'o/ /lag pa'i 'od rnams lha mo ste/ /rdo rje pad+ma mnyam bgrod pa'o/ /phyag rgya 'di las phyag rgya ste/ /lag pa'i dgod pa'i sbyor bas
so/ /gar dang glu sogs rnams kyis ni/ /lha rnams thams cad mnyes par 'gyur/ /'di rnams kyis ni sangs rgyas rnams/ /mchod na dngos grub thams cad ster/ /zhes bcom ldan
'das kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal to/ /gsang ba rgyan gyi bkod pa'i rgyud chen po las/ gsang ba rgyan gyi bkod pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po yongs su rdzogs so// //
de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa dang / mchod pa'i lan dang /
phyag rgya dang / phyag rgya'i lan dang / gar dang / gar gyi lan dang / glu dang / gru'i lan dang / sil snyan dang / sil snyan gyi lan dang / rnam 'gyur dang / rnam 'gyur gyi lan dang /
dbrog pa dang / dgug pa'i lan dang / brda dang / brda'i lan dang / dri ba dang / dri ba'i lan dang / blta ba dang / blta ba'i lan dang / dam tshig dang / dam tshig gi lan dang /
dkyil 'khor dang / dkyil 'khor gyi lan dang / gsang ba dang / gsang ba'i lan dang / gsang chen dang / gsang chen gyi lan dang / de kho na nyid dang / de kho na nyid kyi lan la sogs
pa rnams dang / klu'i rgyal po 'dis gsol ba btab par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas sems can kun gyi don/ /ye shes kun don thams cad mdzad/ /thams cad khyab pa sems can don/ /gnyis
dang gnyis med phyag 'tshal bstod/ /'di dag thams cad gsung du gsol/ /sgrub pa po la phan dgyes pas/ /sgrub pa dngos grub dag dga' ba/ /gang gis dngos grub 'grub 'gyur ba/ /
de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la blta ba rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /
me tog bdug pa dri zhim dang / /gos bzang rgyan dang bza' ba dang / /btung ba ro dang sgron ma gsal/ /mal khri stan dag yid 'ong ba/ /'di yis sangs rgyas thams cad mchod/ /yid ni bde bar
gnas par byed/ /slob dpon rdo rje can dang ni/ /khyad par du ni sgrub bos bya/ /dgod dang sgeg dang de bzhin glu/ /sil snyan gar ni rab dga' ba/ /mchod pa'i lan te shin tu ni/ /sangs rgyas
phyag rgyas 'grub par 'gyur/ /gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri/ /ro dang reg pa yid 'ong ba/ /'di ni mchod pa'i lan du 'grub/ /sangs rgyas byang chub bde ba che/ /phyag rgya skyes bu'i rnam

pa ste/ /phyag rgya'i lan ni rang gzugs te/ /gnyis pa phyag rgya chen po ste/ /phyag rgya'i lan ni las bzang can/ /phyag rgya rang gi bdag por shes/ /phyag rgya'i lan ni sgrub pa po/ /ji srid dbye ba stong
@#/ /phrag ni/ /dbye ba'i gzhi ru brtag par bya/ /zhes so/ /gar ni gar gyi sbyor ba yis/ /gar gyi lan ni gar mkhan ma'o/ /ji srid dbye ba stong phrag kyang / /dbye ba bzhi ru
brtag par bya/ /kun tu bzang po la brten nas/ /ji srid las kyi rjes 'brang ba'o/ /las kyi sbyor la yang dag bsten/ /ji srid bzang po'i rjes 'brang ba'o/ /bla 'og yang dag bskyod pa
yis/ /gar dang steng gi gar bskor ba/ /rtog pa'i sbyor bas brtag par bya/ /rtog pa yis ni rab tu gsang / /ji lta'i sil snyan rdung spyad ni/ /rdung ba'i bdag nyid can gyis dkrol/ /
de las byung ba'i sil snyan lan/ /gsil bas sil snyan nyid du brjod/ /sngags kyi yi ge'i cho ga sbyar/ /ji srid las mchog spyod yul ba/ /de nas sbyor bas 'thon nas su/ /kun tu
bzang por 'gro bar bya/ /sgrogs pas grub ces brjod pa ste/ /'dren pa gsum las legs par 'byung / /dbyangs rnams rnam drug shes par bya/ /glu yi phyag rgya zhes su 'grub/ /
de nas sbyor bas 'thon nas su/ /ji srid mgo dang snying gar son/ /mgrin pa sna yi sbyar ba dang / /mgul pa g.yo ba nyid kyis so/ /'gyur bas rnam par 'gyur ba ste/ /len dang gtong
ba'i cho ga rim/ /chos rnams thams cad blang ba dang / /gdon gyi tshogs rnams bzlog pa ste/ /rnam 'gyur las ni slar yang 'dir/ /sems kyi rnam par rtog pa'o/ /ji srid las ni rjes
sbyor ba/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi rjes su 'brang / /sems dang lus kyi rnam bsgyings pas/ /gdug pa thams cad bzlog par bya/ /lag pa rkang pa'i rim pa kun/ /rnam 'gyur gyi ni lan yin no/ /
dbrog pa dgug par shes bya ste/ /gtong ba dag ni dbrog pa'i lan/ /dbrog pa mchog tu shes bya ba/ /bgegs kyi gnas ni rab gnon pa'o/ /dbrog pa'i lan ni rab bzlog ste/ /bsdigs
pa'i rkang pa dgod par shes/ /brda ni dran pa'i don du ste/ /phan tshun yongs su brjod pa yis/ /'grub dang ma 'grub sbyor ba rnams/ /slob dpon slob ma sogs pas bsgrub/ /brda lan lha mo
rnams kyis ni/ /bskul dang so sor bskul ba'o/ /dri ba smra dang 'dri ba ste/ /mthong nas 'dri ba 'dri ba'i lan/ /legs pa'i gzugs mthong blta ba ste/ /lha yi ye shes spyod yul lo/ /blta
ba'i lan ni de las slar/ /sbyor ba mchog gis sbyor ba'o/ /lha dang lha mo rnams kyi ni/ /g.yas g.yon blta ba blta ba ste/ /ji snyed blta ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /sgrub par byed pa'i lan yin no/ /
dam tshig sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /bka' rtags byas pa nyid du 'dod/ /gang phyir thos pa 'dzin pa yi/ /sgrub po lan du shes par bya/ /dkyil 'khor lus su bshad pa ste/ /ye shes
lnga yis byin brlab pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor lan ni lha mo rnams/ /gcig tu byed pa'i dam pa'o/ /gsang ba sbas par bshad pa ste/ /gsang ba'i lan ni legs sbas pa'o/ /gsang chen
@#/ /sems kyi 'du shes te/ /bde ba'i rnam par rtog pa'o/ /so sor rtog pa lha mo dang / /lha yi bde ba bde chen po/ /sangs rgyas sras bcas thams cad kyi/ /
gsang chen lan du brjod pa'o/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal to/ /de nas de rnams slar yang 'dus par gyur te/ yang bcom ldan 'das la legs
par bskul ba/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde rab mchog /shes rab mchog rab grol ba'o/ /mchod pa'i ye shes legs 'grub pa'i/ /gsang ba chen po gsung du gsol/ /de
nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos slar yang gsang ba chen po mchod pa cher gsang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal

to/ /hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM/ ga ga ri ga ga ri/ ga ga ga/ ga ri ga ri/ ra ra ra/ ga ri ga ga/ te te te te/ he te te te te te/ na te te te N+NA te te/ na te te/ dzA tet+te/ dzA te tat+ta/ dza te/ ri ti
rA/ te ta te/ dzA te tI ri ra te/ ta ri ta ri/ te ta ri hUM/ ri ri hUM/ te dza te te hUM/ zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal to/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag po mchog /rdo rje
sems dpa' kun gyi rje/ /glu yi phyag rgya rab gsal ba'o/ /de nas rol mo'i phyag rgya yi/ /rnal 'byor chen po thugs rje'i bdag nyid can gyis gsungs pa/ /lha dang lha mo rgyal

bdag dang / /gang gis myur du mtshungs 'gyur ba/ /oM hUM b+h+yo g+he Ta hUM/ oM hUM b+h+yo g+he Ta hUM/ g+he Ta hUM/ g+he Ta hUM/ ru lu ru lu/ g+he Tu g+he TuM/ g+he Tu g+he TuM/ g+he Ta g+he Ta/ hUM Ta nA Da yo/ hUM Ta nA Da yo/

hUM Ta nA Da yo/ Ta ra NAM/ Ta ra NAM/ TA Na TA Na TAM Ta/ TAM Ta/ TA Na Ta Na TaM Ta/ TA TAM/ Na T+Ta Na T+Ta/ Ni T+TaM/ oM duHduHduHduHoM duHduHdUHdUHdUHdUHdUHduHduHduHduHTaM TaM/ Da d+hAM d+hAM/ d+ha d+ha

d+ha d+hAM/ d+ha d+ha d+ha/ dz+ha dz+hAM/ dz+ha dz+hAM/ dz+hiM dz+hiM/ dz+hA dz+hA dz+ya dz+hA/ dz+hi dz+hA/ dz+hi/ dz+hAM dz+hAM dz+hAM/ dzI dz+hAM dz+hAM dz+hAM/ sna yi sbubs su dkrol ba dang / lag pa'i mthil dang kha dog gis/ /sil snyan sbyor bas gsil bar
bya/ /nges par myur du rab tu 'grub/ /g.yas dang g.yon gyi sbyor ba dang / /chang zung blta ba'i rim pa yis/ /sgeg cing dpa' ba mi sdug pa/ /dgod dang drag shul 'jigs su rung / /
snying rje rngam dang zhi sogs kyi/ /nyams kyi ngo bo legs bslabs pa'i/ /gang gis rnal 'byor can 'grub 'gyur/ /gar gyi dbang phyug gtso bo che/ /bcud ni zla ba sogs mdzes pa/ /
sha sogs bza' ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / /tsan+dan la sogs byugs pa dang / /me tog la sogs phreng mdzes dang / /bud med bzang mo'i rigs rnams kyis/ /dam tshig byin rlabs sbyor pa las/ /
rdzas rnams thams cad bsgrub par bya/ /phaT yi ge hUM dang bcas pa yis/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal to/ /sbyor ldan kun la gnas nas su/ /g.yas pa yi
@#/ /yang gar sbyor las/ /rdo rje bsdams pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /snying gar de bzhin bsgreng bar bya/ /yang na gnyis pa nyid kyang ste/ /shes rab gang yin rdo rjer bya/ /skar ma
lcags kyu de bzhin 'dir/ /'dir ni bsnyems bcas rjes su chags/ /de las rdo rje'i sbyor ba sbyar/ /yang dang yang du dgrol bar bya/ /'di yis las rnams thams cad ni/ /byed 'gyur 'di
la gdon mi za/ /de nyid snying gar khu tshur te/ /rdo rje gdong pa skar ma'i kha/ /rang gi gnas su bzhag pa ste/ /dbang bskur ba ni gnyis pa'o/ /de nyid bsnyems pas cher bstan te/ /yang
dang yang du yongs su bskyod/ /de nyid 'od zer rnam pa ru/ /thams cad du ni spro bar bya/ /de nyid kha ru bstan pa ni/ /rdo rje bshad par rnam par bshad/ /'di rnams kyis ni don rnams kun/ /
mkhas pa yis ni bsgrub par bya/ /de nyid pad+ma'i sbyor ba dang / /mig gis sbyor ba gnyis pa'o/ /shes rab skar ma de nas bsgreng / /lte bar byas pa 'khor lo can/ /rdo rje smra ba lce yi rtser/ /
tho rnams ma lus 'phrog par byed/ /'di dag gis ni las rnams kun/ /pad+ma'i 'od kyis rab tu bya/ /de bzhin khu tshur legs par sbyar/ /shes rab kyis ni snying gar bsnun/ /de las
gnyis pa sna tshogs che/ /snying gar yongs su bskor bar bya/ /skar ma rdo rje'i rnam pa mchog /bzod dang gzi brjid mche ba mdzes/ /de nyid dam du bsdams pa ni/ /'ching ba'i las
ni byed pa'i mchog /'di rnams kyis ni thams cad sgrub/ /phyag rgya dang ni phyag rgya'i lan/ /g.yas dang g.yon gyi sbyor ba yis/ /las kyi dam pa ma lus pa'o/ /zhes bcom
ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal to/ /de nas bcom ldan sna tshogs che/ /pad+ma rin chen rdor mchog 'dzin/ /gsang ba rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor gyi/ /dpal chen la ni
zhu ba zhus/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor don phyir dang / /ma mo rnams kyi don dam ni/ /yongs su rtog pa thams cad spangs/ /sangs rgyas kun mchog dam pa'i gsang / /dkyil
'khor thams cad brgyan pa yi/ /mdzes pas bcom ldan gsung du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos de dag gis gsol ba btab pa la 'di skad ces
bka' stsal to/ /dang po dang ni gnyis pa dang / /drug dang lnga dang de bzhin bcu/ /mdor bsdus nas ni bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje rin chen chu skyes las/ /rang gi dkyil 'khor go rims
kyis/ /gsang sngags 'dzin pas gnas lngar dgod/ /dkar dang ser po ches dmar ba/ /sngon po'i 'od zer glog las byung / /tha ma kun gyi thog ma ru/ /'od zer bzang po sbyar
bar bya/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor cho ga la/ /gnas nas bsgom dang bzlas pa sbyar/ /'di ni dkyil 'khor ming yin te/ /dkyil 'khor rgyal ba rnams kyi rten/ /brten pas sgrub bo shin
@#/ /tu yang / /dus mi ring bar sa stengs 'grub/ /'di ni bcom ldan rdo rje can/ /kun sbyor dri ma med pa'i gtso/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rgyal po che/ /skye dang
'chi ba 'joms pas gsungs/ /de nas rgyal ba thams cad kyis/ /sbyor ba'i ma dang yum rnams ni/ /legs tshig rdo rje sems dpa' ni/ /bde ba che la legs zhes gsol/ /
rdo rje kun gyi bdag po gtso/ /sangs rgyas dbyangs kyis bstod par byas/ /rdo rje glu sogs sbyar ba yis/ /dbang bskur kun gyi mchog ldan gtso/ /dpal ldan sangs rgyas sangs
rgyas bdag po tshul/ /sangs rgyas nas ni rgyal rnams chub mdzad rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /sangs rgyas sras po nges par mtha' dag sangs rgyas kyis/ /sbyor bas blo gros sprin
rnams legs par tshim mdzad pa/ /dpal gyi rdo rje dri med rdo rje ye shes rdor/ /rdo rje'i snang bas 'jig rten rab tu gsal mdzad pa/ /bsdus pa'i rdo rje sbyor ba ldan pas legs
bton te/ /rdo rje'i bdag nyid ngo bor mdzad pa'i mdzes rdo rje/ /dpal gyi rin chen rin chen 'byung gnas rin chen sprin/ /rin chen rnams la rin chen gyis dgyes rin chen
mdzes/ /mdzes pa'i brjid ldan rin chen rgyal mtshan gyis/ /skye bo rnams kyi phongs dang sdig pa rnams bcom nas/ /dpal gyi pad+ma pad+ma dam pa'i bla ma pad sems dpa'/ /
pad+mas rab dgyes pad+ma las 'khrungs pad+ma yi/ /dra bas pad+ma mtha' dag nges par rgyas mdzad de/ /pad+ma'i rigs la 'jog par mdzad pa'i pad bzang po/ /sna tshogs dpal ldan kun gyi
bdag po sna tshogs mkhyen/ /sna tshogs dbang phyug sna tshogs yum gyis ma gos pa/ /sems can rnams ni 'dul legs 'jog mdzad sna tshogs pa/ /ci dga' 'dod la rig pa dam
pa gnang du gsol/ /zhes so/ /de nas de rnams kyis slar yang sems can ma lus pa 'dul ba'i don du 'di skad ces bstod pa/ sangs rgyas tshul khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'byung
ba khyod la 'dud/ /sangs rgyas ye shes khyod phyag 'tshal/ /sangs rgyas gzi brjid phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /sangs rgyas dpa' bo khyod la 'dud/ /rdo rje khro bo'i yid las 'khrungs/ /sdig
pa bcom pa khyod phyag 'tshal/ /sdig pa bsal la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /phyag na rin chen khyod phyag 'tshal/ /gtsug na rin chen gzi brjid can/ /sdug bsngal bcom pa khyod
la 'dud/ /thams cad grub la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /chos kyi dag pa khyod la 'dud/ /pad+ma dag la rtogs pa'i phyir/ /'dod chags chags pa khyod la 'dud/ /'dod
chags bral la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /sna tshogs rdo rje khyod la 'dud/ /sna tshogs sbyor ba khyod phyag 'tshal/ /sna tshogs tshul can khyod la 'dud/ /sna tshogs bde can
@#/ /phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di yis ni/ /chos dang ldan pa thams cad du/ /nyin re zhing ni bstod byed na/ /bsam pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur/
de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos shes rab dang / ye shes rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chos kyi dbang phyug rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang / /gsang ba rgyan
ces bya ba ni/ /sems dpa' chen po legs par bzung / /sems dpa' chen po ni dga' bas/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dbang phyug
rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dpa' bo chen po ci gsungs pa/ /rang byung ye shes pha rol son/ /chos kun dbang phyug dpal dang ldan/ /
'jig rten gsum gyi sdig 'joms pas/ /ji skad gsungs bzhin snying la ni/ /legs gzung dri med ye shes bzang / /rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal pa/ /bde ba chen po
bdag gis bzung / /zhes so/ /bcom ldan 'das dgyes shing de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' yab dang / yum gyi tshogs dang bcas
pa 'khor dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor ji lta bu'i rdo rje la legs par gnas pa de dag thams cad rdo rje sems dpa'i gsang sngags rjes su dran par gyur to/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs gsang ba rgyan gyi bkod pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po yongs su rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po brda
sprod pa chen po bde bar gshegs pa'i dpal zhes bya ba dang / sgyur byed kyi mkhas pa sgra yi gzhung lugs la blo gros dkar ba kun dga' rgyal mtshan gyis dpal sa skya'i dben
gnas dam par bsgyur// //mda' lnga'i gtsug ldan yid kyi srub shing gi /dregs pa'i dra ba rnam par dral ba'i phyir/ /rgyud rgyal rgya mtsho'i rgyal po ltar zab 'di/ /
bsgyur la 'gal gang 'di la 'phags rnams dgongs// //rgya gar skad du/ sarba du rga ti pa ri sho d+ha na te dzo tA dza ta thA ga ta arta te samya ka saM bud d+ha s+ya ka lpa nA ma/
bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba gzi brjid kyi rgyal po'i brtag pa zhes bya ba/ bam po dang
po/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das lha'i tshogs thams cad kyi dga' ba'i tshal mchog tu
@#/ /yid du 'ong ba na/ nor bu dang / gser dang / gser gyi shing yal ga dang lcug mar bcas pa dang / shing gel pa dang / sman dang / me tog ka ma la
dang / ut+pa la dang / kar ni ka dang / ba ku la dang / ti la ka dang / a sho ka dang / man da ra ba dang / man da ra ba chen po la sogs pa sna tshogs pa dang / dpag bsam
gyi shing rnams kyis mdzes par byas shing / rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ bya sna tshogs mang pos skad 'byin pa/ rnga dang / cang te'u dang / ker ko dang / gling bu dang /
rnga bo che la sogs pa'i sgra grag pa/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha dang / lha'i bu mo sna tshogs rnam par rtsen pa/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems
dpa' thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa na/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa lha dang / rig 'dzin dang / lha'i bu mo 'khor bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag
du ma dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / lha ma yin dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / klu la sogs pa 'khor du ma dang / byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros tshad med pa dang / blo gros mi
g.yo ba dang / blo gros yangs pa dang / kun tu blo gros dang / blo gros mtha' yas dang / blo gros ka ma la dang / blo gros chen po dang / blo gros lha rdzas dang / byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po blo gros sna tshogs la sogs pa phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge 'dun mtha' thug pa med pa rnams kyis bsti stang du
byed/ bla mar byed/ mchod cing brjed la rab tu mchod cing spel te/ 'khor mang po'i dbus na tshangs pa chen po pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs te/ ngan song gi rgyud thams cad yongs su sbyong ba
zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ ngan song gsum gyi rgyud las rnam par grol ba zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi 'od
zer 'phro ba dang / sdud pa mang po'i phreng ba nyid kyi dpral ba'i mdzod spu nas byung nas/ des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag thams cad kun tu snang bar
byas so/ /kun tu snang bar byas nas sems can thams cad kyi sems nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba las rnam par grol te/ bde ba so sor thob nas dge ba'i tshal thams cad kun tu snang
bar byas pa'i mchod pa'i sprin sna tshogs kyis mngon par mchod de/ lan brgya phrag stong du bskor ba byas nas/ mgo bos lan brgya phrag stong du phyag btsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das
@#/ /kyi spyan sngar nor bu dri ma med pa'i steng du 'khod te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /kye ma'o sangs rgyas kye sangs rgyas/ /kye ma'o sangs rgyas mdzad pa legs/ /
gang phyir ngan song bdag cag sbyangs/ /byang chub spyod pa nyid la bkod/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya phrag stong du bskor ba byas te/ phyag
btsal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang gi slad du sangs rgyas kyi 'od zer kun tu snang bas ngan song gi rgyud las rnam par grol
zhing / rnam par grol ba'i lam la bkod pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das/ ngo mtshar lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ ngo mtshar lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
lha'i dbang po/ 'di ni ngo mtshar mi che'o/ /lha'i dbang po/ 'di ni ngo mtshar mi che ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni tshad med pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs rnams yang dag par bsags
pa'o/ /lha'i dbang po/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni tshad med pa'i yon tan rin po che'i 'byung khungs su gyur ba'o/ /lha'i dbang po/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas rnams ni tshad med pa'i thabs yang dag par rdzogs pa'o/ /lha'i dbang po/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shes rab tshad med pa bsags pa'o/ /sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyod pa ni tshad med pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gdul ba'i skye bo tshad med pa rnams snod du gyur par mdzad pa'o/ /sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa'i smon lam gyi stobs dang ldan pa ste/ lha'i dbang po/ de lta bas na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni snod ji
lta ba bzhin du sems can gyi don mdzad pa dang / ji ltar 'dul ba bzhin du sems can rnams kyi don mdzad pa dang / mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can gyi don mdzad pa yin par
rig par bya ste/ 'di la the tshom dang / som nyi dang / yid gnyis ma byed cig /gang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis 'dul bar mi 'gyur ba'i gnas ni med do/ /de nas lha
rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin rang gi stan las langs nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa che ba rgya che ba byas te/ phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /sems
can thams cad la phan pa nyid du bgyi ba dang / sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba nyid du bgyi ba dang / /snying brtse ba can nyid du bgyi ba dang / snying brtse ba can chen po can du bgyi
@#/ /ba dang / bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi bar/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag spobs pa bskyed par gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa/
bdag spobs pa bskyed par gsol/ bcom ldan 'das/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i ris 'di nyid nas lha'i bu nor bu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bgyi ba zhig shi 'phos te/ dus
las 'das nas dgung bdun lon lags na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de gang du skyes/ bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ni ci zhig myong bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das/ lung bstan du
gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa/ lung bstan du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i dbang po/ ci ste de'i dus la bab par shes na nyon cig /lha'i
dbang pos gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das/ dus ni 'di lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ dus dang / tshod ni 'di lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
lha'i dbang po/ lha'i bu nor bu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba de 'di nas shi 'phos nas mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por skyes nas/ des der lo stong phrag bcu gnyis
kyi bar du sdug bsngal ma rungs shing mi bzad pa myong nas sems can dmyal ba chung ngu rnams su yang lo brgya phrag brgyar sdug bsngal myong ngo / /de nas byol song dang / yi
dwags kyi gnas su yang lo brgya phrag brgyar sdug bsngal myong ngo / /de nas yul mtha' 'khob kyi mir skyes nas kyang 'on pa dang / dig pa dang / lkugs pa'i rang bzhin can dang /
smra ba maM gsal bar lo stong phrag drug cu'i bar du myong ngo / /lo stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhir nad rnag khrag 'dzag pa dang / mdze dang / phol mig rnams kyis gzir ba dang /
skye bo mang pos smad pa dang / yongs kyis spangs pa dang / rigs dman pa'i rigs can rjes su myong zhing sdug bsngal ba dang / sdug bsngal brgyud pa dang / gzhan la gnod pa byed
pa dang / las kyis sgrib pa bar chad med pa rnam pa sna tshogs byed pa dang / gzhan yang / sdug bsngal gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa myong zhing myong bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas brgya byin la
sogs pa lha'i bu thams cad kyis thos nas shin tu sngangs shing skrag ste/ skyo nas kha bub tu 'gyel bar gyur to/ /de nas yang langs nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sdug
bsngal chen po brgyud pa 'di las ji ltar na 'di thar par 'gyur/ bde bar gshegs pa/ ji ltar thar par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci nas kyang sdug bsngal gyi phung po 'di las
rnam par grol bar 'gyur ba 'di bskyab tu gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'di bskyab tu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i dbang po/ sangs rgyas bye ba
@#/ /phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhis kyang bshad pa 'di ngas kyang bshad kyis nyon cig /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis yang bcom ldan 'das la me tog man dA ra ba dang /

man dA ra ba chen po dang / me tog rnam pa sna tshogs dang / rin po che'i dbu rgyan dang / phyag gdub dang / dpung rgyan dang / snyan cha dang / do shal dang / se mo do la sogs pa'i rgyan gyi khyad par
rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mngon par mchod de/ lan brgya stong phrag du mar bskor ba byas shing phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das/ legs so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ legs so zhes
bya bas mnyes par byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten la phan pa dang / bde bar bgyi ba dang / ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams ngan song gi rgyud gsum las
rnam par thar par bgyi ba'i slad du legs par bshad du gsol/ de nas yang tshangs pa la sogs pa lha mang po rnams kyis kyang 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan
'das/ legs so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ legs so/ /ci nas kyang ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams kyis mtshan tsam thos pas kyang ngan song gsum gyi lam las
rnam par grol te/ bde 'gro lha'i 'jig rten nam mi'i 'jig rten du skyes nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bgyi ba'i slad du bshad du gsol
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa lha'i bu de dag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'dis byin gyis brlab par bya ba'i phyir don yod
gdon mi za ba'i rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /de nas yang de nyid kyi thugs ka nas sngags 'di phyung nas lha de dag dam tshigs
can du byin gyis brlabs so/ /oM sarba bid+yA badzra a drI Sh+Tha na dz+nyA na sa ma ya hUM/ de ltar ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas kyang gdon mi za bar mi choms pa'i rdo rje'i byin gyis
rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs nas ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / oM sho

d+ha ni sho d+ha ni sarba pA paM bi sho d+ha ni shud+d+he bi shud+d+he sarba karma A ba ra Na bi shud d+he swA hA/ rig pa chen mo 'di bshad ma thag tu sems can thams cad kyi ngan song gi rgyud kyi bcing pa
thams cad rnam par chad do/ /ngan 'gro thams cad rnam par sbyangs so/ /sdug bsngal mi bzad pa rnams rab tu zhi ste/ skye bo mang po rnams bde ba dang ldan par gyur to/ /de nas
gzhan yang gsang ba'i snying po 'di gsungs so/ /oM sho d+ha ne/ sho d+ha ne/ oM sarba a bA ya na/ sarba satwe b+h+yo hUM/ lha'i dbang po/ gzhan yang / 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams
@#/ /cad kyi snying po'o/ /oM sarba a pA ya bi sho d+ha ne hUM phaT/ lha'i dbang po/ gzhan yang / 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po dang / nye ba'i snying
po'o/ /oM traDa/ lha'i dbang po/ gzhan yang / 'di ni ngan song thams cad rnam par sbyong ba'i snying po'o/ /hUM/ lha'i dbang po/ gzhan yang / mdor na dran pa tsam gyis kyang bsod nams
chung ba'i sems can rnams ngan song gi rgyud thams cad las bde blag tu rnam par grol bar 'gyur ba ni 'di yin no/ /oM na mo b+ha ga te sarba durga ti pa ri sho d+ha na rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/

ar+ha te samya ka saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sho d+ha ni sho d+ha ni/ bi sho d+ha ni bi sho d+ha ni/ sarba pA paM bi sho d+ha ni shud+d+he bi shud+d+he/ sarba karma A ba ra Na bi shud+d+he swAhA/ rtsa ba'i rig pa'o/ /
oM sarba bid sarba A ba ra Na bi sho d+ha ya ha na hUM phaT/ oM sarba bid hUM/ oM sarba bid phaT/ oM sarba bid a/ oM sarba bid trA Ta/ oM sarba bid oM/ oM sarba bid swa/ oM sarba bid
a/ oM sarba bid hUM/ oM sarba bid trA Ta/ oM sha/ oM b+ha/ lha'i dbang po/ de bzhin gshegs pa ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po gsang ba'i snying
po 'di ni rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang yang rung bas ming tsam yang nyan tam/ bcangs sam/ bklags sam/ bris nas kyang mgo bo'am/ gtsug phud dam/ dpung pa 'am/
mgul du btags te 'chang na tshe 'di nyid la dus ma yin par 'chi ba brgyad dam/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba brgyad dang 'brel ba'i rmi lam gyi rnam pa'am/ ngan song dang 'brel ba'i
mtshan ma de dag thams cad rmi lam tsam du yang mi 'byung na/ dkyil 'khor du ji lta ba bzhin du zhugs la/ zhugs nas kyang dbang bskur la snying po yang bzlas brjod byed cing / sngags kyi
don yang sgom pa gang yin pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de dag la ni sdig pa gang yang nye bar mi 'gyur/ ngan song du 'gro bar yang mi 'gyur ro/ /skyes pa 'am/ bud med dam/ lha 'am/ klu 'am/
gnod sbyin nam/ srin po 'am/ byol song dam/ yi dwags sam/ sems can dmyal ba la sogs te/ gang yang rung ba shi ba'i lus dkyil 'khor du bcug te dbang bskur na/ de
sems can dmyal bar skyes na yang de ma thag tu rnam par thar nas/ lha'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /lha'i rigs der skyes nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos nyid
mngon sum du byed/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bsnyen bkur la sogs pa yang byed/ phyir mi ldog par yang 'gyur/ rgyud nges pa can du yang 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs
pa'i rigs su yang skye/ sgrib pa rnams rab tu spangs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs sam/ lha'i rigs sam/ gzhan gang yang rung bar bde ba myong bar 'gyur ro/ /lha'i
@#/ /dbang po/ mdor na 'jig rten nam/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phan pa dang / bde ba thams cad myong bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan
'das la de bzhin du bskor ba byas te/ phyag btsal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ngan song thams cad kyi dbang du gyur pa rnams la phan pa dang / bde bar
bgyi ba dang / ci nas kyang sems can de dag ngan song thams cad la rgyab kyis phyogs par bgyi ba dang / bla na ma mchis pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bde blag tu rtogs par
bgyi ba'i slad du bshad du gsol/ rje gcig /bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ngan song thams cad yongs
su sbyong ba'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal
po zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi byang chub sems/ /bla na med pa rtogs gyur pa/ /rgyal bas gsungs pa'i ye shes gang / /de ni
dkyil 'khor snying por gsungs/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can thams cad la thugs brtse ba'i slad du phyi'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so/ /gtsug
lag khang dang skyed mos tshal/ /mchod rten lha khang kun dga' sogs/ /ji bzhin pa yi cho ga yis/ /gnas ni byin gyis brlab pa brtsam/ /byin gyis brlabs pa'i gnas der
ni/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhi dang ldan pa dang / /them skas bzhi yi phreng ba dang / /seng ge ba glang rnams kyis brgyan/ /dar dang

lnga ldi do shal phreng / /dril bu dang ni rnga mas brgyan/ /rdo rje rin chen pad+ma dang / /rgya gram pa yi phyag rgyas brgyan/ /srad bu brgyad dang ldan pa dang / /phyi yi sgo khyud rnams kyis brgyan/ /
dgu yi char ni bgos pa las/ /sgo dang sgo khyud sum char bya/ /rdo rje srad bus thig gdab po/ /dbus kyi dkyil 'khor thig gdab pa/ /chos kyi 'khor lo 'dra ba la/ /lte bar
bcas shing rtsibs bcu drug /rim pa gsum dang ldan pa la/ /rtsibs ni nyis 'gyur nyid du bya/ /dbus kyi phyogs su kun rig ni/ /dung dang kun da zla 'dra la/ /zhal bzhi pa la rdo rje yi/ /
seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs pa dang / /ting 'dzin phyag rgyar ldan pa dang / /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan par bri/ /de yi spyan sngar ngan song kun/ /sbyong ba'i rgyal po bri bya ste/ /phyag gnyis
ting 'dzin tshul du bsnol/ /zla ba rgyas dang pad+ma'i mdog /rgyan rnams kun gyis legs rdzogs la/ /rgyal mchog skyes bus gang bar bri/ /rgyab tu shAkya'i rigs dbang po/ /gtso
@#/ /bo thub pa bri bar bya/ /g.yon dang g.yas kyi phyogs char ni/ /rgyal mchog rin chen me tog gnyis/ /lo tsa nA dang mA ma kI /de bzhin dkar mo sgrol ma rnams/
rang gi rigs kyi mtshan ma bzhin/ /grwa yi phyogs ni kun tu bri/ /rtsibs kyi nang ni thams cad du/ /rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa' mchog /rdzu 'phrul chen po'i sems dpa'
rnams/ /go rims bzhin du bri bar bya/ /mkhas pas lA s+ya la sogs pa/ /mchod pa grwa yi phyogs su bri/ /sgo yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /sgo ba bzhi ni bri bar bya/ /rta
babs khyams ni thams cad du/ /byams pa la sogs bri bar bya/ /nyan thos rgyal ba thams cad dang / /de bzhin rang rgyal gtso bo rnams/ /khro bo mngag gzhug pho nya sogs/ /bri
bya yang na ming yang rung / /phyi yi dkyil 'khor phyi rol du/ /gling bzhi po ni bri bar bya/ /'dzam bu'i gling du tshangs pa bri/ /byang phyogs su ni dbang phyug che/ /shar dang nub kyi
gling du ni/ /brgya byin gtogs 'dod thams cad ni/ /'khor dang bcas par bri bar bya/ /gzhan rnams dag kyang de bzhin te/ /lha min dri za nam mkha' lding / /gnod sbyin
srin po lto 'phyo che/ /'byung po yi dwags 'dre rnams dang / /klu dang grul bum ri rnams dang / /rgyal po bzhi rnams bri bar bya/ /gza' dang skar ma rgyu skar dang / /khro
bo ma rungs 'tshe ba yi/ /bgegs dang bi nA ya ka rnams/ /sems can kun la phan byed pa'i/ /drang srong skal ba chen po rnams/ /phra men ma dang bud med bri/ /de bzhin sring mo rnal 'byor ma/ /'byung
ba bzhi yi lha chen po/ /khyim dang ri la gnas pa dang / /shing dang kun dga'i nags la sogs/ /dur khrod grong khyer gnas pa rnams/ /ming dang brda' 'am yang na ni/ /thig le rnams kyang bri bar
bya/ /de nas mkhas pas dkyil 'khor la/ /bla re rgyal mtshan lhab lhub dang / /gdugs dang rnga ma lda ldi dang / /'phan dang sna tshogs na bzas mchod/ /gser las byas pa'i bya rnams ni/ /
brgyad dam bcu drug lhag kyang rung / /dbang bskur rin chen chus bkang ba'i/ /bum pa lnga ni gzhag par bya/ /mar me gtor ma bum pa dang / /mdzes pa'i bshos rnams gzhag bya ste/ /bza' ba
btung ba sbyar legs dang / /bca' ba sna tshogs gzhag par bya/ /gnod sbyin srin po'i kha zas su/ /gtor ma rnam pa sna tshogs gzhag /'byung po dag dang klu dag dang / /mi dang mi min de bzhin te/ /

me tog dri rnams sna tshogs dang / /'o ma mar dang kha rar bcas/ /rnam rgyal bum pa dri yi chus/ /rab tu bkang ba gzhag par bya/ /de nas khrus la sogs byas la/ /dri dang phreng mchog phreng ba can/ /dri
zhim kha bkang mchog mdzes pa/ /rdo rje 'dzin mas zhugs nas kyang / /me tog thogs te sgo phyogs 'dug /gtso bo rgyal ba sras kyi 'khor/ /mang po rnams ni spyan drangs te/ /phyag rgya sngags dang
@#/ /bdag ldan zhing / /lcags kyu la sogs rnal 'byor gyis/ /dzaHhUM baM hoHthugs rje'i bdag /tshur gshegs zhes ni brjod nas kyang / /gsang ba'i bcing
ba bcings nas ni/ /mdzub gnyis lcags kyu'i tshul du bya/ /zhags pa bzhin du sbyar nas kyang / /de nyid lcags sgrog tshul du bya/ /mtheb gnyis nang du bkug nas ni/ /bskyod par gyur
nas dbang du 'gyur/ /de nas mtshan ma skyes nas mgu nas ni/ /thog ma tha ma med pa mngon sum mthong / /a rga mchog brtags bsang la sogs pa yi/ /dbyangs snyan pa yis
bstod dang lha rdzas kyi/ /mchog gi dam pa rnams kyis legs par mchod/ /de nas 'byung po kun gyi gtor ma bya/ /sems can bkres shing skom pas gdungs pa dang / /phyogs na gnas
pa rnams la rnam par brtag /de yi gtor ma ji ltar mthun par bya/ /de nas sngags pas bla med byang chub kyi/ /gnas su slob ma yongs su smin bya ba/ /'gro la phan phyir myur du byang chub
par/ /de dag byang chub sems mchog bskyed du gzhug /de rnams byin rlabs byang chub smon lam gdab/ /zab cing rgya che ba yi chos bsgrags la/ /bsrung bar byas nas brtul zhugs sdom gnas
pa/ /rang gi kha nas sngags brjod gzhug par bya/ /dar la sogs pas mig gnyis g.yogs nas ni/ /rdo rje 'dzin dpal pad+mar lag gnyis bya/ /me tog rin chen la sogs de

brgyan la/ /yon gyis lag pa bkang ste gzhug par bya/ /sngags ni 'di rnams yin no/ /oM badzra a d+hi ti Sh+tha hUM/ oM badzra sa ma ya hUM/ oM badzra pra be sha hUM/ a sa me tri sa me mahA sa ma ye hUM/ /
de nas sngags 'dis me tog la sogs pa dor bar bya'o/ /sangs rgyas dngos grub thob bya'i phyir/ /bdag la thugs brtser dgongs nas ni/ /'gro la phan phyir gtso chen gyis/ /sman par dgongs

nas bzhes su gsol/ /oM badzra pra ti gr-ih+Na hUM/ oM badzra pra tIts+tsha badzra sa ma ya s+t+waM/ /me tog rin chen la sogs gang / /bab par gyur ba'i rigs kyi lha/ /gtso bo'i rigs de bsgrubs na ni/ /dngos
grub 'gyur te the tshom med/ /de nas sngags pa mkhas pa yis/ /sngags 'dis dam tshigs sbyin par bya/ /oM badzra sa ma ya hUM phaT/ de nas rigs kyi phyag rgya snying gar bcings te dam tshig

gi lha snying la gnas par bya ba'i sngags/ oM badzra sa ma ya hriM da yaM me pra be sha dri D+ha tiSh+tha tiSh+tha hUM/ de nas 'dis dam tshig bsgrag par bya'o/ /'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu/ /dam tshig 'das
na sreg bar byed/ /dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub ni/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'dis 'grub/ /ci ste dam tshig 'das na ni/ /de ma thag tu bkas nas gshegs/ /rdo rje 'dzin rgyal khros nas kyang / /
bdun rgyud rigs ni brlag par mdzad/ /de bas rtag tu bu khyod kyis/ /rgyal bas gsungs pa'i dam tshig dang / /sdom pa dang ni bla ma'i bka'/ /shin tu mos pas bsrung bar bya/ /khyod kyis
@#/ /srog chags gsad mi bya/ /ma byin par yang blang mi bya/ /brdzun dang 'dod la spyod pa rnams/ /dngos grub 'dod pas bya ma yin/ /chang ni btung bar mi bya zhing /
sha la sogs pa bza' mi bya/ /sems can gnod pa'i sbyor ba ni/ /nam yang bya ba ma yin te/ /dkon mchog gsum ni yongs mi spangs/ /dus kun tu ni byang chub sems/ /snying
po sngags dang phyag rgya dang / /lha dang bla ma de bzhin no/ /sdig la sogs pa gang yin dang / /bla ma'i bka' las 'da' mi bya/ /lha la phul ba'i rnying po dang / /de yi grib ma 'gom mi bya/ /
phyag rgya'i gzugs la'ang de bzhin te/ /sngags dang lha la'ang smad mi bya/ /gdon gyi las sogs bya ma yin/ /mu stegs can la'ang smad mi bya/ /mdor na yid gnyis som gnyis
the tshom mi bya ste/ /bdag gi de nyid dang ni sogs de bzhin no/ /mos pa brtan dang ldan pas dam bcas nas/ /sarba bid kyis ji bzhin dbang bskur te/ /bum pa la sogs ji snyed
mang thogs pas/ /bcu po rnams kyis dbang bcu ci dgar bskur/ /de nas lag tu dril dang rdo rje byin/ /'khor lo la sogs rin chen bdun thogs la/ /mi dbang dbang phyug
'khor lo thob pa dang / /sdig pa gzhom phyir dbang ni bskur bar bya/ /sngags bsgrub phyir ni mos ldan slob ma la/ /sngags pas bka' ni rab tu bsgo bar bya/ /des kyang mos
pas spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ /ci ste nor yod bla ma dbul bar bya/ /nor dang gter dang 'bru dang dbyig dang gser/ /bzhon pa khyim gdan bu pho bu mo rnams/ /skyes pa dag dang bud med yang
na ni/ /grong dang grong khyer de bzhin ci bzhed rnams/ /rang gi sems ni rab tu dad pa yis/ /yon gyi mchog nyid dbul ba nyid du bya/ /myur du 'grub phyir mos pas bla ma la/ /mdor na rang gi
lus kyang dbul bar bya/ /tshe 'di'i bde ba ma lus dang / /'jig rten phyi ma'i bde mchog dang / /sangs rgyas nyid kyang 'thob 'gyur na/ /lha yi bde ba smos ci dgos/ /sangs rgyas kun dang bla ma
mnyam/ /rdo rje slob dpon brnyas na ni/ /rtag tu sdug bsngal mthong 'gyur bas/ /cung zad tsam yang brnyas mi bya/ /rdo rje spun dang sring mo dang / /rdo rje ma rnams nyid la ni/ /rnal 'byor can gyis
brnyas ma yin/ /rtag tu 'khon gyi gcug mi bya/ /dkon mchog gsum la gnod byed dang / /bla ma gnod byed ma rungs pa/ /dam tshig las ni 'das pa dang / /de la sogs pa'i gnod byed la/ /
bzod pa bsgom par mi bya ste/ /de ltar gyur na kun rig gis/ /gsungs pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /sems can kun la phan pa dang / /brtser ldan dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /de nas
bcom ldan 'das kyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / lha'i 'jig rten du bcas pa rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir sgrub pa'i cho ga 'di gsungs so/ /ras la bcom
@#/ /ldan 'das thams cad rig pa de bzhin du bris la/ g.yas su ni de bzhin gshegs pa ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba gzi brjid kyi rgyal po/ g.yon
phyogs su ni shAkya thub pa/ ngan song thams cad sbyong ba'i 'og tu ni kun tu spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mdog zla ba lta bu phyag na pad+ma bsnams pa'o/ /shAkya thub pa'i 'og tu ni phyag
na rdo rje/ de gnyis kyi bar du sman gyi bla mdog sngon po phyag gcig na 'bras bu a ru ra bsnams pa/ phyag gcig ni mchog sbyin du bya/ rta mgrin dang / 'jig rten gsum las rnam par
rgyal ba ma rungs pa 'joms pa la brtson pa gnyis ni rang gi lha la brten par bri/ de gnyis kyi dbus su lo tsa nA dang / mA ma kI dang / gos dkar mo dang / sgrol ma rnams rang rang
gi mtshan ma phyag na bsnams par bri/ de dag gi 'og tu pad+ma'i rdzing bu chu dang / chu srin dang / nya dang / rus sbal dang / sbal pa dkar po dang / nya khar ba la sogs par bcas pa dang /
chu las skyes pa'i me tog rnam pa du mas yongs su gang bar bri/ bdug pa dang / mar me dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / bshos dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs pa bri/ de'i
'og tu sgrub pa po nyid thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug par bri/ de nas ri mo'i sku gzugs de mngon par mchod de/ bdag nyid kyis spyan dbye ba bya zhing bden pa la byin gyis
brlabs par dmigs par bya'o/ /de nas ci ste mtshan ma zhig mthong na ni myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro/ /'on te ma mthong na ni ring mo zhig nas dngos grub tu 'gyur te/

bzhad pa dang ni rnga sgra dang / /dril bu'i sgra dang 'brug sgra dang / /dge slong bram ze pho mo dang / /'bras bu mthong na myur du ni/ /mchog dang par ma tha ma 'grub/ /de nas gzugs de gsang sngags dang / /
phyag rgya mngon par byin brlabs nas/ /ci bdog pas ni mchod par bya/ /rtag tu mngon sum 'dug nas kyang / /'jig rten gsum las rnam rgyal gyis/ /bdag bsrung la sogs byas nas kyang / /
bdag gi de nyid bsams nas su/ /dngos grub mtshan ma byung bar du/ /'bum phrag gsum mam drug 'bum bzlas/ /de nas dben pa'i gnas su ni/ /brgyad brgya nyid du tshang bar bya/ /sngags
ni 'khrul pa med par bzlas/ /de nas bzlas pa'i mjug tu ni/ /dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bsams la/ /mchod pa rgya chen byas nas kyang / /mtshan gcig thog thag bzlas par bya/ /
ci ste gtso 'am de yi sras/ /yang na lha rnams mthong gyur na/ /bsod nams snod la ci dga' bar/ /dngos grub mchog ni gsol bar bya/ /lha ni dngos grub 'bras bu ni/ /de la rtag tu dgyes nas
stsol/ /phyag 'tshal dngos grub la sogs blang / /dkon mchog gsum dang bla ma la/ /skal ba re re phul nas ni/ /de nas rtag tu bdag spyod cing / /med na mkhas pa bdag nyid kyis/ /blangs nas
@#/ /bdag nyid spyad par bya/ /sems can kun la phan brtson par/ /bskal pa du mar gnas par 'gyur/ /ci ste dngos grub ma gyur na/ /las rnams thams
cad nus par 'gyur/ /gnod sbyin skar mda'i gdon la sogs/ /chad pas bcad cing bka' tsam gyis/ /zhi ba la sogs las kun ni/ /dran bzhin thams cad byed par 'gyur/
de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sdig pa bgyis pas sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa'i dbang du
gyur pa rnams ji ltar na sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa'i dbang du gyur ba'i sdug bsngal spang ba'i slad du bsgrub par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i
dbang po nyon cig /sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa'i dbang du gyur ba'i sems can sdig pa byed pa/ sdig pa chen po byed pa de dag ci nas kyang sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal
las thabs sla bas grol bar 'gyur ba nyon cig /de bzhin dkyil 'khor bris nas ni/ /snga ma bzhin du bum pa la/ /brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas nas ni/ /dbang bskur ba ni rab tu
brtag /de nas sdig pa kun sbyangs te/ /dmyal ba la sogs sdug bsngal las/ /de ni myur du rnam par thar/ /sdig las rnam grol bdag nyid de/ /dag par gyur ba'i lha rnams
kyi/ /rigs su skyes par gyur nas kyang / /de ni rtag tu sangs rgyas dang / /chos 'gro ba ni thos par 'gyur/ /de yi gzugs brnyan bri ba 'am/ /gur gum gyis ni ming yang rung / /
ngan song gsum gyi sdug bsngal las/ /sems can rnams ni sgrol ba'i phyir/ /sngags mkhan gzhan la phan brtson zhing / /snying rje can gyis dbang bskur ro/ /de nas rnal 'byor
can gyis ni/ /sngags dang phyag rgyas de dbang bskur/ /lha yi gzugs su brtags nas kyang / /mchod rten dbus su gzhag par bya/ /rang gi lha 'am lha gzhan gyi/ /snying po snying gar bris
nas kyang / /lha 'dra bar ni sems bskyed de/ /khyim gyi nang du gzhag par bya/ /de yi ming yang smos nas ni/ /gur gum bzang pos sngags bris la/ /rim gyis 'bum ni tshad tsam du/ /mchod
rten las ni rab tu bya/ /sdig can sdig ni zad bya'i phyir/ /bye ba snyed ni tshang bar bya/ /de ltar byas na nges par ni/ /dmyal ba las ni grol bar 'gyur/ /yi dwags byol song sdug bsngal
las/ /gol te lha yi gnas su skye/ /de yi ming nas brjod nas ni/ /ji skad gsungs pa'i sngags bzla zhing / /'bum phrag stong ngam yang na ni/ /brgya phrag stong du tshang ba dang / /bye ba
snyed du rab bzlas na/ /lha yi gnas su nges par skye/ /de yi ming nas brjod nas kyang / /mkhas pas 'bum phrag brgya 'am ni/ /yang na brgya phrag stong snyed du/ /sbyin sreg byas par gyur na
@#/ /ni/ /dmyal ba chen por gyur pa yi/ /sdig pa de las thar bar 'gyur/ /ji srid mtshan ma shin tu ni/ /'bar ba'i gnas na skyes gyur par/ /mtshan ma yang
dag byung bar du/ /til dang yungs kar 'bras rnams dang / /ra yi 'o mar ldan pa dang / /dri yis bskus pa'i yam shing gis/ /cho ga bzhin du sbyin sreg bya/ /de nas de ni nges
par yang / /lha yi gnas su skyes gyur nas/ /de yi mtshan ma ston par byed/ /yang na lha yi mchog tu 'gyur/ /yang na hoM khung nang du ni/ /me yi ltas ni ston byed cing / /lha
yi gnas su skyes pa dang / /sdig pa bcom pa'i mtshan mar ni/ /dkar po nyid dang g.yas su 'bar/ /gyen du 'bar zhing dri ma med/ /zlum zhing rnam par mi 'phro la/ /brtan
la glog bzhin dri ma med/ /yang na me lha nyid kyis ni/ /bdag nyid de bzhin ston byed de/ /zla ba dri med dkar 'dra la/ /bzhin mdog dkar zhing lam mer 'bar/ /de ni mtshan ma
'di dag gis/ /dmyal ba la sogs rnam grol zhing / /sdig pa bcom nas bde 'gror ni/ /skyes pa yin par shes par bya/ /khru bzhi pa yi tshad du ni/ /cho ga bzhin du khung
brkos la/ /rdo rje mtha' ma bskor ba yi/ /'khor lo dbus su bri bar bya/ /rigs lnga yi ni phyag rgya rnams/ /ji bzhin pa yi phyogs su bri/ /de bzhin sems dpa' rnams
dang ni/ /'jig rten gtso la sogs pa bri/ /bya dang bum pa gang ba dang / /gtor mas snod rnams bkang ba dang / /brgyad snyed tsam du gzhag pa 'am/ /yang na bcu drug snyed du gzhag /
bza' ba dang ni bca' ba'i bshos/ /me tog phreng sogs de bzhin te/ /bla re rgyal mtshan dar la sogs/ /gdugs mchog rnams kyis legs par brgyan/ /sbyin sreg dkyil
'khor dam pa ni/ /sbyin sreg rab tu bya ba yin/ /cho ga shes pas bris nas kyang / /lha rnams mang po spyan drangs la/ /sngags shes pas ni sngags phyag rgyas/ /arga phul bar shes
nas kyang / /mdor na mchod pa byas nas ni/ /lha yi sbyor bas rab gnas la/ /ga pur gur gum la sogs pas/ /mar dang 'o ma til bsgos la/ /til dang yungs kar 'bras rnams
dang / /dri yi chus ni legs bkang ste/ /'bras chen yos dang la du dang / /sbrang rtsi sha kha rar ldan pa/ /brgya phrag du mar yongs bzlas la/ /yam shing la yang de bzhin te/ /rang gi
sngags kyis btab pa'i shing / /khung bu'i nang du gzhag par bya/ /ro la sngags kyis btab nas kyang / /chu mchog gis ni bkrus nas su/ /bzlas pa'i dri yis byug par bya/ /gos dang
rgyan gyis klubs nas kyang / /sngags kyis btab pa'i bdug pas bdug /me tog phreng la sogs pas mchod/ /gtsug phud dpung bar de bzhin du/ /sngags bris nas ni gdags par
@#/ /bya/ /snying ga lkog ma kha phyogs su/ /sarba bi d+yAs byin gyis brlab/ /dbral ba mdzod spu rna ba gnyis/ /mgo bo gtsug phud dpung ba gnyis/ /sna dang rked pa
pus mo bol/ /long bu sna yi rtse mo dang / /mig gnyis dang ni gsang ba yi/ /dbang po rnams kyi gnas la ni/ /de ltar gzhan du yi ge sngags/ /mchog tu dge ba rnams gzhag go /
de nas ngan song sbyong ba'i phyir/ /stan dang bcas te thab dbus su/ /gzhag pa nyid du bya ba yin/ /de nas sngags 'chang sngags kyis ni/ /btab pa'i gos kyis g.yogs par bya/ /de nas
byin za dge ba rab sbar la/ /me lce stong gis 'khrigs shing 'bar ba'i lus/ /zla dkar kund zhi zhal zhi ba'i lus/ /mtha' yas pa yi gzugs kyi me bkug la/ /arga dbul bar brtags
nas de bzhin du/ /blo mchog ldan pa'i mdun du gzugs sogs gzhag /ji ltar gsungs bzhin yon tan 'dod pa yis/ /de bzhin gshegs tshogs de bzhin spyan drangs
la/ /arga la sogs btags te de bzhin du/ /bder gshegs gsungs pa'i mchod pa la sogs bya/ /de nas byin za la ni brtag bya ba/ /bsreg byas bkang ste de yang sbar ba'i
phyir/ /de nas bsreg byas bkang ste rim gyis ni/ /rgyal la sogs la brgya rtsa brgyad du brtag /de nas sbyong ba'i sngags kyi rgyal po la/ /bsreg par bya ba nyi shu rtsa gcig brtag /de nas
spyan drangs yo byad lan gsum dang / /arga la sogs pad+ma'i dkar zhal mchod/ /phyag na rdo rje pad+ma zhags bsnams pa'i/ /'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i gzugs/ /zhabs kyi
pad+mas sdig mnan cing / /rgyan rnams kun ni rab rdzogs la/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi dbu rgyan mtho/ /bsams sam yang na bris kyang rung / /de yi snying pos de bzhin du/ /brgya phrag stong ngam yang

na ni/ /bye ba'i tshad du sbyin sreg bya/ /ci ste mtshan ma la sogs 'byung / /de bzhin sdig can rgyud ces bya/ /de nas thal bar gyur pa dang / /rdo rje bsdu ba'i sngags kyis ni/ /cho ga bzhin du bsdu bar
bya/ /thal ba de dang rus pa'i rdul/ /sngags kyis btab pa'i dri chu dang / /ba skyes 'o ma la sogs lngas/ /sbyong ba'i sngags kyis blo ldan gyis/ /'bum du bzlas pas brdzis nas ni/ /ga
bur dri dang bsgos pa yis/ /'jim pa dang ni bsres nas kyang / /gzugs su bya ba'am yang na ni/ /mchod rten gyi ni ltar byas la/ /gcig gam gnyis sam gsum mam lnga/ /yang
na brgya rtsa brgyad bar du/ /sngags dang phyag rgyas btab nas su/ /'bum phrag gnyis kyi bar du bzlas/ /de nas mchod rten 'bar gyur tam/ /yang na gzugs kyi zhal 'dzum mam/
dri dang bdug pa 'od kyang rung / /snang ngam yang na ngad ldang ngam/ /lha la sogs pa'i rnam pa ni/ /sna tshogs bar ni snang gyur tam/ /rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul ba dang / /me tog
@#/ /la sogs 'dor ba dang / /dung dang rnga la sogs pa'i sgra/ /gling bu pi wang la sogs rnams/ /ci ste mtshan ma 'di dag ni/ /sdig can blos ni ma
mthong na/ /'bum gyi phrag ni brgyad stong ngam/ /ji srid mtshan ma byung bar du/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mchod nas ni/ /mnyam par gzhag pas bzlas par bya/ /de yi mthar
ni mkhas pas kyang / /mtshan gcig thog thag mi nyal bzlas/ /de nas de yi sdig pa ni/ /dag pa nyid du nges par mthong / /lha yi lus kyi gzugs gyur la/ /rang gi
rgyud du ngo shes 'gyur/ /mtshan ma 'di dag shes nas ni/ /rnam par mi rtog sems kyis kyang / /byams dang snying rjer ldan pa yis/ /las rnams thams cad byed par 'gyur/ /
yang na med par gyur na yang / /bzlas shing sgom pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /ming tsam legs par bris nas kyang / /mchod rten phreng ba bya ba dang / /yang na gzugs su bris kyang rung / /sbyin sreg
mngon par dbang bskur na/ /gdon mi za bar bde 'gror skye/ /thal ba yungs kar bye ma sogs/ /rang gi ming smos sngags btab nas/ /bzlas pa byas te song nas kyang / /rgya mtshor 'bab
pa'i klung du dor/ /de ltar na ni sdig can yang / /ngan song las ni thar 'gyur na/ /dge ba'i mchog ni bskyed pa dang / /byang chub sa bon bskyed pa'i bdag /sangs rgyas 'bras bu'i rgyu
ldan pa/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin par ldan/ /tshul khrims rgyud dang rab ldan pa/ /bzod pa brtson 'grus mnyam gzhag dang / /shes rab rnams kyis rgyu bsgom pa'i/ /'jig rten
bsod nams ldan ci smos/ /myur du de yi ngan song ni/ /bcom par gyur te the tshom med/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed la/ /med par lta ba gang yin dang / /byang chub lam las
rnam log pas/ /bstan la zhe sdang gnod byed cing / /sdig pa'i rang bzhin ma mthong la/ /ma dang pha la snying ring zhing / /byang chub sems la brten pa dang / /'dod
chags bral ba bsad pa rnams/ /ci ste lha rnams med gyur tam/ /sangs rgyas dge 'dun chos de bzhin/ /sngags dang phyag rgya'i tshogs la sogs/ /shes rab thabs
rnams med na ni/ /sdig can de dag mi thar zhes/ /bder gshegs rgyal ba nyid kyis gsungs/ /de nas brgya byin la sogs lta/ /pad+ma lta bu'i mig phye nas/ /legs zhes bya
bas mnyes byas te/ /rab tu mgu bas mchod byas nas/ /brgya byin gzhan la phan brtson pas/ /ji skad gsungs pa'i bka' bzhin du/ /shAkya'i gtso bos bka' stsal pa/ /
bden pa nyid du byas gyur nas/ /de nas de ni dmyal ba yi/ /sdug bsngal las ni thar nas kyang / /dga' ldan gnas su sems can kun/ /phan phyir bde gshegs 'dra bar
@#/ /skyes/ /de nas dbang por bcas pa yi/ /grags chen lha rnams gar byed cing / /mchod pa'i sprin ni mtha' yas pas/ /de bzhin gshegs la
mchod bya'i phyir/ /lha yi tshogs kyis mdun byas te/ /tshe 'di nyid la mchod pa'i phyir/ /byang chub tu yang sems bskyed nas/ /lha rdzas rnam pa sna tshogs kyi/ /me tog bdug
pa byug pa dang / /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan 'phan la sogs/ /rgyan la sogs pa rab mdzes dang / /na bza' rin chen char la sogs/ /dga' ba'i tshal ni gang bar byas/ /
de nas ya mtshan cher gyur te/ /lha rnams kyis kyang phyag 'tshal nas/ /dga' ba'i tshal ni yid 'ong ba/ /kun nas gang bar gyur pa yi/ /sna tshogs 'byung ba 'di ci lags/ /
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /grogs po dag shes par gyis shig /rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa 'di ni lha'i bu nor bu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba de yin
no/ /mtshams med pa'i dbang du gyur pa yang myong zhing mthong ba'i chos 'di nyid la bde 'gro'i dbang du gyur pa gang lags pa de ni/ bcom ldan 'das/ ngo mtshar lags
so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ ngo mtshar lags so/ /de nas brgya byin la sogs pa lha'i bu thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu tshig 'di skad ces smras so/ /sangs rgyas 'dra
ba'i ston pa med/ /chos dang 'dra ba'i dge ba med/ /dge 'dun 'dra ba'i snod med de/ /sngags dang 'dra ba'i 'dren pa med/ /de nas lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di
skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis dga' ldan gyi lha'i rigs su skyes pa'i lha'i bu de ci 'dra ba zhig /de'i rdzu 'phrul dang / mthu
ni ji lta bu lags/ lha'i bu nor bu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bgyi ba de bdag cag lta bar 'tshal lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha thams cad kyi snying bskul bar byed pa zhes bya
ba'i 'od zer gyi phreng ba nyid kyi zhabs kyi mthe bo gnyis las phyung ngo / /byung nas kyang nor bu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i lus thams cad snang bar byas nas snying gar zhugs te
bskul nas yang de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas lha'i bu de nyid rab tu dga' bar gyur nas lus kyi 'od zer gyis dpag tshad brgya phrag stong tshun chad kyi nam mkha'i ngos thams
cad gsal bar byas te/ lha'i bu stong phrag du ma'i 'khor gyis bskor cing mdun du byas nas lha'i rdzu 'phrul chen pos mi snang bar byas te 'ongs nas dga' ba'i tshal thams cad
gsal zhing snang bar byas te/ bcom ldan 'das dang / brgya byin gnyis ma gtogs pa lha rnams kyi 'od zil gyis mnan to/ /de nas lha'i bu des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis
@#/ /la phyag btsal nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /e ma shAkya mgon po yi/ /sangs rgyas mdzad pa la mtshan che/ /gang phyir ngan song lhung ba yi/ /
sems can myur du glog bzhin grol/ /de nas skad cig ma de nyid kyi tshe shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam gyi pad+mo thams cad rin po che las byas pa/ dpag tshad brgya phrag stong du dri'i ngad ldang ba/
lha'i glu snyan pa'i sgra grags pa/ ya mtshan du ma yang dag par ston pa/ lha rdzas kyi glu dang / gar dang / brdung ba dang / gling bu dang / rnga dang / ker ko rnams kyi sgra
snyan pa 'byin pa zhig bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar byung ste/ de mthong nas kyang shin tu ya mtshan skyes te 'di skad ces smras so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos ni bsam mi
khyab/ /sngags kyi yon tan sna tshogs bsam mi khyab/ /byang chub rten pa rnams kyang bsam mi khyab/ /tshangs spyod tshul khrims dri med skye bsam yas/ /de nas lha'i bu de dag
gis da blta bar 'dod nas yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /lha'i bu de dang / de'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams blta bar 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das
blta bar 'chal lo/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ blta bar btsal lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang mthe bo gnyis nas 'od zer phyung ste/ 'od zer dri ma med pa des
lha'i bu de dang lha'i 'khor de dag kun tu snang bar byas te bskul nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas nor bu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba de la sogs pa gnas gtsang ma'i ris
kyi lha'i bu rnams kyi bcom ldan 'das dang / brgya byin gnyis kyi gdan ma gtogs par dga' ba'i tshal thams cad g.yos par byas te/ lan brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas
shing bskor ba byas nas yang dang / yang du 'di skad ces gsol to/ /e ma'o sangs rgyas rnams kyi ni/ /sngags kyi byin rlabs ya mtshan che/ /gang phyir mtshams med lhung ba yi/ /
sems can lha gnas myur du skyes/ /de nas lha'i bu nor bu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba la sogs pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la nor bu dang / gser dang / dngul dang /
do shal dang / se mo do dang / gdu bu dang / dpung rgyan dang / snyan cha la sogs pa rgyan gyi khyad par rnam pa sna tshogs du ma dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / 'phan dang / lda
ldi dang / rnga ma la sogs pa yo byad gyi khyad par sna tshogs pa dang / seng ge'i gdan dang / gzim cha dang / pho brang dang / gzhal med khang dang / khang bu brtsegs pa la sogs pa
gnas kyi khyad par sna tshogs pa dang / me tog dang / spos la sogs pa mchod pa'i khyad par sna tshogs pa dang / rang gi lus dang / ngag dang / sems rnams kyang phul te/ ba lang
@#/ /dang / rta dang / seng ge dang / stag dang / spre'u dang / dgo ba dang / thug re dang / ma he dang / bong bu dang / rnga mo dang / chu srin dang / phag dang / ra dang /
glang dang / ba lang dang / 'dod pa'i ba bzhon la sogs pa bzhon pa'i khyad par du ma yang phul nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams kyang mngon par mchod/ lha
rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi dkyil 'khor rnams kyang mngon par mchod de/ legs so zhes bya ba gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das dang / brgya byin gnyis la bla ma dang / bsti
stang du byas te phyag btsal nas de bzhin du song ngo / /de nas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la yang dang / yang du
legs so zhes bya bas bstod cing mchod de phyag btsal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang gi slad du ma 'ongs pa'i byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams 'chang
ba dang / klog pa la spro bar bgyi ba'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan brjod pa'i yon tan bshad du gsol/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha'i bu rnams
ngas bshad kyis/ legs par nyon la yid la zungs shig /lha'i bu rnams/ dge ba bcu dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams kyi rna lam du thos par 'gyur gyi/ sems
can ma rabs rnams kyis ni ma yin no/ /pha rol tu phyin pa bcu la mos pa'i sems can rnams kyi rna lam du nye bar 'gro bar 'gyur gyi/ sems can phal pa ma rabs kyis ni ma
yin no/ /sems can bsam pa nges pa rnams dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i yon tan mang po la mngon par 'dod pa'i sems can rnams kyi rna lam du 'gro bar 'gyur te/ mdor na thams cad
mkhyen pa'i ye shes la brten pa'i sems can rnams kyi rna lam du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha'i bu de dag yang dag par dga' ba skyes nas
'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag ni snod du gyur pa'o/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ bdag cag ni snod du gyur pa ste/ gang gi slad du bdag cag gis de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po zhes bgyi ba'i mtshan brjod pa 'di bcom ldan
'das pad+ma'i zhal nyid nas thos pas bdag cag ni ngan song gis 'jigs par mi 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag ni gdon mi 'tshal bar sangs rgyas
dang / rnam par 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa la sogs pas 'jigs par mi 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag ni gdon mi 'tshal bar sangs rgyas
@#/ /nyid du 'grub pa'i snod du gyur ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ brtag pa'i rgyal po 'dis sems can rnams kyi don bgyid ba
gang lags pa'i skyes bu dam pa de dag gi 'bras bu ni cir 'gyur/ rnam par smin pa ni cir 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i dbang po/ de dag ni
skyes bu dam pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid du blta bar bya ste/ lha'i dbang po/ gang gi phyir 'jig rten pha rol tu phyin nas
mtshams med pa la sogs pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu spong bar byed pa dang / byang chub
la gdon mi za bar brten par byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa phyir mi ldog pa la rab tu 'jog pa'i phyir te/ lha'i dbang po/ /dper na/ khyod kyi lha'i bu nor bu
dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por skyes pa'i don byas pa bzhin no/ /lha'i dbang po/ de ltar gzhan yang ma 'ongs pa'i
sems can rnams kyi don byed pa'i sems can de dag ci so so'i skye bo yin snyam sems sam/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das/ ma lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa/
ma lags so/ /lha'i dbang po/ sems can de dag ni skyes bu dam pa chen po/ gzhan la phan 'dogs pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang phyag bya ba/ mchod pa/ rjed
pa/ bsti stang du bya ba/ phrag la bkur bar bya ba yin na/ lhar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de nas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa lha'i bu rnams dang /
rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / phyogs skyong ba bcu dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon nyid shu rtsa brgyad dang / gnod sbyin chen po nor bu bzang po dang / nor bu bzang po chen po la sogs pa/ byang
chub sems dpa'i sa la rab tu gnas pa rnams dang / klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / bsnyen dga' bo gnyis dang / 'phrog ma bu lnga brgyas bskor ba rnams dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde
dpon chen po pany+tsi ka dang / pany+tsi ka chen po la sogs pa dang / gang gzhan dag kyang rgya che zhing rgya che ba'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / lha ma yin dang / nam
mkha' lding dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'a phye chen po dang / 'byung po dang / yi dwags dang / 'dre dang / rims dang / gdon dang / dug dang / skar ma la sogs pa thams
cad kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag 'dus shing tshogs pa thams cad kyis skyes bu dam pa chen po de'i rkang pa gnyis mgo bos blang
@#/ /bar bgyi'o/ /mdor na rtag par rgyun du dus thams cad du bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang du brtag pa'i
rgyal po 'di rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pas 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ gzhan la rgya cher yang dag par 'chad par 'gyur ram/ gdugs dang / rgyal
mtshan dang / ba dang la sogs pas mchod par 'gyur ram/ rgyal rigs sam/ bram ze'i rigs sam/ rje'u rigs sam/ dmangs rigs sam/ gzhan yang /
rgyal po 'am/ rgyal po'i bu 'am/ rgyal po'i bu mo 'am/ rgyal po'i btsun mo 'am/ rgyal po'i 'khor pho 'am/ rgyal po'i 'khor mo 'am/ gang su yang rung bas 'chang
zhing klog pa dang / gzhan la rgya cher yang dag par 'chad cing ston pa'i bar du bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag 'dus shing tshogs pa thams cad de'i bran du
gyur pa lags so/ /rang gi skye bo dang / gnyen gyi skye bo dang / yongs kyi skye bo dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor
rnams yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/ /dus dus su char dbab par bgyi/ 'bru la sogs pa bskyed par bgyi/ skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / bde ba'i slad du bsgrub par bgyi/ pha rol gyi phru ma
mang po gzhom par bgyi/ sems can ma rungs pa gnod cing 'tshe ba pos de la mi phan pa'i sems bskyed pa gang yin pa de dag brlag par bgyi ba'i slad du bsgrub par bgyi/ ma
rungs par bgyi/ de la bdud kyi las kyang bgyi/ gnod par bgyi ba la yang nye bar gnas par bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ mdor na/ ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams la
brtag pa'i rgyal po 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa lta bur gnas pa lags pas/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gis bu bzhin du bskyang bar bgyi'o/ /lha'i dbang po/ khyod
kyis ji ltar smras pa de de bzhin te/ brtag pa'i rgyal po 'di ni de bzhin du blta bar bya'o/ /lha'i dbang po legs kyis/ 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas pa'i sems can sdig pa'i chos
la kun tu spyod pa/ sems can dmyal ba'i dbang du gyur pa/ 'khor ba mi gtsang ba'i dong du bying ba'i sems can rnams la phan pa dang bde bar bya ba'i phyir yun ring por bag
yod par byos la sgrubs shig /ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyor ba'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po'i brtag pa las/ brtag pa dang po'o// //bam po gnyis pa/ /
de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus brtag pa'i rgyal po brtag pa phyi ma 'di bshad do/ /dpa'
@#/ /bo gdan las bzhengs nas ni/ /dgyes shing rdo rje gsor nas kyang / /shAkya'i dbang po dgyes mdzad pa/ /thub pa'i gtso la phyag 'tshal nas/ /sgrib pa thams
cad rnam par dag pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ngan song thams cad rnam par sbyong ba zhes ya ba rang gi snying po 'di nyid kyi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /oM

sarba pA paM da ha na badzra hUM phaT/ oM sarba a pA ya bi sho d+ha na badzra hUM phaT/ oM sarba karma A ba ra NA ni b+ha smi ku ru hUM phaT/ oM b+h+ruM b+h+ruM bi na sha ya sA ba ra NA ni hUM phaT/ oM bruM bi shod+ha ya A ba

phata sarba A ba ra NA ni s+pho Ta ya hUM phaT/ oM pr-i ta pr-i ta sarba A ba ra NA ni hUM phaT/ oM tra Ta tra Ta sarba A ba ra NA ni hUM phaT/ oM ts+tshi n+da ts+tshin+da sarba A ba ra NA ni hUM phaT/ oM bi dra ba bi dra ba

sarba a bA ya ta t+t+wa NA ni hUM phaT/ oM da ha da ha sarba na ra ka ga ti he tu hUM phaT/ oM pa tsa ba tsa sarba bre ta ka ga ti he tuM hUM phaT/ oM ma tha ma tha sarba tiR+ya ga ga ti he tuM hUM phaT/ de nas de dag rnams

kyi yo byad bshad do/ /oM sarba a pA ya bi sho d+ha ni/ d+ha ma d+ha ma d+hU pa ya hUM phaT/ oM sarba durga ti bi sho d+ha ni puSh+pa bi lo ki ni hUM phaT/ oM sarba a pA ya bi sho d+ha ni dz+nyA na A lo ka ka ri

hUM phata/ oM sarba a pA ya ga ti gan+d+ha nA sha ni gan d+ha bi ta hUM phaT/ sgo ba rnams kyi sngags la/ oM sarba na ra ka ga ti A kar Sha Ni hUM dzaHphaT/ oM sarba na ra ka ga ti a b+hud+d+ha ra Ni hUM hUM phaT/
oM sarba a pA ya ban+d+ha na bi mo tsa ni hUM baM phaT/ oM sarba a pA ya ga ti ga ha na bi nA sha ni hUM hoHphata/ de nas dkyil 'khor bshad de/ 'khor lo 'dra ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ /shin
tu mdzes pa'i rtsibs brgyad can/ /lte bar bcas shing rtsibs rten ldan/ /nang gi rim pa bris nas ni/ /lte ba'i nang du shAkya yi/ /bdag po thub pa gzhag par bya/ /lag na rdo rje stobs
chen ni/ /dpa' bo de yi spyan sngar bri/ /rgyab tu 'khor los bsgyur ba bri/ /g.yas phyogs rgyal ba'i gtsug tor la/ /g.yon par rnam par rgyal ba bri/ /gzi brjid phung po me yi phyogs/ /
dbang po'i phyogs su gdugs dkar po/ /rnam par 'thor ba rlung gi phyogs/ /rnam par 'joms pa nai ri t+yar/ /bris nas phyi rol bri bya ste/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /seng+ge rta babs
brgyan par bya/ /dpa' bos lcags kyu zhags pa dang / /lcags sgrog dril bu snyan rnams gzhag /grwa yi phyogs ni thams cad du/ /bdug pa la sogs bri bar bya/ /de nas dri
zhim dri la sogs/ /rang gi lus ni bskus nas kyang / /rdo rje 'dzin mas zhugs nas ni/ /oM dzaHhUM baM hoHb+ha ga bAn/ e h+ye hi mahA kla ru Ni ka dr-i sh+ya hoHsa ma ya staM zhes pas
@#/ /lha rnams thams cad spyan drang ngo / /de nas gshegs par mos pa bskyed de mchod pa byas nas/ de bzhin du bcug ste dbang bskur na ngan song
thams cad las rnam par grol te/ bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten dang / gong nas gong dus rnams su yang skye bar 'gyur ro/ /dngos grub thams cad kyang 'grub par
'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas su yang gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /snga ma bzhin du las thams cad kyang byed cing thams cad la thogs pa med par 'gyur ro/ /bya ba byas
pas ni rims nad thams cad dang / gdon dang / dug la sogs pa las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /phyag na rdo rje'i hUM zhes bya bas las thams cad skyed par 'gyur ro/ /brtag pa
gzhan gyi cho ga thams cad kyang sgrub par 'gyur ro/ /lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po la sogs pa ngan song gi rgyud kyi dbang du gyur pa rnams kyi shi ba'i ro 'am/
gzugs brnyan nam/ ming la sogs pa bris te bzlas pa dang / sbyin sreg dang / dbang rnams kyis snga ma bzhin du ngan song thams cad las yongs su grol bar byed do/ /
de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes seng ge'i lta stangs kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du bltas te/ phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/
phyag rgya dam pa'i mtshan nyid bshad par bgyi'o/ /thugs rjes bskul ba'i thugs mnga' ba'i/ /rgyal ba kun gyi byin gyis rlobs/ /mnyam par gzhag pas dpral bar ni/ /
phyag 'tshal ba yi thal mo sbyar/ /sangs rgyas bde gshegs skyes rnams kyi/ /phyag 'tshal ba yi phyag rgyar bshad/ /rnal 'byor rig pas mgrin phyogs su/ /thal mo snyim par
sbyar ba ni/ /rtag tu pad+ma'i rigs nyid kyi/ /pad+ma'i phyag rgya yin par bshad/ /rdo rje thal mo sbyar nas kyang / /snying gar gung mo'i mtha' sbyar ba/ /rdo rje rigs kyi phyag rgya 'di/ /dam tshig
thams cad 'dzin byed pa'o/ /lag pa g.yon pa'i thal mo gan rkyal du pang du bzhag la/ /de yi steng du g.yas pa bzhag ste/ mthe bo'i ngos gnyis sprad la zhi ba'i lta bas blta
ba 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya ste/ dam tshig yin par bshad do/ /de nyid las bzlog ste ltag 'og bsnol la mthe bo dang / mthe'u chung gnyis
gcig la gcig lu gu rgyud kyi tshul du bsnol te snying gar gzhag pa 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /thal mo rdzogs par sbyar ba las mthe bo dang / mthe'u chung
gnyis bsnyams la lhag ma rnams brkyang ba 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje bsdam pa bsdams pa las/ gung mo gnyis rdo rje 'dra bar bsnyams la/
@#/ /mthe bo dang / mthe'u chung gnyis brkyang ba 'di ni phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las mthe bo dang / mthe'u chung gnyis de bzhin du byas la/ mdzub
mo gnyis dang / srin lag pad+mo 'dra bar bkug pa ni ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i rgyal po'i thams cad sbyong ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las mdzub mo dang / srin lag gnyis
rin po che 'dra bar byas pa ni dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /mthe'u chung dang mthe bo so sor bsdams la/ lhag ma rnams brkyang ba ni sdig pa thams cad sreg pa'i phyag
rgya'o/ /lag pa g.yon pas de bzhin du bsgyur zhing bya ba ni lha thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o/ /snyim pa bzed la gyen du 'thor ba ni bdug pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /de las 'og nas gyen
du 'thor ba ni me tog gi phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las mthe bo gnyis gyen du bsnyams la mdun du 'dzin pa ni mar me'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las dung 'dra bar byas pa ni dri'i phyag
rgya'o/ /de nyid las rab tu brkyang ste 'dzin pa ni gtor ma'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las gung mo gnyis nang du bcug pa ni a rga'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje bcing ba las gung mo gnyis bsnyams
te/ tshigs dang po bcag la sor mo thams cad brkyang ba ni rnam par 'thor ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las mthe bo dang / mthe'u chung gnyis bkrug pa ni rnam par
'joms pa'i rgya'o/ /de nyid las 'od zer 'bar ba 'dra ba ni gzi brjid phung po'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las spyi bor bskor ba ni gdugs dkar po'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje khu
tshur gnyis las mdzub mo gnyis dang / mthe'u chung gnyis bsnol te/ mdung la gyen du bskor ba ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje bsdams pa las gung mo
gnyis rdo rjer byas la mdzub mo gnyis rin po che lta bur byas te/ lhag ma rnams 'od zer 'dra bar byas pa ni rgyal ba'i gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya'o/ /de bzhin du mdzub mo gnyis
rdo rjer byas la/ sor mo lhag ma rnams bsdams nas rdo rje 'dra bar byas pa ni rnam par rgyal ba'i 'o/ /g.yas pa mchog sbyin du byas la g.yon pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa ni de bzhin
gshegs pa'i yin no/ /rdo rje bsdams pa las mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ste rdo rje 'dra bar byas pa ni rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las mdzub mo g.yas pa bkug pa ni lcags kyu'i
'o/ /de nyid las me tog 'dra bar byas pa ni mda'i 'o/ /de nyid las slar bkug ste/ mthe bo gnyis rtse mo sprad pa ni blo gros legs pa'i 'o/ /de nyid las tshigs bar ma bcag pa
ni rin po che'i 'o/ /de nyid las sor mo rnams 'od zer 'dra bar 'gyed pa ni gzi brjid kyi'o/ /de nyid las spyi bo bzhag pa dpal gyi'o/ /de nyid las mdun du bzhag pa ni bzhad pa'i
@#/ /'o/ /de nyid las pad+ma 'dra bar byas pa ni pad+ma'i 'o/ /de bzhin nyid las rtse mo gnyis bkug pa ni ral gri'o 'o/ /de nyid las gdub bu 'dra bar byas pa ni
'khor lo'i 'o/ /de nyid las pad+ma'i 'dab ma 'dra bar byas pa ni lce'i 'o/ /de nyid las rtse mo yid tsam bskyed pa ni rgya gram mo/ /de nyid las shin tu bskyed pa ni bsrung ba'i 'o/ /de
nyid las rtse mo gnyis slar bkug pa ni gnod sbyin gyi'o/ /dam du bkug pa ni bsdams pa'i 'o/ /bsdams pa nyid mdun du bzhag pa ni bdug pa'i 'o/ /de nyid gyen du bstod pa ni
phreng ba'i 'o/ /mdun du mthe bo gnyis bsdams te bskor ba ni mar me'i 'o/ /de nyid byug pa ltar byas pa ni dri'i 'o/ /de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis bkug pa ni lcags kyu'i 'o/ /
de nyid las rtse mo gnyis sprad pa ni zhags pa'i 'o/ /de nyid las gcig la gcig mdud pa ni lcags sgrog gi'o/ /de nyid las bskyod pa ni mnyes pa'i 'o/ /sku gzugs kyi cho
ga yang 'dir de bzhin du byas te/ cung zad du na bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i gzugs bri'o/ /yang na sku gzugs ni dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du bris
la me tog la sogs pas mchod de/ de'i spyan sngar 'bum tsam zhig sngar bsnyen pa byas nas las thams cad bya'o/ /de nas tshangs pa la sogs pa lha'i tshogs rnams kyis
bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ las kyi rnam par smin pa gang gis lha'i bu nor bu dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bgyi ba de
dmyal ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi dbang du gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal
to/ /lha'i dbang po nyon cig /'di ni sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa yin te/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi ris 'di nyid na mtha' 'khob pa'i rigs ngan du gtogs pa'i rgyal po lus mi bde ba zhes
bya ba zhig tu gyur te/ des mi shes pa'i dbang gis mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten pas rgyal po 'dod pa'i phyir rang gi pha 'tsho ba dang bral bar gyur pa dang / ma de'i mya ngan
gyis gzir bas ma yang dus las 'das so/ /lan gcig ci zhig gi rkyen gyis nags tshal stug po gzhan zhig du rtse zhing dga' ba'i phyir nya bar song ngo / /de na drang srong dgos
pa med par byams pa zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/ de mthong ba dang rgyal po shin tu ya mtshan skyes nas/ kye ma/ 'di lta bu seng ge dang / stag dang / ri dwags dang / phag rgod dang /
ba lang dang / ma he la sogs pa dang / sbrul dang / sre mo dang / sbrang bu dang / sbrang bu mchu rings dang / sbrul gdug pa can rnams kyis gtse ba/ bza' ba dang / btung ba
@#/ /dang / bgo ba dang / longs spyod rnams dang rnam par bral ba/ rlung dang / grang bas yongs su gdung zhing 'tshe ba de na bdag nyid chen po 'di gnas
so snyam par sems kyis brtags nas de'i drung du nye bar song ste phyin pa dang / de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /drang srong chen po/ khyod ci'i phyir na rlung dang tsha ba dang la sogs pa'i
sdug bsngal gyis bdag la gnod par byed/ drang srong gi smras pa/ skyes bu chen po/ bskal ba brgya stong phrag du mar sgrib pa'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba las/ sdug bsngal
gyi khur bu cung zad tsam zhig blangs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bas 'di ni sdug bsngal ma yin
gyi/ skad cig tsam mam/ yud tsam zhig yul gyi bde ba rjes su myong bas bskal pa brgya stong phrag du ma mtha' thug pa med pa dmyal ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal
rjes su myong bar 'gyur ro/ /yul gyi bde ba 'dod pa'i phyir pha ma la sogs pa yang gsod par 'gyur na srog chags gzhan lta ci smos te/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang /
dge 'dun yongs su mi shes pa'i phyir sdig pa thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /drang srong gis smras pa'i tshig de skad ces thos pa dang shin tu 'jigs skrag skyo ste/ sdug
bsngal thams cad kyis gzir nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun zhes bya ba de ci zhig /de'i rang bzhin ji lta bu yin pa dka' thub chen
po smros shig dang / de la kho bo yang skyabs su mchi'o/ /pha ma la gtsas pa dang / srog chags rnams kyi srog bcad na sdig pa ji lta bu zhig thob par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas
dang / chos dang / dge 'dun zhes bya ba ci zhig /de'i rang bzhin ji lta bu yin pa yongs su shes na bsod nams ci 'dra ba zhig yongs su 'thob/ pha ma ma bsad pa
bu ci 'dra ba zhig 'thob/ de nas drang srong des de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /ci ste sems can chen po khyod/ /nga yi tshig 'di nyan 'dod na/ /thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshol la/ /
gus par nyon dang bshad par bya'o/ /de bzhin bgyi zhes bsgrubs nas ni/ /ci bdog pas ni mchod byas te/ /sangs rgyas spyod yul sangs rgyas kyi/ /zab mo'i chos ni nyan
par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs dag pa/ /thos nas kyang ni skyabs su song / /sangs rgyas rnams kyi sgrib med chos/ /rgyal pos thos nas dga' bar gyur/ /
@#/ /yi dwags byol song dmyal ba rnams/ /sdig pa kun gyi 'bras bu ste/ /yul spyod pa dang srog chags rnams/ /gsod cing shin tu mi bzad pa/ /pha
ma gcos pa'i rgyu las byung / /bskal pa du mar rab sdug bsngal/ /dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa/ /mgon med skyabs yang med pa ste/ /thos nas mya ngan zug rngu
