yis/ /rang gi yid la gdung ba ni/ /ji ltar rlung gis mar me bzhin/ /de nyid du ni dus las 'das/ /las kyi rnam smin de yis ni/ /dga' dang ldan pa'i lhar skyes nas/ /brgya
byin lha yi dbang po yi/ /blon po gzugs dang ldan pa la/ /lha rnams kun dang yid mthun zhing / /rab dga' bde dang ldan par skyes/ /bde ba'i mchog ni myong gyur nas/ /
ngan song du yang ltung bar 'gyur/ /de nas da ltar lha dbang po/ khyod kyi mthus kyang de nyid ni/ /dga' ldan gnas ni dga' ba'i mchog /bde mang kun gyi gnas su skyes/
lha yi dbang po nyon cig dang / gang gi tshe sngon byung ba de'i dus na byung ba'i drang srong du gyur pa de ni gzhan yin par khyod kyis shes par mi bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das shAkya
thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'di nyid do/ /de'i phar gyur pa gang yin pa de ni gzhan yin pa khyod kyis blta bar mi bya ste/ lha'i
dbang po/ de'i tshe de'i dus na khyod de'i phar gyur to/ /ma gang yin pa de gzhan yin par mi blta ste/ de'i tshe de'i dus na sha tsi ka nyid yin no/ /'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gang yin pa
de ni gzhan yin par mi blta yi/ lha'i 'khor 'di dag nyid yin no/ /de nas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa lha'i bu rnams yid rab tu mgu zhing rangs te/ ba spu'i
bu ga nas spu rnams langs shing / rgyal ba/ rgyal ba zhes skad chen por bos nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la ming bcu pa 'dis mngon par bstod de gsol ba btab
po/ /ko Ta ko Ta k+Sha/ ko Ta ba/ ko Ta ko Ta/ ko Ta bash+tsa/ ko Ti ka /ko la k+Sha/ ko la ba/ ko la ko la bash+tsa/ ko lasta thA i ti zhes byas nas/ brgya byin la sogs lha mchog
rnams/ /sems can kun la phan pa dang / /tshe dang nad med spel ba'i phyir/ /mgon po khyod la gsol ba 'deb/ /bcom ldan 'das/ tshe thung ba dang / skal ba chung
ba rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / tshe bsring ba'i slad du bshad du gsol/ /gsang ba'i bdag po/ bshad du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na
rdo rjes brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha'i 'khor mang po de dag la gzigs nas legs so zhes bya bas mgu bar byas te/ tshangs pa la sogs pa'i
@#/ /lha'i bu rnams/ gang khyed kyis 'di lta bu'i spobs pa yang dag pa yang dag par bskyed pa de ni legs so/ /legs so/ /legs par sgrubs
shig dang bshad par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes sems can thams cad kyi tshe dpag tu med pas khyab par 'byung ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
snyoms par zhugs nas tshe dang / bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs dpag tu med par 'phel ba zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs
ka nas phyung ngo / /oM pu N+ye bu N+ya mahA bu N+ye/ a pa ri mi ta A yur pu N+ye dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro pa tsi ti ka ri ni swA hA/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po'i gi gzungs 'di bshad
ma thag tu ngan song thams cad rab tu zhi ste/ sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song dang / yi dwags rnams su skyes pa'i sems can thams cad grol bar bdag nyid kyis yang
dag par shes so/ /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rab tu snang bar byas te/ snang bar byas nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa rnam pa bcu gnyis kyi tshul du byas nas de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi chos kyi yi ge de nyid du zhus par gyur to/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dpag tu med pa'i rdo rje 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshe dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba'i snying po'i gzungs 'di bshad do/ /oM a mi te/ a mi ta ud b+ha be/ a mi ta saM b+ha be/
a mi ta bi krAn+te/ a mi ta bi krAn+ta/ gA mi ni/ sarba karma kle sha k+Sha yaM ka re swAhA/ de nas 'di bshad ma thag tu de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rab tu zhi'o/ /de nas yang
bcom ldan 'das kyis gdon mi za bar sgrib pa rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgrib pa gcod pa zhes

bya ba'i snying po'i gzungs 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /oM kaM ka ni kaM ka ni/ ro tsa ni ro tsa ni/ tro Ta ni tro Ta ni/ trA sa ni trA sa ni/ pra ti ha na pra ti ha na/ sarba karma pa raM pa rA Ni me sarba
satwa nA ny+tsa swAhA/ /'di bshad ma thag tu yang thams cad de bzhin du gyur to/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis sgrib pa thams cad dri ma med cing rnam par dag pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i
ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs thams cad kyi sgrib pa rnams ma lus par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i snying po'i gzungs 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /

oM rat+ne rat+ne/ ma hA rat+ne/ rat+na saM b+ha be/ rat+na ki ra Na/ rat+na mA la/ bi shu d+d+he/ shod+d+ha ya/ sarba pA paM ni hUM phaT/ de nas 'di bshad ma thag tu bdud kyi gnas thams cad bcom/ rnam
@#/ /par bcom par 'gyur to/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gdon mi za bar mi choms pa'i sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po'i gzungs 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /oM a mo g+ha a pra ti ha ta/ sarba A ba ra Na/ bi
nA sha ni/ ha ra ha ra hUM phaT/ gsang sngags 'di bshad ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ yang dag par rab tu g.yos so/ /bskyod/ rab
tu bskyod/ yang dag par rab tu bskyod do/ /bskul/ rab tu bskul/ yang dag par rab tu bskul nas rmad kyi ya mtshan du ma 'jig rten du snang bar gyur to/ /de nas dkyil
'khor ni 'di yin te/ gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /sgo ba rnams dang ldan pa ste/ /rta babs bzhi dang ldan par bya/ /lte ba dang ni sgo khyud ldan/ /de yi dbus su 'khor lo yi/ /
dkyil 'khor dam pa bri bya ste/ /rtsibs bzhi dag dang ldan pa la/ /lte ba'i dkyil 'khor ldan par bya/ /de yi dbus su gtso bo ni/ /phyag na rdo rje stobs chen po/ /phyag na rdo rje dril
bsnams shing / /zla brgyas pa'i zhal 'dzum bri/ /shar gyi rtsibs kyi steng du ni/ /mgon po mi bskyod bri bar bya/ /lho yi phyogs su rin chen bri/ /nub phyogs chu skyes pad+ma la/ /byang
phyogs su ni gdon mi za/ /dpa' bo stobs chen bri bar bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni/ /'khor los bsgyur ba chas pa dang / /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mdog 'dra zhing / /
rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa dang / /phyag ni mchog sbyin mi 'jigs pa/ /rdo rje'i skyil mo krung bzhugs bri/ /grwa yi phyogs ni thams cad du/ /de bzhin bdug sogs thams cad bri/ /

sgo ba dag kyang khros pa la/ /khro ba'i dbang du gyur pa bri/ /de nas rnal 'byor can nyid zhugs/ /sngags kyi lha rnams spyan drangs te/ /dzaHhUM baM hoHoM b+ha ga bAn badzra e h+ye hi sa ma ya s+t+waM/ /de nas
gtso bo byon pa dang / /mdor na mchod pa byas nas kyang / /'chi bdag sbrul gyis 'jigs ldan rnams/ /'chi bdag gzhom phyir gzhug par bya/ /oM badzra sa ma ya hUM rdo rje ti rin ti ri bcings la/
lag na rin chen thogs te gzhug /yang na me tog phreng ba ste/ /de ni dkyil 'khor nyid du dor/ /oM pra tIts+tsha badzra hUM/ de nas mna'i dam tshig sbyin par bya ste/ /oM badzra sa ma ya hUM/
de nas 'dis gdong g.yogs dkrol bar bya ste/ oM badzra hA s+ya yud g+ha Ta ya hUM/ de nas 'dis bstan par bya ste/ oM badzra pa sh+ya ho/ /de nas 'dis dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /
oM badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ oM bud+d+ha a b+hi Shiny+tsa oM/ oM rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa trAM/ oM pad+ma a b+hi Shiny+tsa hrIH/ oM karma b+hi Shiny+tsa aH/ de nas bum pa'i dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /
@#/ /oM badzra ka la sha a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ oM bud+d+ha ka la sha a b+hi Shiny+tsa oM/ oM rat+na ka la sha a b+hi Shiny+tsa trAM/ oM pad+ma ka la sha a b+hi Shiny+tsa hrIHoM karma ka la sha

a b+hi Shiny+tsa aHde nas phreng ba'i dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /oM rat+na mA la a b+hi Shiny+tsa trAM trAM trAM trAM trAM/ oM badzra paT+Ta a ba laM pa na a b+hi Shiny+tsa trAM/ oM bud+d+ha mu drA a b+hi Shiny+tsa

oM/ oM badzra mu drA a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ oM rat+na mu drA a b+hi Shiny+tsa trAM/ oM pad+ma mu drA a b+hi Shiny+tsa hrIHoM karma mu drA a b+hi Shiny+tsa aHoM badzra na ma a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM oM hUM trAM hrIHaH/ oM

badzra karma a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM aH/ oM badzra tsakra a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM b+h+ruM/ oM badzra tsakra a d+hi pa ti s+t+waM a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM hUM hUM/ oM oM oM/ trAM trAM trAM/ hrIHhrIHhrIHaHaHaHoM badzra d+hA

ra Ni a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ oM ta thA ga ta d+hA ra Ni a b+hi Shiny+tsa oM/ oM rat+na d+hA ra Ni a b+hi Shiny+tsa trAM/ oM pad+ma d+ha ra Na a b+hi Shiny+tsa hrIHoM karma d+hA ra Ni a b+hi Shiny+tsa aH/ oM ta thA ga ta gu h+ya a

b+hi Shiny+tsa oM/ oM badzra guh+ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ oM rat+na gu h+ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa trAMH/ oM pad+ma gu h+ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa hrIH/ oM karma gu h+ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa aH/ oM pradz+nyA pa ya sa ma yo ga a b+hi Shiny+tsa
hUM AH/ de ltar dbang bskur nas tshe bsring ba'i rig pa 'di sbyin par bya'o/ /oM b+h+rUM badzra A yu She hUM aH/ de'i sgrub pa ni 'di yin te/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i tshe zla ba'i 'od
can zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs shing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ /phyag gnyis mi 'jigs pa dang mchog sbyin du mdzad pa las bdud rtsi 'dzag pa bri'o/ /de'i
'og tu sgrub pa po'i lag pa thal mo brkyang la/ gdong gyen du bcom ldan 'das la blta bar bris la mchod pa rnam pa lnga mchod de/ de'i spyan sngar 'bum bzlas par
bya'o/ /de nas zla ba nya ba dang mchod pa chen po byas te ba dmar ser gyi mar snod gsar bar bcug la rdo rje g.yon pas mnan te/ bcom ldan 'das rab tu sems shing
mtshan thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas dri ma mnam zhing sngon ma byung ba'i dri'i ngad ldang la rlangs pa'am/ du ba'am/ me byung ngam/ 'od zer ram/ me sgron nam/
'od byung ngam/ de la sogs pa'i mtshan ma byung na mar de'am/ mar gsar ram/ til mar ram/ chu'am/ 'o ma'am/ zho'am/ chang ngam/ khrag gam/ zhag gam/
klad pa'am/ sha'am/ gang yang rung ba la rab tu sbrus te/ nang par sngar bsrung ba la sogs pa byas nas bdag nyid sbyangs te 'thungs sam zos na mtshan ma ji lta ba
bzhin du byung na ni nam zla ba dang / nyi ma yod kyi bar du tshe ring zhing rdo rje dang mtshungs par 'gyur te/ tha mas ni tha ma 'grub pas 'di la the tshom ni med do/ /mtshan ma byung na
@#/ /yang 'jig rten na nad med/ ldo ba rkyen/ lus la skra dkar dang / gnyer ma med par 'gyur ro/ /lus brtan zhing tshe lo brgya thub par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan
yang / bzlas pa byas pa tsam gyis zhi ba dang / rgyas pa dang / dbang la sogs pa'i las rnams brtag mi dgos par 'gyur te the tshom med do/ /de na rgyal po chen po bzhis
bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag kyang sems can thams cad kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde
ba'i slad du rang rang gi snying po bshad par 'tshal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal du gsol/ rdo rje 'dzin pa bka' stsal du gsol/ rgyal po chen po rnams
legs kyi/ shod cig dang / ngas kyang rjes su yi rang zhing byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /de nas gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnam thos kyi bus bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang zhing rjes
su yi rang ste/ byin gyis brlabs pas rang gi snying po 'di bshad do/ /oM bai/ de nas dri za'i rgyal po yul 'khor srung gis kyang rang gi snying po 'di bshad do/ /oM D+h-i/ de nas
grul bum gyi rgyal po 'phags skyes pos kyang rang gi snying po 'di bshad do/ /oM bi/ de nas klu'i rgyal po mig mi bzang gis kyang rang gi snying po 'di bshad do/ /oM k+Sha/
de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad de/ gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ dkyil 'khor lngas ni brgyan pa ste/ /de yi dbus su gtso bo ni/ /phyag na rdo rje 'gying bcas bri/ /de yi
g.yon gyi phyogs su ni/ /rnam thos bu dge'i lag pa na/ khe con ne'u le thogs pa dang / /rin chen rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / /sbom zhing seng+ge'i gdan la bzhugs/ /gser mdog
gzi chen ldan par bri/ /mkhas pas bum pa bzang la sogs/ /rin chen chu bo 'bab par bri/ /mdun du yul 'khor srung nyid ni/ /pi wang len pa brtson pa dang / mdzes
shing kha dog ljang gu ste/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan par bri/ /g.yas phyogs dpa' bo lus 'phags po/ /ral gri lag na thogs pa bri/ /nub phyogs su ni mig mi bzang / /
rdo rje zhags pa 'dzin pa'i mchog /sbrul mgo bdun gyis bskor ba la/ /mig kyang dmar zhing shin tu 'bar/ /sgo yi phyogs ni thams cad du/ /sgo ba rnams kyang de bzhin
no/ /de nas/ rdo rje'i phyag rgya zhes bya bas/ /sngags mkhan bdag nyid zhugs nas kyang / /bcom ldan 'das ni spyan drangs te/ /de nas rgyal po spyan drang ngo / /spyan drangs nas
ni mkhas pas mchod/ /cho ga bzhin du arga dbul/ /de nas sngags mkhan sngags 'di dang / /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya 'dis/ /slob ma rgyal rigs rje'u rigs dang /
@#/ /bram ze la sogs de bzhin te/ /me tog rin chen thogs te zhugs/ /oM badzra sa ma ya hUM/ de nas me tog gam rin po che 'dis dor bar bya'o/ /oM badzra
pra tIts+tsha twaM ma ho ta ha ma/ /gang la bab pa'i rgyal po ni/ /de ni 'dis 'grub gzhan du med/ /de nas grwa la bzhag pa yi/ /bum pa bzhis ni dbang bskur te/ /dang po phyag
na rdo rje yi/ /phyag rgyas dbang ni bskur bar bya/ /de la sogs pa go rims kyis/ /dkyil 'khor nyid du dbang bskur na/ /rgyal po ma yin rgyal por 'gyur/ /rgyal
po yin na che bar 'gyur/ /'dzam bu'i gling dbang dpal dang ldan/ /gling bzhi pa la dbang ba'i mchog /lan bzhir dbang ni bskur ba dang / /lan bzhir gzhug par byas na
ni/ /de la rdo rje 'dzin rgyal bdag /bu sdug bzhin du bskyang bar bya/ /bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis/ /bran dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang / /pho brang dang ni 'khor
bcas pas/ /rgyal po rtag tu bskyang bar bgyi/ /de gnod gzhan gyi phru ma dang / /de yi nad dang 'chi bdag gi /'jigs dang mu ge la sogs pa'i/ /gnod pa rnams
ni gzhom par bgyi/ /rnam thos bus ni rgyas par bgyi/ /yul 'khor srung gis zhi bar bgyi/ /phyugs dang gnyen bcas dus min pa'i/ /'chi bdag lus 'phags
po yis 'joms/ /mig mi bzang gis bkra shis shing / /mu ge la sogs rnam par 'joms/ /mdor na bdag gis de yi ni/ /re dang bsam pa kun bgyi ste/ /ji ste
nges pa ma lags na/ /phyag na rdo rje la 'khus 'gyur// //de nas phyogs skyong ba rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag btsal nas 'di skad ces gsol
to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag rnams kyis kyang sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i slad du rang rang gi snying po rnams dbul bar bgyi'o/ /bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jig rten skyong ba rnams legs so/ /legs so/ /legs kyi phul cig /de nas 'byung po rnams kyi bdag po dbang ldan la sogs
pas rang rang gi snying po rnams phul ba/ oM IHoM iM/ oM a/ oM ya/ oM ri/ oM ba/ oM ya/ oM ku/ oM a/ oM bra/ de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad
de/ dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bris la/ /mgon po dbus su de bzhin gzhag /phyogs skyong rang gi phyogs gnas su/ /gzhag bya spyan sngar nyi ma dang / /phag gi
gzugs dang gnyis bzhag ste/ /sgo ba rnams kyang de bzhin no/ /de nas spyan drangs de kun la/ /mchod pa kun gyis mchod par bya/ /de nas bdag nyid zhugs nas kyang / /
@#/ /slob ma rnams ni gzhug bya zhing / /phyogs skyong rang gi sngags btab pa'i/ /bum pa rnams kyis dbang bskur ro/ /de nas phan par 'dod
pa yis/ /bsgrub phyir snying po sbyin par bya/ /phyogs skyong rang gi phyogs gnas rnams/ /brtag mi dgos par 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nas de dag mgu nas 'di
skad ces gsol te/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang rgyal rigs kyi spyi bo nas dbang bskur zhing rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor 'dir zhugs te/ dbang bskur ba thob pa'am/
gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa de dag bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis rtag par dus thams cad du bsrung pa dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar
bgyi'o/ /pha rol gyi phru ma kun gzhom par bgyi/ /dus dus su char pa dbab par bgyi/ 'bru dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu rnams bskyed par bgyi'o/ /de nas
chos kyi rgyal po chen po gshin rjes bcom ldan 'das la phyag btsal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis kyang rgyal po chen po
de'i tshe bsring bar bgyi'o/ /dus ma lags par 'chi ba brgyad po so sor dgag par bgyi'o/ /srin po rnams kyi bdag po chen po ni ri tis kyang 'di skad ces
gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis kyang rgyal po dang / rgyal po'i bu dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / mi'am/ gzhan gang yang rung ba dag la nad dang / yi dwags
dang / 'dres mi 'jigs par bgyi/ srin po la sogs pas 'jigs par mi bgyi/ dus ma lags pa'i 'chi bdag gis 'jigs par mi bgyi ste/ dus thams cad du bsrung
ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po chen po wa ru Nas kyang 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gis kyang rtag par dus
thams cad du rgyal po de dang / yul thams cad so sor bskyang bar bgyi/ kun tu bsrung bar bgyi/ 'bru rnams bskyed par bgyi/ klu'i nyes pa rnams mi 'byung bar bgyi/
thog dang ser ba rnams mi dbab par bgyi/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba rnams so sor dgag par bgyi'o/ /de nas rlung gi bdag pos 'dis skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan
'das/ bdag gis kyang sems can chen po de la dus thams cad du rlung gi 'jigs pa mi 'byung bar bgyi/ dus ma lags pa'i rlung mi 'byung bar bgyi/ 'bru dang / me
tog dang / 'bras bu thams cad bskyed par bgyi/ 'jigs pa thams cad so sor dgag par bgyi'o/ /de nas gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po chen po ku be ras bcom ldan 'das
@#/ /la phyag btsal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis kyang gnod sbyin gyi sde dbon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang lhan cig
tu mchis te/ stobs dang ldan pas sems can chen po de la dus thams cad du 'jigs pa thams cad so sor dgag par bgyi/ nor dang / 'bru thams cad legs
par 'byor par bgyi/ rang gi skye bo dang / yongs kyi skye bo dang / yul dang / gnas dang / bran dang / snag gi gnyen dang / rus kyi gnye na dang / grogs
dang / bu dang / bu mo dang / chung ma la sogs pa bsrung bar bgyi/ glang dang / ba lang dang / bong bu dang / rnga mo dang / lug dang / ma he dang / bal glang dang
rta dang / ra la sogs pa la yang bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /de nas 'byung po thams cad kyi bdag po dbang ldan gyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la phyag btsal nas 'di
skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis kyang rgyal po de dang / rgyal po de dag gi bu dang / rgyal rigs dang / bram ze rnams 'di dang pha rol tu
bskyab pa dang / phan gdags pa dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / zhi ba dang / bkra shis pa dang / chang ba sbang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / gdug gzhil ba dang / dug
gzhom pa dang / mtshams gcad pa dang / sa'i 'og gi mtshams gcad pa dang / phyogs kyi mtshams bcad pa dang / rdo rje rwa bas bskor ba dang / rdo rje phur bus gdab pa
dang / rdo rje dra ba rnams pre bar bgyi/ dgos pa thams cad la nye bar gnas par bgyi/ dgos pa dang / dgos pa ma lags pa rnams kyi mtshan ma nye bar bstan par bgyi/
dge ba dang / mi dge ba thams cad rmi lam du yang bsgo bar bgyi/ sgrub na yang bgegs ma mchis par bgyi/ dngos grub thams cad stsal bar bgyi'o/ /de nas yang nam mkha'
lding gi bdag po nam mkha' la spyod pa rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la phyag btsal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gis kyang dus
thams cad du rgyal po de dang / rgyal po'i bu dang / rgyal po'i blon po dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs rnams 'jigs pa thams cad las bdag nyid 'khor thams cad dang
bcas par mchis la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi/ mchog thams cad rab tu bstab par bgyi/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi/ dus thams cad du phyi
bzhin du 'brang bar bgyi'o/ /de nas sa 'og gi bdag po phag chen pos kyang bcom ldan 'das la phyag btsal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag
@#/ /gis kyang mi'i bdag po de dang / mi'i bdag po'i bu dang / yang na lan gnyis su byung ba'am/ lan gnyis su byung ba'i bu dang / rgyal rigs dang /
rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dad pa rnams kyis dus thams cad don thams cad grub par bgyi'o/ /'jigs
pa thams cad las dus thams cad yang bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /bdag nyid kyang yongs su bskyab par bgyi'o/ /de nas gza' chen po brgyad dang / 'khor rgyu skar du bcas
pa rnams kyis kyang 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyis kyang rang rang gi sngags kyi snying po rnams 'bul bar
'tshal na/ de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyis brlabs par gsol/ legs so/ /legs so/ /ngas byin gyis brlabs kyis gza' chen po rnams shod cig /de
nas nyi ma la sogs pa gza' chen po rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /oM A/ /oM so/ oM aM/ oM bu/ oM pr-i/ oM
shu/ oM sa/ oM rA/ de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad de/ /dbus su ni bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje nyid 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i gzugs
su bri'o/ /ngos rnams su phyag rgya chen po bzhi bri'o/ /pa ba sangs ni mdun du la/ /zla ba rgyab tu bri bar bya/ /g.yas su phur bu bri bya zhing / /g.yon par gza' lhag bri bar bya/ /me
yi phyogs su mig dmar dang / /rlung gi phyogs su nyi ma ste/ /dbang ldan phyogs su spen pa'o/ /srin po'i phyogs su sgra gcan bri/ /dkyil 'khor phyi rol khor yug tu/ /
rgyu skar thams cad bri bar bya/ /sgo sgor de bzhin sgo ba rnams/ /khros pa'i yid du bri bar bya/ /rdo rje 'dzin mas zhugs nas ni/ /rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas/ /thams cad
kyang ni spyan drang ngo / /de nas slob ma rnams zhugs te/ /oM badza ha na hUM phaT/ /oM dzra gra ha sa ma ye hUM phaT/ oM badzra gra ha pra tI ts+tsha sa ma ye hUM/ de nas bza' brgyad sngags
btab pa'i/ /bum pa brgyad kyis dbang bskur ro/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgyas dbang bskur te/ /gza' rnams thams cad bsgrub par bya'o/ /de nas gza' chen po de dag gyis
bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gza' chen po brgyad kyis kyang rgyal po chen po de dang / rgyal po'i bu
la gtogs par dus thams cad du de bzhin du thams cad bgyi'o// //de nas rgyu skar dang / skad cig dang / yud tsam dang / thang cig dang / dus dang / zla
@#/ /tshigs dang / sbyor ba dang / khyim dang / dus sbyor dang / chu tshod la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyis kyang de bzhin du phyag 'tshal nas 'di
skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gis kyang dus thams cad du sems can chen po de dag gi bka' mi gcog ste/ /dpon po bzhin du bskyang bar
bgyi'o/ /grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / rgyal po dang / pho brang dang / 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gyi gnas thams cad so sor bskyang bar bgyi'o//
'jigs pa chen po 'byung ba'i tshe yang des bdag cag mchod na gdon mi 'tshal bar 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo / /de nas klu chen po brgyad kyis phud ces bya ba'i sgras
bcom ldan 'das de mnyes par byas te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ /bdag cag gis kyang de dag thams cad kyi gsang ba'i snying po 'di dbul lo/ /
klu chen po rnams legs kyi/ gsang ba'i snying po rnams phul cig /de nas de dag mgu nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skang ces gsol to/ /oM phu/ oM
pha/ oM phU/ oM phA oM phI/ oM phe/ oM phi/ oM phau/ de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad de/ pad+ma chen po 'dab brgyad la/ /kha dog dkar po bri bar bya/ /de yi dbus su
gtso bo ni/ /phyag na rdo rje rab gnas pa/ /sbrul mgo mtha' yas gdengs pa yi/ /ltos 'gro chen po sdigs pa bri/ /mtha' yas 'jog po de bzhin du/ /karko Ta dang kA li ka /nor
rgyas bu dang dung skyong dang / pad+ma chu lha de bzhin du/ /mdor na 'dab ma re re la/ /de dag sbrul mgo 'bar ba bri/ /sbrul mgo bdun bdun chung ma yis/ /mgul nas 'khyud
dang bcas par bri/ /bum pa brgyad dang gtor ma dang / /bshos mdzes pa dang 'byung po yi/ /mar dang 'o ma sbrang rtsir bcas/ /byas pa rnams ni gzhag par bya/ /de nas rdo rje
bdag nyid zhugs/ /sbrul mgos sbrul mgo can rnams dgug /phud ces bya dang lhan cig tu/ /dzaHhUM baM hoHzhes brjod de/ /de nas bu ni rgyal po dang / /rgyal rigs thams
cad rab bcug nas/ /dug gi nyes skyon bsal ba'i phyir/ /phud ces bya bas dbang bskur ro/ /de nas ming tsam brjod pas kyang / /klu gnas de dag thams cad 'grub/ /de
nas de dag kun mgu nas/ /bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ /sbyan sngar thal mo sbyar 'khod nas/ /smon lam rab tu 'debs par gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gis
bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la mngon par dga' ba rnams gal te dkyil 'khor 'dir zhugs pa rnams la bslus par gyur na/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nyid la bslus
@#/ /par gyur cig /de'i tshe bdag cag gi gnas bye mas bsregs par gyur cig /rdo rje kun tu 'bar bas bdag cag gi mgo bkas par gyur cig
rtag par dus thams cad du sems can chen po de bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba bgyi/ byin chen po dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus bskyed par bgyi/ de'i
yul du dug ma mchis par bgyi/ dus dus su char dbab par bgyi/ pha rol po'i g.yul thams cad la dus dang / dus ma yin pa'i char dbab par bgyi/ 'jigs pa thams
cad rnam par gzhom par bgyi/ rgyal ba'i bka' dang / rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bka' rab tu bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /de nas sgrub pa bshad de/ lha rdzas 'od phreng dkar po yis/ /dbul
sbrul mgo bzhis bskor ba'i/ /rdo rje 'dzin gtso bsam nas su/ /phud ces bya ba 'bum bzlas la/ /de nas dug blangs phud ces ni/ /bya ba'i dkyil 'khor bsams nas
kyang / /lha rdzas 'od zer phreng bas gang / /de la phud ces bya ba bsam/ /lag pa sbrul mgo zhags 'dra dang / /phud ces bya ba'i rlung gis gtor/ /pags pa sha dang rus
gnas pa'i/ /dug rnams thams cad ma lus par/ /phud ces bya ba'i lag pas drangs/ /de nas las rnams kun byed cing / /dug rims dug sbyar la sogs pa/ /khu tshur
gyis kyang kun phyin na/ /sbrul mgo'i phyag rgyas smos ci dgos/ /de nas lha chen po rnams kyi bdag po 'jigs par byed pa chen po bud med chen mo brgyad kyis bskor bas bcom ldan 'das
la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gis skrag pa dang / bud med rnams kyis skrag pas lha dang klu la sogs pa thams cad skrag /rnam par
skrag /rab tu skrag te/ kha sbub tu 'gyel nas gos dang bral te sems kyang stor nas kun tu 'phyan pa de dag la phan gdags pa'i slad du bdag cag snying po 'bul bar 'tshal gyis/ /
bcom ldan 'das kyis de legs par byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ 'jigs par byed pa chen po/ legs so/ /legs so/ /rab tu 'jigs par byed pa bdag nyid dang / /lha'i bud med thams
cad kyi snying po rnams shod cig /de nas 'jigs par byed pa chen pos 'jigs par byed pa'i sgra phyung nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /oM b+hai ra be b+hI swA hA/ oM b+hA swAhA/ oM b+hI swA hA
oM b+hU swA hA/ oM b+he swA hA/ oM b+hai swA hA/ oM b+hau swA hA/ oM b+haM swAhA/ oM b+haHswAhA/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'jigs byed chen po ni brgyad po de dag bdag gi ngag nyan/ de nas de dag dkyil
'khor bshad/ /'khor lo chen po rtsibs brgyad pa/ /bris nas dbus su rdo rje 'dzin/ /khro chen 'jig rten gsum las ni/ /rnam rgyal zhes bya gzhag par bya/ /de yi zhabs drung 'jigs byed
@#/ /pa'i/ /drag po chen po khros pa ni/ /'jigs byed ma dang bcas par bri/ /rtsibs kyi nang ni thams cad du/ /gzhan yang 'jigs byed brgyad po ni/ /bud med rnams
dang ldan pa la/ /khros pa'i bzhin dang yid khros par/ /ci bder bar ni bri bar bya/ /'dir ni sgo sgor de bzhin du/ /sgo ba shin tu khros ldan bri/ /de nas lcags kyu la sogs pas/ /
bkug ste mgo yi thod pa ni/ /khrag gis bkang ste mchod nas kyang / /sha chang gtor ma bzang po dang / /snod rnams khrag gis bkang ba dang / /mgo thod mgo yi dum bu dang / khrag gam
chang bkang bum pa brgyad/ /dkyil 'khor der ni gzhag par bya/ /de nas 'jig rten gsum rgyal ba'i/ /mchog gi slob ma gzhug par bya/ /bum pa'am mgo yi thod pa ni/ /de ltar
brgyad kyis dbang bskur ro/ /de nas las rnams sbyin bya ste/ /bud med khyim mam mtshan gcig par/ /'jig rten gsum ni 'dul ba'i mchog /tshul bzhin du ni mchod nas kyang //
'bum phrag bzhir ni bzlas par bya/ /de nas 'jigs par byed pa yi/ /bdag nyid chen po'i sgra thos nas/ /mi 'jigs par ni mgo thod par/ /khrag mchog bkang ste arga dbul//
de nas khro bo 'jigs byed pa/ /ma rungs yid can bud med kyi/ /tshogs kyis bskor cing 'jigs byed pa/ /brgyad kyis bskor ba mthong bar 'gyur/ /de mthong 'jigs pa med gyur
la/ /hUM zhes bya ba dran byed cing / /sha 'am yang na chang mchog gis/ /thod pa bkang ste dbul bar bya/ /de nas 'jigs byed ma rungs 'joms/ /mgu nas rab tu grub gyur nas/ /ci 'dod ces
ni smras nas kyang / /mgu ba'i yid kyis de sbyin byed/ /sa rnams sbyin pa ma gtogs par/ /bde chen hUM gi tshul gyis gsol/ /khu ba bro ba'i btung ba dang / /rdzas dang ral gri 'khor lo dang //
rtse gsum pa dang mtho ris dang / /mi dang sa 'og rgyal po dang / /gling dang gling bzhi brgya byin dang / /gnod sbyin dbang phyug srin po nyid/ /rig 'dzin dang ni rig 'dzin gyi/ /'khor los
bsgyur dang 'jig rten ni/ /gsum gyi bdag dang bka' nyan dang / /rang gi 'khor dang bud med kyi/ /dngos grub gang yang rung ba ni/ /ci dga' bar yang sbyin par byed/ /byin nas
dgod cing 'gro bar byed/ /skrag na de ma thag tu gsod/ /de nas tshangs pa la sogs pa lha chen po rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to//
bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal na rang gi brtag pa bshad par 'tshal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs brtse bar dgongs te
byin gyis brlab par gsol/ de nas tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha rnams kyis rang gi snying po rnams bshad do/ /oM A/ oM b+hi/ oM ru/ oM i/ oM kaM /oM ga /oM bri/ oM ka/
@#/ /de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad de/ /dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bris la/ /dbus su 'jig rten gsum 'dul ba/ /de yi mdun du dpa' bo ni/ /dbang
phyug rtse gsum lag thogs bri/ /rgyab tu tshangs pa phri bya ste/ /g.yon par lag na 'khor lo thogs/ /g.yas par dbang po rang gi ni/ /phyag rgya'i mtshan ma lag thogs bri/ /rang gi
dkyil 'khor chung ma rnams/ /'dir yang sgo ba de bzhin te/ /bya dang bum pa gang bar gzhag /dkyil 'khor gyi ni phyi rol du/ /stobs bzang la sogs mthu chen gzhag /de nas
zhugs nas lha rnams ni/ /mkhas pas kun nas dgug par bya/ /dzaHhUM bo hoHlha thams cad/ /dkyil 'khor dam par bzhugs par mdzod/ /de nas 'ongs par mthong ba
dang / /dga' ba chen pos mchod par bya/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yi/ /phyag rgyas slob ma rnams gzhug ste/ /oM pra ti ts+tsha twAM mahA satwa badzra d+hA ra A dz+nyA pa ya hUM ha ha ha ho/ /me tog
cho ga bzhin du dor/ /mig dbye nas ni bstan par bya/ /de nas sngags kyis btab pa yi/ /bum pa'i chus ni dbang bskur ro/ /de nas lha rnams gang dga' ba'i/ /dngos grub
rab tu sbyin par bya/ /'bum gcig gam ni 'bum gnyis sam/ /dang po bsnyen pa byas nas kyang / /dbang phyug la sogs lha mchog rnams/ /de dag sgrub pas bsgrub bya
ste/ /mtshan gcig la sogs gnas sam ni/ /phyag na rdo rje'i pho brang ngam/ /yang na de bzhin gshegs pa'am/ /ring bsrel ldan pa'i mchod rten du/ /lha rnams thams cad cho
ga bzhin/ /sgrub pas rtag tu bsgrub byas na/ /nam phyed na ni lha bzhengs nas/ /khyod kyi 'dod pa gang yin pa/ /de ni ci bder sbyin bya yis/ /bzang pos myur du soms te smos/ /gang
phyir mchog ni khyod la sbyin/ /de nas sngags shes dngos grub phyir/ /lha la mchog ni gsol ba gdab/ /lha rdzas khu ba bro btung dang / /mi snang ba dang mkha' 'gro dang / /ril bu
rdzas dang rgyal la sogs/ /yid 'dod tshang med gsol ba gdab/ /de nas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag btsal nas 'di skad ces gsol
to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ /'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dir zhugs pa gang lags pa de dag /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag lha thams cad
kyis sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ngo / /mtho ris kyi lam bstan par bgyi'o/ /ngan song ma lags pa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o/ /sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i lam bstan
par bgyi'o/ /dpen pa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o/ /rnam par dben pa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o/ /mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o/ /dam pa'i chos kyi lam
@#/ /bstan par bgyi'o/ /bde 'gro'i lam bstan par bgyi'o/ /spong ba'i lam bstan par bgyi'o/ /nyon mongs pa med pa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o/ /sangs
rgyas nyid du 'grub pa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' nyid du 'grub pa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid du 'grub pa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o/ /
dus thams cad du 'jigs pa thams cad las bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o/ /bdag nyid kyi bu bzhin du yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/ /de'i pha rol gyi dgra
kun gzhom par bgyi'o/ /grong dang / grong 'dab dang / ljongs dang / rgyal po dang / rgyal po'i pho brang dang / rgyal srid rnams bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /yul dang / phyogs dang / grong
khyer dang / grong 'khor rnams bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /rgyal srid kyang stsal bar bgyi'o/ /rgyal srid thob pa rnams ni rgyal srid rgyas par bgyi'o/ /gling gcig pa dang / gling
gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa dang / bde 'gro dang / mi'i gnas dang / sa'i 'og dang / 'khor los bsgyur ba rnams stsal bar bgyi'o/ /mdor na brgya byin nyid
dang / tshangs pa nyid dang / gtogs 'dod nyid dang / dbang phyug chen po nyid kyang stsal bar bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje nyid kyi 'khor gyi
dkyil 'khor la kun tu gzigs nas 'dzum pa mdzad pa dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag g.yos/ /rab tu g.yos/ yang dag par rab tu g.yos/ 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/
yang dag par rab tu 'gul/ 'bar/ rab tu 'bar/ yang dag par rab tu 'bar/ /dgod/ rab tu dgod/ yang dag par rab tu dgod/ rtse/ rab tu rtse/ yang dag par rab tu rtse
zhing rmad kyi ya mtshan du ma 'jig rten du yang dag par rab tu snang bar gyur to/ /de nas tshangs pa la sogs pa lha'i tshogs rnams shin tu dam par gyur nas bcom ldan
'das la phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum pa
mi mdzad na/ 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ de'i slad du 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags pa lung bstan du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
phyag na rdo rjes lha rnams kyis gsol ba'i tshig gsan nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams sngon gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bshad
pa'i 'chi bdag zhi bar byed pa'i rig pa dang / dus ma yin pa'i 'chi bdag 'joms par byed pa'i rig sngags gzi brjid chen po gang yin pa thos sam/ de nas bcom ldan
@#/ /'das phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal nas tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha chen po de dag yang dag par rab tu mgu ste ba spu langs nas legs so zhes bya ba 'di dag
gsol te/ /bcom ldan 'das/ legs so/ /legs so/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa legs so/ /legs so/ /gang gi slad du tshe thung ba'i sems can rnams tshe bsring bar bgyi ba dang / dus
ma lags par 'chi ba bdag gis nyes pa rnams gang gi dus ma lags pa 'chi ba las rnam par grol bar bgyi ba dang / ngan song du skyes pa rnams ngan song gi rgyud thams cad
las ci nas kyang rnam par grol bar bgyi ba dang / 'khor ba'i 'jigs pas skrag pa'i sems can rnams bde blag tu 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs par bgyis nas
myur du bla na ma mchis pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba'i slad du gzi brjid chen po'i stobs dang / mthu chen po'i
rig pa bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams kyis gsol ba'i tshig gsan nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi snying po 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /oM pu N+ye pu N+ye/ mahA pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta A yuHpu N+ye dz+nyA na saM b+ha ro pa tsi te swAhA/ snying
po'i rig pa'o/ /oM hrIHswAhA/ nye ba'i snying po'i rig pa'o/ /oM b+h+rUM swAhA/ nye ba'i snying po'i rig pa'o/ /oM kruM swAhA/ snying po yang dag par bskul ba'i rig pa'o/ /oM traM swAhA/ snying po
dam pa'o/ /oM hrIM swAhA/ gsang ba'i snying po'o/ /de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad de/ dkyil 'khor rtsibs bzhi par byas la/ de'i dbus su de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dang /

bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs dang / gzi brjid tshad med pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhag ste/ b+h+rUM zhes bya ba'i snying po'o/ /de'i spyan sngar ni phyag na rdo rje ste/ hrIHzhes bya ba'i snying
po'o/ /g.yon par ni khro bo ste/ kruM zhes bya ba'i snying po'o/ /g.yas par ni nam mkha'i snying po ste/ traM zhes bya ba'i snying po'o/ /rgyab tu ni 'phags pa kun tu spyan ras gzigs
kyi dbang po mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa zhes bya ste/ hrIM zhes bya ba'i snying po'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor la rig pa rnams bri'o/ /bum pa lnga dang / brgyad
'khor los bsgyur ba'i sngags kyis btab la gzhag go /bdug pa la sogs pa las thams cad pa'i khro bo'i sngags kyis btab pa dang / mchod pa la sogs pa gzhag ste/
sgo ba thams cad kyang de bzhin no/ /de nas sngags mkhan bdag nyid zhugs la/ bde bar gshegs pa dam pa sras dang 'bangs su bcas shing 'khor gyis bskor te/
@#/ /rig pa dang lhan cig spyan drang ngo / /de nas bdag nyid dbang bskur te/ skyil mo krung bcas nas 'dug la stong phrag brgya bzlas na/ de bzhin gshegs
pa'am/ rdo rje 'dzin pa'am/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug kyang rung ste/ mngon sum du mthong nas de 'dod pa'i mchog so sor thob par 'gyur ro/ /ci ste mnyam
par gzhag na de'i tshe yid kyis las thams cad nus par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya bcings la/ oM badzra d+ha ra/ rat+na d+ha ra/ pad+ma d+ha ra/ bi shwa d+ha ra/ ta thA ga ta sa

ma ya/ mA ti kra ma/ ta thA ga ta sa ma ya d+ha ra a t+ma ko\u0f85haM/ zhes nga rgyal bskyed la slob ma rnams gzhug par bya'o/ /de nas 'di sa me tog dor bar bya'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta pra tIts+tsha

ho sa ma ya s+t+waM/ de nas phreng ba de nyid kyis mgo la bcings la dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi Shiny+tsa badzra d+ha ra A dz+nyA pa ya hUM b+h+rUM/ oM badzra badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM hUM/ oM

rat+na rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM trAM/ oM pad+ma pad+ma a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM hrIH/ oM karma karma a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM kruM/ de nas dam tshig dang / bka'i dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /de la dam tshig ni/ dkon mchog
gsum dang byang chub sems/ /bla ma dam pa rnams mi spang / /srog chags rnams ni gsad mi bya/ /ma byin par yang mi blang zhing / /brdzun du smra bar bya ma yin/ /pha rol bud
med spyad mi bya/ /bla ma smad par mi bya ste/ /de yi grib ma mi 'gom zhing / /slob dpon ma yin mi gzung la/ /rdo rje slob dpon mtshan mi brjod/ /sngags dang phyag rgya mi smad de/ /lha rnams
la lta smos ci dgos/ /ci ste glen pas smad na ni/ /nad kyis nges par 'chi bar 'gyur/ /rnying dang lha yi grib ma dang / /'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi/ /phyag rgya yi ge'i mtshan ma
rnams/ /gom pas 'gom par mi bya'o/ /glen pas dkon mchog gsum sogs dang / /sangs rgyas bstan la gnod byed dang / /bla ma smod la brtson pa rnams/ /mkhas
pas bsgrims te gsad par bya/ /chos min ldan dang sdig sbyong dang / /rtag tu sems can gnod brtson dang / /dam tshig sdang rnams snying brtse ba'i/ /sngags mkhan gyis ni
sngags kyis gsad/ /'jungs pa rnams kyi nor blangs la/ /sems can phongs la sbyin par bya/ /bla ma la ni mchod pa dang / /de ltar dam tshig bsgrub pa dang / /dkyil 'khor phyir dang
dam tshig can/ /phan phyir rgyal ba'i sras rnams la/ /mchod phyir mi yi dbang po 'am/ /phyug po rnams kyi nor dbrog go /sems can rnams la phan spyod pas/ /rtag tu dam tshig
bla ma'i nor/ /srog chags srog ni bsrung ba'i phyir/ /brdzun du yang ni smra bar bya/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni mnyes bya dang / /dam tshig rnams ni bsrung ba dang / /sngags rig pas ni
@#/ /bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /gzhan gyi bud med bsten par bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas 'dug nas/ /thams cad byas shing kun zos kyang / /'grub 'gyur
nyes par mi 'gyur na/ /snying rjer ldan pas smos ci dgos/ /de nas 'dis bka'i dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta A dz+nyA na te dA s+yA mi gr-i h+na badzra su sid d+ha ye/ oM badzra
tiSh+tha hUM/ 'dis rdo rje lag tu byin la las kyi dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /oM sarba karma ni ku ru bud d+hA nA ma hUM/ de nas bla ma bla ma'i phyir/ /khyod kyis lus mchog sbyin par bya/ /nor
dang dbyig dang 'bru rnams dang / /stan dang bzhon pa de bzhin te/ /bran gyi mchog dang khang pa dang / /rgyal po rgyal srid de bzhin te/ /bu dang bu mo chung ma dang / /ma dang sring mo tsha mo
dang / /gzhan yang ci bzheng thams cad ni/ /phan par bsam phyir bla mar dbul/ /de nas byang chub bar du ni/ /sangs rgyas nyid dang gzhan dag dang / /'jig rten pa yi mthu
chen rnams/ /gang 'dod pa dag bsgrub 'dod pas/ /dngos grub rnams ni gsol bar bya/ /de nas bu la phan pa'i phyir/ /sngags mkhan ser sna med sems dang / /dad pas
dad pa'i sems ldan pa/ /dngos grub rnams ni sbyin par bya/ /chos rnams thams cad dngos med par/ /sems kyis bsgom pa byas nas kyang / /a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
bsam/ /rang gi sa bon de dbus su/ /bsams nas dam tshig phyag rgya yang / /bsam zhing de bzhin de nyid du/ /sgrub pa po ni bsgyur bar bya/ /lha yi rnal 'byor tshul du bsgyur/ /de nas
rang gi sa bon dang / /phyag rgyas de byin brlabs/ /ltag 'og go rims ji bzhin du/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis dbang bskur ro/ /de nas nga rgyal bskyed nas kyang / /mkhas pa
yis ni bsgrub byas na/ /de bzhin gshegs kyang 'grub 'gyur na/ /dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos/ /de nas tshangs pa la sogs pa lha chen po rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad
ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rgyal po dang / rgyal po'i bu dang / rgyal po'i blon po dang / rgyal rigs dang / bram ze dang / rje'u rigs dang /
dmang rigs dang / gzhan yang dman zhing kho re chung ba phyag dar ba dang / mtha' 'khob pa'i rigs ngan gyi skye bo rnams dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po 'dir zhugs na de dag gi rnam
par smin pa ji lta bur 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir nga la zhus pa de ni legs so/ /legs so/ /lha'i bu
rnams/ dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po 'dir zhugs pa dang / dbang bskur ba dang / bris pa dang / 'drir bcug pa dang / rjes su yi rang ba dang / phyag byas pa dang / mchod pa rnams kyi
@#/ /'bras bu dang / rnam par smin pa nyon cig /lha'i bu rnams/ mdor na nga la yang de'i yon tan bshad par spobs pa med de/ nga'i bsod nams kyi phung
po gang yin pa de brgya phrag stong du mar bsgyur kyang grangs su yang mi chog /bgrang bar yang mi chog /dper yang mi bzod de/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
bsod nams kyi phung po yang mi bzod do/ /dkyil 'khor 'dir zhugs pa'i sems can rnams kyi 'bras bu dang / rnam par smin pa gang lags pa de ni bcom ldan 'das do
mtshar che'o/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa ngo mtshar che'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gis dkyil 'khor la sogs par 'jug par spro'o/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa spro'o/ /de
nas lha de dag gis de bzhin du phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dzam+bu'i gong gi sems can bsod nams chung zhing tshe thung ba dang / ngan song
gi rgyud dang ldan pa dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / yi dwags dang / byol song rnams su skyes pa dag kyang mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de dag la bdag cag gis ji ltar
bsgrub par bgyi/ kye lha'i bu rnams/ sems can de dag ni dkyil 'khor 'di nyid du chu gcig /chos kyi yi ge yang zlos su chu gcig dang / de nas sems can de dag tshe ring
par 'gyur/ /bsod nams dang bral ba rnams bsod nams dang ldan par 'gyur/ ngan song las kyang rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/ /kye lha'i bu rnams/ ngan song du skyes zin pa
gang yin pa de dag gi ming la yang dbang bskur cig /gzugs brnyan la yang dbang bskur bar byos shig /mchod rten la yang dbang bskur bar byos shig /rang gi lha'i sku la
yang dbang bskur bar byos shig /chung ngu na de dang rigs mthun pa dang / de'i bu dang / de dang rus mthun pa dang / de'i ming 'dzin pa'am/ bran la yang dbang bskur cig dang / zhag
bdun du dkyil 'khong du bcug ste dbang bskur na/ gdon mi za bar zhag bdun gyis ngan song gi sgrib pa las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/ /lha'i bu rnams/ de yi ming nas smos te
'bum phrag gnyis sam/ 'bum phrag gsum mam/ 'bum phrag bzhi nas 'bum phrag brgya phrag stong gi bar du bzlas pa byas na mtshams med pa lnga byas pa yang rnam par
thar par gyur na/ sdig pa chung ngu byas pa rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos/ lha yi bu rnams zhi ba yi/ /ho ma khung tha ma bar ma mchog /khru gang khru do khru bzhi pa'i/ /zlum po nyid du byas
nas ni/ /de yi ming yang yungs kar gyis/ /brgya phrag stong du bsreg byas na/ /ngan song kun la rnam par thar/ /de yi sha dang rus pa dang / /skra dang thal ba la sogs pas/ /cho ga
@#/ /de dang 'dra bar ni/ /sbyin sreg byas nas ngan song yang / /kun las rnam par thar par 'gyur/ /de yi dbus su 'khor lo ni/ /rtsibs brgyad 'od zer dkar
'bar bri/ /khor yug rdo rje rtse lnga pa/ /'od zer dkar dang ldan par bri/ /de nas rdo rje rgya gram dang / /rdo rje rin chen chu skyes mchog /de nas sdig pa gzhom pa'i phyir/ /phyag rgya sna tshogs
gzhag par bya/ /phyi yi rdo rje rigs rnams kyi/ /phyag rgya rnams ni phyi rol bri/ /gza' dang skar ma'i mtshan ma dang / /de ltar 'jig rten skyong ba rnams/ /gtso bo'i ri mo lugs
ma'ang rung / /rdo rje can dang lhan cig gzhag /bya dang bum pa bkang ba dang / /gtor ma lha bshos rab dkar gzhag /mdor na thig ni btab nas kyang / /cho ga bzhin du bri bar
bya/ /dkar po'i gos ni bgos nas kyang / /sangs rgyas gzugs can mi 'jigs pas/ /ngan song rgyud na gnas pa yi/ /sems can rjes su dran byed cing / /sdig pa'i
sgrib pa zhi ba'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi sbyin sreg ni/ /mar dang 'o ma sbrang rtsi can/ /'bras yos yungs kar bsres pa dang / /de yi rus pa sha la sogs/ /yang na
ming nas smos te bya/ /de nas bde 'gror skyes nas kyang / /mkhas pas rgyas pa bya dgos te/ /khru do pa 'am khru bzhi pa/ /de ltar mchog ni khru brgyad par/ /byas nas hom
khung gru bzhi pa/ /kun tu mu ran ldan par bya/ /de dbus pad+ma rin chen can/ /'od zer ser po ldan par bri/ /khor yug tu ni rin chen dang / /mu ran rnams la chu skyes bri/ /phyi rol du ni
rigs lnga yi/ /so so'i phyag rgya bri par bya/ /de ltar phyi yi lha rnams dang / /lcags kyu la sogs bri bar bya/ /gos rnams ser por bsgyur nas kyang / /mtho ris gnas pa rjes dran
zhing / /de la phan phyir rgyas pa'i phyir/ /rgyas pa yi ni las byas na/ /lus can de yi tshe dang dpal/ /gzi brjid bde ba'i longs spyod 'phel/ /de nas phan phyir nges par yang / /dbang du bya
ba'i las byas na/ /hom khung gzhu yi dbyibs 'dra la/ /khru gang pa 'am khru do pa/ /khru bzhir byas la de'i dbus su/ /pad+ma dmar po bris nas kyang / /de yi dbus su mda' bcas pa'i/ /
gzhu yang de bzhin bri bar bya/ /khor yug tu yang mda' bcas pa'i/ /gzhu ni kha dog dmar por bri/ /sngags rdzogs pas ni rtag par yang / /phyi rol de dang 'dra bar bya/ /sems
can de yang dran byas te/ /dmar por gyur pa'i gos gyon la/ /me tog dmar ram pad+ma 'am/ /'bras bu dmar ram tshon bskus pa'i/ /mar dang gur gum bsres pa dang / /tsan+dan dmar
po'i phye ma yis/ /sbyin sreg byas na lha la sogs/ /thams cad de yi dbang du 'gyur/ /de la gdon rnams gzhom pa'i phyir/ /mngon spyod kyang ni brtsam bya ste/ /phyed dang gsum
@#/ /mam khru gsum mam/ /de ltar dam pa khru dgur bya/ /gru gsum pa dang ldan par ni/ /dbus su rdo rje rtse dgu pa/ /rtse gsum pa dang rgya gram pa'i/ /rdo rje rnams
dang dbyig pa dang / /mgo ni rdo rje rtse gsum dang / /dgra sta rtse gcig mu khyud bskor/ /phyi rol du yang rim gsum du/ /snga ma bzhin du brgyan par bya/ /bya dang gtor ma bum pa dang / /
bshos cha rnam pa mang du gzhag /sha dang khrag gis bkang ba yi/ /mgo yi thod pa kun tu gzhag /de yi lus can sdig sogs dang / /bgegs rnams gzhom par bya ba'i
phyir/ /gos nag bgos shing khros nas kyang / /'jig rten gsum rgyal bdag nyid bsam/ /de nas de yi sdig bcom lus/ /bgegs dang phral te ci bde bar/ /mtho ris
'jig rten mi yi nang / /khams gsum pa na ci bder spyod/ /go rims 'di dag nyid kyis ni/ /tshe 'di'i gnas la'ang bya ba ste/ /de nas gang gi phyir byas pa/ /de yi phyir yang de bzhin
'gyur/ /gzhan dag kyang ni las rnams kun/ /snga ma ji bzhin de ltar bya/ /des ni sems can thams cad la'ang / /myur du bde skyid myong bar 'gyur/ /de nas tshangs pa la
sog pa lha rnams yid mgu nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ngan song du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi don
dang / /phan pa dang / bde ba'i slad du brtag pa'i rgyal po 'di 'dri ba dang / 'drir 'jug pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo rnams bdag cag tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams
kyis bu bzhin du yongs su bskyang bar bgyi/ gang rgyal po dang / rgyal po'i bu dang / rgyal po'i blon po rnams ji ltar gsungs pa'i rjes su slob na de'i rgyal srid 'phel bar bgyi/
yul dang / phyogs dang / rang gi skye bo dang / yongs kyi skye bo dang / bran la sogs pa bsrung bar bgyi/ nor dang 'bru rnams mang du 'byor par bgyi/ bud med dang / skyes pa dang /
khye'u dang / bu mo rnams dang ldan par bgyi/ 'byor ba dang / rgyas pa dang / lo legs pa dang / zhi ba rnams su bgyi na/ ji ltar bshad pa la mi rtog par bgyi ba lta smos kyang ci
'tshal/ gang gi brtag pa'i rgyal po 'di dang bas rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la brtags te/ grong dang grong khyer du gtsugs la/ bdag nyid kyis bsu ba dang / glang po che'i steng du bzhag
la grong dang grong khyer la sogs pa thams cad bskor na/ nad dang gnod pa thams cad ma mchis par 'gyur la/ sems can chen po de'i drung na bdag cag bran gyi tshul lam/
de'i tshul du gnas par bgyi'o/ /gang du 'dir rab tu spyod pa de na/ bcom ldan 'das/ phyag na rdo rje nyid longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skus rdo rje sems dpa'i skur zhugs par 'tshal
@#/ /bar bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ rdo rje sems dpa' kun tu bzang po re ba thams cad yongs su skor ba de nyid brtag pa'i rgyal po'i gzugs
su bzhugs par 'tshal bar bgyi 'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'khor dang bcas te bzhugs par 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ /sa phyogs de mchod rten du gyur par
'tshal bar bgyi ste/ mchod par bgyi/ phyag 'tshal bar bgyi/ kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /bdag cag tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams kyis brtag pa'i rgyal
po 'di kun la rgyas par 'chad pa'i rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub chen po de'i g.yog bgyi'o/ /bran gyi tshul du gnas par bgyi 'o/ /bka' nyan pa'i tshul du gnas
par bgyi'o/ /sgo ba thams cad mnyan par bgyi'o/ /phan pa dang / bde ba thams cad bgyi'o/ /dngos grub thams cad kyang stsal bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/
mdor na de'i rkang pa'i rdul mgo bos blangs par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ phyag 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ mchod par bgyi'o/ /bdag
cag de'i phyi bzhin du rjes su 'brang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das/ dkyil 'khor du zhugs te dbang bskur ba gang lags pa de dag kyang bdag cag gi dpon po
lags par 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ /phyag na rdo rje lags par 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' lags par 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ /bde ba chen po kun tu bzang po
lags par 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ /bde ba chen po kun tu bzang po lags par 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa lags par 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ /de nas
bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams/ chos la rim gro bya bar de
ltar dam tshig la gces par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni legs so/ /legs so/ /legs par sgrubs shig/ //bam po gsum pa ste tha ma/ de nas
bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes sngags dang / rig pa dang / snying po thams cad brtan par bya ba'i phyir nyid kyi snying po 'di bshad do/ /oM badzra b+h+rUM hUM badzra pA Ni dr-i D+ha tiSh+Tha
hUM/ oM hUM a/ oM badzra hUM phaT/ oM dr-i D+ha badzra hUM phaT/ oM badzra hUM sa/ oM badzra hUM aH/ de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad de/ dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bris

la/ /dbus su rdo rje bri bar bya/ /yang na rdo rje sems dpa' 'am/ /kun tu bzang ngam bde ba che/ /spyan sngar phyag na rdo rje la/ /g.yas su phyag na rin chen bsnams/ /phyag na pad+ma nub phyogs bri/ /byang phyogs
@#/ /phyag na rgya gram bsnams/ /phyi rol tu ni kun bskor zhing / /sangs rgyas thams cad gzhag par bya/ /de yi phyi rol sems dpa' rnams/ /go rims bzhin du bri bar bya/ /de yi
phyi rol sems dpa' rnams/ /byams pa la sogs mchog chen bri/ /de ltar dge slong kun dga' sogs/ /thub rnams de yi phyi rol bri/ /rang gi chung ma bus bskor ba'i/ /
tshangs pa la sogs phyi rol bri/ /gza' dang skar ma'i lha rnams dang / /rgyal po bzhi po rnams dang ni/ /phyogs skyong 'jig rten skyong ba rnams/ /de yi phyi rol dmyal kun
dang / /'dod chags la sogs byol song bri/ /sgo skor gsungs pa de bzhin du/ /sgo ba stobs kyi dam pa rnams/ /dri rnams lnga yi chus bkang ba/ /gser gyi bum pa 'od can
dang / /gtor ma dang ni lha bshos dang / /me tog bdug pa rab mdzes pa dang / /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan 'phan rnams dang / /bla re dang ni rnga mchog dang / /dril bu rdo rje nor
bu dang / /do shal nyi ma la sogs brgyan/ /'dod can rnams kyi 'bras bu ni/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lngas dgang ngo / /de nas sngags mkhan nyid kyis ni/ /spyan drang bdag
nyid 'jug par bya/ /bdag nyid kyis ni dbang yang bskor/ /sdom gnas dam tshig ldan pa dang / /bla ma mos shing mi 'jigs la/ /rigs skyes skyon dang bral ba dang / /
ser sna ma lus spangs gyur cing / /yon tan mang por ldan gyur pa/ /gtong dang tshul khrims mang du thos/ /byams pa dang ni snying rje'i sems/ /dga' dang btang snyoms gnas
pa dang / /stong pa mtshan ma med pa'i sems/ /smon pa med pa'i yid ldan pa'i/ /slong ma dam pa sngags 'di yis/ /byang chub tu ni sems bskyed la/ /sngags mkhan gyis ni

gzung bar bya/ /oM badzra hUM dzaH/ oM badzra sa ma ya pra be sha hUM/ oM badzra pA Ni pra tIts+tsha badzra sa twa mahA su kha hUM/ ha ha ho sa ma ya s+t+raM/ me tog gi phreng ba dor nas gang la bab pa'i
sngags dang phyag rgyas mgo bo la bcing bar bya'o/ /de nas dam tshig sbyin par bya ste/ oM/ ci ste khyod kyis su yang rung ba la smras na ni/ phyag na rdo rje nyid kyis rdo rje 'bar zhing
rab tu 'bar bas khyod kyi mgo bkas par 'gyur ro/ /oM badzra sa ma ya dr-i D+ha hUM a/ de nas 'dis dam tshig gi chu blud la gdong g.yogs dgrol bar bya'o/ /oM badzra tsak+ShuH
pa sh+ye ho Adz+nyA pa ya ti ban+na mok+Sha ya ma ni hUM phaT/ de nas phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bstan te/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar

dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /oM badzra pA Ni swa yAn+te a nu rak+to a b+hi Shiny+tsa hrIH/ oM badzra badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa sarba badzra a b+hi She ka ta hUM A/ oM bud d+ha a b+hi Shiny+tsa sarba bud d+ha a b+hi She ka ta
@#/ /oM hUM/ oM rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa sarba rat+na a b+hi She ka ta oM traM/ oM pad+ma a b+hi Shiny+tsa sarba pad+ma a b+hi She ka ta a hrIH/ oM karma a b+hi shiny+tsa sarba karma a b+hi
She ka ta oM AH de nas bdag gi lus la sogs pa yon du phul la bka' mnod par bya'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta A dz+nyA a b+hi She ka ta oM kan+te dA s+yA mi gr-ih+Na badzra pra sid d+ha
ye hUM/ de nas las thams cad byed du gzhug cing dngos grub thams cad kyang sbyin no/ /bde bas bde ba bskyed nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi po'i dbus su ni/ /kun tu bzang
ngam bde ba che/ /bdag nyid kyis ni bsgoms nas kyang / /snying gar hUM zhes bya bsams na/ /rdo rje sems dpa' mnyam par 'gyur/ /dpal ldan las rnams kun byed cing / /
kun tu bzang por bdag nyid 'gyur/ /de ltar 'gyur ba the tshom med/ /hUM las sangs rgyas gzugs gyur nas/ /phyag na rdo rjer bdag nyid 'gyur/ /snying gar 'khor lo rab
bsgoms na/ /phyag na rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje khro bor rnam bsgoms te/ /snying ga'i dbus su phaT ces pa/ /hUM zhes bya bas bskor bsams na/ /khro bo stobs chen
nyid du 'gyur/ /rdo rje bstan par bdag bsgyur la/ /snying gar a zhes bya ba yis/ /bskor ba'i hUM dang trAM ldan pa'i/ /bsams na rin chen 'dra bar 'gyur/ /rdo rjer bsgoms
la snying gi ni/ /dbus su pad+mo zhes bya ba/ /oM zhes bya bas bskor bsams na/ /phyag na pad+mo mnyam par 'gyur/ /'khor lo rgya gram hUM ldan par/ /a zhes bya bas bskyed nas
kyang / /oM zhes bya bas bskor bsams na/ /rdo rje las dang mnyam par 'gyur/ /de nas las rnams bshad bya ste/ /zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa'i las/ /de ltar dbang dang mngon
spyod rnams/ /bzlas dang sbyin sreg cho ga yis/ /las rnams thams cad bya ba yin/ /rdo rje sems dpar bdag bsgyur la/ /zhi ba'i las ni brtsam bya zhing / /cho ga shes pas
nang par nyid/ /bzlas dang sbyin sreg nyid byed cing / /'od zer sprin gyis de lus la/ /'phro bar gyur par rnams bsgoms te/ /rtag tu shar bltas 'od zer gyis/ /nyes pa
thams cad sel bar bsam/ /'di ni sems can phan dga' bas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs las bya/ /kun tu bzang po'i sku chen nam/ /bde ba chen por bsams
nas kyang / /nang par re re 'od byed na/ /snga ma bzhin du las byas te/ /nang par sngar ni sems can rnams/ /sdig can sems can zhi bar 'gyur/ /gser 'od mdzes shing 'bar
ba yi/ /rin chen 'dzin du bsams nas ni/ /bza' ba legs byas nyi ma yi/ /gung la rgyas pa'i las shis te/ /rin chen 'dra bar khung brkos la/ /bzlas dang sbyin sreg rab tu
@#/ /bya/ /yang na sngags pas snga ma bzhin/ /'od kyi lus la rab tu dgang / /sbyor dang ldan pas khung bu ni/ /pad+mo 'dra bar byas nas kyang / /pad+ma 'dzin
par bdag bsgyur la/ /bdag dang nye ba'i nyi ma'i mthar/ /bzlas dang sbyin sreg nyid byed cing / /'od zer sprin gyis lus bkang nas/ /thams cad ma lus dbang du 'gyur/ /
'dren pa kun tu bzang po yis/ /zhi ba'i las ni rab tu bya/ /rdo rje rin chen rgyag pa ste/ /dbang bskur ba yang de bzhin no/ /dpal gyi rnam rgyal de bzhin du/ /longs
spyod dbang phyug dpal mnyam med/ /rdo rje nyi ma gzi brjid dang / /mdog sdus shin tu 'bar ba bya/ /bzhad cing rmad du mdzad pas ni/ /dga' mgu rangs pa rnams
su 'gyur/ /pad+mo bzhad pas chos kun ni/ /rtogs mdzad sangs rgyas thams cad kyang / /mnyes 'gyur lha bran smos ci dgos/ /gzhan gyi rigs sogs tshogs
mchog rnams/ /rnon pos gcod pa nyid du mdzad/ /gdon dang yi dwags 'dre rnams dang / /gnod sbyin srin po bka' nyan dang / /gza' mchog brgyad ni ma rungs
rnams/ /'khor los rtsa nas 'byin par mdzad/ /lkugs dang lkugs pa ma yin dang / /glen rnams mi smra smra bar mdzad/ /lce la dzaM zhes bya ba yis/ /ma rungs rnams
kyang lkugs par mdzad/ /rgya gram gyis ni mchod pa dang / /sems can don mdzad thams cad ston/ /hAM zhes bya bas 'phro mdzad cing / /rdo rje srung bas srung bar mdzad/ /hUM zhes
bya ba'i so yis ni/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin nyid kyis kyang / /ma rungs rab tu ma rungs kun/ /za byed sdig spyod smos ci dgos/ /ma rungs snying gar dam du ni/ /baM zhes bya ba bsams
nas kyang / /dug dang rims dang gdon la sogs/ /rdo rje bsdams pas bcing par mdzad/ /bzlas dang sbyin sreg las rnams kyis/ /dgos pa thams cad sgrub par mdzad/ /
'od zer bsil bas dngos po la/ /rgyas par gyur pas sgom byed cing / /zhi ba'i lha yi rnal 'byor dang / /zhi ba'i sems kyis zhi bar bya/ /rang gi lus ni gser btsos
dang / /nyi ma gsal shar dge 'dra bar/ /bsams la rgyas par bya ba'i phyir/ /'od zer sprin gyis dgang bar bya/ /pad+mo sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /hrIH'dra 'od zer
btang ba yis/ /snying la kun tu skor byed cing / /'dod pa kun gyi dbang du byed/ /rdo rje hUM gi ting 'dzin gyis/ /khros na rdo rje mtshon cha'i char/ /sdig spyod lus la dbang byas na/ /
de ma thag tu brlag par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la phyag btsal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ /phyag na rdo rjes sems can thams cad la
@#/ /phan pa'i phyir the tshom thams cad gcod pa/ ngan song thams cad bzlog pa'i brtag pa dam pa 'di bshad pa legs so/ /legs so/ /de nas bcom
ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes phyag rgya'i le'u 'di bshad do/ /lag pa gnyis mdun du bzhag la/ a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du byin gyis brlab par bsams te/ hUM zhes
bya ba dang / a zhes bya bas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de gnyis kyis byin gyis brlabs te/ lag pa gnyis kyi thal mo gnyis ka la a la sogs pa'i yi ge bcu drug gis
bkang zhing 'phro bar byas te/ mthe bo gnyis la oM zhes bya ba bsam/ mdzub mo gnyis la hUM zhes bya ba gzhag /gung mo gnyis la trAM zhes bya ba gzhag /srin lag gnyis la
hrIHzhes bya ba gzhag /mthe'u chung gnyis la a zhes bya ba gzhag /de ltar yi ge rnams gzhag pa byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yin par mos pa bskyed de/ chos
thams cad gcig la gcig 'dres pa dang / bdag dang yang rjes su mthun par dran par bya ste/ lag pa gnyis pad+ma lta bur sbyar ba byas nas oM zhes bya ba gnyis brkyang
pa dang / a zhes bya ba gnyis bkug ste/ de bzhin du hUM zhes bya ba dang / hrIHzhes bya ba gnyis pad+ma'i 'dab ma 'dra bar bya/ /trAM zhes bya ba gnyis gshibs te brkyang ba 'di ni
bcom ldan 'das kyi rtsa ba'i phyag rgya las thams cad dang ldan pa'i dam tshig go /de nyid rnon po dang ldan pa dang / de nyid las rab tu 'khor lo 'dra ba ni 'khor lo'i 'o/ /de nyid las
khar bzhag pa ni sgra'i ste/ 'di ni phyag rgya'i tshogs so/ /de nyid las gnyis su byas nas las kyir byas na las kyi'o/ /g.yon pa mgo thong thogs 'dra dang / /g.yas pa mdung thung
rtse gsum dang / /g.yon pa pad+mo kha 'dzums dang / /g.yas pa oM zhes bya bar gzhag /g.yon pa 'khor lo bde gsum dang / /a dang oM gnyis rtse sprad la/ /lhag ma gsum ni rdo
rje can/ /oM dang hUM gnyis gzhur byas la/ /lhag ma mdar byas mda' can gyi'o/ /lag pa g.yas g.yon 'khor lor bya/ /'od ni nyi ma zla ba'i zhal/ /thal mo dam sbyar sor mo
'phro/ /gza' lhag rtag tu se gol gtogs/ /de nyid tshig dbang gsungs pa ste/ /mchu la tshig 'byung 'dra bar gzhag /pa ba sangs ni bde ldan pa/ /spen pa dbyug pa 'dzin par

bya/ /ba lang sna ni chu srin 'dra/ /shes bya rgyu skar me stag 'dra/ /de nyid bskor na glog phreng gi /bla 'og gzhag na sprin phyag rgya/ /'di dag ni snying po'i phyag rgya ste/ las kyi phyag rgya yang
'di dag nyid do/ /de nyid las srin lag gnyis bcings pa ni phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las hUM zhes bya ba tshigs bar ma bcag pa ni dbang bskur ba sbyin par byed pa ste/
@#/ /nam mkha'i snying po'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las hUM zhes bya ba bcings te srin lag pad+ma 'dra bar byas pa 'di ni pad+ma las byung ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid
las hUM zhes bya ba dang / hrIHzhes bya ba gnyis gshibs te bsgreng ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las pad+mo 'dra bar byas pa ni bde ba chen
po'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las 'od zer 'phro ba'i tshul du byas pa ni kun tu bzang po'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid nang du bkug pa ni khro bo sna tshogs kyi phyag rgya gzi can no/ /de nyid las
shin tu bsdams pa ni rdo rje bsdam pa'o/ /brkyang ba ni gzi can no/ /hUM zhes bya ba'i so ni gnod sbyin gyi'o/ /hUM zhes bya ba gnyis lcags kyur byas pa ni 'gugs pa'o/ /de nyid
mdar byas pa ni 'dod pa'o/ /hUM dang oM zhes bya ba gnyis sbyar ba ni dgyes pa'i 'o/ /de nyid dkyil 'khor lta bur byas pa ni gzi brjid kyi'o/ /de nyid nor bu 'dra bar byas pa
ni rgyal mtshan gyi'o/ /bskor na bzhad pa'i ste/ de nyid khar bzhag na ni dgyes shing 'dzum par mdzad pa'i ya mtshan no/ /thal mo pad+mo 'dra bar bkug pa ni pad+ma'i 'o/ /
AHzhes bya ba dang / oM zhes bya ba nang du bkug pa ni ral gri'i phyag rgya'o/ /gcig la gcig sbyar ba ni 'khor lo'i 'o/ /snga ma las oM zhes bya ba gnyis khar bzhag
pa ni tshig 'byung ba ste/ mdor na phyag rgya 'di dag ni las thams cad sbyin par byed pa'o/ /de nyid bsdus mdud sbrul mgor 'gyur/ /kun tu gnod sbyin mche ba 'dra/ /srin po yi ni
khrag 'phrog pa/ /lag pa bskor ba rlung gi ste/ /dbyug tor ldan pa gnod sbyin no/ /bum par gzhag pa nor gyi ste/ /mthe bo sre mo'i sna 'drar bya/ /mgo yi thod pa nag po'i ste/ /b+h+ring+gi
ri ti lag brkyang ba/ /pi wang g.yon thogs dri za'i 'o/ /lag gnyis 'bar ba me 'bar ba/ /gung mo dbyug 'dra gshin rje'i 'o/ /rno la khro dang dbang bsgyur ba/ /mthe'u chung ral
gri mdzub zhags pa/ /rlung gi phyag rgya rgyal mtshan yin/ /de la sogs pa'i phyag rgya rnams/ /lag las skye ba skyes par 'gyur/ /lha rnams kun gyi thun mong du/ /pad+mo'i phyag rgya
bkra shis te/ /klu rnams shes bya ut+pa la/ /de ltar so ni gnod sbyin rnams/ /srin po rnams kyi mgo tshal pa/ /bud med rnams kyi sor bcu bsnol/ /gza' rnams kyi ni dbyug
pa ste/ /arga dbul ba rgyu skar rnams/ /de dag kun gyi sems sgrub pa'o/ /mgo bo thod pa khar bzhag pa'i/ /phyag rgya 'di ni phra men ma'i/ /mgo thod lce yi phyag rgya ni/ /rdo rje rnal
'byor ma yir bshad/ /de dag kun kyang thun mong du/ /phyag rgya chen po bshad par bya/ /thal mo brkyang bar bshad pa ste/ /yang na thal mo pad+mor bya/ /rdo rje khu tshur bcings nas ni/ /a zhes
@#/ /bya ba lu gu rgyud/ /hUM zhes bya ba gnyis bsgreng la/ /phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya yin/ /rdo rje bsdam pa bsdams nas kyang / /hUM dang a gnyis gshibs te bsgreng / /
oM zhes bya ba ngos bcar ba'i/ /phyag rgya snang ba byed par dgongs/ /de las a zhes bya ba bcings/ /oM zhes bya ba nang du gzhug /oM zhes bya ba sngon bzhin sbyar/ /oM yang a
dang 'dra bar bya/ /trAM zhes bya ba gshibs nas ni/ /A dang oM gnyis lu gu rgyud/ /hUM zhes bya ba gnyis bsgreng la/ /lhag ma gshibs pa'i phyag rgya 'di/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil bar shes
par bya/ /trAM zhes bya ba gshibs na ni/ /hUM zhes bya ba'ang de bzhin no/ /de ltar hUM zhes bya ba gshibs/ /lhag ma 'od zer 'dra bar bya/ /rta mgrin phyag rgya gang yin pa/ /de yang
las rnams kun la gsungs/ /spyan gyi mig dang 'dra bar bshad/ /mA ma kI yi rdo rje 'dra/ /dkar mo pad+ma nyid du bshad/ /ut+pa la ni sgrol mar dgongs/ /sa sa sa sa sa

sa sa sa sa sa sa sa sa sa sa sa/ ba ba ba ba ba ba ba ba ba ba ba ba ba ba ba ba/ dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra/ twa twa twa twa twa twa twa twa twa twa twa twa twa twa twa twa/ hUM/ dza/ ho/

d+hu/ trAM/ R+yaM/ b+h+ri/ hA/ hrIH/ d+hIH/ kruM/ b+haM/ kaM/ raM/ k+ShaM/ saM/ oM bud+d+ha lo tsa ne hUM/ oM badzra mA ma kI trAM/ oM badzra paN+Da re de hi de hi sid d+hi bo d+hi na lo kot+ta ram+bA swAhA/ oM badzra tA re

tu t+tA re tu re hUM hUM hUM swA swA swA swAhA/ zhi ba'i brdung ba/ sham+ba ta/ sham+ba ta/ sham+ba ta/ sham+ba ta/ sham+ba ta/ sham+ba ta/ sham+ba ta/ sham+ba ta/ sham+ba ta/ sham+ba ta/ sham+ba ta/ sham+ba te/

sham+ba ta/ sham+ba ta/ sham+ba ta/ sham+ba ta/ rgyas pa'i brdung ba/ g+hUM/ g+huM/ g+huM/ g+huM/ g+huM/ g+huM/ g+huM/ g+huM/ g+huM/ g+huM/ g+huM/ g+huM/ g+huM/ g+huM/ g+huM/ g+huM/ dbang gi brdung ba/ ho d+hu ma/ ho b+hu

ma/ ho d+hu ma/ ho d+hu ma/ ho d+hu ma/ ho d+hu ma/ ho d+hu ma/ ho d+hu ma/ ho d+hu ma/ ho d+hu ma/ ho d+hu ma/ ho d+hu ma/ ho d+hu ma/ ho d+hu ma/ ho d+hu ma/ ho d+hu ma/ mngon spyod kyi brdung ba/ kha twaM/

kha twaM/ kha twaM/ kha twaM/ kha twaM/ kha twaM/ kha twaM/ kha twaM/ kha twaM/ kha twaM/ kha twaM/ kha twaM/ kha twaM/ kha twaM/ kha twaM/ de nas lha rnams kun dga' nas/ /phyag na rdo rje phyag 'tshal te/ /khro
bo'i 'khor lo bshad pa'i phyir/ /gsol ba 'debs pa nyid du gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes rang gi sku bor te/ rdo rje sems dpa'i skur zhugs nas gnyis su med
par mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje sems dpa'i khro bo me'i rdo rje nyi ma zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di nyid kyi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /oM badzra satwa

kro d+ha a na lA rka ma hA badzra kro d+ha dra ba dra ba/ bi dra ba bi dra ba/ sarba pA ya nA sha ya nA sha ya/ ha ra ha ra prA NA na hUM phaT/ oM trai lo kyA lo ka kA ra ya hUM phaT/ oM trai lo kya da ma ka hUM phaT/
@#/ /oM trai lo kya nA sha na hUM phaT/ oM trai lo kya ban d+ha ka hUM phaT/ oM a mr-i te hUM phaT/ oM kA la daN+Da hUM phaT/ oM kA ni d+hu ni hUM phaT/ oM hrIHhUM phaT/ oM kA la

aM ku sha hUM phaT/ oM kA la pA sha hUM phaT/ oM kA la ban+d+ha hUM phaT/ oM kA la rak+Sha sa hUM phaT/ oM kA la rak+Sha si hUM phaT/ oM kA la daN+Di hUM phaT/ oM kA la rA tri hUM phaT/ oM kA la yak+Shi
Ni hUM phaT/ /de nas dkyil 'khor mi bzad pa/ /che ba'i mchog ste rtsibs bcu gnyis/ /lha rdzas 'bar ba'i phreng bas dkrigs/ /shin tu 'bar zhing cher 'bar ba/ /de ltar
dkyil 'khor bris nas kyang / /rdo rje sems dpa' gzhag par bya/ /'jig rten gsum snang la sogs khro bo kun/ /ma rungs snying gar mnan nas sdigs byed cing / /zhal
ni shin tu 'jigs 'jigs lta/ /phyag ni brgya phrag du mar ldan/ /sbrul dang mi sdug mgos brgyan la/ /stag lpags kyis ni smad g.yogs bgos/ /rgyu ma thogs shing
dbu mtha' yas/ /mgo thod shas gang phyag na thogs/ /de ltar bris nas phyi rol du/ /srin mo'i tshogs rnams gzhag par bya/ /sgo ba rnams ni ji bzhin du/ /rang gi phyag rgya'i
lag mtshan can/ /de nas bdud rtsis gang ba yi/ /bum pa bcu drug gzhag par bya/ /bdug pa me tog dri zhim dang / /mar me dang ni bro snod dang / /kha zas bkang ba'i gtor
ma dang / /bza' dang bca' dang bdud rtsi zhes/ /mgo thod gang bar gyur pa rnams/ /dkyil 'khor du ni mang du gzhag /de nas slob dpon bdag nyid kyang / /mgu nas mgo thod
phyag rgyas 'jug /phyag rgya de dang de yis na/ /sha rnams kun gyi dam tshig stsol/ /de nas 'dod ldan rnyed nas ni/ /hUM zhes bya bas bsgrub par bya/ /de nas sngags mkhan sgo
sgor yang / /de nyid dran byed bsnyen par bya/ /de ni nges par dngos grub ste/ /yud tsam 'jig rten gsum dbang 'gyur/ /dkyil 'khor du ni tshogs rnams dang / /rang gi
lha yi tshogs rnams la/ /rgyud las byung ba'i dam tshig brjod/ /de nas bcod de langs nas kyang / /tshogs can rdo rje sems dpa' yi/ /tshul du gnas nas 'byung bar
bya/ /de nas slob ma bsdus nas ni/ /lag na rin chen thogs te gzhug /oM badzra kro d+ha sa ma ya hUM/ oM badzra rAk+Sha si hUM/ oM badzra kro d+ha a na la rka s+phu Ta ra pra tI ts+tsha hUM phaT/ oM

badzra kro d+ha na ni rak+Sha hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha pa sha hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha sa ma ya ni bI ra hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha sa ma ya mA ti kra ma hUM phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha ra ti sa ma ya a b+hi
Shiny+tsa hUM phaT/ 'dis dbang bskur la de bzhin du dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /de nas de dag gi sgrub pa bshad de/ bdag nyid khro bor snyoms zhugs la/ /de nas snying gar nyi ma
@#/ /bsgom/ /rang gi chos kyi yi ge las/ /khros nas yang dang yang 'phro zhing / /de gnyis gcig tu bsgom par bya/ /de nas 'grub 'gyur gzhan du min/ /
khro bo'i rgyal po'i las dngos su/ /gsod pa yin par bshad mod kyi/ /zhi dang dbang dang rgyas pa rnams/ /de dag byed 'gyur gdon mi za/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin
gnas/ /khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bsgom byas na/ /gdug pa'i sems can 'dzin byed cing / /mdor na dug rims gdon la sogs/ /de bzhin de dag thams cad ni/ /thabs
la sogs pas 'joms byed pa/ /khros nas snying las 'byung 'gyur bar/ /gsad pa'i las la bsam par bya/ /khros par gyur ba'i rgod ma'i khas/ /sha dang khrag rnams
'jib byed cing / /de dag 'tsho ba 'phrog byed par/ /bsams na nges par brlag par 'gyur/ /khro bo 'jig rten gsum snang mdzad/ /zla ba 'dra ba'i dge bsam zhing / /'od
zer 'byung ba mang po yis/ /khyab par gyur par rnams bsams la/ /rims dang gdon dang dug la sogs/ /'od zer der ni phyung nas kyang / /de yi nad rgas gnod pa
rnams/ /zhi bya'i phyir ni ring du dor/ /de nas hUM gi tshig bzhag la/ /rdo rje lta bu'i lus bsam zhing / /haM gi 'khor los go char bya/ /'od zer chu yi dbang bskur ro/ /de nas
de yi ming smros shig /bzlas pas tshul bzhin bsam par bya/ /de nas khung bu gsum la rnam cig ni/ /zla ba rgyas shing 'od zer 'phro 'dra la/ /khru gang tsam mam yang na khru do pa/ /
mi rgyal mchog rnams kyi ni gnyis su bsgyur/ /de yi sa rnams rnam par sbyang byas te/ /'khor lo'i dkyil na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi/ /dbus su rdo rje rtse ltar gyur pa
gcig /'od zer dkar po phreng bskor gzi can gzhag /phyag rgya'i tshogs rnams thams cad bri bya ste/ /rigs brgyal sogs phyag rgya zur phyin cing / /rgyal po bzhi yi ji
bzhin phyag mtshan rnams/ /phyogs kyi bdag po rnams kyang phyogs phyogs su/ /lha chen la sogs phyag rgya khyab 'jug dang / /'khor lo lta bu nyid du bri bar bya/ /dri zhim chus bkang
mdog 'od dkar gyur la/ /dkar pos shin tu dkrigs pa'i bum pa brgyad/ /dkar gsum gang ba'i gtor ma lha bshos dang / /bdug pa mar me me tog rnams kyang gzhag /
mchod pa bya ba'i phyir ni bla re dang / /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan rnga ma la sogs gzhag /nang re ga bur bcas pa'i dri zhim pa/ /tsan+dan la sogs pa yi byug pas byug /kha ni
shar phyogs bltas te sbyin sreg bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan la 'dug bya'am/ /yang na rnal 'byor ldan zhing sems dpa'i gdan/ /gos la sogs dkar phreng ba
@#/ /dkar gyis brgyan/ /mar dang sbrang rtsi 'o ma dang / /nas kyi thug pa la sogs dang / /til mar dang ni til nyid dang / /yungs kar dang ni 'bras yos dang /
'bras chen nas dang gro rnams dang / /me tog shin tu dri zhim rnams/ /ga bur dang ni bsres nas kyang / /tsan+dan dkar pos bsgos pa dang / /'dab bdun me tog 'bras bu
rnams/ /zho dang ldan pa'i yam shing la/ /de dag khung bu'i khyad par las/ /rang gi sor gyis gzhal bya zhing / /nyi shu rtsa bzhi yan chad mchog /sor bcu drug ni bar ma ste/ /
tha ma bcu gnyis nyid du shes/ /shin tu chung na sor brgyad de/ /bud shing zho dang ldan pa la/ /dri chus bskus pa shes par bya/ /bud shing de las byung ba'i me/ /sbyar nas dri
chus gtor nas ni/ /pad+ma dkar po zhal 'dra dge /pad+ma nor bu ril ba thogs/ /lag na dbyung pa mchog thogs pa/ /pad+ma dkar po'i stan steng 'dug /de lta'i me lha bkug
nas kyang / /arga blang te dbul bar bya/ /de nas zla rgyas dkar po la/ /bzhugs pa'i 'gro phan spyan drangs te/ /pad+ma dkar po shar phyogs su/ /bsams nas steng du
gzhag par bya/ /de nas de ltar bsams nas kyang / /bsgrub bya rtag tu mdun bzhag ste/ /de yi nyes pa drangs nas ni/ /shin tu bsrings te sba bar bya/ /nang par sngar ni
gtsang 'gyur zhing / /shin tu dri zhim lus byugs la/ /bdud rtsi bzhin bsam sbyin sreg bya/ /dam tshig 'di ni 'da' bar dka'/ /lha rdzas bdud rtsi bro lnga 'di/ /dang por me lha brtag
byas la/ /khro bo de ni de lus su/ /spyan drangs nas ni bzhugs par bsams/ /de nas dang po khro bo la/ /bsreg bya lan gsum dbul bar bya/ /de nas dkon mchog gsum la gsum/ /
de nas me lha nyid la gsum/ /de nas rdo rje sems dpa' la/ /de nas lha rnams re re la/ /de nas bgegs la sogs la dbul/ /de yid 'ong ba'i lha yang rung / /de nas dang po khro bo
yi/ /sngags kyis yam shing sbyin sreg bya/ /de nas gcig tu bsres nas kyang / /bdud rtsi sngags kyis btab nas ni/ /de bzhin sbyin sreg byas 'og tu/ /brgya stong snyed dam yang na ni/ /
brgya rtsa brgyad kyi bar du ni/ /khro bo nyid la dbul bar bya/ /de yi lus la dbang bskur zhing / /mnyam par bzhag bas bsrungs nas kyang / /mjug tu mngon par mchod nas ni/ /
lha rnams thams cad gshegs par gsol/ /'dis ni zhi ba'i las rnams kyang / /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /ci ste de ni sdig can nam/ /gal te mnyam par ma bzhag pas/ /
de tshe dngos grub ma gyur na/ /stong pa nyid du rnam bsgoms la/ /de nas de bzhin byas nas ni/ /gdon mi za bar dngos grub 'gyur/ /zhi ba'i las so/ /'bras bur ldan
@#/ /pa'i nags tshal lam/ /yang na nags sam rgyal po 'am/ /rgyal rigs khyim du rgyas pa ni/ /dga' ba'i sems kyis bya ba ste/ /khru do yang na khru bzhi
pa'am/ /de ltar mchog ni khru brgyad de/ /chung mchog bar ma rnams las gcig /rgyas pa'i las ni bya ba yin/ /mdor na hom khung bya ba ni/ /stegs bu brtsigs te dkyil
'khor ni/ /chung ngu la ni khru brgyad de/ /bar ma la ni bcu gnyis nyid/ /mchog la bcu drug yang na ni/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhir shes par bya/ /mu khyud sor brgyad bcu drug gam/ /sum
cu gnyis su bya ba yin/ /phyi yi 'khor lo de yi phyed/ /pad+ma rnams kyis brgyan par bya/ /dkyil 'khor dbus su rin chen dang / /pad+ma sna tshogs brgyan par bya/ /de yi
dbus su brko ba ni/ /legs par bltas te phyed kyi tshad/ /khru bzhi pa 'am khru brgyad pa/ /yang na dpal bskyed pad+ma 'dra/ /mdor na 'jim pa ser po yis/ /de bzhin
khung mchog brkos nas ni/ /gur gum la sogs bskus nas kyang / /de yi dbus su bris nas ni/ /tshon mchog ser pos bskus nas kyang / /ser 'od 'dra bar bsgom
par bya/ /de nas tshon ni dmar ser gyis/ /rin chen pad+ma la sogs pa'i/ /phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor khor yug tu/ /gnas pa nyid du bri bar bya/ /rim gnyis yang ni rim
bzhi'am/ /yang na rim pa brgyad ldan par/ /der ni sgo ba de dag nyid/ /phyag rgya'i gzugs su brtag par bya/ /bum pa kha dog gser 'dra zhing / /dri chus rab tu bkang ba la/ /
shin tu mdzes brgyad bcu gnyis sam/ /sum cu gnyis sam bcu drug ste/ /dkri ba'i dar ni ser po la/ /kha rgyan yal ga me tog can/ /dri zhim me tog bdug pa dang / /
phreng ba mar me rgyan rnams dang / /rgyal mtshan 'phan la sogs pa dang / /bla re gdugs rnams ser pos brgyan/ /bdag nyid gos dang rgyan rnams dang / /me tog la sogs
ser pos brgyan/ /byang phyogs kha ltas 'dug nas ni/ /'jig rten gsum 'dul khro bo yi/ /nyid kyi rnal 'byor rjes dran zhing / /lha yi yid bzhin nor rgyal mtshan/ /btso
ma gser gyi 'od dang 'dra/ /de bzhin nyi zla ku be ra/ /gnod sbyin dang ni dzam+b+ha la/ /gser gyi char ni rab 'bebs shing / /yid kyi 'dod pa skong mdzad pa/ /mdor na de yi 'od
zer gyis/ /nges par dbang ni bskur bar bsam/ /de nas rgyal srid thob 'gyur na/ /lus rgyas pa lta smos ci dgos/ /rgyas par bya phyir de ming nas/ /smos te brgya phrag brgya
rtsa brgyad/ /yang na de bzhin stong phrag ni/ /brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas par bya/ /de nas sbyin sreg rab bya ste/ /byang phyogs su ni seng+ge yi/ /gdan gyi steng na rin chen dang / /pad+ma nyi
@#/ /zla gdan steng na/ /rdo rje rin chen rin chen mchog /rin chen dpal dang gzi brjid mchog /rdo rje bzhad dang rgyal ba yang / /rgyan rnams kun gyis
brgyan nas ni/ /phyag ni mchog sbyin gzhol ba dang / /rin chen char yang 'bebs brtson zhing / /'od zer ser 'phro thams cad kyis/ /de la shin tu khyab byed bsam/ /dung dang
pi wang cang te'u dang / /sil snyan glu dang gar mchog gis/ /mdor na mchod pa byas nas ni/ /de yi 'og tu las brtsam mo/ /khung bu'i khyad par nyid las kyang / /yam shing
bud shing khyad par dbye/ /mdzub gang khu tshur bcangs khru gang / /chung ngu nyid du bshad pa yin/ /bar ma khru dor shes par bya/ /khru bzhi pa ni mchog yin te/ /me tog 'bras
bur bcas rigs kyi/ /ya tog ma tog sbrang rtsir gzhug /'bru rnams thams cad 'byor pa dang / /me tog 'bras bu ser por ldan/ /mar dang sbrang rtsi bsres nas ni/ /phal
cher dpal gyi 'bras bur ldan/ /me lha gser dang 'dra ba la/ /phyag bzhi pa ste 'dir de bzhin/ /pad+ma gdan bzhugs rnam brgyan pa/ /spyan drangs bsreg bya sbyin sreg
bya/ /de yi lus su khro rgyal po/ /byin can legs par bcug nas ni/ /sngon bzhin dran byed de zhal du/ /sbyin sreg yongs su brtag bya ste/ /'bum mam nyis 'bum
tsam gyis kyang / /don ni nges par rab tu 'grub/ /'bum phrag brgyas ni rgyal srid dam/ /longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa 'grub/ /de nas mjug tu 'od zer gyis/ /de la dbang
bskur bsrung bar bya/ /de nas de ni rgyal 'gyur te/ /phyag na rdo rje'i bka' bzhin no/ /rgyas pa'i las so/ /dbang ni chags pa'i sems kyis kyang / /chags pa'i ting nge 'dzin
gyis bya/ /chags pa bcom ldan rdo rje can/ /rdo rje chags pa de las byung / /khams gsum chags par byed pa'i phyir/ /pad+ma sems dpa' rtag tu chags/ /de bas 'dis ni de dag
ni/ /las 'grub par ni bshad pa yin/ /chags dang mthun pa'i sa phyogs sam/ /chags par byed pa'i khyim du shis/ /btso blag can nam zla mtshan can dag gi /khyim du chags
pa'i las rnams bya ba yin/ /yid dang mthun pa'i sa phyogs sam/ /rdo rje chags pa'i gnas kyang rung / /phyag na pad+ma'i gnas nyid du/ /rtag tu rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas/ /bde
chen gyi ni gnas chen dang / /pad+ma ut+pal rdzing bu dang / /ban+du ka yi me tog gnas/ /me tog 'bras bu dmar tshal ni/ /yid 'ong sems ni chags byed pa/ /der ni stegs bu khru
brgyad dam/ /de ltar bcu gnyis bcu drug rnams/ /byas nas de yi dbus su yang / /hom khung dkyil 'khor bya ba ni/ /khru gang yang na khru do'am/ /de ltar khru ni bzhi par bya/ /gzhu
@#/ /'dra ba'am pad+mo 'am/ /yang na rdo rje 'dra bar bya/ /mda' 'dra zla ba kham 'dra dang / /de ltar pad+ma'i 'dab ma 'dra/ /zheng du mchu yi phyed kyi tshad/ /zhing gi
phyed kyi tshad tsam du/ /hom khung zabs su brko bar bya/ /mu khyud sor ni bzhi par bya/ /nyis 'gyur ba ni nyis 'gyur bya/ /tha ma mchog gi khyad par las/ /yam shing so sor nges
par bya/ /yang na yam shing sreg shing ni/ /tshad ni zhi ba'i las su gsungs/ /shin tu dmar ba'i tsan+dan nam/ /yang na shing dmar gzhan yang rung / /me tog 'bras bu dmar
po 'am/ /btsag dang tsan+dan rgya skyegs sogs/ /le brgan rtsi dang gur gum gyis/ /mdor na bud pa'i shing dang ni/ /yam shing la yang bskus nas ni/ /yungs kar kha dog
dmar po dang / /btsag gam mtshal yang de bzhin du/ /zangs kyi phye dang yungs kar du/ /skye tshe 'bru dang lan tshwa dang / /til dang dri zhim thig le'i 'bru/ /la phug yungs rdog
de bzhin te/ /khrag dang rdul ni chen po rnams/ /bsreg bya phyir ni bsdus nas kyang / /sngar bshad 'bras bu la sogs pa'i/ /khu bas yang dang yang bskus nas/ /khro bo'i
sngags kyis byin brlabs te/ /ba dang ra las bzhos pa yis/ /bshigs ma thag pa'i mar sar dang / /mar dang til mar rnams kyis dgang / /ga bur la sogs bsgos
nas kyang / /bdud rtsis btab ste gzhag par bya/ /de nas hoM khung dmar po la/ /byu ru'i sdong po 'dra bar yang / /bsams nas spos dmar la sogs dang / /gur gum dmar
pos byug par bya/ /de nas kha dog dmar po yis/ /stug po nyid du bsku par bya/ /gur gum ser pos bsres pa yi/ /tshon gyi ri mo bri ba ni/ /hoM khung nang du pad+ma bri/ /de yi
steng du mda' bcas gzhu/ /rtag tu hoM khung khor yug tu/ /pad+ma nyid ni bri bar bya/ /gzhu yi dbus su rdo rje nyid/ /khor yug tu ni mda' nyid bri/ /gzhu yi phyi rol pad+ma
nyid/ /bris nas de yi steng du mda'/ /de yi phyi rol rdo rje dang / /lcags kyu mdar bcas gzhu bris la/ /lho phyogs rgyal mtshan rin chen dang / /gzi brjid dkyil 'khor
bri bar bya/ /pad+ma ral gri 'khor lo rnams/ /nub phyogs nyid du bri bar bya/ /rdo rje mche ba go cha mchog /byang phyogs su ni bri bar bya/ /grwa rnams su ni spos la sogs/ /phyag
rgya'i gzugs su bri bya zhing / /me tog dmar po la sogs pas/ /shin tu snga ma bzhin mchod de/ /dpal ldan gos dang phreng ba dang / /dmar po'i dri ni bskus nas kyang / /
rtag tu thub pa nus bltas la/ /dmar thag ma chad las bya ste/ /pad+ma dmar po'i gdan bsams la/ /rab chags phyag na pad+ma bsnams/ /g.yon du rdo rje chags pa la/ /
@#/ /g.yas su bde ba chen po ste/ /bsams na de yi dbus su ni/ /chu srin rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa gzhag /rdo rje gzhu dang g.yon 'gying ma/ /me tog dmar rgyan
rab rgyas ma/ /dri dmar la sogs rab mchod de/ /mda' dang gzhu thogs de bzhin du/ /pad+ma dmar dang dbyig bsnams pa'i/ /me yi lha ni bkug nas kyang / /de yis lus
su khro rgyal po/ /legs par bcug ste gzhag par bya/ /'od zer chags pas bsgyur nas ni/ /de'i lus rdo rje lcags kyu dang / /zhags pa bcings pas bkug nas ni/ /spyi
bo zhabs kyi drung du gzhag /de ltar bsams te snyoms zhugs pas/ /las byas pa ni gang yin pa/ /des ni lha yang dbang 'gyur na/ /mi dang lha min smos ci dgos/ /las rnams
zin par gyur ba dang / /chags pa'i sems su byas nas ni/ /de yi 'od zer spyi bor dgang / /de ni bsrungs nas btang bar bya/ /de nas rdo rje 'dod pa yis/ /lha rnams mchod
de gshegs par gsol/ /de nas bsrung ba byas nas ni/ /rdo rje 'dod pas rtag tu bzlas/ /dbang gi las so/ /de nas brgya byin tshangs sogs lha/ /phyag 'tshal
yang dang yang du ni/ /rin chen gdugs la sogs mchog gi /mchod pa sna tshogs byas nas kyang / /phyag na rdo rje rgyal can la/ /dga' ba'i bsam pas bstod byed pa/ /
sangs rgyas kun pas sngar sangs rgyas/ /mi shes dri ma kun bcom pa/ /rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po/ /rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin/ /rdo rje sku ste sku che ba/ /phyag na rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod/ /
rdo rje yan lag rdo rje'i mchog /rdo rje'i 'bar ba che 'bar ba/ /rdo rje shugs te shugs che ba/ /rdo rje mtshon cha mtshon cha che/ /phyag na rdo rje phyag chen po/ /rdo rje mda' ste rab
