par bya'o/ /oM badzra hA s+ya ud g+ha TA ya hUM/ de nas 'dis dkyil 'khor bstan par bya'o/ /oM badzra dri sh+ya hoH/ de nas dbang bskur ba sbyin te/ /oM badzra a b+hi ShaM ny+tsa hUM/ oM bud+d+ha

a b+hi Shiny+tsa oM/ oM rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa trAM/ oM pad+ma a b+hi Shiny+tsa hrIH/ oM karma a b+hi Shiny+tsa aH/de nas bum pa'i dbang bskur sbyin te/ oM badzra ka la sha a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM oM bud+d+ha kal sha a

b+hi Shiny+tsa oM/ oM rat+na ka la sha a b+hi Shiny+tsa trAM/ oM pad+ma ka la sha a b+hi Shiny+tsa hrIH/ oM karma ka la sha a b+hi Shiny+tsa aH/de nas phreng ba'i dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /oM rat+na mA la a b+hi

Shiny+tsa trAM trAM trAM trAM trAM/ oM badzra paT+Ta a ba laM ba na a b+hi Shiny+tsa trAM/ oM badzra mu dra a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ oM bud+d+ha mu dra a b+hi Shiny+tsa oM/ oM rat+na mu dra a b+hi Shiny+tsa trAM/ oM pad+ma mu dra a b+hi Shiny+tsa

hrIHoM ka rma mu dra a b+hi Shiny+tsa aH/ oM badra nA ma a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ oM hUM trAM hrIHaHoM badzra karma a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM aH/ oM badzra tsakra a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM bruM/ oM badzra tsakra a d+hi pa d+hi s+t+waM/

a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM hUM hUM/ oM oM oM/ trAM trAM trAM/ hrIHhrIHhrAM/ aHaHaH/ oM badzra d+hA ra Ni a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ oM ta thA ga ta d+hA ra Ni a b+hi Shiny+tsa oM/ oM rat+na d+hA ra Ni a b+hi Shiny+tsa trAM/

oM pad+ma d+hA ra Ni a b+hi Shiny+tsa hrIHoM karma d+hA ra Ni a b+hi Shiny+tsa aH/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta gu h+ye a b+hi Shiny+tsa oM/ oM badzra gu h+ye a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ oM ra t+ni yu h+yi a b+hi Shiny+tsa trAM/ oM

@#/ /pad+ma gu h+ye a b+hi Shiny+tsa hrIH/ oM karma gu h+ye a b+hi Shiny+tsa AH/ oM pradz+nya pA ya sa ma yo ga a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM aH/ de ltar dbang bskur nas tshe 'phel ba'i rig pa 'di sbyin no/ /oM b+h+ruM badzra A yu
She hUM aH/ 'di'i sgrub pa ni 'di yin te/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje tshe dpag med zla ba'i 'od can zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs shing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ phyag gnyis
mi 'jigs pa dang / mchog sbyin mdzad pa las bdud rtsi 'dzag pa bri'o/ /de'i 'og tu sgrub pa po lag pa thal mo sbyar ba brkyang ba gdong gyen du bcom ldan 'das la blta ba bris la
mchod pa rnam pa lngas mchod pa bya ste de'i spyan sngar stong phrag brgya bzlas so/ /de nas zla ba nya la mchod pa chen po byas la dmar ser gyi mar snod sar par bcug la g.yon pa'i
rdo rjes mnan te/ bcom ldan 'das la rab tu sems shing mtshan thog thag bzlas pa bya'o/ /de nas dri mnam zhing sngon ma byung ba'i dri ngad kyang ldang ngo / /dro ba dang / du ba dang / me yang 'byung
ngo / /'od zer gyi snang ba rab tu 'phros te de la sogs pa'i mtshan ma byung na mar de'am/ mar gsar pa'am/ til mar ram/ chu'am/ 'o ma'am/ zho'am/ chang ngam/ khrag gam/ zhag
gam/ klad pa'am/ sha'am/ gang yang rung ba dang lhan cig tu rab tu bsgrubs te nang par sngar srung ba la sogs pa byas nas bdag nyid sbyangs te 'thungs sam/ zos na mtshan ma ji

lta ba bzhin du byung na ni nam zla ba dang / nyi ma ji srid pa'i tsher 'gyur zhing rdo rje sems dpa'i tsher yang 'gyur ro/ /tha mas ni dngos grub tha mar 'gyur te 'di la the tshom med do/ /mtshan ma ma
byung na yang 'jig rten na nad med pa dang / yid gzhungs pa dang ldan zhing / skra dkar dang / gnyer ma med pa dang / lus brtan zhing tshe lo brgya thub par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang bzlas pa byas pa
tsam gyis zhi ba dang / rgyas pa dang / dbang la sogs pa'i las rnams brtag mi dgos par 'grub ste the tshom med do/ /de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la phyag
btsal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ /bdag cag kyang sems can thams cad kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i slad du rang ra nga gi snying po bshad par 'tshal gyis/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' gnang par zhu/ rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' gnang bar zhu/ /rgyal po chen po dag legs so/ /legs so/ /shod cig dang / ngas rjes su yi rang gi dam tshig byin gyis brlab
par bya'o/ /de nas gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu ngal gsos pos bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang zhing rjes su yi rang ste byin gyis brlab bas rang gi snying po rang gi snying gnas phyung la/

om bai/ de nas dri za'i rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung gis de khon bzhin du rang gi snying po bshad pa/ oM d+hi/ de nas grul bum gyi rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes pos de kho na bzhin du rang gi snying
@#/ /po bshad pa/ oM bi/ de nas klu'i rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang gis de kho na bzhin du rang gi snying po bshad pa/ oM k+Sha/ de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad de/ gru
bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /dkyil 'khor lngas ni brgyan pa ste/ /de yi dbus su mgon po ni/ /phyag na rdo rje 'gying bcas bri/ /de yi g.yon pa'i logs su ni/ /ngal gso dge pa lag pa na/ /
be con dang ni ne 'u le/ /rin po che yi rgyan gyis brgan/ /sbom zhing seng+ge'i gdan la bzhugs/ /gser mdog gzi brjid ldan pa bri/ /khas pas bum pa bzang la sogs/ /rin chen tshogs
char 'bab pa bri/ /mdun du yul 'khor skyong nyid ni/ /pe wang sgrogs par yang dag brtson/ /rol cing kha dog ljang gu nyid/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa bri/ /g.yas su
dpa' bo lus 'phags po/ /ral gri phyag na bsnams pa bri/ /nub tu yang ni mig mi bzang / /rdo rje zhags pa 'dzin cing mchog /sbrul mgo bdun gyis yongs su bskor/ /
mig ni dmar zhing shin tu 'bur/ /sgo yi phyogs ni thams cad du/ /sgo skyong rnams kyang de bzhin no/ /de nas sngags pa rang nyid 'jug /'khor lo'i phyag rgya zhes grags pa'i/ /
bcom ldan 'das nyid spyan drang zhing / /de nas rgyal po spyan drang ngo / /spyan drangs nas ni mkhas pas mchod/ /mchod yon zhabs bsil chi ga bzhin/ /de nas slob ma rgyal rigs
sam/ /rje rigs bram ze la sogs kyang / /me tog phreng bas rnam brgyan pa/ /sngags shes pa yi sngags 'di dang / /rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgyas gzhug /oM badzra sa ma ye hUM/ de
nas me tog gam rin po che 'dis kyang dor bar bya'o/ /oM badzra pra ta'i ts+tsha d+haM ma ho ta ta ma/ gang la lhung ba'i rgyal po de/ /'di yis 'grub 'gyur gzhan du min/ /de nas grwa gnas
pa yi/ /bum pa bzhis kyang dbang bskur te/ /lnga pa phyag na rdo rje'i 'o/ /phyag rgya nyid kyis dbang bskur bya/ /de la sogs pa'i go rims bzhin/ /dkyil 'khor bris nas dbang
bskur bas/ /rgyal po ma yin rgyal por 'gyur/ /rgyal po yin na chen por 'gyur/ /dzam+bu gling dbang dpal dang ldan/ /gling bzhi pa yi bdag po mchog/ lan bzhi dbang ni bskur
ba dang / /lan bzhir rab tu zhugs na ni/ /de la rdo rje 'dzin rgyal bdag /rang gi bu bzhin bsrung bar bya/ /bdag cag rgyal chen bzhi pos kyang / /'bangs dang 'khor du bcas pa
dang / /yul 'khor pho brang bcas pa yi/ /rgyal pos rtag tu bskyang bgyi ste/ /de yi ma rungs pa rnams dang / /de yi pha rol sde dang nad/ /'chi bdag 'jigs pa mu ge dang / yams dang
nyer 'tshe gzhom par bgyi/ /ngal gso pos ni rgyas par bgyis/ /yul 'khor srung gis zhi ba nyid/ /phyugs dang gnyen bcas dus min pa'i/ /'chi bdag lus 'phags po yis 'joms/ /
@#/ /mig mi bzang gis bde bar byed/ /mu ge la sogs rnam par 'joms/ /mdor na bdag gis de yi ni/ /re ba kun dang bsam pa kun/ /bgyi ste gal te ma nges na/ /
phyag na rdo rje bslus pa yin/ /de nas phyogs skyong bcus bcom ldan 'das la phyag btsal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag kyang sems can thams
cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i slad du rang rang gi snying po rab tu dbul lo/ /'jig rten skyong ba rnams legs so/ /legs so/ /de legs pa smros shig/ /de nas 'byung po'i bdag po
dbang ldan la sogs pas rang rang gi snying po rnams phul ba/ oM I/ oM iM oM a/ oM ya/ oM ri/ oM baM/ oM yaM/ oM yaM/ oM ba'/ de nas de dag gis dkyil 'khor bshad
de/ dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bris la/ /mgon po dbus su de bzhin gzhag/ phyogs skyong rang gi phyogs kyi char/ /gzhag bya spyan sngar rnam pa gnyis/ /nyi ma dang ni phag gi gzugs/ /sgo skyong
rnams kyang de bzhin no/ /de nas de kun sbyan drangs la/ /mchod pa kun gyis mchod par bya/ /de nas rang nyid zhugs nas kyang / /slob ma rnams ni gzhug bya zhing / /phyags skyong la
sogs sngags bzlas pa'i/ /bum pa rnams kyis dbang bskur ro/ /de nas phan par 'dod pa yis/ /sgrub phyir snying po'i sbyin par bya/ /phyogs skyong rang gi phyogs gnas rnams//
brtag mi dgos par 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nas de dag mgu nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang su zhig rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bor dpang bskur bas dkyil
'khor 'dir zhugs te dbang bskur ba 'dzin pa dang / gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/ /rigs kyi bu mo dad pa de dag /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gis kun nas bsrung ba
dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o/ /pha rol gyi sde rnams gzhom par bgyi'o/ /dus dang / dus su char dbab par bgyi'o/ /'bru dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu rnams
bskyed par bgyi'o/ /de nas chos kyi rgyal po gshin rjes bcom ldan 'das la phyag btsal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ /bdag gis rgyal po chen po de'i tshe bsring bar bgyi'o/ /
dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ba brgyad po so sor dgag par bgyi'o/ /srin po rnams kyi bdag po chen po bden bral gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis rgyal po chen po de dang /
rgyal po chen po'i bu dang / bram ze'am/ rje rigs sam/ mi gzhan gang yang rung ba dag la nad med pa dang / yi dwags dang / 'dres 'jigs pa med pa dang / srin po la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa med pa
dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa med par bgyi'o/ /dus thams cad du bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po chen po chu bdag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom
@#/ /ldan 'das/ bdag gis dus thams cad du rgyal po de dang / yul thams cad kun nas so sor bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /'bru
rnams kyang bskyed par bgyi'o/ /klu'i nyes pa rnams mi 'byung bar bgyi'o/ /dug dang / thog kyang mi 'byung bar bgyi'o/ /mi tog dang / 'bras bu thams cad kyang yongs
su rdzogs par bgyi'o/ /'jigs pa thams cad kyang so sor dgag par bgyi'o/ /de nas rlung gi bdag pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan
'das/ bdag gis kyang sems can chen po de la dus thams cad du rlung gi 'jigs pa mi 'byung bar bgyi/ dus ma lags pa'i rlung mi 'byung bar bgyi/
'bru dang / me tog dang / 'bru thams cad kyang yongs su bskyed par bgyi'o/ /de nas gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po chen po lus ngan pos bcom ldan 'das la phyag
btsal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po brgyad cu dang lhan cig tu mchis te/ stobs dang
ldan pas sems can chen po de la dus thams cad du 'jigs pa thams cad so sor dgag par bgyi'o/ /nor dang 'bru thams cad legs par 'byor par bgyi'o/ /
rang gi skye bo dang / yongs kyi skye bo dang / yul dang / gnas dang / bran dang / snag gi gnyen dang / grogs dang / bu dang / bu mo dang / chung ma la sogs pa yang bsrung
bar bgyi'o/ /glang dang / ba dang / bong bu dang / rnga mo dang / lug dang / ma he dang / glang po che dang / rta dang / ra la sog pa yang bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /de nas
'byung po thams cad kyi bdag po dbang ldan gyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la phyag btsal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis rgyal po
de dang / rgyal po'i bu dang / rgyal rigs dang / bram ze rnams 'di dang pha rol tu yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi
ba dang / bkra shis pa dang / chad pa yongs su spang ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / dug gzhom pa dang / mtshams bcing ba dang / sa gzhi bcing ba dang / phyogs
bcing ba dang / rdo rje'i ra ba dang / rdo rje'i phur bus gdab pa dang / rdo rje'i gru yang bgyi'o/ /dgos pa thams cad la nye bar gnas par bgyi'o/ /bya ba dang / bya ba ma yin
pa rnams kyi mtshan ma nye bar bstan par bgyi'o/ /dge ba dang / dge ba ma yin pa thams cad rmi lam du yang bsgo bar bgyi'o/ /bsgrub pa thams cad la bgegs ma mchis
@#/ /par dngos grub thams cad kyang stsal bar bgyi'o/ /de nas yang nam mkha' la spyod cing nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i bdag pos bcom
ldan 'das la phyag btsal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis dus thams cad du rgyal po dang / rgyal po'i bu dang / rgyal po'i blon po
dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs lam la gnas pa thams cad la bdag nyid 'khor thams cad dang bcas pa mchis te/ bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba kun
nas bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /bgegs kyi gnas thams cad so sor bzlog par bgyi'o/ /nad thams cad bsal bar bgyi'o/ /dus thams cad du phyi bzhin du 'brang
bar bgyi'o/ /de nas sa'i 'og gi bdag po phag chen pos kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis mi'i bdag po dang /
rje rigs dang / bram ze dang / dmangs rigs sam/ gzhan yang / rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dad pa rnams kyi dus thams cad du don bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /'jigs pa
thams cad las kyang bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /gzhan yang yongs su bskyab par bgyi'o/ /de nas gza' chen po brgyad 'khor rgyu skar dang bcas pa rnams kyis 'di skad ces
gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyis kyang rang rang gi snying po rnams 'bul bar 'tshal na de la bcom ldan 'das kyis byin
gyis brlab tu gsol/ /legs so/ legs so/ /ngas byin gyis brlabs kyis gza' chen po rnams shod cig/ de nas nyi ma la sogs pa'i gza' chen po rnams kyis bcom
ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas smras pa/ oM A/ oM so/ oM aM/ oM bu/ oM pri/ oM shu/ oM sa/ oM rA/ de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ dbus su bcom ldan 'das phyag
na rdo rje nyid 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i gzugs su bri'o/ /mtha' rnams su ni rgya mtsho chen po bzhi bri'o/ /de yi mdun du pa ba sangs/ /zla ba rgyab tu bri
bar bya/ /g.yas su phur bu bri bya zhing / /g.yon du lhag pa bri bar bya/ /yi gnas su mig dmar nyid/ /rlung gi phyogs su nyi ma ste/ /dbang ldan du ni spen pa nyid/ /srin
po'i phyogs su sgra gcan bri/ /dkyil 'khor phyi rol khor yug tu/ /rgyu skar thams cad bri bar bya/ /sgo sgor de bzhin sgo ba rnams/ /khros pa'i yid du bri bar bya/ /rdo rje

'dzin pas 'jug bya ste/ /rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas/ /thams cad kyang ni spyan drang ngo / /de nas slob ma rnams gzhug ste/ /oM badzra ha na hUM phaT oM badzra gra ha sa ma ya hUM/ oM badzra gra ha pra tI ts+tsha hUM de
@#/ /nas gza' brgyad sngags ni sngags pa yis/ bum pa brgyad po rnams kyis dbang bskur ro/ de nas rdo rje phyag rgyas dbang bskur re/ de nas
gza' rnams thams cad bsgrub par bya'o/ /de nas gza' chen po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la phyag btsal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das
bdag cag gza' chen po brgyad kyis rgyal po chen po de dang / rgyal po'i bu la kun tu dus thams cad du de kho na bzhin du thams cad bgyi'o/ /de nas rgyu skar dang /
skad cig dang / thang cig dang / yud tsam rnams so/ /tshes dang / sbyor ba dang / khyim dang / dus sbyor dang / mjug phong la sog spa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams
kyis de bzhin du phyag btsal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gis kyang dus thams cad du sems can chen po'i bka' mi bcag
cing dpon po bzhin du bskyang bar bgyi'o/ /grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang gi gnas thams cad so sor bskyab par
bgyi'o/ /'jigs pa chen po 'byung ba'i tshe na yang des bdag cag mchod na gdon mi 'tshal bar 'jigs pa de mi 'byung ngo / /de nas klu chen po brgyad kyis phud
ces bya ba'i sgras bcom ldan 'das mnyes par byas te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag rnams kyis gsang ba'i snying po rnams 'bul lo// //
klu chen po rnams/ legs so/ /legs so/ /gsang ba'i snying po rnams phul cig/ de nas de dag mgu nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag btsal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
oM phuH/ oM phuH/ oM phaM/ oM phuH/ oM phI/ oM phai/ oM pho/ oM phau/ de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad de/ pad+ma chen po 'dab brgyad pa/ /kha dog dkar po legs par bri/ /
dkyil 'khor de yi dbus bzhugs pa/ /phyag na rdo rje rab tu nag/ sbrul mgo mtha' yas gdengs ka bdun/ /ltos 'gro chen po sdigs pa bri/ /mtha' yas 'jog po
de bzhin du/ /stobs kyi rgyu dang rigs ldan dang / /nor rgyas bu dang dud skyong dang / /pad+ma chu bdag de bzhin du/ /mdor na 'dab ma re re la/ /de dag sbrul mgo 'bar ba bri/ /
sbrul mgo bdun bdun chung ma yi/ /mgul nas 'khyud dang bcas pa bri/ /bum pa brgyad rnams gzhag bya ste/ /gtor ma lha bshos mdzes pa dang / /mar dang 'o ma sbrang rtsir
bcas/ /btsos pa'i dbye ba rnams kyang ngo / /rdo rje'i bdag nyid bzhugs pa ni/ /sbrul mgo sbrul mgo can rnams dgug/ phud ces bya ba lhan cig ste/ /dzaHhUM baM hoHzhes brjod
@#/ /do/ /de nas rgyal po'am rgyal rigs ni/ /de dag thams cad bcug nas su/ /dug gi nyes skyon bsal ba'i phyir/ /phung ces bya bas dbang bskur ro/ /
de nas ming tsam bzung bas kyang / /klu rnams de dag thams cad 'grub/ /de nas de dag kun mgu nas/ /bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ /spyan sngar thal mo sbyar
'khod nas/ /smon lam rab tu 'debs par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la mngon par dga' ba gang dag dkyil 'khor 'dir
zhugs pa de dag bslus par gyur na de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'di nyid la bslus par gyur cig /de'i tshe bdag bye tshan gyis sregs par gyur cig /rdo rje kun tu 'bar bas bdag
cag gi mgo 'gems par gyur cig /rtag par dus thams cad du sems can chen po de srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba par bgyi'o/ /gzi byin chen po dang / stobs dang / brtson
'grus bskyed par bgyi'o/ /de'i dug rnams dug ma mchis par bgyi'o/ /dus dang dus su char dbab par bgyi'o/ /me tog thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/ /pha rol
kyi g.yul thams cad la dus dang dus ma yin pa'i char dbab par bgyi'o/ /'jig rten pa thams cad bskyed par bgyi'o/ /rgyal ba'i bka' dang rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bka' rab
tu bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /de nas sgrub pa bshad de/ lha rdzas 'od 'phro dkar po can/ /klu rnams 'dud pas gnas pa yi/ /rdo rje 'dzin gtso bsams nas ni/ /phud ces bya ba 'bum du bzlas/ /
de nas dug gis zin pa la/ /phud ces bya ba'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /lha rdzas 'od zer phreng ba 'khrigs/ /bsams nas de la phud yig bsam/ /lag pa sbrul mgo zhags 'dra dang / /phud
kyi rlung gis pags pa sha /rus gnas phud kyi rnam pa'i dug /mtha' dag drangs te gso bar bya/ /de nas las rnams kun byed cing / /dug rims dug sbyar la sogs pa/ /khu tshur gyis kyang
kun sel na/ /sbrul mgo'i phyag rgyas smos ci dgos/ /de nas lto 'phye chen po'i bdag po 'jigs byed chen po'i ma mo chen mo brgyad kyis bskor bas bcom ldan 'das la phyag
btsal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gis 'jigs pa dang / ma mo rnams kyis 'jigs pas lha dang / klu la sogs pa kun tu skrag /rnam par skrag
ste kha bub tu 'gyel nas gos dang bral te sems stor nas kun tu 'phyan pa ngag la phan gdags pa'i slad du bdag cag gi snying po 'bul bar 'tshal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
de legs par byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ /'jigs byed chen po/ /legs so/ /legs so/ /rab tu 'jigs par byed pas rang nyid dang lha'i bu mo thams cad kyi snying po rnams
@#/ /shod cig /de nas 'jigs byed chen pos 'jigs par byed pa'i sgra phyung nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /oM b+hai ra ba bai ra swAhA/ oM b+ha swA hA/ oM b+hi swAhA/ oM b+hu
swAhA/ oM b+he swA hA/ oM b+hai swA hA/ oM b+hau swA hA/ oM b+haM swA hA/ oM b+haHswA hA/ bcom ldan 'jigs byed chen po ni/ /brgyad po de dag gdams ngag nyan/ /de nas de dag dkyil 'khor
bshad/ /'khor lo chen po rtsibs brgyad bri/ /dbus su phyag na rdo rje ni/ /khro bo chen po 'jig rten gsum/ /rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya gzhag /de yi zhabs 'og ma rungs pa/ /'jigs byed rnams
kyi bdag po che/ /'jigs byed ma dang bcas pa bri/ /rtsibs kyi nang rnams thams cad du/ /gzhan yang 'jigs byed brgyad po ni/ /ma mo rnams dang ldan pa ni/ /khros pa'i bzhin dang yid
khros par/ /ci bde bar ni bri bar bya/ /'dir ni sgo sgor de bzhin du/ /sgo ba shin tu khros ldan bri/ /de nas lcags kyu la sogs pas/ /bkug ste mgo bo'i thod pa ni/ /
khrag gis gang bas mchod nas su/ /sha chang gtor ma bzang po dang / /snod rnams khrag gis bkang ba dang / /mgo thod mgo yi dum pu dang / /khrag gam chang bkang bum
pa brgyad/ /dkyil 'khor 'dir ni gzhag par bya/ /de nas 'jig rten gsum rnam rgyal/ /mchog gis slob ma rnams gzhug bya/ /thod pa dang ni bum pa yang / /
brgyad po rnams kyis dbang bskur ro/ /de nas las rnams sbyin par bya/ /ma mo'i khyim mam mtshan gcig par/ /'jig rten gsum ni 'dul ba'i mchog /tshul
bzhin du ni mchod byas nas/ /'bum phrag bzhir ni bzlas par bya/ /de nas 'jigs par byed pa'i sgras/ /bdag nyid chen pos thos gyur te/ /mi 'jigs pa
ni thod pa ru/ /khrag mchog bkang ba'i arga dbul/ /de nas khro bo 'jigs byed pa/ /ma rungs yid can ma mo ni/ /tshogs kyis bskor cing 'jigs byed ni/ /
brgyad kyis bskor ba mthong bar 'gyur/ /de mthong 'jigs pa med byas la/ /hUM zhes bya ba dran byed cing / /sha 'am yang na chang mchog gis/ /thod pa bkang ste
dbul bar bya/ /de nas 'jigs byed ma rungs 'joms/ /mgu zhing rab tu 'grub 'gyur nas/ /ci 'dod smos shig ces bya ba/ /mgu ba'i yid kyis de sbyin byed/ /sa
rnams sbyin pa ma gtogs par/ /ro dang bcud len rdzas dang ni/ /ral gri 'khor lo rtse gsum dang / /mtho ris sa steng sa 'og dang / /gling dang gling bzhi'i rgyal srid
dang / /brgya byin nyid dang gnod sbyin dbang / /srin po nyid dang rig 'dzin nyid/ /rig 'dzin 'khor lo sgyur ba nyid/ /'jig rten gsum gyi bdag po nyid/ /bka'
@#/ /nyan nyid kyang rang nyid dam/ /ma mo'i tshogs rnams ster bar 'gyur/ /dngos grub gang yang rung ba ni/ /ji ltar 'dod pa blang bar bya/ /hUM gi rnam par mngon
phyogs shing / /byin nas dgod cing 'gro ber byed/ /skrag na de ma thag tu gsod/ /de nas tshangs pa la sogs pa lha chen po rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag
btsal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' gnang na rang gi rtog pa bshad par 'tshal gyis/ de
nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse bar dgongs te byin gyis brlab par gsol/ /de nas tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams kyis rang rang gi snying po rnams bshad
do/ /oM a/ oM bi/ oM ru/ oM i/ oM kaM/ oM ga /oM bri/ oM ka /de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad de/ /dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bris la/ /
dbus su 'jig rten gsum 'dul ba/ /de yi mdun du dpa' bo ni/ /dbang phyug lag na rtse gsum bri/ /rgyab tu tshangs pa'i rnam par bri/ /g.yon du lag na 'khor
lo can/ /g.yas na dbang po rang nyid kyi/ /phyag rgya'i mtshan ma lag thogs bri/ /sgo skyong rang bzhin 'dir de rnams/ /chung ma rang gi dkyil 'khor du/ /bum pa
bum pa bkang ba yang / /phyi rol dkyil 'khor du ni gzhag /stobs bzang la sogs mthu chen yang / /de nas 'jug bya lha rnams yin/ /mkhas pas kun nas
spyan drang zhing / /dzaHhUM baM hos lha thams cad/ /pho brang dam par 'jug par mdzod/ /de nas de rnams gshegs bltas nas/ /dga' ba chen po mchod par bya/ /de
nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis/ /phyag rgya slob ma rnams gzhug ste/ /oM pra tI ts+tsha d+h+waM ma hA sa twa badzra d+ha ra A dz+nyA pa ya hUM ha ha ha ha ho/ /me tog ji lta bzhin du dor/ /mig
phye nas ni bstan par bya/ /de nas mngon par bsngags pa yi/ /bum pa'i chu yis dbang bskur ro/ /de nas lha rnams gang 'dod pa'i/ /dngos grub rab tu
sbyin par bya/ /'bum phrag gcig gam 'bum phrag gnyis/ /sngon du bsnyen pa byas nas ni/ /dbang phyug la sogs lha mchog ni/ /de rnams sgrub pa po yis 'grub/
mtshan ma gcig pa la sogs su'am/ /yang na phyag na rdo rje'i gnas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho brang ngam/ /ring bsrel ldan pa'i mchod rten du/ /
lha rnams thams cad cho ga bzhin/ /sgrub pa po yis rtag tu bsgrub/ /de nas nam phyed na ni lha/ /'ongs nas khyod kyi 'dod pa ci/ /ji ltar bde zhing phan pa ni/ /
@#/ /sbyin zhes nges par go bar byed/ /bzang po myur du sems te smros/ /gang phyir mchog ni khyod la sbyin/ /de nas sngags shes dngos grub
dang / /mchog gi lha la gsol ba gdab/ /lha rdzas bcud dang bcud len dang / /mi snang ba dang mkha' 'gro dang / /ril bu rgyal srid rdzas la sogs/ /yid 'dod
tshad med gsol ba gang ba/ /de nas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag btsal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang
dag 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag lha rnams kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par
sbyang ngo / /mtho ris kyi lam bstan par bgyi'o/ /bde 'gro'i lam bstan par bgyi'o/ /dam pa'i chos kyi lam bstan par bgyi'o/ /sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i lam
bstan par bgyi'o/ /nges par 'byung ba'i lam bstan par bgyi'o/ /mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o/ /spong ba'i lam bstan par
bgyi'o/ /nyon mongs pa med pa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o/ /sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub pa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' nyid du
'grub pa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid du 'grub pa'i lam bstan par bgyi'o/ /dus thams cad du 'jigs pa thams cad las bsrung
ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o/ /grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rnams bsrung
bar bgyi'o/ /yul dang / phyogs dang / grong 'khor rnams kyang bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /rgyal po yang stsal bar bgyi'o/ /rgyal bo thob pa'i rgyal po che
par bgyi'o/ /gling gcig dang / gling gnyis dang / gling gsum dang / gling bzhi ba dang / bde 'gro dang / sa steng dang / sa 'og gi 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po
rnams stsal bar bgyi'o/ /mdor na brgya byin nyid dang / tshangs pa nyid dang / khyab 'jug nyid dang / dbang phyug chen po nyid kyang stsal bar bgyi'o// //
de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes slar yang nyid kyi 'khor la gzigs nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /de nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de
dag g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ yang dag par rab tu g.yos/ 'gul rab tu 'gul/ yang dag par rab tu 'gul/ 'bar rab tu
@#/ /'bar/ /yang dag par rab tu 'bar/ dga' rab tu dga'/ yang dag par rab tu dga'/ rtse rab tu rtse/ yang dag par rab tu rtse zhing ngo mtshar rmad
du byung ba du ma yang 'jig rten du yang dag par rab tu mthong ngo / /de nas tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha rnams shin tu ya mtshan skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal
nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'dzum pa mdzad pa 'di'i rgyu gang lags/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni rgyu ma
mchis par mdzum pa mi mdzad do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de'i phyir 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu lung bstan du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes lha rnams
kyis gsol ba'i tshig gsan nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams/ gang sngon sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bshad pa 'chi bdag zhi bar
byed pa'i rig pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba 'joms par byed pa'i rigs pa'i sngags gzi brjid chen po nyon cig /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la
tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha rnams kun tu dga' zhing ba spu langs shing phyag btsal nas legs so zhes bya ba rab tu phul te/ bcom ldan 'das/ legs so/ /legs so/ /
rdo rje 'dzin pa/ legs so legs so/ /gang gis tshe thung ba'i sems can rnams tshe ring bar 'gyur ba dang / dus ma yin pa'i 'chi bdag gis zin pa rnams dus ma yin par
'chi ba las rnams par grol ba dang / ngan song du skyes pa'i sems can rnams ngan song las ji ltar grol ba dang / 'khor ba'i 'jigs pas skrag pa'i sems can rnams bde
ba'i thabs kyis 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs par 'gyur zhing myur ba nyid du bla na ma mchis pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba
gzi brjid che zhing stobs che ba pha rol gnon pa'i rig pa bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams kyis gsol ba 'debs
pa'i tshig gsan nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po rig pa 'di rang gi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /oM puN+ye puN+ye ma hA puN+ye a pa ri mi ta A yuHpuN+ye dz+nyA na

sa b+hA ro pa tsi te swA hA/ snying po'i rig pa'o/ /oM badzriM swAhA/ nye ba'i snying po'i rig pa'o/ /oM b+hUM swa hA/ snying po'i nye ba'i snying po'i rig pa'o/ /oM krAM swA hA/ snying po yang dag par
bskul ba'i rig pa'o/ /oM trAM swA hA/ snying po dam pa'o/ /oM hrIHswA hA/ gsang ba'i snying po'o/ /de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad de/ /dkyil 'khor rtsibs bzhi par byed la
@#/ /de'i dbus su de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dang / bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa gzi brjid kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhag ste/ b+h+rUM

zhes bya ba'i snying po'o/ /de nas spyan sngar phyag na rdo rje ste/ /badzriM zhes bya ba'i snying po'o/ /g.yon du ni khro bo ste/ krAM zhes bya ba'i snying po'o/ /g.yas su nam mkha'i snying po ste/ trAM
zhes bya ba'i snying po'o/ /rgyab tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa zhes bya ba ste/ hrIHzhes bya ba'i snying po'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od
kyi dkyil 'khor la reg par bri'o/ /bum pa lnga dang brgyad 'khor los bsgyur ba'i sngags kyis btab la gzhag go /las thams cad pas mngon par bsngags pa yang
ngo| |bdug pa la sogs gzhag go /mchod pa'i dang po can sgo skyong thams cad nyid kyang ngo / /de nas sngags pa yang dag par 'jug pa'i phyir bde bar gshegs pa dam pa
sras dang bcas pa 'khor gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba rig pa dang lhan cig spyan drang ngo / /rig pa yang bde bar gshegs pa'i g.yon gyi logs su bri'o/ /de nas bdag nyid
dbang bskur ste/ skyil mo krung gis 'dug la stong phrag brgyar bzlas so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur zhing rdo rje 'dzin pa'am
'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gam/ ji ltar 'dod pa'i mchog so sor thob po/ /gang gi tshe mnyam par gzhag pa de'i tshe yid kyis las thams cad nus
par 'gyur ro/ /de nas slob ma rnams gzhug ste rdo rje 'dzin pa'i phyag rgyas nga rgyal 'di bskyed par bya ste/ oM badzra d+ha ra/ rat+na d+ha ra/ pad+ma d+ha ra/ bi shwa d+ha ra/ ta thal ga
ta sa ma ya mA ti kra ma/ ta thA ga ta sa ma ya d+hA rAt+ma ko\u0f85haM zhes pa'o/ /de nas 'dis me tog dor bar bya'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta pri tI ts+tsha ho sa ma ya s+t+waM/ de nas phreng ba da

mgo la bcings la dbang bskur/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi Shiny+tsa d+hA ra A dz+nyA pa ya hUM b+h+rUM/ oM badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM b+h+rUM/ oM rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM traM/ oM pad+ma a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM hrIHoM
karma a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM AHde nas dam tshig dang bka'i dbang bskur ba sbyin no/ /de la dam tshig ni/ dkon mchog gsum dang byang chub sems/ /bla ma dam pa yong mi spong / /
srog chags rnams ni gsad mi bya/ /ma byin par yang mi blang nyid/ /brdzun yang smra bar mi bya 'o/ /pha rol bud med spyan mi bya/ /bla ma smad par mi bya zhing / /grib ma'ang 'gom
par mi bya'o/ /slob dpon ma yin mi gzung zhing / /mtshan ma slob dpon spangs pa yang / /sngags dang phyag rgya mi smad de/ /lha rnams la yang ga la zhig /gal te rmongs
@#/ /pas smad na ni/ /nad kyis nges par 'chi bar 'gyur/ /mchod rnying lha yi grib ma dang / /'jig rten 'jig rten las 'das pa'i/ /phyag rgya
yi ge mtshan ma yang / /gom pas bgom par mi bya 'o/ /blun po dkon mchog gsum sogs dang / /sangs rgyas bstan la gnod byed dang / /bla ma smod la brtson
pa rnams/ /mkhas pas bsgrims te gsad par bya/ /chos mi ldan dang bsreg pa dag /rtag tu sems can gnod brtson dang / /dam tshig sdang rnam snying brtse bas/
sngags pas sngags kyis gzhom par bya/ /'jungs pa'i nor yang yang dag blang / /sems can sdug bsngal can la sbyin/ /bla ma mchod pa'i rgyu mtshan dang / /de
bzhin dam tshig sgrub pa dang / /dkyil 'khor don dang rgyal sras la/ /mchod pa'i don phyir bsam pa yis/ /nor 'phrog 'jungs pa'i nor yang 'ong / /sems
can rnams la phan dga' pas/ /dam tshig dang ni bla ma'i rdzas/ /sems can rnams kyi srog bsrung phyir/ /rtag tu brdzun ni smra bar bya/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni
mnyes bya dang / /dam tshig rnams ni bsrung bya dang / /sngags rig pa yi bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /gzhan gyis bud med kyang bsten bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas 'dug
pas| |thams cad spyod cing kun byas kyang / /'grub 'gyur nyes par mi 'gyur na/ /snying rje ldan pas smos ci dgos/ /de nas 'dis bka' yi dbang bskur ro/ /oM sarba ta thA

ga ta A dz+nyA te dA s+ya mi gr-i h+Na badzra su sid+d+ha ye/ oM badzra tiSh+Tha hUM/ 'dis rdo rje lag tu byin la phrin las kyi dbang bskur sbyin no/ /oM sarba kar+m+ma Ni ku ru bud+d+ha nAM hUM/ de nas bla ma bla
mar bya ba'i phyir/ /khyod kyis lus mchog sbyin par bya/ /rdzas dang nor dang 'bru rnams dang / /rta dang bzhon pa nyid dang ni/ /bran gyi mchog dang khang pa dang / /rgyal srid dbang
phyug de bzhin te/ /bu dang bu mo chung ma dang / /ma dang sring mo tsha mo dang / /gzhan yang ci bzhed thams cad ni/ /phan pa'i bsam pas bla mar dbul/ /de nas dngos grub
sangs rgyas dang / /byang chub sgrub dang gzhan yang ni/ /'jig rten pa yi mthu chen rnams/ /ji ltar 'dod pas gsol ba gdab/ /de nas bu la phan pa'i phyir/ /sngags
rig ser sna med sems dang / /dad pas dad pa'i sems ldan la/ /dngos grub rnams ni sbyin par bya/ /chos rnams rang bzhin med par ni/ /sems kyis bsgom par
byas nas kyang / /a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam/ /rang gi sa bon de dbus su/ /bsams nas dam tshig phyag rgya yang / /bsam bzhin de bzhin de nyid kyang / /lha yi
@#/ /rnam pa'i rnal 'byor du/ /sgrub pa po yis yongs su bsgyur/ /de nas rang gi sa bon dang / /phyag rgyas phyag rgya de byin brlab/ /gong 'og go rims
ji bzhin du/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis dbang bskur ro/ /de ltar nga rgyal bskyed nas ni/ /mkhas pa yis ni bsgrub bya ste/ /de bzhin gshegs kyang 'grub 'gyur na/ /dngos
grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos/ /de nas tshangs pa la sogs pa lha chen po rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/
rgyal po dang / rgyal po'i bu dang / rgyal po'i blon po dang / rgyal rigs dang / bram ze dang / rje'u'i rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / gzhan yang dman pa phyag dar ba dang /
mtha' 'khob kyi skye bo'i gnas dang / skye bo'i gnas kyi rigs su skyes pa dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po 'dir zhugs pa de dag gi rnam par smin pa ji lta bur 'gyur/ bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ tshangs pa la sogs pa lha'i tshogs rnams/ gang ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir zhus pa ni/ legs so/ /legs so/ /lha'i
tshogs rnams/ dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po 'dir zhugs shing dbang bskur ba dang / bris pa dang / 'drir bcug pa dang / rjes su yi rang ba dang / phyag byas pa dang / mchod
pa byas pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa nyon cig /lha'i bu rnams/ mdor na nga la yang de'i phan yon bshad par spro ba med de/ gang nga la bsod nams kyi phung po de brgya phrag
stong du mar bsgyur yang grangs su yang / bgrang bar yang / dper yang mi bzod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bsod nams kyi phung po'i bar gyis kyang mi bzod do/ /gang
dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa'i sems can rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa 'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das/ ngo mtshar che'o/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa/ ngo mtshar che'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/
bdag cag rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dkyil 'khor la sogs par zhugs spro'o/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa spro'o/ /de nas lha de dag gis de bzhin du phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces
gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ '+dzam+bu'i gling ba'i sems can rnams bsod nams chung zhing tshe thung ba dang / ngan song gi rgyud dang ldan pa dang / dmyal ba dang / yi dwags dang / byol
song rnams su skyes pa dag kyang mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de dag la bdag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bya/ kye lha'i bu dag /de dag ni dkyil 'khor 'di nyid du chug cig /bcug
nas kyang dbang bskur cig /chos kyi yi ge yang zlos su chug cig /de nas sems can de dag tshe ring bar 'gyur/ bsod nams dang bral ba bsod nams dang ldan par 'gyur/ /
@#/ /ngan song las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/ /lha'i bu rnams/ gang ngan song du skyes pa de dag gi ming la dbang bskur ba mdzod cig /gzugs brnyan
la yang dbang bskur bar byos shig /rang gi lha'i sku la yang dbang bskur bar byos shig /tha na de dang rigs mthun pa dang / de'i bu dang / de dang rus mthun pa dang / de'i
ming 'dzin pa dang / bran la yang dbang bskur cig /zhag bdun lan bdun dkyil 'khor du bcug ste dbang bskur bas nges par ngan song gi sgrib pa las rnam par
grol bar 'gyur ro/ /lha'i bu rnams/ de'i ming nas smos te/ 'bum phrag gnyis dang / 'bum phrag gsum dang / 'bum phrag bzhi dang / 'bum phrag brgya stong
gi bar du bzlas na/ mtshams med pa lnga byas pa yang rnam par grol bar 'gyur na sdig pa chung du byas pa rnams lta ci smos/ lha'i bu rnams/ zhi ba'i thab khung zlum po tha ma
dang | bar ma dang / mchog khru gang dang / khru do 'am/ khru bzhi ba byas nas/ de'i ming gis yungs kar dkar po rnams brgya phrag stong du bsregs na ngan song kun las
thar bar 'gyur re/ /de'i sha dang / rus pa dang / skra dang / thal ba la sogs pa la cho ga de nyid kyis sdig pa kun las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/ /de yi dbus su 'khor
lo ni/ /rtsibs brgyad dkar po 'od zer 'bar/ /khor yug rdo rje rtse lnga ba/ /'od zer dkar po dang ldan bri/ /de nas sna tshogs rdo rje bya/ /rdo rje rin chen chu skyes mchog /de nas sdig
pa gzhom pa'i phyir/ /phyag rgya rnam pa sna tshogs bya/ /phyi rol rdo rje rigs rnams kyi/ /phyag rgya rnams ni phyir rol bri/ /gza' dang skar ma'i mtshan ma dang / /de ltar 'jig rten
'khor rnams kyang / /gtso bo'i ri mo lugs ma dang / /rdo rje can dang lhan cig bzhag /bum pa bum pa gang ba dang / /gtor ma lha bshos shin tu dkar/ /mdor na thig ni
btab nas kyang / /cho ga bzhin du bri bar bya/ /dkar po'i gos ni gyon nas su/ /sangs rgyas gzugs can mi 'jigs pas/ /ngan song 'gro bar gnas pa yi/ /sems
can de rjes dran byed cing / /sdig pa sgrib pa zhi ba'i phyir/ /rgyud dag pa yi sbyin sreg ni/ /mar dang 'o ma sbrang rtsir bcas/ /'bras yos yungs kar bsres pa dang / /de yi
rus pa sha la sogs/ /yang na ming tsam gyis kyang bya/ /de nas bde 'gro skyes nas su/ /mkhas pas rgyas par bya ba ni/ /khru do pa 'am khru bzhi ba/ /de bzhin mchog ni khru
brgyad par/ /byas nas thab khung khru bzhi ba/ /kun tu mu ran dang ldan pa/ /de dbus pad+ma rin chen can/ /'od zer ser po can bri zhing / /khor yug tu ni rin chen dang / /
@#/ /mu ran la ni chu skyes bri/ /phyi rol tu ni rigs lnga yi/ /dbye bas phyag rgya bri bar bya/ /de bzhin phyi yi lha rnams dang / /lcags kyu la sogs bri bar
bya| |na bza' ser po gyon byas nas/ /mtho ris gnas pa rjes dran zhing / /de la phan phyir rgyas pa yi/ /don du rgyas pa'i las byas na/ /lus can de yi tshe dang dpal/ /
gzi brjid skal ba bzang po 'phel/ /de nas de la phan pa yi/ /dbang du bya ba'i las bya ste/ /thab khung gzhu yi dbyibs 'dra ba/ /khru gang pa 'am khru do ba/ /khru bzhi byas
la de dbus su/ /chu skyes dmar po yang dag bri/ /de yi dbus su mda' bcas pa'i/ /gzhu nyid kyang ni bri bar bya/ /khor yug tu ni mdar bcas pa'i/ /gzhu ni kha dog
dmar po bri/ /sngags 'dzin pa yis rtag par yang / /phyi rol de yi lha yi bya/ /sems can de ni dran byas la/ /na bza' dmar po gyon pa yi/ /me tog dmar zhing
pad+ma yang / /'bras bu dmar dang khams bcas pa/ /mar dang gur gum bsres pa dang / tsan+dan dmar po'i phye ma dang / /sbyin sreg byas nas lha la sogs/ /thams
cad de yi dbang du 'gyur/ /de yi gdon rnams rnam gzhom phyir/ /mngon spyod yang dag brtsom par bya/ /khru do phyed bcas khru gsum mam/ /de bzhin mchog ni khru
dgu pa/ /zur gsum dang ni ldan par bya/ /dbus su rdo rje rtse dgu pa/ /rtse gsum pa yis mu ran bya/ /sna tshogs rdo rje yang byas la/ /dbyug pa mgo dang rtse gsum rnams/ /rdo rje
dgra sta rtse gcig gis/ /phyi rol du yang mtshan par bya/ /rig pa gsum pa sngar bzhin brgyan/ /bum pa gtor ma bum pa yang / /zhal zas mang po gzhag par bya/ /sha dang
khrag gis bkang ba yi/ /thod pa rnams kyang kun tu yang / /de nas gos nag bgos shing khros/ /rang nyid 'jig rten gsum rnam rgyal/ /lus can de yi sdig las sogs/ /
de nas de yi sdig bcom zhing / /bgegs dang bral te ci bde bar/ /mtho ris 'jig rten mi rnams nyid/ /je snyed khams gsum 'jig rten spyod/ /myur du go rims 'di nyid
kyis| |tshe 'dir gnas pa rnams la bya/ /de nas gang gi phyir byas pa/ /de yi phyir ni de bzhin 'gyur/ /gzhan dag kyang ni las rnams kyang / /snga ma ji bzhin de bzhin bya/ /
des ni sems can rnams la yang / /myur du bde skyid 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nas tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha rnams yang dag par dga' bas bcom ldan 'das la
phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang ngan song du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi don dang / phan yon dang / bde ba'i slad du brtag
@#/ /pa'i rgyal po 'di 'dri ba dang / 'drir 'jug pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de bdag cag tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams kyis bu bzhin du
yongs su bskyang bar bgyi ste/ yang ji ltar bshad pa ma tshang ba med par bgyis pa lta ci smos/ gang yang rgyal po dang / rgyal po'i bu dang / rgyal po'i blon po ji ltar
gsungs pa'i sngags rjes su slob pa de'i rgyal srid 'phel bar bgyi'o/ /yul dang / phyogs dang / skye bo'i gnas dang / 'khor gyi skye bo'i lo thog la sogs pa yang
bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /nor dang / 'bru rnams mang du 'byor bar bgyi'o/ /bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams phun sum tshogs par yang bgyi'o/ /'byor
ba dang / rgyas pa dang / lo legs pa dang / bde bar bgyi'o/ /gang zhig brtag pa'i rgyal po 'di la dang pas rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la brtags te grong dang / grong khyer la sogs
par 'jug pa bdag nyid kyis bsdu bar yang bgyi'o/ /glang po che'i steng du bzhag la grong dang / grong khyer la sogs pa thams cad du bskor bar bya ste/ dus ma yin par 'chi
ba dang / nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can chen po de'i drung na bdag cag bran gyis tshul lam/ bu'i tshul du gnas pa shes bar bgyi'o/ /gang na 'di
rab tu spyod pa de na bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje rang nyid longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skus rdo rje sems dpa'i skur bzhugs par 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rdo
rje sems dpa' kun tu bzang po re ba thams cad yongs su skong ba de nyid brtag pa'i rgyal po'i gzugs su gzhugs par 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ /sa phyogs de yang mchod rten du
gyur ba 'tshal bar bgyi ste/ mchod par bgyi 'o/ /phyag 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ /kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /gang yang brtag pa'i rgyal po 'dir rab tu spyod pa'i rdo rje slob dpon
dka' thub chen po de'i bdag cag tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha rnams kyis g.yog bgyi'o/ /bran gyi tshul du gnas par bgyi'o/ /mngag gzhug pa nyid du gnas par bgyi'o/ /bsgo
ba thams cad mnyan par bgyi'o/ /phan pa dang / bde ba thams cad bgyi'o/ /dngos grub stsal bar bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ mdor na de'i rkang ba'i rdul mgo bos gzung
bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ phyag 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ /de'i phyi bzhin du rjes su 'brang bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ /gang dkyil 'khor du zhugs te dbang bskur ba de
kho bo cag gis mnga' bdag tu 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ /phyag na rdo rjer 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' lags par 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ /bde ba chen po kun tu bzang po lags
@#/ /bar 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa lags par 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes tshangs pa la sogs
pa'i lha rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams gang chos la rim gro gcig gnyis byas pas de ltar yang dag pa'i dam bca' ni legs
so/ /legs par sgrubs shig /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes sngags dang / rig pa dang / snying po thams cad brtan par bya ba'i phyir rang gi snying po 'di
bshad do/ /oM b+hUM druM badzra pA Ni dr-i tiSh+Tha hUM/ oM hU AH/ oM badzra hUM phaT/ oM dr-i T+ha badzra hUM/ oM badzra hUM sa/ oM badzra hUM aH/ de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor bshad de/ /
dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bris la/ /dbus su rdo rje bri bar bya/ /yang na rdo rje sems dpa' 'am/ /kun tu bzang po bde ba che/ /spyan sngar phyag na rdo rje nyid/ /g.yas su phyag
na rin chen spyan/ /phyag na pad+ma nub phyogs bri/ /byang du phyag na sna tshogs bri/ /phyi rol du ni zlum por bskor/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dgod par bya/ /de yi phyi rol sems
dpa' rnams/ /go rims bzhin du bri bar bya/ /de yi phyi rol sems dpa' yang / /byams pa la sogs mchog chen bri/ /de phyir de bzhin dge slong ni/ /kun dga' bo
sogs thub pa bri/ /rang gi chung ma bus bskor ba'i/ /tshangs pa la sogs phyi rol bri/ /gza' dang rgyu skar nyi zla dang / /rgyal po bzhi bo rnams dad ni/ /phyogs skyong 'jig rten
skyong ba rnams/ /dkyil 'khor 'dir ni yang dag bri/ /phyir rol du ni dmyal ba sogs/ /klu la sogs pa dud 'gro'i dang / /sgo dang sgor ni de bzhin du/ /sgo skyong stobs kyi
dam pa rnams/ /dkar po 'dod pa'i nyi ma la/ /rab tu 'bad pas dkyil 'khor bri/ /gang bsngags nag po'i phyogs la yang / /dkyil 'khor 'gal ba ma yin no/ /lnga ba de
rjes bdun pa dang / nya gang ba ni khyad par du/ /sngags de phyag na pad+ma yi/ /dkyil 'khor bya ba'i cho ga la'o/ /gang yang drag po'i las rnams la/ /de ni nag po la yang bri/ /
khro bo rnams kyi dkyil 'khor yang / /zla ba nya ba khyad par du/ /rgyal po rnams kyi dkyil 'khor bsngags/ /gzhan yang rang gis 'dus byas pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor la brtson
gdab bya zhing / /shar nas 'char ba'i dbang bya ste/ /phyogs kyi cha ni brtag par bya/ /de nas dkyil 'khor dgod pa ni/ /yid kyis yongs su brtag par bya/ /sngags dang
rgyud ni dang por byas/ /'jam zhing sngags gzugs dge zhing zhi/ /rjes mthun rang gi slob nyid kyi/ /slob ma lhan cig tsam gyis spyad/ /de nas nang bar rab sngar langs/ /legs
@#/ /bkrus gos dkar 'chang zhing gtsang / /blo ldan bla ma slob mar bcas/ /dkyil 'khor drung du kun nas 'gro /dkyil 'khor phyogs nyid shin tu
yang / /nye bar byugs shing legs par mnyes/ /khro bo chen po bzlas pa yi/ /dri yi chu yis bsangs pa yi/ /dbus su rigs rnams snying po yis/ /lhag par gnas
par bya ba nyid/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni gtso bo yi/ /sngags kyi las rnams thams cad bya/ /sa la sor ni bcu gnyis pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor dri yis byas nas su/ /dkyil
'khor rig pas lan bdun du/ /lhag pa de nas bzlas par bya/ /rdo rjes lha rnams nyid kyi yang / /byang chub chen po zhes bya ba'i/ /snying pos skal ba ji lta bar/ /dri dang me tog
sogs mchod pa/ /byas nas gtor ma dbul bya zhing / /mngon par bsngags pa'i spos kyang ngo / /de nas tsan+dan la sogs pa/ /bsres pa'i chu la mngon par bsngags/ /de
la dbul ba'i me tog dang / /bdug pa la yang cho ga bzhin/ /so shing u dum bA ra dang / /a shwat+tha sogs rma med cing / /shin tu phra min sbom pa min/ /sor mo bcu gnyis
tshad tsam ni/ /dri yi chu yis rab bkrus shing / /me tog phreng ba yis kyang bcings/ /dri bzangs la sogs byugs shing bdug /lag pas reg na snying po ni/ /mang po yang ni
bzlas bya zhing / /rigs nyid kyis ni lan bdun nam/ /slob ma rnams kyis tshad gzhal bas/ /so shing la sogs yang dag gzung / /gcig la sogs pas go rims bzhin/ /
rtse mo nyid nas bca' bar bya/ /de nas mkhas pas bdag nyid kyis/ /slob ma srung ba brtan byas nas/ /sbyin sreg las ni mar byugs pa'i/ /yam shing rnams ni mar dang
bcas/ /sbrang rtsi mar dang bsres pa dang / /mar gyi sreg blugs bsreg bya zhing / /zho zan gyi yang sbyin sreg bya/ /dang por bgegs ni zhi bya'i phyir/ /de nas thugs kyis rjes 'dzin
phyir/ /de nas zhi ba'i sbyin sreg cing / /sdig pa zhi bar bya phyir ram/ /de nas slob ma rnams brtags nas/ /cho ga yi ni lhag gnas bya/ /de yis ji ltar nus pa yis/ /de bzhin sdom
pa gzung bar bya/ /de rnams cho ga 'di yin te/ /gtsang zhing dkar ba'i gos can ni/ /mdun du bltas te/ 'dug pa la/ /lhag par gnas par brtsam par bya/ /bla mas dang por
skyabs gsum sbyin/ /de yi rjes la byang chub sems/ /ma bskyed pa ni bskyed bya zhing / /bskyed pa slar yang rjes dran bya/ /de nas khro bo mngon bzlas pa'i/ /chu yi spyi bor bsang
gtor bya/ /mgo bor kun tu reg nas ni/ /mnyam par gzhag par lan bdun bzlas/ /rig pa'i rgyal po'i snying po ni/ /lag pas dri bzangs spags pa la/ /'jigs pa bzlog la
@#/ /mkhas pa yis/ /lan bdun rtag tu bzlas par bya/ /'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po yis/ /rig pa'i rgyal po yi ge gcig /rta mgrin chu skyes rigs
la ni/ /rig pa'i rgyal po yi ge bcu/ /sum+b+ha zhes bya rdo rje'i rigs/ /rig pa'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul che/ /yi ge hUM bzhi rnams dang ldan/ /las kun rab tu spros pa la'o/ /rigs
gsum rnams la thun mong ba/ /khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil ba nyid/ /bgegs kun rnam par gzhom pa'i phyir/ /gsang ba pa yi bdag pos gsungs/ /las ni thams cad pa
yi sngags/ /spyi bor reg cing bzlas de nas/ /bsang gtor yang bya de nyid kyis/ /bdug pa yis kyang bdug par bya/ /dbang bskur ba ni bum pa bcas/ /'bru la sogs pa thams
cad ldan/ /cung zad cung zad gang du blugs/ /rig pa'i rgyal pos mngon par bsngags/ /cho ga bzhin du lhag gnas bya/ /dri yi chu yis mchod yon sbyin/ /me tog kyang ni
gzhug par bya/ /bdug pa yis kyang bdug par bya/ /dbang bskur ba ni bum pa bcas/ /mkhas pas yang dag yongs su bzlas/ /de yis dbang bskur bya ba yin/ /slar yang
bzlas pa dkyil 'khor du/ /slob ma dam tshig can rnams ni/ /thal mo sbyar zhing mngon phyogs la/ /de nas so shing sbyin par bya/ /slob ma rnams ni go rims bzhin/ /gzung
shing shar du kha bltas te/ /phyi rol nyid du so shing bca'/ /ma gas par ni 'chos nas su/ /logs ma yin par 'dor bya ste/ /so shing mdun du dor byas pa/ /gang tshe mdun du rtse
mo lhung / /de tshe dngos grub mchog shes bya/ /gang zhig steng du bltas pa yang / /de bzhin shar du rtse mo bstan/ /dngos grub 'bring du yongs su grags/ /byang du bltas na thad
ka nyid/ /rig pa'i dngos grub 'jig rten pa/ /so shing dor ba brgya lam na/ /gang tshe 'og tu kha bltas pa/ /de tshe sa 'og dngos grub ni/ /'byung ba 'di la the tshom med/ /slob ma
nye bar reg pa ni/ /snga ma bzhin du gzung byas la/ /thams cad las byed sngags kyis ni/ /bla mas dri bzangs chu sbyin no/ /re re la yang btung ba'i phyir/ /khyor ba gsum ni sbyin
par bya/ /de nas blo ldan langs nas su/ /'di dag kun tu spyad par bya/ /de nas mchod pa yang byas nas/ /lag pas spos ni bteg nas su/ /blo ldan gus pas lha rnams lo/ /
gsol ba gdab cing gus gnas bya/ /dang por sngags ni snyan gsan dbab/ /de yi dkyil 'khor gang yin pa/ /de yi rim pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /lha rnams spyan 'dren pa
yin no/ /bcom ldan che ge mo zhes bya/ /rig pa'i rgyal po khyod la 'dus/ /slob ma rnams la brtse phyir dang / /khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir/ /nyid kyi dkyil 'khor
@#/ /thugs rje yi/ /bdag nyid kyang ni bri bar 'tshal/ /bcom ldan de ni bdag gus la/ /bka' drin mdzad par rigs lags so/ /'jig rten mgon
po brtse ba can/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang / /dgra bcom gang gzhan sngags kyi lha/ /lha dang 'jig rten skyong rnams dang / /'byung po rdzu 'phrul che gang dang / /
sangs rgyas bstan la mngon dga' rnams/ /bdag la yang dag dgongs su gsol/ /che ge mo zhes bya ba dang / /che ge mo yi dkyil 'khor ni/ /rang nyid 'byung ba bgyid par
'tshal/ /ji ltar gus pa'i nyer spyod kyis/ /slob ma dang bcas bdag la ni/ /rjes su brtse bas nyer gzung nas/ /dkyil 'khor dang bcas thams cad ni/ /nye bar byon par
mdzad par rigs/ /de skad smras te tshig gang zhig /bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ /bstod pa'i nyer spyod kyang byas nas/ /de dag gshegs su gsol bar bya/ /chags
bral so sor ldan pa yi/ /slob ma rnams la chos bshad bya/ /blo ldan shar du mgo bstan te/ /dge ba'i gnyid kyi nyal du gzhug /de nas snga dro nyid du ni/ /mtshan mo'i rmi
lam mthong bar bri/ /gang tshe dge ba'am mi dge ba/ /dwogs med nyin par thos nas su/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pas ni/ /rigs bdun rnams kyi dam tshig kyang / /de nas
bu khyod dam tshig dang / /sdom pa rgyal ba yis gsungs pa/ /dad pas bla ma'i bka' yang bskyang / /khyed kyis srog chags gsang mi bya/ /ma byin mi blang 'dod log
dang / /dngos grub 'dod pas mi bya'o/ /chang mi btung zhing sha la sogs/ /bza' ba nam yang ma yin nyid/ /sems can kun la gnod mi bya/ /dkon mchog gsum yang
mi spang zhing / /dus rnams kun tu byang chub sems/ /snying po sngags dang phyag rgya dang / /bla ma lha rnams de bzhin nyid/ /bla ma'i bka' las 'da' mi bya/ /gang las sdig
'gyur de las 'da'/ /de la phul ba'i rnying pa dang / /grib ma la yang 'gom mi bya/ /phyag rgya'i rnam pa'ang de bzhin nyid/ /sngags dang lha la mi smad cing / /gdon gyi las
rnams mi bya 'o/ /mu stegs pa yang smad mi bya/ /mdor na bdag nyid the tshom dang / /som nyi yid gnyis mi bya ste/ /rgyud dang lha tshogs la de bzhin/ /dad pa brtan pas dam
bcas nas/ /sarba bid kyis dbang de bzhin/ /bum pa la sogs mchog rnams kyis/ /dbang bskur bcu po 'dod ji bzhin/ /de nas lag na rdo rje dang / /dril bu sbyin bya de rjes
la/ /'khor lo la sogs rin chen bdun/ /bzung nas 'khor los bsgyur ba yi/ /rgyal po dbang phyug thob phyir dang / /sdig pa gzhom phyir dbang bskur zhing / /sngags bsgrub
@#/ /'dod pa'i slob ma la/ /rjes su gnang ba mnyan du gzhug /de nas bstod pas mgo bo yis/ /phyag 'tshal ji ltar 'dod pa'i rdzas/ /bla ma la ni
dbul bya ste/ /rin chen gter dang 'bru dang dbyigs/ /gser dang bzhon pa khyim dang gdan/ /bu dang bu mo skyes pa dang / /bud med rnams ni dbul bya zhing / /grong dang
grong khyer ci bzhed rnams/ /rang gi sems ni rab dang bas/ /yon rnams nges par dbul bya zhing / /dngos grub myur phyir bla ma la/ /mdor na bdag nyid kyang 'bul bya/ /
tshe 'di'i bde ba ma lus dang / /'jig rten pha rol bde ba'i mchog /sangs rgyas nyid kyang 'thob 'gyur te/ /lha yi bde ba lta ci smos/ /bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/ /
rdo rje slob dpon smod pa gang / /de yis rtag tu sdug bsngal 'thob/ /de phyir slob dpon smad mi bya/ /rdo rje spun dang sring mo dang / /gang yang smad par mi bya zhing / /'khon
par yang ni mi bya 'o/ /dkon mchog gsum la gnod byed dang / /bla ma smod byed ma rungs rnams/ /dam tshig 'das la bzod mi bya/ /de lta bu sogs gnod byed la'ang / /
de lta nyid do de byas na/ /kun rig gis gsungs dngos grub 'thob/ /sems can kun la rjes brtse bas/ /dngos grub myur du 'byung ba 'thob// //de nas bcom
ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po dang / lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don du sgrub pa'i cho ga gsungs te/ bri gzhi la bcom ldan 'das thams cad
rig pa de kho na bzhin du bri zhing / g.yas su de bzhin gshegs pa ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i rgyal po dang / g.yon du shAkya thub pa dang / ngan song thams cad yongs
su sbyong ba'i rgyal po'i 'og tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sku mdog zla ba lta bu phyag na pad+ma can dang / shAkya thub pa'i 'og na phyag na rdo rje dang / de dag gi dbus
su sman pa'i rgyal po phyag gcig gis a ru ra'i 'bras bu bsnams shing de las gzhan ni mchog sbyin du bya'o/ /rta mgrin dang / 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba ma rungs
pa 'joms pa la brtson pa dag ni rang gi lha la mngon par phyogs par bri zhing de dag gi dbus su lo tsa nA dang / mA ma kI dang / gos dkar mo dang / sgrol ma dag phyag na rang
gi mtshan ma can bri'o/ /de rnams kyi 'og tu rdzing bu chu srin dang / nya dang / rus sbal dang / sbal pa dkar po la sogs pa dang bcas pa dang / chu las skyes pa'i me tog
du mas yongs su gang bar bri zhing 'dug pa dang / mar me dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / zhal zas dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu rnams pa sna tshogs bri par bya'o/ /'og nyid du
@#/ /sgrub pa po thal mo sbyar te rab tu 'dug cing 'dus par bri'o/ /de nas de rdzogs pa la byin gyis brlab pa dmigs par bya ste/ spyan dbye ba byas nas
mchod pas mchod par bya'o/ /de nas gal te mtshan ma mthong na myur du 'grub po/ /gal te ma mthong na ring mo zhig na 'grub pa'o/ /bzhad pa dang ni rnga sgra dang / /dril
bu'i sgra dang 'brug sgra nyid/ /dge slong bram ze bu mo dang / /'bras bu mthong na dngos grub ni/ /mchog 'bring tha ma myur du 'grub/ /de nas sku gzugs phyag rgya dang / /sngags
rnams kyis ni bya ni gyis brlab/ /ji ltar bskyed pas thob bya zhing / /'jig rten gsum ni rnam rgyal kyis/ /bdag bsrung la sogs byas nas su/ /bdag gi de nyid kyang
bsgoms nas/ /ji srid dngos grub rtags 'byung ba/ /'bum phrag gsum mam drug 'bum bzlas/ /de nas dbang pa'i gnas su ni/ /sngags kyang chad lhag bskang
bya ste/ /brgya phrag brgyad rnams bzlas par bya/ /de nas bzlas pa de yi mthar/ /dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bsams la/ /mchod pa rgya chen yang byas nas/ /mtshan mo
gcig ni bzlas par bya/ /de nas gal te gtso bo 'am/ /sras sam lha rnams mthong gyur na/ /de tshe snod 'dod ji ltar bar/ /dngos grub mchog ni gsol ba gdab/ /
lha rnams rtag tu dgyes pa yis/ /dngos grub 'bras bu de la stsol/ /phyag byas nas ni dngos grub ni/ /mchog la sogs pa blang bar bya/ /bla ma dkon mchog gsum po
la/ /rang rang skal pa phul nas ni/ /de nas rtag tu bdag nyid sbyar/ /de rnams med na shes rab can/ /blangs nas rang nyid spyad par bya/ /sems can kun la phan btson
zhing / /skal pa du mar gnas par 'gyur/ /legs par bsgrubs na thams cad byed/ /gnod sbyin sgyu sgar gdong la sogs/ /tshig tsam gyis ni bran bzhin du/ /zhi ba'i
las la sogs pa ni/ /thams cad byed par 'gyur ba yin// //de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sems
can sdig pa bgyis pa dmyal ba la sogs pa'i dbang du gyur pa rnams kyis dmyal ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal rab tu spang ba'i phyir ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi /bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i dbang po/ dmyal ba la sogs pa'i dbang du gyur pa'i sems can sdig pa chen po byed pa de rnams dmyal ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal
rnams las tshegs med par grol bar 'gyur ba de nyid de bzhin du nyon cig /de bzhin dkyil 'khor bris nas ni/ /brgya rtsa brgyad ni bzlas pa yi/ /bum pa rnams ni snga ma
@#/ /bzhin/ /dbang bskur ba ni brtag par bya/ /de nas sngon gyi sdig byang zhing / /dmyal ba la sogs sdug bsngal ni/ /kun las myur du rnam grol 'gyur/ /
sdig las rnam grol bdag nyid che/ /de yang gnas gtsang lhar skyes nas/ /rtag tu sangs rgyas chos pa gro thos/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas/ /rim gyis byang chub mngon
sum byed/ /de yi gzugs brnyan dang ni ming / /gur gum gyis ni bris nas su/ /ngan song gsum gyi 'jigs chen las/ /sems can rnams ni thar pa'i phyir/ /sngags pa
gzhan la phan brtson zhing / /brtse bas mngon par dbang bskur ro/ /de nas rnal 'byor can gyis ni/ /sngags dang phyag rgyas dbang skur te/ /lha yi gzugs su brtags
nas su/ /mchod rten dbus su bzhag par bya/ /rang gzhan lha yi snying po ni/ /snying ga de yi phyogs bris nas/ /lha mnyam par ni sems bskyed de/ /khyim du yang ni gzhag
par bya/ /de yi ming dang spel ba'i sngags/ /gur gum bzang pos bris nas ni/ /'bum ni yongs su rdzogs par du/ /mchod rten las ni rab tu bya/ /sdig chen sdig ni
zad bya'i phyir/ /bye ba yang ni rdzogs par bya/ /de ltar byas na de nges par/ /dmyal ba las ni grol bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin yi dwags byol song las/ /grol te lha rigs
rnams su skyes/ /de yi ming dang spel nas ni/ /ji ltar gsungs pa'i sngags stong bzlas/ /gal te brgya phrag stong yang tshad/ /byed ba'i bar du rdzogs par bya/ /lha'i rigs rnams
su skye bar 'gyur/ /de yi ming nas spel ba yi/ /mkhas pas 'bum phrag brgya 'am ni/ /yang na brgya phrag stong snyed du/ /spyin sreg byas na dmyal ba ni/ /chen po'i sdig pa
las grol 'gyur/ /ji srid mtshan ma 'bar ba yi/ /gnas su yang dag skye par 'gyur/ /yungs kar dkar po'i til dang 'bras/ /ra yi 'o ma yang dag ldan/ /de bskus yam
shing de srid du/ /cho ga ji bzhin sbyin sreg bya/ /de nas de ni nges par yang / /lha rigs rnams su skyes pa yi/ /mtshan mnye bar mthong bar 'gyur/ /gal te lha yi mchog skyes
dang / /yang na thab khung nang du ni/ /dkar po g.yas bskor 'bar ba dang / /gyen du 'greng zhing dri ma med/ /'phro ba bsdoms bzhin 'bar ba dang / /glog bzhin dri ma med 'od
brtan/ /me rtags 'di rnams mthong bar 'gyur/ /yang na me lha bdag nyid ni/ /de bzhin kho nar ston 'gyur te/ /zla ba bzhin du dri ma med/ /dkar po bzhin mdog 'bar ba'o/ /
mtshan ma 'di dag mthong ba la/ /de nas dmyal sogs rnams grol zhing / /sdig pa bcom nas bde 'gror ni/ /skyes pa yin par shes par bya/ /khru bzhi pa yi tshad du ni/ /cho ga ji bzhin thab khung
@#/ /brko/ /rdo rjes mtha' ma bskor ba yi/ /'khor lo dbus su bri bar bya/ /rigs lnga yi ni phyag rgya rnams/ /ji bzhin rang gi phyogs su bri/ /ji bzhin sems dpa' rnams dang ni/ /
'jig rten la sogs phyin nas bri/ /de nas bum pa gang ba dang / /gtor ma brgyan rnams bkang ba ni/ /brgyad dam bcu drug dag tu gzhag /bza' dang bca' ba zhal bras dang / /me tog phreng sogs
de bzhin te/ /bla re rgyal mtshan dar la sogs/ /gdugs mchog rnams kyi legs par brgyan/ /de ltar sbyin sreg thab khung ni/ /mchog tu yang dag sbyin sreg bya/ /cho ga shes
par de bris nas/ /lha yi tshogs ni spyan drangs te/ /sngags shes pas sngags phyag rgya yis/ /arga la sogs phul nas ni/ /mdor bsdus mchod par byas nas su/ /
lha yi sbyor bas rab gnas la/ /ga bur gur gum la sogs pas/ /mar dang 'o ma til bsgos la/ /til dang yungs kar 'bras rnams dang / /dri yi chus ni legs
bkang ste/ /'bras chen spos dang la du dang / /sbrang rtsi sha ka rar ldan la/ /brgya phrag du mar yongs su bzlas/ /yam shing la yang de bzhin te/ /rang gi sngags kyis
btab pa'i shing / /khung bu'i nang du gzhag par bya/ /lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / /dri za sogs su gnas pa yi/ /ro la sngags kyis btab nas su/ /chu mchog
gis ni bkrus nas ni/ /sngags bzlas dri yis byug par bya/ /gos dang rgyan gyis brgyan bya zhing / /sngags kyis btab pa'i bdug pas bdug /me tog phreng ba la sogs mchog /
gtsug phud dpung par de bzhin du/ /sngags bris na ni gdags par bya/ /snying ga mgrin pa kha phyogs su/ /sarba bid+yAs byin gyis brlab sa/ /dpral ba mdzod spu rna ba gnyis/ /
mgo bo spyi gtsug dpung pa gnyis/ /rna ba dku dang pus mo bol/ /sna yi rtse mo long bu dang / /mig gnyis dang ni gsang ba yi/ /dbang po rnams kyi gnas dang ni/ /de ltar
gzhan du'ang gnas yi ge /mchog tu dge ba de dag gzhag /de dag ngan song yongs sbyangs phyir/ /stan dang bcas te thab dbus gzhag /de nas sngags pas sngags kyis
ni/ /mngon par bsngags pa'i gos kyis g.yogs/ /de nas byin za yang dag rab sbar la/ /me lce stong gis dkrigs shing 'bar ba'i lus/ /zla ba kund bzhin du zhi ba'i
yid/ /dpag med kun la mchod yon yongs su brtag /de bzhin ji ltar gsungs pa'i mchod pa bya/ /de nas dang po de yi sbyin sreg ni/ /rdzogs par byas zhing 'bar ba nyid
la ni/ /yongs su brtags pa nas ni rgyal ba las/ /sogs pa rnams kyi brgyad ni lhag pa dang / /bcas pa'i brgya ni yongs su brtag par bya/ /de nas sbyong ba'i sngags kyi
@#/ /rgyal po yang / /bsreg bya nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su brtag /de nas zhal ras dkar po sbyar drangs la/ /yo byad rnams sam mchod yon sogs gsum
mchod/ /phyag na rdo rje pad+ma zhags pa bsnams/ /rgyan rnams thams cad kyis ni rab brgyan cing / /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid kyi dbu rgyan can/ /bsam par bya zhing yang ni
bri bar bya/ /de yi snying po brgya phyag stong ngam ni/ /ji srid bye ba'i bar du sbyin sreg bya/ /yang na mtshan ma yang dag byung na ni/ /de bzhin sdig rgyun spangs par shes par bya/ /de
nas thal bar 'gyur ba cho ga bzhin/ /rdo rje bsdu bas thal ba rus pa bsdu/ rdo rje bdud rtsi'i dri chu dang / /ba yi rnam lnga pa bcas la/ /sbyong ba'i sngags ni 'bum bzlas te/
gong bu byas nas ga bur drir/ /sa dang legs par bsres byas la/ /sku gzugs mchod rten lhar bsam zhing / /lan gcig gnyis gsum bzhi lnga 'am/ /yang na
lan grangs brgya rtsa brgyad/ /sngags dang phyag rgyas byin brlabs la/ /'bum phrag gnyis ni bzlas par bya/ /de nas mchod rten 'bar gyur tam/ /yang na sku gzugs
zhal 'dzum mam/ /de spos ngad ldan 'od snang ngam/ /lha la sogs pa sna tshogs pa/ /rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul ba dang / /me tog la sogs 'dor ba dang / /dung dang rnga dang
gling bu dang / /pi wang la sogs sgra thos 'gyur/ /gal te lha yi mtshan ma de/ /sdig mang nyid kyis ma mthong ba/ /de tshe 'bum phrag brgya stong bzlas/ /ji srid mtshan ma byung bar
du/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mchod nas ni/ /mnyam par gzhag pas bzlas par byas/ /de mthar cho ga shes par yis/ /mtshan gcig thog thag mi nyal bzlas/ /de nas de yi
sdig pa ni/ /rnam dag bdag nyid nges par mthong / /lha yi lus kyis gzugs dang ni/ /de yi rgyud du ngo shes 'gyur/ /mtshan ma 'di dag shes nas su/ /rnam par mi rtog sems
kyis ni/ /byams dang snying rje ldan pa yis/ /las rnams thams cad rab tu bya/ /gal te de yang med gyur na/ /de tshe bzlas bsgom tshul gyis phya/ /de yi ming tsam bris nas su/ /
mchod rten phreng ba bya ba dang / /sku gzugs kyang ni byas nas su/ /sbyin sreg dbang bskur byas gyur na/ /gdon mi za bar bde 'gror skye/ /thal ba yungs kar bye ma sogs/ /mi
spel sngags ni mngon btab nas/ /rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung dor/ /de ltar byas na sdig pa can/ /yin yang ngan song rnams la ni/ /rnam par thar par gyur nas kyang / /dge
ba mchog gi sa bon ni/ /bskyed dang ldan pas sangs rgyas nyid/ /'bras bur yang dag ldan pa yi/ /sbyin pa tshul khrims bzod pa dang / /brtson 'grub bsam gtan shes rab rgyu/ /
@#/ /rab tu bsgoms pa'i bsod nams ldan/ /'jig rten ngan song bcom pa ni/ /'di ltar lha yang ci zhig smos/ /'di la the tshom med pa yin/ /gang yang
dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa dang / gang yang med pa'i lta ba can dang / gang byang chub kyi lam las rnam par 'das pa'i bstan pa la zhe sdang gis gnod pa byed pa dang / sdig pa'i
rang bzhin mi shes pa pha dang / ma la sems mi brtse ba dang / byang chub kyi sems la mi brten pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba bsad pa dang / lha dang / sangs rgyas dang /
chos dang / dge 'dun dang / sngags dang / phyag rgya'i tshogs la sogs pa rnams la med pa nyid du lta ba la sogs pa'i sdig pa can rnams la de lta bu'i shes rab dang thabs
med na grol ba med do/ /zhes pa bde bar gshegs pa rgyal ba rnams kyis gsungs so/ /de nas brgya byin la sogs pa spyan pad+ma rgyas pa rnams legs so zhes bya bas mnyes
par mdzad do/ /mnyes par mdzad nas mchod pa mdzad do/ /brgya byin/ gzhan la phan par brtson pas kyang ji ltar bka' stsal ba bzhin du byas so/ /'bras bu de bzhin
du thob par gyur to/ /dbang ldan du mgrin pa sngon po glang khyu mchog la zhon pa/ sku mdog dkar po phyag bzhi pa/ g.yas pa'i dang po dang / gnyis pa rdo rje rtse gsum pa dang
mchog sbyin du bcas pa/ g.yon pa'i gcig gis rtse gsum pa 'dzin cing gnyis pas ral gri 'dzin pa/ sbrul gyi mchod phyir thogs pa can bris te/ oM pa shu pa ti nI la kaN+tha u
ma prI ya swA hA zhes pa 'dis so/ /de nas phyag rgya 'di yin te/ lag pa rdo rje khu tshur byas la mthe'u chung mthe bong gis mnan te sor mo lhag ma rnams rdo rje'i mtshan nyid du byas shing
ming med dang / mdzub mo yang rdo rje'i rnam par chung zad mdud par bya'o/ /'di ni phyags bdag gi phyag rgya'o/ /khyab 'jug khyung la zhon pa/ mdog nag po phyag bzhi pa/ phyag g.yas pa
dag na dbyug to dang / rdo rje 'dzin cing g.yon pa dag na dung dang / 'khor lo 'dzin pa'o/ /gser gyi rdo rje ma khyab 'jug lta bu gser gyi mdog can du shes par bya'o/ /rdo rje dril bu rma
bya la zhon pa/ zhal drug pa/ dmar po g.yas pa dag na shak+ti dang / rdo rje/ g.yon pa dag na khyim bya dang / dril bu 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje gzhon nu ma rdo rje dril bu lta bur shes par bya'o/ /
mi smra ba rdo rje dang pa la zhon pa/ gser mdog can/ zhal bzhi pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ phyag g.yas pa dag na rdo rje dang / bgrang phreng 'dzin cing / g.yon pa dag na dbyug tho dang / sbyi blugs
'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje zhi ba ma tshangs pa lta bur shes par bya'o/ /rdo rje mtshon cha glang po che dkar po la zhon pa/ phyag g.yon pas rang gi rdo rje 'dzin cing / g.yas pas 'jig rten las
@#/ /'das pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje khu tshur rdo rje mtshon cha ltar shes par bya'o/ /rdo rje 'khyil ba khro bo yang shing rta la zhon pa/ mdog dmar po g.yas pa
dang / g.yon pa na pad+ma dang / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi ma dang / rdo rje 'khyil pa khro bo lta bu nyid do/ /rdo rje 'od zer khro bo dkar po dang pa la zhon pa/ g.yas
pas rdo rje 'dzin cing / g.yon pas pad+ma dang / zla ba 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje 'od zer ma rdo rje khro bo lta bu'o/ /rdo rje dbyug pa khro bo rus sbal la zhon pa/ mdog sngon po phyag g.yas na rdo rje
'dzin cing / g.yon pas dbyug pa 'dzin pa'o/ /dbyug pa rdo rje mchog ma rdo rje dbyug pa khro bo lta bu'o/ /rdo rje dmar ser khro bo glang po che la zhon pa mdog dmar po/ phyag g.yas
na rdo rje 'dzin cing / g.yon pas mi bzung nas za zhing gnas pa'o/ /rdo rje ske rags ma rdo rje dmar ser khro bo lta bu'o/ /rdo rje tshogs bdag glang sna glang po che la zhon pa can/ phyag
g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin cing / g.yon pas gshol 'dzin cing gnas pa mdog dkar po'o/ /rdo rje 'dul ba ma rdo rje glang sna lta bu 'o/ /'di ni khyad par te gang zhe na/ phyag g.yon gyis
kha T+wAM ga 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje phreng ba tshogs kyi bdag po mdog ldang gu/ /bya ku li ka'i shing rta la zhon pa/ /phyag g.yas kyis rdo rje 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas me tog gi phreng ba 'dzin pa'o/ /

rdo rje gdan ma rdo rje phreng ba lta bu'o/ /'di ni khyad par te gang zhe na/ phyag g.yon gyis shak+ti 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje dbang can ne tso'i shing rta la zhon pa mdog dkar ser/ phyag g.yas pas rdo rje
'dzin pa/ g.yon pas chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan bsnams pa'o/ /rdo rje dbang can ma rdo rje dbang can lta bu ste 'di ni khyad par ro/ /gang zhen/ mdog dmar po'o/ /rnam rgyal rdo rje tshogs kyi
bdag po sbal pa la zhon pa mdog dkar po'o/ /phyag g.yas na rdo rje 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas ral gri 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje gdengs pa ma rnam rgyal rdo rje lta bu'o/ /rdo rje gtun shing pho nya mo
me tog gi shing rta'i khang bu la zhon pa mdog dkar ser/ phyag g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas gtun shing 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje gtun shing pho nya mo rdo rje gtun shing lta bu ste
'di ni khyad par ro/ /gang zhe na/ g.yon gyis kha T+wAM ga 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje rlung gi pho nya mdog sngon po'i ri dwags la zhon pa/ phyag g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin pa/ g.yon pa/ /gyon pas dar 'dzin
pa'o/ /mgyogs pa'i rdo rje ma rdo rje rlung gi pho nya lta bu'o/ /rdo rje me'i pho nya mo ra stes la zhon pa mdog dmar po/ g.yen du 'bar ba'i 'od rtse gsum pa 'bar ba'i phyag g.yas pa dag na rdo
rje dang / go cha 'dzin pa/ g.yon pa dag na dbyug pa dang / spyi blugs 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje 'bar ba rdo rje me lta bu'o/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed po nya sngon po ro langs la zhon pa/ phyag g.yas pas
@#/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas rtse gsum 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje gtsigs pa pho nya mo rdo rje 'jigs byed lta bu ste 'di ni khyad par ro/ /gang zhe na/ g.yon pas
zhags pa 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje lcags kyu bran klu lhag pa la zhon pa sngon po/ phag gi gdong pa can g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas lcags kyu 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje nag po
bra na mo ro langs kyi zhon pa can/ phyag g.yon gyis kha T+wAM ga 'dzin pa/ phyag g.yas kyis rdo rje 'dzin pa/ mdog nag mo'o/ /rdo rje log 'dren phran bra ba byi ba la zhon pa mdog dkar
po/ glang po che'i gdong pa can/ phyag g.yas dag na rdo rje dang / dgra sta 'dzin pa/ g.yon dag na rtse gsum dang ni dbyug pa 'dzin pa/ sbrul gyi mchod phyir thogs pa'o/ /rdo rje srul
mo bran mo mdog sngon mo/ g.yas na rdo rje 'dzin pa g.yon pa phyags ma 'dzin pa bra ba byi ba la zhon pa'o/ /klu rdo rje'i chu srin zhon pa dang gdengs ka brgyad pa/ mdog dkar po g.yas pas
rdo rje 'dzin pa/ g.yon pa klu'i zhags pa'i 'dzin pa'o/ /rdo rje chu srin ma bran mo chu srin la zhon pa/ mdog dkar po gdengs ka brgyad ma/ g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin pa/ g.yon pas rdo
rjes mtshan pa'i chu srin 'dzin pa'o/ /'jigs mdog ma ljang gu g.yas pas rdo rje 'dzin cing / g.yon pas ral gri be Ta ka 'dzin pa'o/ /dpal mo mdog dkar ser g.yas
pas rdo rje 'dzin cing / g.yon pas pad+ma 'dzin pa'o/ /dbyangs can ma mdog dkar mo/ phyag g.yon pas pi wang dang g.yas pas rdo rje ma'o/ /bgrod ka mdog ljang gu seng+ge la zhon pa/
phyag g.yas pa dag na rdo rje dang 'khor lo 'dzin pa/ g.yon pa dag na lde men dang ral gri 'dzin pa'o/ /ma mo thams cad dang / drag po la sogs pa dang / chu bdag gi mthar thug pa rnams kyi
dang / gang phyag g.yas su rdo rje gsungs pa de ni rdo rje rtse gsum par shes par bya'o/ /'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lha thams cad rnam par snang mdzad la mngon du bltas
pa'o/ /de nas thun mtshams kyi dus su rdo rje ti rin ti ris dag par bcings te me tog sngon po'i phreng ba bzung la dkyil 'khor du 'jug go /yi ge hUM bzhi pa brjod cing rdo rjes rnam par snang
mdzad la skor ba bdun dang / dung dang / dril bu'i sgra bsgrags par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi yang lhag pa dang / chad pa'i nyes bzhi bar bya ba'i nges par bltas te phreng ba bcom
ldan 'das la phul nas rdo rje'i gar byas la blangs te yi ge hUM bzhi pa nyid kyis rang gi mgo bor bcing ngo / /ji ltar cho ga bzhin du yang / /gang zhig chad pa yongs su bskang / /mkhas
pas lhag pa rnam spang phyir/ /rdo rje dril bu kun tog bya/ /'grub 'gyur nyes pa spang mi bya/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de nas 'dug par gyur pa yi/ /rdo rje slob dpon mnyam gzhag pas/ /rdo
@#/ /rje sgo ni bzhi po rnams/ /yid kyi dbye bar bya ba nyid/ /oM badzro t+g+ha Ta ya sa ma ya pra be sha hUM zhes bya'o/ /phyag rgya yang 'di yin te/ rdo rje khu tshur gnyis gshibs
te/ /mdzub mo gan rkyal yang dag gzung / /legs par drag tu rnam par dbye/ /sgo dbye ba yi cho ga yin/ /zhes pa'o/ /de nas lcags kyu la sogs pas las rnams byas
la rin po che bdun las byas pa'am/ sa las byas pa'i bum pa/ nag po la sogs pa med pa/ mgrin pa ring ba/ mchu 'phyang ba/ lto ba che ba/ lha rdzas kyi dri'i chu dang / rin
po che dang / sman thams cad dang / 'bru thams cad kyis yongs su rdzogs pa/ yal 'dab dang bcas pa mgrin pa la gos dam pas legs par bcings la bsrung ba byas
pa/ phyi rol kun tu lha rdzas kyi dri rjes su byugs pa/ me tog gi phreng ba btags pa'i rdo rjes steng du mtshan pa/ rdo rje chen pos byin gyis brlabs pa/ khro bo ti rin ti ris yongs
su bzung ba'i rdo rje dang me tog gi yal 'dab kyis/ oM badzra u da ka hUM zhes bya ba 'di stong rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags pa'i yi ge hUM bzhi pa brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags pa
byas la/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi spyan sngar legs par bzhag go /'jug pa'i sgo la mngon par phyogs pa'i phyi rol du bum pa gnyis pa la yi ge hUM bzhi pa
brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa bzhag go /de'i chus bdag nyid dang slob ma dbang bskur ba bya ste gzhug pa'i phyag rgya bcings nas sam ma bcings pa yang ngo / /byu ru de bzhin sa le
spram/ /dung dang de bzhin nor bu ni/ /rin chen kun te sing g+h+ri dang / /byA g+h+rI gi ri be be ri/ /sman kun til nas sran ma sha /'bras dang gro ni lnga pa ste/ /sman lnga 'bru kun sgras
mtshon pa'o/ /de'i rjes la phyag rgya bzhi la sogs pa sngon du 'gro ba'i sdom pa 'dzin du bcug nas rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi gos sngon po la yang yongs su bzlas te/ sems dpa'i
gtsug tor gyis gtsug tor bcing ba dang / sgo skyong gis gdong bcing ba dang / rdo rje go chas stod g.yogs dang / gtsug tor la sogs pa can gyis slob dpon gyis khro bo ti rin ti
ris me tog sngon po'i phreng ba bzung nas/ oM badzra ma ya ma pra be shA mi zhes brjod cing zhugs la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gsol ba gdab ste/ bcom ldan 'das
zhes bya ba la sogs pas so/ /de nas rdo rje'i chu 'thungs nas bdag nyid 'jug par byas la/ phreng ba de dkyil 'khor chen por dor la rang rang gi mgo la bcings te/ gdong bcings
pa bkrol la/ ji lta ba bzhin du dkyil 'khor la bltas te/ tiSh+Tha badzra zhes pa la sogs pas gzhug pa'i phyag rgya dgrol ba yang byas la chu'i dbang bskur ba dang / sangs rgyas
@#/ /lnga'i cod pan dang / dar dbyangs dang / rdo rje dang / phreng ba dang / bdag po la sogs pas dbang bskur ba dgu bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga
nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas blangs pa de kho na nyid dang / chos dang / dam tshig dang / dngos grub dang / rdo rje brtul zhugs kyang bzung la/ me tog la sogs
pas kyang bdag nyid legs par mchod de tshigs su bcad pa lnga pas rjes su gnang ba dang / yi ge hUM gis gzengs bstod pa dang / lung bstan pa yang smos la/ slar yang byin
gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas la ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i bzlas pa yang ste hUM kA ra badzra haM zhes pa'o/ /rang gi mtshan brjod par bya zhing rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag
rgya chen po bcing la/ de'i sngags aH'i rnam pa'i mtha' can gyi rnam par snang mdzad kyi gnas su de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje'i bdag nyid dbab bo/ /badzro haM zhes bya ba yis
rdo rje'i nga rgyal rnam par bsgoms la de rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad du bsgoms te/ badzra d+hA tu a haM zhes pa'o/ /de ltar rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar gyi phyag rgya chen po bcings la byang
gi sgor de'i sngags aH'i rnam pa'i mtha' can gyi rdo rje dril bu bdag nyid dbab pa'o/ /badzra g+haN+Do haM zhes pa'i nga rgyal bskyed la de badzra A be sha kro d+ho haM zhes bsgom
mo/ /de lta bu'i rdo rjer bsgrub pa yin no/ /de nas yang rdo rje slob dpon gyis sems dpa' rdo rje lcags kyus bcings la se gol legs par gtogs par byed cing sangs rgyas
thams cad 'dus par bya ste/ oM badzra sa mA ya dzaHdzaHhUM baM hoHzhes pa lan nyi shu rtsa gcig rab tu brjod do/ /de nas myur du phyag rgya chen po dang / rdo rje khro bo dam tshig brjod
do/ /de ma thag tu mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa mchog go /de nas rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'i rang gi sgo nas spyan drangs la bcug ste/ bcings nas dbang du byas la ji lta ba bzhin
du yi ge hUM bzhi pas mchod yon phul te dpal rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams dang / bskal pa bzang po'i mthar thug pa rnams bsgrubs te rang
gi sngags brjod pa ji lta bur brjod cing dzaHhUM baM hoHsa ma ya s+t+waM sa ma ya s+t+waM a haM/ de nas rang gi sngags brjod do/ /de lta bus 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas dam tshig gi
phyag rgya rnams dbyung ste/ /rdo rje las gsang dam pa byung / /dam tshig mchog rnams nyid du grags/ /khro bo'i bcing ba bla med pa/ /de rnams bcing bar rab bshad bya/ /lag
par rdo rje kun tu bsnol/ /mthe chung lcags kyu bcing ba nyid/ /mdzub mo dag ni rab tu brkyang / /'jig rten gsum po rnam rgyal zhes/ /de bzhin mdzub mo kha sprad cing / /nor bu nyid ni
@#/ /bar ma bskum/ /bsnyams la dbu ma pad+ma nyid/ /gung mo mdzub mo gnyis sdigs mdzub/ /sdigs mdzub gnyis ni rdo rje yang / /g.yas pa bkug
pa lcags kyu'o/ /de dag nyid sbyar yi ge hUM/ /legs pa'i rnam pa de bzhin yang / /mdzub gnyis logs gnas khro gnyer du/ /snying gar nyi ma mdzub gnyis zlum/ /
lag pa mgo bor rab tu brkyang / /mdzub mo kha ru dgod pa can/ /mdzub mo sen mo kun tu rig /g.yas pa mdzod kyi khu tshur yang / /gung mo'i mgo bcas 'khor lo
nyid/ /kha las rab mchog mthon pa yi/ /mdzub mo dbu ma rdo rje yang / /mdzub mo mgrin pa bskor ba dang / /mdzub mo lhag ma mche ba che/ /rdo rje khu tshur mthe bong
bsdam/ /sgeg mo la sogs pa rnams ni rdo rje dbyings su bshad pa bzhin du bya ba 'di lta ste/ /rdo rje bsdams pa bcings nas su/ /snying gar yang na mthe bong mnyam/ /
legs par rab brkyang phreng ba ma/ /thal mo sbyar mchog kha nas dbyung / /gar las sbyi por thal mo sbyar/ /rdo rje bsdams pa thur du sbyin/ /thal mo legs sbyar gyen
du gtor/ /mthe bong bsnyams te nges par bsnyams/ /rab tu brkyang ba byug pa yi/ /mdzub mo gcig ni bkug pa dang / /mthe bong gnyis ni mdud pa bcings/ /mthe
bong mdzub mo bsnol ba bcing / /rdo rje khu tshur mchog bsdams nyid/ /ces pa'o/ /snying po'i dkyil 'khor la rdo rje rtse lnga pa rnam par bsams la hUM gi rnams pa nyid brjod
cing phyag rgya thams cad bcing bar bya'o/ /de nas phyag rgya'i nges par 'byung ba ste/ rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi phyag rgya ni/ rnam par snang mdzad/ rdo rje hUM mdzad/ rin chen hUM mdzad/ chos
kyi hUM mdzad/ las kyi hUM mdzad kyi gnas su yang ngo / /de nas rin chen hUM mdzad la sogs pa rnams kyi sngags rnams 'byung ste/ oM badzra b+h+r-i ku Ti kro d+ha A na ya sarba rat+na ni hrIHhUM

phaT/ oM badzra hrIHSh+Ti krod+ha duSh+Ta mA ra ya hUM phaT/ oM badzra bi shwa kro d+ha ku ru sarba bi shwa ru pA ya sA d+ha ya hUM phaT/ phyag rgya gzhan rnams ni sems dpa' rdo rje ma nas brtsams par
blta'o/ /de nyid kyi phyir rig pa thams cad kyi mchog rnams kyis rnam par rgyal ba'i sngags su bshad do/ /rdo rje hUM mdzad dang bcas pa'i phyag rgya bsdu bas yang bcom ldan 'das
rdo rje hUM mdzad bklag par bya'o/ /gzhan rnams rdo rje hUM mdzad du 'gyur ba rigs pa yang ma yin te/ rgyud thams cad du hUM mdzad nges par bstan pa yang ma yin no/ /de'i rjes su de
kho na bzhin lce la rdo rje bskod de rim pa bzhin du sangs rgyas rdo rje 'chang la sogs pa'i chos kyi yi ge rnams dgod do/ /de rnams kyang / /hUM yig sangs rgyas rdo rje can/ /trAM yig rdo
@#/ /rje'i snying po yi/ /hrIHyig rnam pa rdo rje'i sde'i/ /AHyig rdo rje sna tshogs kyi/ /hUM sems dpa' rdo rje'i ma yi/ /trI rin chen rdo rje ma yi/ /hrIHchos kyi rdo
rje ma yi/ /aHlas kyi rdo rje'i ma yi/ /hUM hUM/ trAM trAM/ hrIHhrIH/ aHaHzhes bya'o/ /rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa dga' ba chen po la hUM/ gzugs mdzes pa la hUM/ rna ba
bde ba la hUM/ mchod pa thams cad la hUM/ rab tu dga' ba la hUM/ dbus su bgrod pal hUM/ legs par gzi mchog la hUM/ dri bzang mchog la hUM/ A yA hi dza hUM/ A hi
hUM hUM hUM/ hi s+pho Ta baM hU
g+haN+Ta a aHhUM rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs pa nas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i mthar thug pa rnams kyi'o/ /de ma thag tu aH'i yi ge las/ snying gar sna tshogs rdo rje
bskyed pa las kyi phyag rgya bcing / /de la khro bo'i khu tshur rnam par gnyis byas pa la g.yon pa'i rdo rje sor mo g.yas pa bzung zhing bsgreng ba byang chub mchog ces bya ba'i phyag rgya
'di ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rab tu ster ro/ /gnyis po de dag gis 'gying ba dang bcas pas gsal bar byed pa ni rdo rje hUM mdzad dang / rdo rje sems dpa' dang / sems
dpa' rdo rje ma rnams kyi'o/ /lcags kyu 'dzin par yang dag gnas/ /mda' gsor ba yi sbyor ba dang / /legs so zhes bya snying gar gnas/ /rdo rje gnyis nyid dbang bskur
ba/ /rin chen hUM mdzad dang / /rdo rje khro gnyer dang / khro bo dang / rin chen rdo rje ma rnams kyi'o/ /snying gar nyi ma rab tu blta/ /g.yon gnas lag ngar dbyug pa dang / /de bzhin
'di ni yongs su bzlog /g.yas dang g.yas min rnam par bsnol/ /chos kyi hUM mdzad dang / rdo rje chos dang / chos kyi rdo rje ma rnams kyi'o/ /snying gar nyi ma la ral gri'o/ /mgal
me'i 'khor lo bskor ba nyid/ /rdo rje gnyis ni khar gnas shing / /rdo rje'i gar ni bgrol bas ni/ /'gram pa spyi gtsug yang dag gnas/ /las kyi hUM mdzad dang / /rdo rje las
dang | las kyi rdo rje ma rnams kyi'o/ /go cha mthe chung mche ba mchog /khu tshur gnyis ni nges par bcing / /rdo rje 'gyings pa'i rab sbyor bas/ /bsam pa g.yos pas 'dud
par bya/ /phreng ba bcings te kha nas dbyung / /gar las spyi bor thal mo sbyar/ /'og tu 'phyang dang gyen du 'thor/ /mthe bo bsnyams te nges par gshibs/ /dri byug pa yi sbyor ba
las/ /mchod pa'i phyag rgya rab tu grags/ /mdzub mo lcags kyu bcings pa yis/ /mthe chung las ni lcags kyu che/ /mkhrig ma mdud pa mchog dag bsnol/ /rgyab dag kyang
ni nges par gshibs/ /zhes sgo skyong rnams kyi phyag rgya'o/ /las kyi phyag rgya thams cad kyang gar las 'byung ba yin no/ /de nas rnam par snang mdzad pa sogs pa rnams kyi bcing
@#/ /bar bya'o/ /rdo rje sems ma dang / rin chen dang / chos dang / las kyi rdo rje ma rnams kyi yang ste rdo rje dang po dang / mthar gnas pa'i skyes pa dang / bud
med kyi gzugs 'dzin pa de rnams kyi bdag nyid chen po gang dang / gang gi phyag rgya gang dang / gang yin pa rnams bcing ngo / /thams cad kyi phyag rgya dam tshig phyag rgya yang yin
te/ g.yon pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gan rgyal du byas la lag pa g.yas pa'i mdzub mo dang / mthe bong dag dang / mthe chung nas brtsams te kha phye ba'i thal mo kha sbyar
